original: Padaṭṭhānanti āsannakāraṇaṃ, idhāpi padaṭṭhānavicāraṇātiādi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

original: Viyūhīyanti vibhāgena piṇḍīyanti etena, ettha vāti byūho. Nibbacanādīnaṃ sutte dassiyamānānaṃ catunnaṃ byūhoti catubyūho, catunnaṃ vā byūho etthāti catubyūho.

original: Āvaṭṭīyanti etena, ettha vā sabhāgā visabhāgā ca dhammā, tesaṃ vā āvaṭṭananti āvaṭṭo.

original: Pakārehi pabhedato vā ñāpīyanti iminā, ettha vā atthāti paññatti.

original: Otārīyanti anuppavesīyanti etena, ettha vā suttāgatā dhammā paṭiccasamuppādādīsūti otaraṇo.

original: Tassāti yathāvuttassa hāruddesassa. Anugītīti vuttassevatthassa sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ

analyzed: purimā disā pacchimā disā iti vuccamānā disā avisesā ca evam sāmañña visesā api tathā

analyzed: hi idam dukkhan ti vuccamānam jāti ādi apekkhāya sāmaññam pi samānam sacca apekkhāya

original: viseso hoti. Esa nayo samudayādīsupi. Eso hāro adhiṭṭhānoti evaṃ suttāgatānaṃ dhammānaṃ
analyzed: visesaḥ hoti esa nayo samudaya ādīsu pi eso hāro adhiṭṭhāno ti evam sutta āgatānam dhammānam

original: avikappanavasena sāmaññavisesaniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo adhiṭṭhāno hāro nāmāti attho.
analyzed: avikappana vasena sāmañña visesa niddhāraṇa lakkhaṇaḥ adhiṭṭhānaḥ hāraḥ nāma ati attho

original: 15. Ye dhammāti ye avijjādikā paccayadhammā. Yaṃ dhammanti yaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ paccayuppannadhammaṃ.
analyzed: ye dhammā ti ye avijjā ādikā paccaya dhammā yam dhammam ti yam saṅkhāra ādikam paccaya uppanna dhammam

original: Janayantīti nibbattenti. Paccayāti sahajātapaccayabhāvena. Paramparatoti paramparapaccayabhāvena,
analyzed: janayanti iti nibbattenti paccayā ati sahajāta paccaya bhāvena paramparato ti parampara paccaya bhāvena

original: anurūpasantānaghaṭanavasena paccayo hutvāti attho. Upanissayakoṭi hi idhādhippetā.
analyzed: anurūpa santāna ghaṭana vasena paccayaḥ hutvā ti attho upanissaya koṭi hi idha adhippetā

original: Purimasmiṃ avasiṭṭho paccayabhāvo. Hetumavakaḍḍhayitvāti taṃ yathāvuttapaccayasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: purimasmin avasiṭṭhaḥ paccaya bhāvaḥ hetum avakaḍḍhayitvā ati tam yathā vutta paccaya saṅkhātam

original: janakādibhedabhinnaṃ hetuṃ ākaḍḍhitvā suttato niddhāretvā yo saṃvaṇṇanāsaṅkhāto,
analyzed: janaka ādi bheda bhinnam hetum ākaḍḍhitvā suttataḥ niddhāretvā yaḥ saṃvaṇṇanā saṅkhāto

original: eso hāro parikkhāroti evaṃ sutte āgatadhammānaṃ parikkhārasaṅkhāte hetupaccaye niddhāretvā
analyzed: eso hāro parikkhāro ti evam sutte āgata dhammānam parikkhāra saṅkhāte hetu paccaye niddhāretvā

original: saṃvaṇṇanalakkhaṇo parikkhāro hāroti attho.
analyzed: saṃvaṇṇana lakkhaṇaḥ parikkhāraḥ hāraḥ ti attho

original: 16. Ye dhammāti ye sīlādidhammā. Yaṃmūlāti yesaṃ samādhiādīnaṃ mūlabhūtā, te tesaṃ
analyzed: ye dhammā ati ye sīla ādi dhammā yaṃmūlā ati yesam samādhi ādīnam mūla bhūtā te tesam

original: samādhiādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānabhāvena samāropayitabbāti sambandho. Ye cekatthā pakāsitā
analyzed: samādhi ādīnam padaṭṭhāna bhāvena samāropayitabbā ati sambandhaḥ ye cekatthā pakāsitā

original: munināti ye ca rāgavirāgācetovimuttisekkhaphalakāmadhātusamatikkamanādisaddā anāgāmiphalatthatāya
analyzed: muninā ati ye ca rāga virāga acetaḥ vimutti sekkha phala kāmadhātu samatikkamana ādi saddāḥ anāgāmi phala ttha tāya

original: ekatthā buddhamuninā paridīpitā, te aññamaññavevacanabhāvena samāropayitabbāti sambandho.
analyzed: ekatthā buddha muninā paridīpitā te aññamañña vevacana bhāvena samāropayitabbā ti sambandhaḥ

original: Samāropanañcettha sutte yathārutavasena niddhāraṇavasena vā gayhamānassa sikkhattayasaṅkhātassa
analyzed: samāropanam ca ittha sutte yathāruta vasena niddhāraṇa vasena vā gayhamānassa sikkhattaya saṅkhātassa

original: sīlādikkhandhattayassa pariyāyantaravibhāvanamukhena bhāvanāpāripūrikathanaṃ, bhāvanāpāripūrī
analyzed: sīla ādi kkhandha ttayassa bhāvanā pāripūri kathanam bhāvanā pāripūrī

original: ca pahātabbassa pahānenāti pahānasamāropanāpi atthato dassitā eva hoti. Esa samāropano
analyzed: ca pahātabbassa pahānena ati pahāna samāropanā api atthataḥ dassitā eva hoti esa samāropano

original: hāroti esa sutte āgatadhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānavevacanabhāvanāpahānasamāropanavicāraṇalakkhaṇo
analyzed: hāro ti esa sutte āgata dhammānam padaṭṭhāna vevacana bhāvanā apahāna samāropana vicāraṇa lakkhaṇo

original: samāropano nāma hāroti attho.
analyzed: samāropanaḥ nāma hāro ti attho

original: Nayasaṅkhepo
analyzed: naya saṅkhepaḥ

original: 17. Evaṃ gāthābandhavasena soḷasapi hāre niddisitvā idāni naye niddisituṃ “taṇhañcā”tiādi
analyzed: evam gāthābandha vasena hāre niddisitvā idāni naye niddisitum

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha taṇhañca avijjampi cāti sutte āgataṃ atthato niddhāraṇavasena vā gahitaṃ
analyzed: vuttam tattha taṇham ca avijjam pi ca ati sutte āgatam atthataḥ niddhāraṇa vasena vā gahitam

original: taṇhaṃ avijjañca yo netīti sambandho. Yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso taṃ neti saṃkilesapakkhaṃ
analyzed: taṇham avijjam ca yaḥ neti iti sambandhaḥ yaḥ saṃvaṇṇanā visesaḥ tam neti saṃkilesa pakkham

original: pāpeti saṃkilesavasena suttatthaṃ yojetīti adhippāyo. Samathenāti samādhinā. Vipassanāyāti
analyzed: pāpa iti saṃkilesa vasena sutta attham yojeti iti adhippāyaḥ samathena ati samādhinā vipassanāya ati

original: paññāya, yo neti vodānapakkhaṃ pāpeti, tathā suttatthaṃ yojetīti adhippāyo. Saccehi
analyzed: paññāya yaḥ na iti vodāna pakkham pāpeti tathā sutta ttham yojeti iti adhippāyaḥ saccehi

original: yojayitvāti nayanto ca taṇhā ca avijjā ca bhavamūlakattā samudayasaccaṃ, avasesā
analyzed: yojayitvā ati ca taṇhā ca avijjā ca bhava mūla kattā samudaya saccam avasesā

original: tebhūmakadhammā dukkhasaccaṃ, samathavipassanā maggasaccaṃ, tena pattabbā asaṅkhatadhātu
analyzed: tebhūmaka dhammāḥ dukkha saccam samatha vipassanā magga saccam tena pattabbāḥ asaṅkhata dhātu

original: nirodhasaccanti evaṃ imehi catūhi saccehi yojetvā. Ayaṃ nayo nandiyāvaṭṭoti yo taṇhāvijjāhi
analyzed: nirodha saccanti evam imehi catūhi saccehi yojetvā ayam nayaḥ yaḥ

original: saṃkilesapakkhassa suttatthassa samathavipassanāhi vodānapakkhassa catusaccayojanamukhena
analyzed: saṃkilesa pakkhassa suttatthassa samatha vipassanāhi vodāna pakkhassa catur acca yojana mukhena

original: nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso, ayaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭo nayo nāmāti attho. Ettha ca nayassa
analyzed: nayana lakkhaṇaḥ saṃvaṇṇanā visesaḥ ayam nandiyāvaṭṭaḥ nayaḥ nāma ati atthaḥ ettha ca nayassa

original: bhūmi gāthāyaṃ “nayo”ti vuttā, tasmā saṃvaṇṇanāvisesoti vuttaṃ. Na hi atthanayo saṃvaṇṇanā,
analyzed: bhūmi gāthā ayam nayo ti vuttā tasmā saṃvaṇṇanā visesaḥ ti vuttam na hi attha nayo saṃvaṇṇanā

original: catusaccapaṭivedhassa anurūpo pubbabhāge anugāhaṇanayo atthanayo. Tassa pana yā ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ
analyzed: catu acca paṭivedhassa anurūpaḥ pubba bhāge anugāhaṇa nayaḥ attha nayaḥ tassa pana yā ugghaṭita ññu ādīnam

original: vasena taṇhādimukhena nayabhūmiracanā, tattha nayavohāro.
analyzed: vasena taṇhā ādi mukhena naya bhūmi racanā tattha naya vohāro

original: 18. Akusaleti dvādasacittuppādasaṅgahite sabbepi akusale dhamme. Samūlehīti attano
analyzed: akusala iti dvādasa cittuppāda saṅgahite sabbe pi akusale dhamme sa mūlehi iti attanaḥ

original: mūlehi, lobhadosamohehīti attho. Kusaleti sabbepi catubhūmake kusale dhamme. Kusalamūlehīti
analyzed: mūlehi lobha dosa mohehi iti attho kusala iti sabbe pi catu bhūmake kusale dhamme kusala mūlehi iti

original: kusalehi alobhādimūlehi yo neti. Nayanto ca kusalākusalaṃ māyāmarīciādayo viya abhūtaṃ
analyzed: kusalehi alobha ādi mūlehi yaḥ na iti nayanto ca kusala akusalam māyā marīci ādayaḥ

original: na hotīti bhūtaṃ. Paṭaghaṭādayo viya na sammutisaccamattanti tathaṃ. Akusalassa iṭṭhavipākatābhāvato
analyzed: na hoti iti bhūtam paṭa ghaṭa ādayaḥ viya na akusalassa iṭṭha vipāka tā bhāvato

original: kusalassa ca aniṭṭhavipākatābhāvato vipāke sati avisaṃvādakattā avitathaṃ neti. Evametesaṃ
analyzed: kusalassa ca aniṭṭha vipāka tā bhāvataḥ vipāke sati avisaṃvādaka ttā avitatham na iti evam etesam

original: tiṇṇampi padānaṃ kusalākusalavisesanatā daṭṭhabbā. Atha vā akusalamūlehi akusalāni
analyzed: tiṇṇam pi padānam kusala akusala visesana tā daṭṭhabbā atha vā akusala mūlehi akusalāni

original: kusalamūlehi ca kusalāni nayanto ayaṃ nayo bhūtaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ neti, cattāri
analyzed: kusala mūlehi ca kusalāni nayantaḥ ayam nayaḥ bhūtam tatham avitatham na iti cattāri

original: saccāni niddhāretvā yojetīti attho. Dukkhādīni hi bādhakādibhāvato aññathābhāvābhāvena
analyzed: saccāni niddhāretvā yojeti iti atthaḥ dukkha ādīni hi bādhaka ādi bhāvataḥ aññathābhāva abhāvena

original: bhūtāni, saccasabhāvattā tathāni, avisaṃvādanato avitathāni. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā
analyzed: bhūtāni sacca sabhāva ttā tathāni avisaṃvādanato avitathāni vuttam ha etam bhagavatā

original: “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathānī”ti. Tipukkhalaṃ taṃ nayaṃ
analyzed: cattāri imāni bhikkhave tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni iti tipukkhalam tam nayam

original: āhūti yo akusalamūlehi saṃkilesapakkhassa kusalamūlehi vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa
analyzed: yaḥ akusala mūlehi saṃkilesa pakkhassa kusala mūlehi vodāna pakkhassa suttatthassa

original: catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso, taṃ tipukkhalaṃ nayanti vadantīti attho.
analyzed: catur acca yojana mukhena nayana lakkhaṇaḥ saṃvaṇṇanā viseso tam tipukkhalam nayanti vadanti iti attho

original: 19. Vipallāsehīti asubhe subhantiādinayappavattehi catūhi vipallāsehi. Kileseti kilissanti
analyzed: vipallāsehi iti asubhe subha nti ādi naya ppavattehi catūhi vipallāsehi kileseti

original: vibādhiyantīti kilesā, saṃkiliṭṭhadhammā, saṃkilesapakkhanti attho. Keci “saṃkilese”tipi
analyzed: vibādhiyanti iti kilesā saṃkiliṭṭha dhammā saṃkilesa pakkhanti attho keci

original: paṭhanti, kilesasahiteti attho. Indriyehīti saddhādīhi indriyehi. Saddhammeti paṭipattipaṭivedhasaddhamme,
analyzed: paṭhanti kilesa sahita iti atthaḥ indriyehi iti saddhā ādīhi indriyehi saddhamme iti paṭipatti paṭivedha saddhamme

original: vodānapakkhanti attho. Etaṃ nayanti yo subhasaññādīhi vipallāsehi sakalassa saṃkilesapakkhassa
analyzed: vodāna pakkham ti atthaḥ etam nayanti yaḥ subha saññā ādīhi vipallāsehi sakalassa saṃkilesa pakkhassa

original: saddhindriyādīhi vodānapakkhassa catusaccayojanavasena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso,
analyzed: saddhi indriya ādīhi vodāna pakkhassa catu sacca yojana vasena nayana lakkhaṇaḥ saṃvaṇṇanā viseso

original: etaṃ nayaṃ nayavidū saddhammanayakovidā, atthanayakusalā eva vā sīhavikkīḷitaṃ nayanti vadantīti attho.
analyzed: etam nayam naya vidū saddhamma naya kovidāḥ attha naya kusalāḥ eva vā sīha vikkīḷitam nayanti vadanti iti attho

original: 20. Veyyākaraṇesūti tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanatthaṃ katesu suttassa atthavissajjanesūti
analyzed: veyyākaraṇesu iti tassa tassa attha nayassa yojana attham katesu suttassa attha vissajjanesu iti

original: attho. Tenevāha “tahiṃ tahi”nti. Kusalākusalāti vodāniyā saṃkilesikā ca tassa tassa
analyzed: tena iva āha tahim tahim ti kusala akusalā ati vodāniyā saṃkilesikā ca tassa tassa

original: nayassa disābhūtadhammā. Vuttāti suttato niddhāretvā kathitā. Manasā volokayateti
analyzed: nayassa disābhūta dhammā vuttā ati suttataḥ niddhāretvā kathitā manasā volokayatā iti

original: te yathāvuttadhamme citteneva “ayaṃ paṭhamā disā ayaṃ dutiyā disā”tiādinā tassa tassa
analyzed: te yathāvutta dhamme cittena iva ayam paṭhamā disā ayam dutiyā disā ati ādinā tassa tassa

original: nayassa disābhāvena upaparikkhati, vicāretīti attho. “Olokayate te abahī”tipi pāṭho.
analyzed: nayassa disā abhāvena upaparikkhati vicāreti iti atthaḥ olokayate te abahi iti pi pāṭhaḥ

original: Tattha teti te yathāvuttadhamme. Abahīti abbhantaraṃ, citte evāti attho. Taṃ khu
analyzed: tattha te iti te yathāvutta dhamme abahi iti abbhantaram citte eva ati attho tam khu

original: disālocanaṃ āhūti olokayateti ettha yadetaṃ olokanaṃ, taṃ disālocanaṃ nāma nayaṃ
analyzed: disālocanam olokayata iti ettha yat etam olokanam tam disālocanam nāma nayam

original: vadanti. Khu-ti ca nipāto avadhāraṇe. Tena olokanameva ayaṃ nayo, na koci atthavisesoti dasseti.
analyzed: vadanti ca nipātaḥ avadhāraṇe tena olokanam eva ayam nayaḥ na koci attha visesaḥ ti dasseti

original: 21. Oloketvāti paṭhamādidisābhāvena upaparikkhitvā. Disālocanenāti disālocananayena
analyzed: oloketvā ti paṭhama ādi disā bhāvena upaparikkhitvā disa ālocanena ati disa ālocana nayena

original: karaṇabhūtena. Yena hi vidhinā tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanāya disā olokīyanti,
analyzed: karaṇa bhūtena yena hi vidhinā tassa tassa attha nayassa yojanāya disāḥ olokīyanti

original: so vidhi disālocananti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Ukkhipiyāti uddharitvā, disābhūtadhamme
analyzed: saḥ vidhi disā locananti evam vā ettha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo ukkhipiya ati uddharitvā disā bhūta dhamme

original: suttato niddhāretvāti attho. “Ukkhipiya yo samānetī”tipi paṭhanti, tassattho – “yo
analyzed: suttataḥ niddhāretvā ti attho ukkhipiya yaḥ samāneti iti pi paṭhanti tassa atthaḥ yaḥ

original: tesaṃ disābhūtadhammānaṃ samānayanaṃ karotī”ti. Yanti vā kiriyāparāmasanaṃ. Samānetīti
analyzed: tesam disābhūta dhammānam samānayanam karoti iti yanti vā kiriyā parāmasanam samāneti iti

original: samaṃ, sammā vā āneti tassa tassa nayassa yojanāvasena. Ke pana āneti? Sabbe kusalākusale
analyzed: samam sammā vā āneti tassa tassa nayassa yojanā vasena ke pana āneti sabbe kusala akusale

original: taṃtaṃnayadisābhūte. Ayaṃ nayoti samānetīti ettha yadetaṃ taṃtaṃnayadisābhūtadhammānaṃ
analyzed: taṃ taṃ naya disā bhūte ayam samānā iti iti ettha yat etam taṃ taṃ naya disā bhūta dhammānam

original: samānayanaṃ, ayaṃ aṅkuso nāma nayoti attho. Etañca dvayaṃ “vohāranayo, kammanayo”ti ca vuccati.
analyzed: samānayanam ayam aṅkusaḥ nāma nayo ti attho etat ca dvayam vohāra nayo kamma nayo ti ca vuccati

original: 22. Evaṃ hāre naye ca niddisitvā idāni nesaṃ yojanakkamaṃ dassento “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: evam hāre naye ca niddisitvā idāni yojana kkamam dassento soḷasa hārā

original: Tattha paṭhamaṃ soḷasa hārā “yojetabbā”ti vacanaseso. Hārasaṃvaṇṇanā paṭhamaṃ kātabbā
analyzed: tattha paṭhamam soḷasa hārāḥ yojetabbā ati vacana sesaḥ hāra saṃvaṇṇanā paṭhamam kātabbā

original: byañjanapariyeṭṭhibhāvatoti adhippāyo. Disalocanatoti disālocanena, ayameva vā pāṭho.
analyzed: byañjana pariyeṭṭhi bhāvato ti adhippāyaḥ disa locanato ti disa ālocanena ayam eva vā pāṭho

original: Aṅkusena hīti hi-saddo nipātamattaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
analyzed: aṅkusena hi iti hi saddaḥ nipāta mattam sesam uttānam eva

original: Dvādasapadaṃ
analyzed: dvādasa padam

original: 23. Idāni yesaṃ byañjanapadānaṃ atthapadānañca vasena dvādasa padāni suttanti vuttaṃ,
analyzed: idāni yesam byañjana padānam attha padānam ca vasena dvādasa padāni suttan ti vuttam

original: tāni padāni niddisituṃ “akkharaṃ pada”ntiādimāha. Tattha apariyosite pade vaṇṇo akkharaṃ
analyzed: tāni padāni niddisitum akkharam pada nti ādim āha tattha a pariyosite pade vaṇṇo akkharam

original: pariyāyavasena akkharaṇato asañcaraṇato. Na hi vaṇṇassa pariyāyo vijjati, atha vaṇṇoti
analyzed: pariyāya vasena akkharaṇataḥ a sañcaraṇataḥ na hi vaṇṇassa pariyāyaḥ vijjati atha vaṇṇo ti

original: kenaṭṭhena vaṇṇo? Atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṭṭhena. Vaṇṇo eva hi ittarakhaṇatāya aparāparabhāvena
analyzed: kenaṭṭhena vaṇṇaḥ attha saṃvaṇṇana ṭṭhena vaṇṇaḥ eva hi ittara khaṇatāya apara apara bhāvena

original: pavatto padādibhāvena gayhamāno yathāsambandhaṃ taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vadati. Ekakkharaṃ
analyzed: pavattaḥ pada ādi bhāvena gayhamānaḥ yathāsambandham tam tam attham vadati ekakkharam

original: vā padaṃ akkharaṃ, keci pana “manasā desanāvācāya akkharaṇato akkhara”nti vadanti.
analyzed: vā padam akkharam keci pana manasā desanā vācāya akkharaṇataḥ akkharanti vadanti

original: Padanti pajjati attho etenāti padaṃ, taṃ nāmapadaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ upasaggapadaṃ nipātapadanti
analyzed: padanti pajjati atthaḥ etena ati padam tam nāma padam ākhyāta padam upasagga padam nipāta padam ti

original: catubbidhaṃ. Tattha “phasso vedanā citta”nti evamādikaṃ satvappadhānaṃ nāmapadaṃ.
analyzed: catubbidham tattha phassaḥ vedanā cittan ti evamādikam satva ppadhānam nāma padam

original: “Phusati vedayati vijānātī”ti evamādikaṃ kiriyāpadhānaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ. Kiriyāvisesaggahaṇanimittaṃ
analyzed: phusati vedayati vijānāti iti evamādikam kiriyā apadhānam ākhyāta padam kiriyā visesa ggahaṇa nimittam

original: “pa” iti evamādikaṃ upasaggapadaṃ. Kiriyāya satvassa ca sarūpavisesappakāsanahetubhūtaṃ
analyzed: pa iti evamādikam upasagga padam kiriyāya sattvassa ca sarūpa visesa pakāsana hetu bhūtam

original: “eva”nti evamādikaṃ nipātapadaṃ.
analyzed: evanti evamādikam nipāta padam

original: Byañjananti saṅkhepato vuttaṃ padābhihitaṃ atthaṃ byañjayatīti byañjanaṃ, vākyaṃ.

original: Taṃ pana atthato padasamudāyoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Padamattasavanepi hi adhikārādivasena

original: Lakkhaṇanti sabhāvo. So hāranayānaṃ niddese vibhāvito eva.

original: kāmagiddhaṃ kāme pariyesantaṃ rakkhantañca sīhādayo ca pākaṭaparissayā kāyaduccaritādayo
analyzed: kāma giddham kāme pariyesantam rakkhantam ca sīha ādayo ca pākaṭa parissayā kāya duccarita ādayo

original: ca apākaṭaparissayā maddanti. Tato naṃ…pe… dakanti tato tehi pākaṭāpākaṭaparissayehi
analyzed: ca apākaṭa parissayāḥ maddanti tatas naṃpe dakanti tatas tehi pākaṭa apākaṭa parissayehi

original: abhibhūtaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ jātiādidukkhaṃ samudde bhinnanāvaṃ udakaṃ viya anveti anugacchatīti
analyzed: abhibhūtam tam puggalam jāti ādi dukkham samudde bhinna nāvam udakam viya anveti anugacchati iti

original: attho. Ayaṃ ādīnavoti yvāyaṃ taṇhāduccaritasaṃkilesahetuko jātiādidukkhānubandho, ayaṃ ādīnavo.
analyzed: atthaḥ ayam ādīnavaḥ ti yvā ayam taṇhā duccarita saṃkilesa hetuko jāti ādi dukkha anubandho ayam ādīnavaḥ

original: Tasmāti yasmā kāmagiddhassa vuttanayena dukkhānubandho vijjati, tasmā. Jantūti satto.
analyzed: tasmā iti yasmā kāmagiddhassa vutta nayena dukkha anubandhaḥ vijjati tasmā satto

original: Sadā satoti pubbarattāpararattaṃ jāgariyānuyogena sato hutvā. Kāmāni parivajjayeti
analyzed: sadā sataḥ iti pubbaratta apararattam jāgariya anuyogena sataḥ hutvā kāmāni parivajjaya iti

original: vikkhambhanavasena samucchedavasena ca rūpādīsu vatthukāmesu sabbappakāraṃ kilesakāmaṃ
analyzed: vikkhambhana vasena samuccheda vasena ca rūpa ādīsu vatthu kāmesu sabbappakāram kilesa kāmam

original: anuppādento kāmāni parivajjaye pajaheyya. Te pahāya tare oghanti evaṃ te kāme pahāya
analyzed: an uppādentaḥ kāmāni parivajjaye pajaheyya te pahāya tare evam te kāme pahāya

original: tappahānakaraariyamaggeneva catubbidhampi oghaṃ tareyya, tarituṃ sakkuṇeyyāti attho.
analyzed: tad pahāna kara ariya maggena iva catubbidham pi ogham tareyya taritum sakkuṇeyya ati attho

original: Nāvaṃ sitvāva pāragūti yathā puriso udakaggahaṇena garubhāraṃ nāvaṃ udakaṃ bahi siñcitvā
analyzed: nāvam yathā purisaḥ udaka ggahaṇena garu bhāram nāvam udakam bahis siñcitvā

original: lahukāya nāvāya appakasireneva pāragū bhaveyya, pāraṃ gaccheyya, evameva attabhāvanāvaṃ
analyzed: lahukāya nāvāya appa kasirena iva pāragū bhaveyya pāram gaccheyya evam eva atta bhāva nāvam

original: kilesūdakagarukaṃ siñcitvā lahukena attabhāvena pāragū bhaveyya, pāraṃ nibbānaṃ arahattappattiyā
analyzed: kilesu udaka garukam siñcitvā lahukena atta bhāvena pāragū bhaveyya pāram nibbānam arahatta ppattiyā

original: gaccheyya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānenāti attho. Idaṃ nissaraṇanti yaṃ
analyzed: gaccheyya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānena ati atthaḥ idam nissaraṇam ti yam

original: kāmappahānamukhena caturoghaṃ taritvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nibbānaṃ, idaṃ
analyzed: kāma ppahāna mukhena catur ogham taritvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyāḥ nibbānam idam

original: sabbasaṅkhatanissaraṇato nissaraṇanti.
analyzed: sabba saṅkhata nissaraṇataḥ nissaraṇam ti

original: Dhammoti dānādipuññadhammo. Haveti nipātamattaṃ. Rakkhati dhammacārinti yo taṃ dhammaṃ
analyzed: dhammo ti dāna ādi puñña dhammaḥ hava iti nipāta mattam rakkhati dhamma cārin ti yaḥ tam dhammaṃ

original: appamatto carati, taṃ dhammacāriṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikabhedena duvidhatopi anatthato
analyzed: appamattaḥ carati tam dhamma cārim diṭṭhadhammika samparāyika bhedena duvidhataḥ pi anatthato

original: rakkhati pāleti. Chattaṃ mahantaṃ yatha vassakāleti vassakāle deve vassante yathā
analyzed: rakkhati pāleti chattam mahantam vassakāle iti vassakāle deve vassante yathā

original: mahantaṃ chattaṃ kusalena purisena dhāritaṃ taṃ vassatemanato rakkhati. Tattha yathā
analyzed: mahantam chattam kusalena purisena dhāritam tam vassa temanataḥ rakkhati tattha yathā

original: taṃ chattaṃ appamatto hutvā attānaṃ rakkhantaṃ chādentañca vassādito rakkhati, evaṃ
analyzed: tam chattam appamattaḥ hutvā attānam rakkhantam chādentam ca vassa āditaḥ rakkhati evam

original: dhammopi attasammāpaṇidhānena appamatto hutvā dhammacariyāya attānaṃ rakkhantaṃyeva
analyzed: dhammaḥ api atta sammāpaṇidhānena appamattaḥ hutvā dhamma cariyāya attānam rakkhantam yeva

original: rakkhatīti adhippāyo. Esā…pe… cārīti etena vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti, taṃ
analyzed: rakkhati iti adhippāyaḥ esāpe cāri iti etena vuttam eva attham pākaṭataram karoti tam

original: suviññeyyameva. Idaṃ phalanti diṭṭhadhammikehi samparāyikehi ca anatthehi yadidaṃ
analyzed: su viññeyyam eva idam phalanti diṭṭhadhammikehi samparāyikehi ca anatthehi yat idam

original: dhammassa rakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ rakkhāvasānassa ca abbhudayassa nipphādanaṃ, idaṃ nissaraṇaṃ
analyzed: dhammassa rakkhaṇam vuttam rakkhā avasānassa ca abbhudayassa nipphādanam idam nissaraṇam

original: anāmasitvā desanāya nibbattetabbatāya phalanti.
analyzed: an āmasitvā desanāya nibbattetabba tāya phalanti

original: Sabbe dhammāti sabbe saṅkhatā dhammā. Anattāti natthi etesaṃ attā kārakavedakasabhāvo,
analyzed: sabbe dhammā ati sabbe saṅkhatāḥ dhammāḥ anattā ati natthi etesam attā kāraka vedaka sabhāvaḥ

original: sayaṃ vā na attāti anattāti. Itīti evaṃ. Yadā paññāya passatīti yasmiṃ kāle vipassanaṃ
analyzed: sayam vā na attā ati anattā ati iti iti evam yadā paññāya passati iti yasmin kāle vipassanam

original: ussukkāpento anattānupassanāsaṅkhātāya paññāya passati. Atha nibbindati dukkheti
analyzed: ussukkāpentaḥ anatta anupassanā saṅkhātāya paññāya passati atha nibbindati dukkha iti

original: atha anattānupassanāya pubbe eva aniccatādukkhatānaṃ suparidiṭṭhattā nibbidānupassanāvasena
analyzed: atha anatta anupassanāya pubbe eva anicca tā dukkha tānam su paridiṭṭha ttā nibbida anupassanā vasena

original: vipassanāgocarabhūte pañcakkhandhadukkhe nibbindati nibbedaṃ āpajjati. Esa maggo
analyzed: vipassanā gocara bhūte pañca kkhandha dukkhe nibbindati nibbedam āpajjati esa maggo

original: visuddhiyāti yā vuttalakkhaṇā nibbidānupassanā sabbakilesavisujjhanato visuddhisaṅkhātassa
analyzed: visuddhiyā ti yā vutta lakkhaṇā nibbida anupassanā sabba kilesa visujjhanataḥ visuddhi saṅkhātassa

original: ariyamaggassa accantavisuddhiyā vā amatadhātuyā maggo upāyo. Ayaṃ upāyoti yadidaṃ
analyzed: ariya maggassa accanta visuddhiyā vā amata dhātuyā maggaḥ upāyaḥ ayam upāyo ti yat idam

original: anattānupassanāmukhena sabbasmiṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ nibbindanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ visuddhiyā adhigamahetubhāvato upāyo.
analyzed: anatta anupassanā mukhena sabbasmim vaṭṭasmim nibbindanam vuttam tam visuddhiyāḥ adhigama hetu bhāvataḥ upāyaḥ

original: “Cakkhumā…pe… parivajjaye”ti imissā gāthāya ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yathā cakkhumā puriso
analyzed: cakkhumā ape parivajjaya iti imissā gāthāya ayam saṅkhepa atthaḥ yathā cakkhumā puriso

original: sarīre vahante visamāni bhūmippadesāni caṇḍatāya vā visame hatthiādayo parivajjeti,
analyzed: sarīre vahante visamāni bhūmi ppadesāni caṇḍa tāya vā visame hatthi ādayo parivajjeti

original: evaṃ loke sappañño puriso sappaññatāya hitāhitaṃ jānanto pāpāni lāmakāni duccaritāni
analyzed: evam loke sappaññaḥ puriso sappañña tāya hita ahitam jānantaḥ pāpāni lāmakāni duccaritāni

original: parivajjeyyāti. Ayaṃ āṇattīti yā ayaṃ “pāpāni parivajjetabbānī”ti dhammarājassa bhagavato āṇā, ayaṃ āṇattīti.
analyzed: parivajjeyyāti ayam āṇatti iti yā ayam pāpāni parivajjetabbāni iti dhammarājassa bhagavataḥ āṇā ayam āṇatti iti

original: Evaṃ visuṃ visuṃ suttesu āgatā phalūpāyāṇattiyo udāharaṇabhāvena dassetvā idāni tā ekato āgatā dassetuṃ “suññato”ti gāthamāha.
analyzed: evam visum visum suttesu āgatāḥ phala upāya āṇattiyaḥ udāharaṇa bhāvena dassetvā idāni tāḥ ekatas āgatāḥ dassetum suññatas ti gātham āha

original: Tattha suññato lokaṃ avekkhassu, mogharājāti āṇattīti “mogharāja, sabbampi saṅkhāralokaṃ
analyzed: tattha suññatas lokam avekkhassu mogha rāja ati āṇatti iti mogha rāja sabbam pi saṅkhāra lokam

original: avasavattitāsallakkhaṇavasena vā tucchabhāvasamanupassanavasena vā suññoti passā”ti
analyzed: avasavatti tā sat lakkhaṇa vasena vā tuccha bhāva samanupassana vasena vā suññaḥ ti passāti

original: idaṃ dhammarājassa vacanaṃ vidhānabhāvato āṇatti. Sabbadā satikiriyāya taṃsuññatādassanaṃ
analyzed: idam dhammarājassa vacanam vidhāna bhāvataḥ āṇatti sabbadā sati kiriyāya taṃsuñña tā dassanam

original: sampajjatīti “sadā satoti upāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhaccāti vīsativatthukaṃ
analyzed: sampajjati iti sadā sataḥ iti upāyaḥ iti vuttam attā anudiṭṭhim vīsati vatthukam

original: sakkāyadassanaṃ uddharitvā samucchinditvā. Evaṃ maccutaro siyāti. Idaṃ phalanti yaṃ
analyzed: sakkāya dassanam uddharitvā samucchinditvā evam maccutaraḥ siyā iti idam phalanti yam

original: evaṃ vuttena vidhinā maccutaraṇaṃ maccuno visayātikkamanaṃ tassa yaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāpaṭipajjanaṃ,
analyzed: evam vuttena vidhinā maccu taraṇam maccuno visaya atikkamanam tassa yam pubba bhāga paṭipadā paṭipajjanam

original: idaṃ desanāya phalanti attho. Yathā pana assādādayo sutte katthaci sarūpato katthaci
analyzed: idam desanāya phalanti atthaḥ yathā pana assāda ādayaḥ sutte katthaci sarūpato katthaci

original: niddhāretabbatāya katthaci visuṃ visuṃ katthaci ekato dassitā, na evaṃ phalādayo.
analyzed: niddhāretabba tāya katthaci visum visum katthaci ekatas dassitāḥ na evam phala ādayaḥ

original: Phalādayo pana sabbattha sutte gāthāsu vā ekato dassetabbāti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ
analyzed: phala ādayaḥ pana sabbattha sutte gāthāsu vā ekatas dassetabbā ti imassa nayassa dassana attham

original: visuṃ visuṃ udāharitvāpi puna “suññato loka”ntiādinā ekato udāharaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: visum visum udāharitvā api puna suññatas loka nti ādinā ekatas udāharaṇam katam ti daṭṭhabbam

original: 6. Evaṃ assādādayo udāharaṇavasena sarūpato dassetvā idāni tattha puggalavibhāgena desanāvibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: evam udāharaṇa vasena sarūpataḥ dassetvā idāni tattha puggala vibhāgena desanā vibhāgam dassetum tattha bhagavā tiādi vuttam

original: Tattha ugghaṭitaṃ ghaṭitamattaṃ uddiṭṭhamattaṃ yassa niddesapaṭiniddesā na katā,
analyzed: tattha ugghaṭitam ghaṭita mattam uddiṭṭha mattam yassa niddesa paṭiniddesā na katā

original: taṃ jānātīti ugghaṭitaññū. Uddesamattena sappabhedaṃ savitthāramatthaṃ paṭivijjhatīti
analyzed: tam jānāti iti ugghaṭita ññū uddesa mattena sa pabhedam sa vitthāram attham paṭivijjhati iti

original: attho, ugghaṭitaṃ vā uccalitaṃ uṭṭhapitanti attho, taṃ jānātīti ugghaṭitaññū. Dhammo
analyzed: attho ugghaṭitam vā uccalitam uṭṭhapitanti attho tam jānāti iti ugghaṭita ññū dhammo

original: hi desiyamāno desakato desanābhājanaṃ saṅkamanto viya hoti, tamesa uccalitameva jānātīti
analyzed: hi desiyamānaḥ desakataḥ desanā bhājanam saṅkamantaḥ viya hoti tam esaḥ uccalitam eva jānāti iti

original: attho, calitameva vā ugghaṭitaṃ. Sassatādiākārassa hi veneyyānaṃ āsayassa buddhāveṇikā
analyzed: calitam eva vā ugghaṭitam sassata ādi ākārassa hi veneyyānam āsayassa buddha āveṇikā

original: dhammadesanā taṅkhaṇapatitā eva calanāya hoti, tato paramparānuvattiyā, tatthāyaṃ
analyzed: dhamma desanā taṅkhaṇa patitā eva calanāya hoti tatas paramparā anuvattiyā tattha ayam

original: ugghaṭite calitamatteyeva āsaye dhammaṃ jānāti avabujjhatīti ugghaṭitaññū, tassa
analyzed: ugghaṭite calita matteya iva āsaye dhammam jānāti avabujjhati iti ugghaṭita ññū tassa

original: ugghaṭitaññussa nissaraṇaṃ desayati, tattakeneva tassa atthasiddhito. Vipañcitaṃ
analyzed: nissaraṇam desayati tattakena iva tassa attha siddhitaḥ vipañcitam

original: vitthāritaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ jānātīti vipañcitaññū, vipañcitaṃ vā mandaṃ saṇikaṃ dhammaṃ
analyzed: vitthāritam niddiṭṭham jānāti iti vipañcita ññū vipañcitam vā mandam saṇikam dhammaṃ

original: jānātīti vipañcitaññū, tassa vipañcitaññussa ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca desayati, nātisaṅkhepavitthārāya
analyzed: jānāti iti vipañcitaññū tassa vipañcitaññussa ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca desayati na ati saṅkhepa vitthārāya

original: desanāya tassa atthasiddhito. Netabbo dhammassa paṭiniddisena atthaṃ pāpetabboti
analyzed: desanāya tassa attha siddhitaḥ netabbaḥ dhammassa paṭiniddisena attham pāpetabbaḥ ti

original: neyyo, mudindriyatāya vā paṭilomaggahaṇato netabbo anunetabboti neyyo, tassa neyyassa
analyzed: neyyaḥ mud indriya tāya vā paṭiloma ggahaṇataḥ netabbaḥ anunetabbaḥ iti neyyaḥ tassa neyyassa

original: assādaṃ ādīnavaṃ nissaraṇañca desayati, anavasesetvāva desanena tassa atthasiddhito. Tatthāyaṃ pāḷi –
analyzed: assādam ādīnavam nissaraṇam ca desayati desanena tassa attha siddhitaḥ tattha ayam

original: “Katamo ca puggalo ugghaṭitaññū? Yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ugghaṭitaññū.
analyzed: katamaḥ ca puggalaḥ ugghaṭita ññū yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭa velāya dhamma abhisamayaḥ hoti ayam vuccati puggalaḥ ugghaṭita ññū

original: “Katamo ca puggalo vipañcitaññū? Yassa puggalassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo vipañcitaññū.
analyzed: katamaḥ ca puggalaḥ vipañcitaññū yassa puggalassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhamma abhisamayaḥ hoti ayam vuccati puggalaḥ vipañcitaññū

original: “Katamo ca puggalo neyyo? Yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yonisomanasikaroto
analyzed: katamaḥ ca puggalaḥ neyyaḥ yassa puggalassa uddesataḥ paripucchato yoniso manasikaroto

original: kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato evaṃ anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti. Ayaṃ
analyzed: kalyāṇa mitte sevataḥ bhajataḥ payirupāsataḥ evam anupubbena dhamma abhisamayaḥ hoti ayam

original: vuccati puggalo neyyo”ti.
analyzed: vuccati puggalaḥ neyyaḥ ti

original: Padaparamo panettha nettiyaṃ paṭivedhassa abhājananti na gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ettha
analyzed: pada paramaḥ pana ittha nettiyam paṭivedhassa a bhājana nti na gahito ti daṭṭhabbam ettha

original: ca assādo, ādīnavo, nissaraṇaṃ, assādo ca ādīnavo ca, assādo ca nissaraṇañca, ādīnavo
analyzed: ca assādaḥ ādīnavaḥ nissaraṇam assādaḥ ca ādīnavaḥ ca assādaḥ ca nissaraṇam ca ādīnavaḥ

original: ca nissaraṇañca, assādo ca ādīnavo ca nissaraṇañcāti ete satta paṭṭhānanayā.
analyzed: ca nissaraṇañca assādaḥ ca ādīnavaḥ ca nissaraṇañca ati ete satta paṭṭhānanayā

original: Tesu tatiyachaṭṭhasattamā veneyyattayavinayane samatthatāya gahitā, itare cattāro
analyzed: tesu tatiya chaṭṭha sattamāḥ veneyya ttaya vinayane samattha tāya gahitāḥ itare cattāro

original: na gahitā. Na hi kevalena assādena ādīnavena tadubhayena vā kathitena veneyyavinayanaṃ
analyzed: na gahitā na hi kevalena assādena ādīnavena tad ubhayena vā kathitena veneyya vinayanam

original: sambhavati, kilesānaṃ pahānāvacanato. Pañcamopi ādīnavāvacanato nissaraṇassa anupāyo
analyzed: sambhavati kilesānam pahānā vacanataḥ pañcamaḥ api ādīnavā vacanataḥ nissaraṇassa anupāyo

original: eva. Na hi vimuttirasā bhagavato desanā vimuttiṃ tadupāyañca anāmasantī pavattati.
analyzed: eva na hi vimutti rasā bhagavataḥ desanā vimuttim tad upāyam ca an āmasantī pavattati

original: Tasmā ete cattāro nayā anuddhaṭā. Sace pana padaparamassa puggalassa vasena pavattaṃ
analyzed: tasmai ete cattāraḥ nayāḥ anuddhaṭā sace pana pada paramassa puggalassa vasena pavattam

original: saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ tadubhayabhāge ṭhitaṃ desanaṃ suttekadesaṃ gāthaṃ
analyzed: saṃkilesa bhāgiyam vāsanā bhāgiyam tad ubhaya bhāge ṭhitam desanam sutta eka desam gātham

original: vā tādisaṃ etesaṃ nayānaṃ udāharaṇabhāvena uddharati, evaṃ sati sattannampi nayānaṃ
analyzed: vā tādisam etesam udāharaṇa bhāvena uddharati evam sati

original: gahaṇaṃ bhaveyya. Veneyyavinayanaṃ pana tesaṃ santāne ariyamaggassa uppādanaṃ. Taṃ
analyzed: gahaṇam bhaveyya veneyya vinayanam pana tesam santāne ariya maggassa uppādanam tam

original: yathāvuttehi eva nayeti, nāvasesehīti itare idha na vuttā. Yasmā pana peṭake –
analyzed: yathā vuttehi eva naya iti na avasesehi iti itare idha na vuttāḥ yasmai pana

original: “Tattha katamo assādo ca ādīnavo ca?
analyzed: tattha katamo assādo ca ādīnavaḥ ca

original: Yāni karoti puriso, tāni attani passati;
analyzed: yāni karoti puriso tāni attani passati

original: Kalyāṇakārī kalyāṇaṃ, pāpakārī ca pāpaka”nti.
analyzed: kalyāṇa kārī kalyāṇam pāpa kārī ca

original: Tattha yaṃ kalyāṇakārī kalyāṇaṃ paccanubhoti, ayaṃ assādo. Yaṃ pāpakārī pāpaṃ paccanubhoti, ayaṃ ādīnavo.

original: Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, lokadhammā. Katame aṭṭha? Lābhotiādi. Tattha lābho yaso sukhaṃ pasaṃsā, ayaṃ assādo. Alābho ayaso dukkhaṃ nindā, ayaṃ ādīnavo.

original: attho eko evāti “eko pañho”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha kāraṇamāha “ekavatthupariggahā”ti. Idaṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ ekaḥ evā ti ekaḥ pañhaḥ ti vuttam tattha kāraṇam āha eka vatthu pariggahā ti idam

original: vuttaṃ hoti – kiñcāpi nivāraṇaappakāsanaabhilepanamahābhayasaṅkhātā pucchāya gahitā
analyzed: vuttam hoti kiñcā api nivāraṇa appakāsana abhilepana mahābhaya saṅkhātā pucchāya gahitā

original: cattāro ete atthā, te panekaṃ lokaṃ patiguṇabhūtā, loko padhānabhāvena gahitoti tabbasena
analyzed: cattāro ete atthā te pana ekam lokam pati guṇa bhūtāḥ loko padhāna bhāvena gahito ti tad basena

original: ekovāyaṃ pañhoti. Tenevāha “lokādhiṭṭhāna”ntiādi. Ko pana so lokoti? Āha “loko tividho”tiādi.
analyzed: ekaḥ uva ayam pañho ti tena iva āha loka adhiṭṭhāna ntiādi kaḥ pana so loko iti āha loko tividhaḥ itiādi

original: Tattha rāgādikilesabahulatāya kāmāvacarasattā kilesaloko. Jhānābhiññāparibuddhiyā
analyzed: tattha rāga ādi kilesa bahula tāya kāmāvacara sattā kilesa lokaḥ jhāna abhiññā paribuddhiyā

original: rūpāvacarasattā bhavaloko. Āneñjasamādhibahulatāya visadindriyattā arūpāvacarasattā
analyzed: rūpāvacara sattā bhava lokaḥ āneñja samādhi bahula tāyai visat indriya ttā arūpāvacara sattā

original: indriyaloko. Atha vā kilissanaṃ kileso, vipākadukkhanti attho. Tasmā dukkhabahulatāya
analyzed: indriya lokaḥ atha vā kilissanam kilesaḥ vipāka dukkhan ti atthaḥ tasmā dukkha bahula tāya

original: apāyesu sattā kilesaloko. Tadaññe sattā sampattibhavabhāvato bhavaloko. Tattha ye
analyzed: apāyesu sattā kilesa loko tad aññe sattā sampatti bhava bhāvato bhava loko tattha ye

original: vimuttiparipācakehi indriyehi samannāgatā sattā, so indriyalokoti veditabbaṃ. Pariyāpannadhammavasena
analyzed: vimutti paripācakehi indriyehi samannāgatā sattā saḥ indriya loko ti veditabbam pariyāpanna dhamma vasena

original: lokasamaññāti ariyapuggalā idha na saṅgayhanti.
analyzed: ariya puggalāḥ idha na saṅgayhanti

original: Avijjāya nivuto lokoti caturaṅgasamannāgatena andhakārena viya rathaghaṭādidhammasabhāvappaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya
analyzed: avijjāya nivutaḥ loko ti catur aṅga samannāgatena andhakārena viya ratha ghaṭa ādi dhamma sabhāva paṭicchādana lakkhaṇāya

original: avijjāya nivuto paṭicchādito loko. Vivicchāti vicikicchāhetu. “Vivicchā macchariya”nti
analyzed: avijjāya nivutaḥ paṭicchāditaḥ lokaḥ vivicchāti vicikicchā hetu vivicchā mat śariyanti

original: saṅgahe vuttaṃ. Pamādāti pamādahetu. Jappābhilepananti jappā taṇhā assa lokassa makkaṭālepo
analyzed: saṅgahe vuttam pamādā ti pamāda hetu jappa abhilepanam ti jappā taṇhā assa lokassa makkaṭa ālepaḥ

original: viya makkaṭassa abhilepanaṃ silesoti brūmi. Dukkhanti jātiādikaṃ vaṭṭadukkhanti ayaṃ
analyzed: viya makkaṭassa abhilepanam sileso ti brūmi dukkham ti jāti ādikam vaṭṭa dukkham ti ayaṃ

original: padattho. Sesaṃ pāḷiyā eva viññāyati. Imāni cattāri padāni pucchāgāthāyaṃ vuttāni
analyzed: padattho sesam pāḷiyā eva viññāyati imāni cattāri padāni pucchāgāthāyam vuttāni

original: “imehī”ti vissajjanagāthāyaṃ vuttehi imehi catūhi padehi vissajjitāni. Kathanti āha
analyzed: imehi iti vissajjana gāthāyam vuttehi imehi catūhi padehi vissajjitāni kathan ti āha

original: “paṭhama”ntiādiṃ. Tena yathākkamaṃ pucchāvissajjanāni veditabbānīti dasseti.
analyzed: paṭhama nti ādim tena yathākkamam pucchā vissajjanāni veditabbāni iti dasseti

original: Idāni taṃ yathākkamaṃ pucchaṃ vissajjanañca sarūpato dassetuṃ gāthāya ca atthaṃ vivarituṃ
analyzed: idāni tam yathākkamam puccham vissajjanam ca sarūpataḥ dassetum gāthāya ca attham vivaritum

original: “kenassū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “nīvaraṇehī”ti padena vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā
analyzed: kenassu utiādi vuttam tattha nīvaraṇehi iti padena vuttam eva attham pākaṭam katvā

original: dassetuṃ “avijjānīvaraṇā hi sabbe sattā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca “yathāhā”tiādinā suttantaradassanena
analyzed: dassetum avijjā nīvaraṇāḥ hi sabbe sattā tiādi vuttam ettha ca yathā āha iti ādinā sutta antara dassanena

original: imasmiṃ pañhavissajjanavicaye anugītivicayaṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha pariyāyatoti
analyzed: imasmin pañha vissajjana vicaye anugīti vicayam dasseti iti daṭṭhabbam tattha pariyāyato ti

original: kāraṇato. Nīvaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ kāmacchandādīnampi kāraṇabhāvato paṭicchādanabhāvato
analyzed: kāraṇataḥ nīvaraṇa saṅkhātānam kāmacchanda ādīnam pi kāraṇa bhāvato paṭicchādana bhāvato

original: ca ekaṃyeva nīvaraṇaṃ vadāmi, na pana aññesaṃ nīvaraṇasabhāvānaṃ abhāvāti attho.
analyzed: ca ekam yā iva nīvaraṇam vadāmi na pana aññesam nīvaraṇa sabhāvānam abhāvā ati attho

original: Yathā ca avijjāya sati nīvaraṇānaṃ bhāvo, evaṃ avijjāya asati na santi nīvaraṇānīti
analyzed: yathā ca avijjāya sati nīvaraṇānam bhāvaḥ evam avijjāya asati na santi nīvaraṇāni iti

original: dassetuṃ “sabbaso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dassetum sabbaso tiādi vuttam

original: Tenāti “avijjāya nivuto loko”ti padena. Paṭhamassa padassāti “kenassu nivuto loko”ti
analyzed: tena ati avijjāya nivutaḥ loko ti padena paṭhamassa padassa ati kenassu nivutaḥ loko ti

original: padassa. Yuttāti yojitā, anurūpāti vā attho. Etena pucchānurūpatā vissajjanassa dassitāti
analyzed: padassa yuttā ati yojitā anurūpā ati vā attho etena puccha anurūpa tā vissajjanassa dassitā ati

original: pubbāparavicayo vuttoti veditabbaṃ. “Yo puggalo nīvaraṇehi nivuto”tiādinā vivicchāpamādānaṃ
analyzed: pubba apara vicayaḥ vuttaḥ ti veditabbam yaḥ puggalaḥ nīvaraṇehi nivutaḥ iti ādinā viviccha apamādānam

original: avijjāya paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti. Nivuto eva hi nappakāsati. Vivicchāti vicikicchā.
analyzed: avijjāya paccaya bhāvam dasseti nivutaḥ eva hi na ppakāsati vivicchāti vicikicchā

original: Tenevāha – “vivicchā nāma vuccati vicikicchā”ti. Tatrāyaṃ padasiddhi – yathā micchādiṭṭhisammādiṭṭhiyo
analyzed: tena iva āha vivicchā nāma vuccati vicikicchā ati tatra ayam yathā micchādiṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhiyo

original: “niccaṃ anicca”ntiādinā ekaṃsaggāhabhāvena pavattanti, na evamayaṃ. Ayaṃ pana anekaṃsaggāhabhāvato
analyzed: niccam anicca nti ādinā eka aṃsa ggāha bhāvena pavattanti na evam ayam ayam pana aneka aṃsa ggāha bhāvato

original: “niccaṃ nu kho aniccaṃ nu kho”tiādinā vividhaṃ viruddhaṃ vā icchati esatīti vivicchāti.
analyzed: niccam nu kho aniccam nu kho ti ādinā vividham viruddham vā icchati esati iti

original: “So vicikicchanto”tiādinā appakāsanassa vivicchāpamādānaṃ kāraṇabhāvaṃ vivarati.
analyzed: so vicikicchanto ti ādinā appakāsanassa vivicchā apamādānam kāraṇa bhāvam vivarati

original: Sukke dhamme na uppādiyatīti na samādāya vattati. Nappakāsantīti te attano santāne
analyzed: sukke dhamme na uppādiyati iti na samādāya vattati na ppakāsanti iti te attano santāne

original: anuppādiyamānā kusalā dhammā taṃ puggalaṃ pakāsaṃ loke abhiññātaṃ na karontīti attho.
analyzed: an uppādiyamānā kusalāḥ dhammā tam puggalam pakāsam loke abhiññātam na karonti iti attho

original: Abhilimpatīti makkaṭālepo viya makkaṭaṃ dārusilādīsu purisaṃ rūpādivisaye allīyāpetīti
analyzed: abhilimpati iti makkaṭa ālepaḥ makkaṭam dāru silā ādīsu purisam rūpa ādi visaye

original: attho. Āsattibahulassāti āsaṅgabahulassa. Evaṃ abhijappāti karitvāti evaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṭṭhāyinīti
analyzed: atthaḥ āsatti bahulassa ati āsaṅga bahulassa evam abhijappāti karitvā ati evam pariyuṭṭhāna ṭṭhāyinī iti

original: iminā kāraṇena. Tatthāti tāya taṇhāya. Loko abhilitto silesena makkhito viya hotīti attho.
analyzed: iminā kāraṇena tattha ati tāya taṇhāya lokaḥ abhilittaḥ silesena makkhitaḥ viya hoti iti attho

original: Bhāyati etasmāti bhayaṃ. Mahantaṃ bhayaṃ mahabbhayaṃ. Tenevāha – “dukkhamassa mahabbhaya”nti.
analyzed: bhāyati etasma ati bhayam mahantam bhayam mahat bhayam tena iva āha dukkham assa mahat bhayanti

original: Dukkhaṃ domanassanti dukkhameva vibhattanti sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tisso
analyzed: dukkham domanassanti dukkham eva vibhattanti sabbam dukkham vibhajitvā dassetum tissaḥ

original: dukkhatā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Odhasoti kadāci attūpakkamamūlāya kadāci parūpakkamamūlāyātiādinā
analyzed: dukkha tā atiādi vuttam odhasaḥ iti kadāci attu upakkama mūlāya kadāci para upakkama mūlāya atiādinā

original: vibhāgena dukkhadukkhatāya muccanakā visesena rūpāvacarā. Tathāti odhaso kadāci karahacīti
analyzed: vibhāgena dukkha dukkha tāya muccanakā visesena rūpa avacarā tathā ati odhasaḥ kadāci karahaci iti

original: evaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Vipariṇāmadukkhatāya muccanakā upekkhāsamāpattibahulā visesena arūpāvacarasattā.
analyzed: evam ākaḍḍhati vipariṇāma dukkha tāya muccanakā upekkhā samāpatti bahulā visesena arūpāvacara sattā

original: Appābādhāti padaṃ dukkhadukkhatāya muccanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Dīghāyukāti vipariṇāmadukkhatāya.
analyzed: appābādhā iti padam dukkha dukkha tāya muccanassa kāraṇa vacanam dīgha āyukā ati vipariṇāma dukkha tāya

original: Arūpadevā hi loke visesato dīghāyukāti. Idañca muccanamaccantikaṃ. Yasmā ca dukkhā
analyzed: arūpa devāḥ hi loke visesataḥ dīgha āyukā ati idam ca yasmā ca dukkhā

original: vedanāpi saṅkhatattā aniccatādisaṅkhāradukkhasabhāvā eva, tasmā yato muccanamaccantikaṃ,
analyzed: vedanā api anicca tā ādi saṅkhāra dukkha sabhāvā eva tasmā yatas muccanam accantikam

original: taṃ anavasesapariyādānavasena saṅgaṇhitvā dassetuṃ “saṅkhāradukkhatāya panā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: tam anavasesa pariyādāna vasena saṅgaṇhitvā dassetum saṅkhāra dukkha tāya pana iti ādim āha

original: Tattha upādiyatīti upādi, vipākakkhandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ. Upādissa sesaṃ upādisesaṃ,
analyzed: tattha upādiyati iti upādi vipāka khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpam upādissa sesam upādi sesam

original: taṃ natthi etissāti anupādisesā, nibbānadhātu, tāya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā,
analyzed: tam natthi etissa ati anupādisesā nibbāna dhātu tāya anupādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā

original: itthambhūtalakkhaṇe cāyaṃ karaṇaniddeso. Nibbānadhātūti ca nibbāyanamattaṃ. Tasmāti
analyzed: ittham bhūta lakkhaṇe ca ayam karaṇa niddesaḥ nibbāna dhātu uti ca nibbāyana mattam tasmā iti

original: yasmā sakalalokabyāpinī sabbasaṅgāhinī ca saṅkhāradukkhatā, tasmā. Lokassāti sambandhe
analyzed: sakala loka byāpinī sabba saṅgāhinī ca saṅkhāra dukkha tā tasmā lokassa ati sambandhe

original: sāmivacanaṃ. Tena “dukkhamassā”ti padassa atthaṃ dasseti. Evamettha lokassa nīvaraṇādīni
analyzed: sāmi vacanam tena dukkham assa ati padassa attham dasseti evam ettha lokassa nīvaraṇa ādīni

original: ajānantena, samayantaraparicayena vā tattha saṃsayapakkhandena ekaṃseneva byākātabbattā
analyzed: a jānantena samaya antara paricayena vā tattha saṃsaya pakkhandena ekaṃsena iva byākātabba ttā

original: sattādhiṭṭhānā pucchā katā, sā ca ajānanassa, saṃsayassa vā nīvaraṇādivisayatāya
analyzed: satta adhiṭṭhānā pucchā katā sā ca a jānanassa saṃsayassa vā nīvaraṇa ādi visaya tāya

original: catubbidhā. Pāḷiyaṃ pana nīvaraṇādīnaṃ loko ādhārabhāvena gāthāyaṃ vuttoti eko pañhoti
analyzed: catubbidhā pāḷiyam pana nīvaraṇa ādīnam lokaḥ ādhāra bhāvena gāthāyam vutto ti ekaḥ pañho ti

original: dassitanti. Ayamettha pucchāvicayo. Vissajjanavicayopi adiṭṭhajotinī vissajjanā vimaticchedinī
analyzed: dassitam ti ayam ettha pucchā vicayaḥ vissajjana vicayaḥ api adiṭṭha jotinī vissajjanā vimati chedinī

original: cātiādinā pucchāvicaye vuttanayānusārena veditabbo.
analyzed: ca ati ādinā pucchā vicaye vutta naya anusārena veditabbo

original: Evaṃ ekādhāraṃ pucchaṃ dassetvā idāni anekādhāraṃ dassetuṃ “savanti sabbadhī”tiādi
analyzed: evam eka ādhāram puccham dassetvā idāni aneka ādhāram dassetum savanti sabbadhi itiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha savantīti sandanti. Sabbadhīti sabbesu rūpādīsu āyatanesu. Sotāti
analyzed: vuttam tattha savanti iti sandanti sabbadhi iti sabbesu rūpa ādīsu āyatanesu sotā ati

original: taṇhādisotā. Kiṃ nivāraṇanti tesaṃ kiṃ āvaraṇaṃ kā rakkhā. Saṃvaraṃ brūhīti taṃ nesaṃ
analyzed: taṇhā ādi sotā kim tesam kim āvaraṇam kā rakkhā saṃvaram brūhi iti tam

original: nīvaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ saṃvaraṃ kathehi. Kena sotā pidhīyareti kena dhammena taṇhādisotā
analyzed: nīvaraṇa saṅkhātam saṃvaram kathehi kena sotā kena dhammena taṇhā ādi sotā

original: pidhiyyanti pacchijjantīti ayamettha padattho. Sesaṃ pāḷivaseneva āvi bhavissati.
analyzed: pidhiyyanti pacchijjanti iti ayam ettha padattho sesam pāḷi vasena iva bhavissati

original: Te dve pañhāti yadipi imissā gāthāya pucchāvasena pavattāya cattāri padāni cattāri
analyzed: te dve yadi pi imissā gāthāya pucchā vasena pavattāya cattāri padāni cattāri

original: vākyāni. Ñātuṃ icchitassa pana atthassa duvidhattā te dve pañhā. Kasmāti ce? “Imehi
analyzed: vākyāni ñātum icchitassa pana atthassa te dve pañhā kasmā iti ce imehi

original: bahvādhivacanena pucchitā”ti āha. Tatthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – ime etāya gāthāya gahitā
analyzed: pucchitā iti āha tattha ayam saṅkhepa atthaḥ ime etāya gāthāya gahitā

original: atthā yasmā bahūni adhikicca pavattavacanena pucchitā, tasmā te dve pañhāti. Ekato
analyzed: atthā yasmā bahūni adhikicca pavatta vacanena pucchitā tasmā te dve ekatas

original: upari bahūti hi sāsanavohāro, tameva pucchāya duvidhatthavisayataṃ vivarituṃ “eva”ntiādi
analyzed: upari hi sāsana vohāraḥ tam eva pucchāya evantiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tassattho – yāhi ñātibyasanādisaṅkhātāhi pāṇavadhādīhi eva vā duggatihetubhūtāhi
analyzed: vuttam tassa atthaḥ yāhi ñāti byasana ādi saṅkhātāhi pāṇa vadha ādīhi eva vā duggati hetu bhūtāhi

original: āpadāhi samaṃ saha, sabbathā vā ayaṃ loko āpanno ajjhotthaṭo. Taṃnimittehi dasahi
analyzed: āpadā hi samam saha sabbathā vai ayam lokaḥ āpannaḥ ajjhotthaṭaḥ tad nimittehi dasahi

original: kilesavatthūhi saṃkiliṭṭho ca, tassa taṃ āpannākāraṃ saṃkiliṭṭhākārañca buddhiyaṃ
analyzed: kilesa vatthūhi saṃkiliṭṭhaḥ ca tassa tam āpanna ākāram saṃkiliṭṭha ākāram ca buddhiyam

original: katvā āha – “evaṃ samāpannassa evaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhassā”ti. Vodāyati sujjhati etenāti
analyzed: katvā āha evam samāpannassa evam saṃkiliṭṭhassa ati vodāyati sujjhati etena ati

original: vodānaṃ, samathavipassanā. Vuṭṭhāti etena nimittato pavattato cāti vuṭṭhānaṃ, ariyamaggo.
analyzed: vodānam samatha vipassanā vuṭṭhāti etena nimittataḥ pavattataḥ ca ati vuṭṭhānam ariya maggo

original: Asamāhitassāti nānārammaṇesu vikkhittacittassa. Savantīti pavattanti. Abhijjhātiādi
analyzed: asamāhitassa ati nānā ārammaṇesu vikkhitta cittassa savanti iti pavattanti abhijjhāti ādi

original: asamādhānahetudassanaṃ. Tenevāha – “evaṃ asamāhitassā”ti. “Yathāha bhagavā”tiādinā
analyzed: asamādhāna hetu dassanam tena iva āha evam asamāhitassa iti yathā āha bhagavā iti ādinā

original: idhāpi anugītivicayaṃ dasseti. Sotānaṃ savanaṃ yebhuyyena anurodhavasenevāti āha
analyzed: idha api anugīti vicayam dasseti sotānam savanam yebhuyyena anurodha vasena iva iti āha

original: – “savati manāpikesu rūpesū”ti. Ettha ca cakkhādayo sotānaṃ dvārabhāvena pavattamānā
analyzed: savati manāpikesu rūpesu iti ettha ca cakkha ādayo sotānam dvāra bhāvena pavattamānā

original: upacāravasena sayaṃ savantā viya vuttā. Itīti evaṃ. Sabbāti sabbasmā. Sabbathāti
analyzed: upacāra vasena sayam savantāḥ viya vuttāḥ iti iti evam sabbā ati sabbasmā sabbathā ati

original: sabbappakārena. Idaṃ vodānanti idaṃ “pariyuṭṭhānavighāta”nti vuttaṃ pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ vodānaṃ.
analyzed: sabba ppakārena idam vodānam ti idam pariyuṭṭhāna vighātam ti vuttam pariyuṭṭhāna ppahānam vodānam

original: Vissajjanagāthāya sati tesaṃ nivāraṇanti vipassanāsampayuttā sati kusalākusalānaṃ
analyzed: vissajjana gāthāya sati tesam vipassanā sampayuttā sati kusala akusalānam

original: dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamānā tesaṃ sotānaṃ nivāraṇanti. Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmīti
analyzed: dhammānam gatiyaḥ samanvesamānā tesam sotānam sotānam saṃvaram brūmi iti

original: tameva satiṃ sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi. Paññāyete pidhīyareti rūpādīsu aniccatādipaṭivedhasādhikāya

original: Appattassa visayassa esanavasena icchā, pattassa appattassa vā pātukāmatāvasena taṇhā,
analyzed: appattassa visayassa esana vasena icchā pattassa appattassa vā pātu kāma tā vasena taṇhā

original: ayametāsaṃ viseso. Yadipi evaṃ, tathāpi sabbā taṇhā rūpādivisayaṃ gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā
analyzed: ayam etāsam visesaḥ yadi pi evam tathā api sabbā taṇhā rūpa ādi visayam gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā

original: gahaṇena ekasabhāvā evāti dassento “sabbā hi taṇhā ajjhosānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇā”ti
analyzed: gahaṇena eka sabhāvā eva ti dassento sabbā hi taṇhā ajjhosāna lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇā ti

original: āha. Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya pakāsento “sabbo aggī”tiādimāha, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: āha idāni tam attham upamāya pakāsentaḥ sabbaḥ aggi iti ādim āha tam su viññeyyam eva

original: Ayaṃ pana na kevalaṃ taṇhā ārammaṇe pavattivisesena dvīhi eva nāmehi vuttā, atha kho anekehipi pariyāyehīti dassanatthaṃ “icchāitipī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ayam pana na kevalam taṇhā ārammaṇe pavatti visesena dvīhi eva nāmehi vuttā atha kho anekehi pi pariyāyehi iti dassana ttham icchā iti pi itiādi vuttam

original: Tattha icchanti tāya ārammaṇānīti icchā. Taṇhāyanaṭṭhena taṇhā. Pīḷājananato duruddhāraṇato
analyzed: tattha icchanti tāya ārammaṇāni iti icchā taṇhāyana ṭṭhena taṇhā pīḷā jananataḥ duruddhāraṇataḥ

original: ca visapītaṃ sallaṃ viyāti sallaṃ. Santāpanaṭṭhena dhūpāyanā. Ākaḍḍhanaṭṭhena sīghasotā
analyzed: ca visa pītam sallam viyāti sallam santāpana ṭṭhena dhūpāyanā ākaḍḍhana ṭṭhena sīgha sotā

original: saritā viyāti saritā, allaṭṭhena vā saritā, “saritāni sinehitāni ca, somanassāni
analyzed: saritā viyāti saritā allaṭṭhena vā saritā saritāni sinehitāni ca somanassāni

original: bhavanti jantuno”ti hi vuttaṃ. Allāni ceva siniddhāni cāti ayamettha attho. Visattikāti
analyzed: bhavanti jantuno ti hi vuttam allāni ca iva siniddhāni ca ati ayam ettha atthaḥ visattikā ti

original: visatāti visattikā. Visaṭāti visattikā. Visamāti visattikā. Visālāti visattikā. Visakkatīti
analyzed: visatā ati visattikā visaṭā ati visattikā visamā ati visattikā visālā ati visattikā

original: visattikā. Visaṃvādikāti visattikā. Visaṃharatīti visattikā. Visamūlāti visattikā.
analyzed: visattikā visaṃvādikā ati visattikā visaṃharati iti visattikā visamūlā ati visattikā

original: Visaphalāti visattikā. Visaparibhogāti visattikā. Visatā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde
analyzed: visa phalā ati visattikā visa paribhogā ati visattikā visatā vā pana sā taṇhā rūpe sadde

original: gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule gaṇe visatā vitthatāti visattikā.
analyzed: gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule gaṇe visatā vitthatā ati visattikā

original: Sinehanavasena sineho. Nānāgatīsu kilamathuppādanena kilamatho. Paliveṭhanaṭṭhena
analyzed: sinehana vasena sinehaḥ nānā gatīsu kilamatha uppādanena kilamatho paliveṭhana ṭṭhena

original: latā viyāti latā. “Latā uppajja tiṭṭhatī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Mamanti maññanavasena maññanā.
analyzed: latā viyā ati latā latā uppajja tiṭṭhati iti hi vuttam mamanti maññana vasena maññanā

original: Dūragatampi ākaḍḍhitvā bandhanaṭṭhena bandho. Āsīsanaṭṭhena āsā. Ārammaṇarasaṃ pātukāmatāvasena
analyzed: dūra gatam pi ākaḍḍhitvā bandhana ṭṭhena bandho āsīsana ṭṭhena āsā ārammaṇa rasam pātukāma tā vasena

original: pipāsā. Abhinandanaṭṭhena abhinandanā. Itīti evaṃ ārammaṇe pavattivisesena anekehi
analyzed: pipāsā abhinandana ṭṭhena abhinandanā iti iti evam ārammaṇe pavatti visesena anekehi

original: nāmehi gayhamānāpi sabbā taṇhā ajjhosānalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇāti yathāvuttamatthaṃ nigameti.
analyzed: nāmehi gayhamānā api sabbā taṇhā ajjhosāna lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇā ati yathāvuttam attham nigameti

original: Puna taṇhāya anekehi nāmehi gahitabhāvameva “yathā cā”tiādinā upacayena dasseti.
analyzed: puna taṇhāya anekehi nāmehi gahita bhāvam eva yathā ca ati ādinā upacayena dasseti

original: Tattha vevacaneti vevacanahāravibhaṅge. “Āsā ca pihā”ti gāthāya atthaṃ tattheva vaṇṇayissāma.
analyzed: tattha vevacana iti vevacana hāra vibhaṅge āsā ca piha ati gāthāya attham tattha iva vaṇṇayissāma

original: Avigatarāgassātiādīsu rañjanaṭṭhena rāgo, chandanaṭṭhena chando, piyāyanaṭṭhena pemaṃ,
analyzed: a vigata rāgassa ati ādīsu rañjana ṭṭhena rāgaḥ chandana ṭṭhena chandaḥ piyāyana ṭṭhena pemam

original: paridahanaṭṭhena paridāhoti taṇhāva vuttā. Tenevāha – “taṇhāyetaṃ vevacana”nti. Evaṃ
analyzed: paridahana ṭṭhena paridāho ti taṇhā ava vuttā tena iva āha evam

original: yujjatīti evaṃ icchātaṇhānaṃ atthato anaññattā “tayo pañhā”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ yujjati
analyzed: yujjati iti evam icchā taṇhānam atthataḥ anaññattā tayo pañhā ati yat vuttam tam yujjati

original: yuttiyā saṅgacchatīti attho.
analyzed: yuttiyā saṅgacchati iti attho

original: 21. Evaṃ “kenassubbhāhato loko”ti gāthāya “tayo pañhā”ti pañhattayabhāve yuttiṃ dassetvā
analyzed: evam loko ti gāthāya tayo pañhā iti pañhattaya bhāve yuttim dassetvā

original: idāni aññehi pakārehi yuttigavesanaṃ dassento “sabbo dukkhūpacāro”tiādimāha. Tattha
analyzed: idāni aññehi pakārehi yutti gavesanam dassentaḥ sabbaḥ dukkha upacāraḥ ti ādim āha tattha

original: dukkhūpacāroti dukkhappavatti. Kāmataṇhāsaṅkhāramūlakoti kāmataṇhāpaccayasaṅkhārahetukoti
analyzed: dukkha upacāro ti dukkha ppavattī kāma taṇhā saṅkhāra mūlako ti kāma taṇhā paccaya saṅkhāra hetuko ti

original: yujjatīti adhippāyo. Nibbidūpacāroti nibbidāpavatti kāmānaṃ vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā
analyzed: yujjati iti adhippāyaḥ nibbida upacāro ti nibbida apavatti kāmānam vipariṇāma aññathābhāvā

original: uppajjamānā anabhirati ñāṇanibbidā ca. Kāmataṇhāparikkhāramūlakoti kāmataṇhāya parikkhārabhūtavatthukāmahetuko.
analyzed: uppajjamānā anabhirati ñāṇa nibbidā ca kāma taṇhā parikkhāra mūlako ti kāma taṇhāya parikkhāra bhūta vatthu kāma hetuko

original: Tattha anabhiratisaṅkhātā nibbidā kāmataṇhāparikkhāramūlikā, na ñāṇanibbidāti sabbo
analyzed: tattha anabhirati saṅkhātā nibbidā kāma taṇhā parikkhāra mūlikā na ñāṇa nibbidā ati sabbaḥ

original: nibbidūpacāro kāmataṇhāparikkhāramūlakoti na pana yujjatīti vuttaṃ. Imāya yuttiyāti
analyzed: nibbida upacāraḥ kāma taṇhā parikkhāra mūlako ti na pana yujjati iti vuttam imāya yuttiyā ti

original: nayaṃ dasseti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā pañhattayabhāve yutti vuttā, yathā ca dukkhūpacāranibbidūpacāresu,
analyzed: nayam dasseti idam vuttam hoti yathā pañhattaya bhāve yutti vuttā yathā ca dukkha upacāra nibbida upacāresu

original: evaṃ imāya yuttiyā iminā yogena nayena aññamaññehi kāraṇehi taṃtaṃpāḷippadese anurūpehi
analyzed: evam imāya yuttiyā iminā yogena nayena aññamaññehi kāraṇehi taṃtaṃpāḷippadese anurūpehi

original: aññathā aññehi hetūhi yutti gavesitabbāti.
analyzed: aññathā aññehi hetūhi yutti gavesitabbā ati

original: Idāni taṃ nayadassanaṃ saṃkhittanti vitthārato vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “yathā hi bhagavā”tiādi
analyzed: idāni tam naya dassanam saṃkhittanti vitthārataḥ vibhajitvā dassetum yathā hi bhagavā atiādi

original: āraddhaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – rāgadosamohacaritānaṃ yathākkamaṃ asubhamettāpaccayākārakathā
analyzed: āraddham tattha ayam saṅkhepa atthaḥ rāga dosa moha caritānam yathākkamam asubha mettā paccaya ākāra kathā

original: rāgādivinayanato sappāyāti ayaṃ sāsanayutti. Evamavaṭṭhite yadi rāgacaritassa mettācetovimuttiṃ
analyzed: rāga ādi vinayanato ayam sāsana yutti evam avaṭṭhite yadi rāga caritassa mettā cetaḥ vimuttim

original: deseyya, sā desanā na yujjati asappāyabhāvato. Tathā sukhāpaṭipadādayoti. Nanu ca
analyzed: sā desanā na yujjati a sappāya bhāvato tathā nanu ca

original: sukhāpaṭipadādayo paṭipattiyā sambhavanti, na desanāyāti? Saccametaṃ, idha pana rāgacaritoti
analyzed: sukhā paṭipad ādayo paṭipattiyā sambhavanti na desanāya ati saccam etam idha pana rāga caritā ti

original: tibbakileso rāgacaritoti adhippeto. Tassa dukkhāya paṭipadāya bhāvanā samijjhati.
analyzed: tibba kilesaḥ rāga carito ti adhippetaḥ tassa dukkhāya paṭipadāya bhāvanā samijjhati

original: Yassa ca dukkhāya paṭipadāya bhāvanā samijjhati, tassa garutarā asubhadesanā sappāyā,
analyzed: yassa ca dukkhāya paṭipadāya bhāvanā samijjhati tassa garutarā asubha desanā sappāyā

original: yassa garutarā asubhadesanā sappāyā, na tassa mandakilesassa viya lahukatarāti imamatthaṃ
analyzed: yassa garutarā asubha desanā sappāyā na tassa manda kilesassa viya lahukatarā ti imamattham

original: dassento āha – “sukhaṃ vā paṭipadaṃ…pe… deseyya na yujjati desanā”ti. Iminā nayena
analyzed: dassentaḥ āha sukham vā deseyya na yujjati desanā ati iminā nayena

original: sesapadesupi yathāsambhavaṃ attho vattabbo. Ettha ca ayuttaparihārena yuttisamadhigamoti
analyzed: sesa padesu pi yathāsambhavam atthaḥ vattabbaḥ ettha ca ayutta parihārena yutti samadhigamaḥ ti

original: yuttivicāraṇāya ayuttipi gavesitabbāti vuttaṃ – “yadi hi…pe… na yujjati desanā”ti.
analyzed: yutti vicāraṇāya gavesitabbā ati vuttam yadi hi pe na yujjati desanā ati

original: Sesesupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ yaṃ kiñcītiādi yuttihārayojanāya nayadassanameva.
analyzed: sesesu pi esā iva nayaḥ evam yam kiñci itiādi yutti hāra yojanāya naya dassanam eva

original: Tattha evanti iminā nayena. Yaṃ kiñcīti aññampi yaṃ kiñci. Anulomappahānanti pahānassa
analyzed: tattha evam ti iminā nayena yam kiñci iti aññam pi yam kiñci anuloma ppahānam ti pahānassa

original: anurūpaṃ, pahānasamatthanti attho. Sutte anavasesānaṃ padatthānaṃ anupadavicāraṇā
analyzed: anurūpam pahāna samatthanti atthaḥ sutte anavasesānam padatthānam anupada vicāraṇā

original: vicayo hāro, vicayahārasaṃvaṇṇanāya niddhāritesu atthesu yuttigavesanaṃ sukaranti
analyzed: vicayaḥ hāraḥ vicaya hāra saṃvaṇṇanāya niddhāritesu atthesu yutti gavesanam

original: āha – “sabbaṃ taṃ vicayena hārena vicinitvā yuttihārena yojetabba”nti. Yāvatikā ñāṇassa
analyzed: āha sabbam tam vicayena hārena vicinitvā yutti hārena yojetabbanti yāvatikā ñāṇassa

original: bhūmīti saṃvaṇṇentassa ācariyassa yaṃ ñāṇaṃ yaṃ paṭibhānaṃ, tassa yattako visayo,
analyzed: bhūmi iti saṃvaṇṇentassa ācariyassa yam ñāṇam yam paṭibhānam tassa yattakaḥ visayaḥ

original: tattako yuttihāravicāroti attho. Taṃ kissa hetu? Anantanayo samantabhaddako vimaddakkhamo
analyzed: tattakaḥ yutti hāra vicāraḥ ti attho tam kissa hetu ananta nayaḥ samantabhaddakaḥ vimadda khamaḥ

original: vicittadesano ca saddhammoti.
analyzed: vicitta desano ca saddhammaḥ ti

original: Evaṃ nayadassanavaseneva yuttihārayojanā dassitāti taṃ brahmavihāraphalasamāpattinavānupubbasamāpattivasibhāvehi
analyzed: evam naya dassana vasena iva yutti hāra yojanā dassitā ati tam brahmavihāra phala samāpatti nava anupubba samāpatti vasi bhāvehi

original: vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “mettāvihārissa sato”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha mettāvihārissāti
analyzed: vibhajitvā dassetum mettāvihārissa sato tiādi āraddham tattha mettāvihārissa ati

original: mettāvihāralābhino. Satoti samānassa, tathābhūtassāti attho. Byāpādoti padoso. Cittaṃ
analyzed: mettā vihāra lābhino sato ti samānassa tathābhūtassa ati atthaḥ byāpādaḥ iti padosaḥ cittam

original: pariyādāya ṭhassatīti cittaṃ abhibhavissati. Yasmā pana kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
analyzed: pariyādāya cittam abhibhavissati yasmai pana kusala akusalānam dhammānam

original: apubbaṃ acarimaṃ pavatti nāma natthi, tasmā samāpattito vuṭṭhānassa aparabhāgeti
analyzed: apubbam acarimam pavatti nāma natthi tasmā samāpattitaḥ vuṭṭhānassa apara bhāge ti

original: dassanatthaṃ “ṭhassatī”ti vuttaṃ. Na yujjati desanāti byāpādapaṭipakkhattā mettāya
analyzed: dassana attham vuttam na yujjati desanā ati byāpāda paṭipakkha ttā mettāya

original: tādisī kathā na yuttāti attho. Byāpādo pahānaṃ abbhatthaṃ gacchatīti yujjati desanāti
analyzed: tādisī kathā na yuttā ati atthaḥ byāpādaḥ pahānam abbhattham gacchati iti yujjati desanā ati

original: yathāvuttakāraṇato eva ayaṃ kathā yuttāti. Sesavāresupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
analyzed: yathā vutta kāraṇataḥ eva ayam kathā yuttā ati sesa vāresu pi iminā ava nayena atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Anuttānaṃ eva vaṇṇayissāma.
analyzed: anuttānam eva vaṇṇayissāma

original: Animittavihārissāti aniccānupassanāmukhena paṭiladdhaphalasamāpattivihārassa. Nimittānusārīti
analyzed: animitta vihārissa ati anicca anupassanā mukhena paṭiladdha phala samāpatti vihārassa nimitta anusārī iti

original: saṅkhāranimittānusārī. Tena tenevāti niccādīsu yaṃ yaṃ pahīnaṃ, tena teneva nimittena.
analyzed: saṅkhāra nimitta anusārī tena tena iva ati nicca ādīsu yam yam pahīnam tena tena iva nimittena

original: Asmīti vigatanti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu diṭṭhimānavasena yaṃ asmīti maññitaṃ,
analyzed: asmi iti vigata nti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu diṭṭhi māna vasena yam asmi iti maññitam

original: taṃ vigataṃ. Tamevatthaṃ vivarati “ayamahamasmīti na samanupassāmī”ti. Vicikicchākathaṃkathāsallanti
analyzed: tam vigatam tam evattham vivarati ayam aham asmi iti na samanupassāmi iti vicikicchā kathaṃkathā sallanti

original: vinayakukkuccassāpi kathaṃ kathanti pavattisabbhāvato vicikicchāpadena visesitaṃ.
analyzed: vinaya kukkuccassa api katham kathan ti pavatti sabbhāvataḥ vicikicchā padena visesitam

original: Na yujjati desanāti vicikicchāya pahānekaṭṭhabhāvato na yuttāyaṃ kathā.
analyzed: na vicikicchāya pahāna ekaṭṭha bhāvataḥ na yuttā ayam kathā

original: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassāti paṭhamajjhānasamaṅgino. Kāmarāgabyāpādā visesāya saṃvattantīti
analyzed: paṭhamam jhānam samāpannassa ati paṭhamajjhāna samaṅgino kāma rāga byāpādāḥ visesāya saṃvattanti iti

original: na yujjatīti yasmā nīvaraṇesu appahīnesu paṭhamajjhānassa upacārampi na sampajjati,
analyzed: na yujjati iti yasmā nīvaraṇesu appahīnesu paṭhamajjhānassa upacāram pi na sampajjati

original: pageva jhānaṃ, tasmā kāmarāgabyāpādā visesāya dutiyajjhānāya saṃvattantīti na yuttāyaṃ
analyzed: pagā iva jhānam kāma rāga byāpādāḥ visesāya dutiya jhānāya saṃvattanti iti na yuttā ayam

original: kathā. Yathāladdhassa pana paṭhamajjhānassa kāmarāgabyāpādā pariyuṭṭhānappattā hānāya
analyzed: kathā yathā laddhassa pana paṭhama jhānassa kāma rāga byāpādā pariyuṭṭhāna ppattā hānāya

original: saṃvattantīti yujjati desanā yuttā kathāti, evaṃ sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. Avitakkasahagatā
analyzed: saṃvattanti iti yujjati desanā yuttā kathā ati evam sabbattha yojetabbam avitakka sahagatā

original: saññāmanasikārā nāma saha upacārena dutiyajjhānadhammā, ārammaṇakaraṇattho hettha
analyzed: saññā manasikārāḥ nāma saha upacārena dutiya jhāna dhammā ārammaṇa karaṇa attho ha ittha

original: sahagata-saddo. Hānāyāti paṭhamajjhānato parihānāya. Visesāyāti dutiyajjhānāya. Iminā
analyzed: sahagata saddo hānāya ati paṭhama jhānato parihānāya visesāya ati dutiya jhānāya iminā

original: nayena tattha tattha hānanti, visesoti ca vuttadhammā veditabbā. Vitakkavicārasahagatāti
analyzed: nayena tattha tattha hānam ti visesaḥ ti ca vutta dhammā veditabbā vitakka vicāra sahagatā ati

original: paṭhamajjhānadhammā, kāmāvacaradhammā eva vā. Upekkhāsukhasahagatāti upacārena saddhiṃ
analyzed: paṭhama jhāna dhammā kāmāvacara dhammāḥ eva vā upekkhā sukha sahagatā ati upacārena saddhiṃ

original: dutiyajjhānadhammā, tatramajjhattupekkhā hi idha upekkhāti adhippetā. Pītisukhasahagatāti
analyzed: dutiya jhāna dhammā tatramajjhatta upekkhā hi idha upekkhā ati adhippetā pīti sukha sahagatā ti

original: saha upacārena tatiyajjhānadhammā. Upekkhāsatipārisuddhisahagatāti catutthajjhānadhammā.
analyzed: saha upacārena tatiya jhāna dhammā upekkhā sati pārisuddhi sahagatā ati catuttha jhāna dhammā

original: Saññūpacārāti paṭusaññākiccaṃ karontā eva ye keci cittuppādā, “ākiñcaññāyatanadhammā”tipi
analyzed: saññu upacārā ati paṭu saññā kiccam karontāḥ eva ye keci cittuppādāḥ ākiñcaññāyatana dhammā atipi

original: vadanti. Saññāvedayitanirodhasahagatāti “saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharissāmī”ti
analyzed: vadanti saññā vedayita nirodha sahagatā ati saññā vedayita nirodham upasampajja viharissāmi iti

original: tassa parikammavasena pavattadhammā. Te pana yasmā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyaṃ
analyzed: tassa parikamma vasena pavatta dhammā te pana yasmā

original: ṭhiteneva sakkā saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharituṃ, na tato parihīnena,
analyzed: ṭhitena iva sakkā saññā vedayita nirodham upasampajja viharitum na tatas parihīnena

original: tasmā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā hānāya saṃvattantīti na yuttā kathā. Visesāya
analyzed: tasmā nevasaññā nāsañña āyatana samāpattiyāḥ hānāya saṃvattanti iti na yuttā kathā visesāya

original: saṃvattantīti pana yuttā kathāti āha – “hānāya…pe… desanā”ti. Kallatāparicitanti

original: na detīti kiccato kathitā. Uppajjamānāpi imesu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu uppajjatīti jātito
