original: kathitā. Evaṃ kiccato jātito ca kathitāpi lakkhaṇato kathite eva sukathitā hotīti
analyzed: kathitā evam kiccataḥ jātito ca kathitā api lakkhaṇato kathite eva su kathitā hoti iti

original: lakkhaṇato dassetuṃ “aññāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: lakkhaṇataḥ dassetum aññāṇa ntiādi vuttaṃ

original: Tattha ñāṇaṃ atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti.
analyzed: tattha ñāṇam attha anattham kāraṇa akāraṇam catu sacca dhammam viditam pākaṭam karoti

original: Ayaṃ pana avijjā uppajjitvā taṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ na detīti ñāṇapaccanīkato aññāṇaṃ.
analyzed: ayam pana avijjā uppajjitvā tam viditam pākaṭam kātum na deti iti ñāṇa paccanīkato aññāṇam

original: Dassanantipi paññā, sā hi taṃ ākāraṃ passati. Avijjā pana uppajjitvā passituṃ na
analyzed: paññā sā hi tam ākāram passati avijjā pana uppajjitvā passitum na

original: detīti adassanaṃ. Abhisamayotipi paññā, sā taṃ ākāraṃ abhisameti. Avijjā pana uppajjitvā
analyzed: deti iti a dassanam paññā sā tam ākāram abhisameti avijjā pana uppajjitvā

original: taṃ abhisametuṃ na detīti anabhisamayo. Anubodho sambodho paṭivedhotipi paññā, sā
analyzed: tam abhisametum na deti iti anabhisamayaḥ anubodhaḥ sambodhaḥ paṭivedhaḥ tipi paññā sā

original: taṃ ākāraṃ anubujjhati sambujjhati paṭivijjhati. Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ anubujjhituṃ
analyzed: tam ākāram anubujjhati sambujjhati paṭivijjhati avijjā pana uppajjitvā tam anubujjhitum

original: sambujjhituṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na detīti ananubodho asambodho appaṭivedho. Tathā sallakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: sambujjhitum paṭivijjhitum na deti iti ananubodhaḥ asambodhaḥ appaṭivedhaḥ tathā sat lakkhaṇam

original: upalakkhaṇaṃ paccupalakkhaṇaṃ samapekkhaṇantipi paññā, sā taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhati
analyzed: upalakkhaṇam paccupalakkhaṇam samapekkhaṇa nti pi paññā sā tam ākāram sallakkhati

original: upalakkhati paccupalakkhati samaṃ sammā ca apekkhati. Avijjā pana uppajjitvā tassa
analyzed: upalakkhati paccupalakkhati samam sammā ca apekkhati avijjā pana uppajjitvā tassa

original: tathā kātuṃ na detīti asallakkhaṇaṃ anupalakkhaṇaṃ apaccupalakkhaṇaṃ asamapekkhaṇanti ca vuccati.
analyzed: tathā kātum na deti iti asat lakkhaṇam anupalakkhaṇam apaccupalakkhaṇam asamapekkhaṇam ca vuccati

original: Nāssa kiñci paccakkhakammaṃ atthi, sayañca appaccavekkhitvā katakammanti appaccakkhakammaṃ.
analyzed: na assa kiñci paccakkha kammam atthi sayam ca ap paccavekkhitvā kata kammanti appaccakkha kammaṃ

original: Dummedhānaṃ bhāvo dummejjhaṃ. Bālānaṃ bhāvo bālyaṃ. Sampajaññanti paññā, sā atthānatthaṃ
analyzed: dummedhānam bhāvaḥ dummejjham bālānam bhāvaḥ bālyam sampajaññanti paññā sā attha anattham

original: kāraṇākāraṇaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ sampajānāti. Avijjā pana uppajjitvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ pajānituṃ
analyzed: kāraṇa akāraṇam catu sacca dhammam sampajānāti avijjā pana uppajjitvā tam kāraṇam pajānitum

original: na detīti asampajaññaṃ. Mohanavasena moho. Pamohanavasena pamoho. Sammohanavasena
analyzed: na deti iti asampajaññam mohana vasena mohaḥ pamohana vasena pamohaḥ sammohana vasena

original: sammoho. Avindiyaṃ vindati, vindiyaṃ na vindatīti avijjā. Vaṭṭasmiṃ ohanati otaratīti
analyzed: sammohaḥ avindiyam vindati vindiyam na vindati iti avijjā vaṭṭasmin ohanati otarati iti

original: avijjogho. Vaṭṭasmiṃ yojetīti avijjāyogo. Appahīnaṭṭhena ceva punappunaṃ uppajjanato
analyzed: vaṭṭasmim yojeti iti avijjā yogo appahīna ṭṭhena ca iva punappunam uppajjanato

original: ca avijjānusayo. Magge pariyuṭṭhitacorā viya addhike kusalacittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti viluppatīti
analyzed: ca avijjā anusayaḥ magge pariyuṭṭhita corāḥ viya addhike kusala cittam pariyuṭṭhāti viluppati iti

original: avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṃ. Yathā nagaradvāre palighasaṅkhātāya laṅgiyā patitāya manussānaṃ
analyzed: avijjā pariyuṭṭhānam yathā nagara dvāre paligha saṅkhātāya laṅgiyā patitāya manussānam

original: nagarappaveso pacchijjati, evameva yassa sakkāyanagare ayaṃ patitā, tassa nibbānasampāpakaṃ
analyzed: nagara ppaveso pacchijjati evam eva yassa sakkāya nagare ayam patitā tassa nibbāna sampāpakam

original: ñāṇagamanaṃ pacchijjatīti avijjālaṅgī nāma hoti. Akusalañca taṃ mūlañca, akusalānaṃ
analyzed: ñāṇa gamanam pacchijjati iti avijjālaṅgī nāma hoti akusalam ca tam mūlam ca

original: vā mūlanti akusalamūlaṃ. Taṃ pana na aññaṃ, idhādhippeto mohoti moho akusalamūlanti
analyzed: vā mūlanti akusala mūlam tam pana na aññam idha adhippeto moho ti mohaḥ akusala mūlanti

original: ayaṃ ekapadiko avijjāya atthuddhāro. Ayaṃ vemattatāti ayaṃ avijjāya vemattatā.
analyzed: ayam ekapadikaḥ avijjāya atthuddhāraḥ ayam ayam avijjāya vemattatā

original: Vijjāti vindiyaṃ vindatīti vijjā, vijjhanaṭṭhena vijjā, viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjā.
analyzed: vijjāti vindiyam vindati iti vijjā vijjhana ṭṭhena vijjā vidita karaṇa ṭṭhena vijjā

original: “Dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādīsu dukkhasaccassa yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ jānāti passati paṭivijjhatīti
analyzed: dukkhe ñāṇa nti ādīsu dukkha saccassa yāthāvasa rasa lakkhaṇam jānāti passati paṭivijjhati iti

original: dukkhe ariyasacce visayabhūte ñāṇaṃ “dukkhe ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Paññāti
analyzed: dukkhe ariya sacce visaya bhūte ñāṇam dukkhe ñāṇam ti vuttam esa nayo sesesu pi paññā ti

original: tassa tassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇasaṅkhātena paññāpanaṭṭhena paññā, tena tena vā aniccādinā
analyzed: tassa tassa atthassa pākaṭa karaṇa saṅkhātena paññāpana ṭṭhena paññā tena tena vā anicca ādinā

original: pakārena dhamme jānātīti paññā. Pajānanākāro pajānanā. Aniccādīni vicinatīti vicayo.
analyzed: pakārena dhamme jānāti iti paññā pajānana ākāraḥ pajānanā anicca ādīni vicinati iti vicayaḥ

original: Pakārehi vicinatīti pavicayo. Catusaccadhamme vicinatīti dhammavicayo. Aniccādīnaṃ
analyzed: pakārehi vicinati iti catu sacca dhamme vicinati iti dhamma vicayo anicca ādīnam

original: sallakkhaṇavasena sallakkhaṇā. Tesaṃyeva pati pati upalakkhaṇavasena paccupalakkhaṇā.
analyzed: sat lakkhaṇa vasena sat lakkhaṇā tesam yeva pati pati upalakkhaṇa vasena paccupalakkhaṇā

original: Paṇḍitabhāvo paṇḍiccaṃ. Kusalabhāvo kosallaṃ. Nipuṇabhāvo nepuññaṃ. Aniccādīnaṃ vibhāvanavasena
analyzed: paṇḍita bhāvaḥ paṇḍiccam kusala bhāvaḥ kosallam nipuṇa bhāvaḥ nepuññam anicca ādīnam vibhāvana vasena

original: vebhabyā. Tesaṃyeva cintanavasena cintā. Aniccādīni upaparikkhatīti upaparikkhā.
analyzed: vebhabyā tesam yeva cintana vasena cintā anicca ādīni upaparikkhati iti upaparikkhā

original: Bhūrīti pathaviyā nāmaṃ, ayampi saṇhaṭṭhena vitthataṭṭhena ca bhūrī viyāti bhūrī.
analyzed: bhūri iti pathaviyā nāmaṃ ayam pi saṇha ṭṭhena vitthata ṭṭhena ca bhūrī viyāti bhūrī

original: Tena vuttaṃ – “bhūrī vuccati pathavī, tāya pathavisamāya vitthatāya paññāya samannāgatoti
analyzed: tena vuttam bhūrī vuccati pathavī tāya pathavi samāya vitthatāya paññāya samannāgataḥ ti

original: bhūripañño”ti. Api ca bhūrīti paññāyevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Bhūte atthe ramatīti bhūrī.
analyzed: bhūri pañño ti api ca bhūri iti adhivacanam bhūte atthe ramati iti bhūrī

original: Kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā, khippaṃ gahaṇadhāraṇaṭṭhena vā medhā. Yassuppajjati,
analyzed: kilese medhati hiṃsati iti medhā khippam gahaṇa dhāraṇa ṭṭhena vā medhā yassa uppajjati

original: taṃ sattaṃ hitapaṭipattiyaṃ sampayuttaṃ vā yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhe pariṇetīti pariṇāyikā.
analyzed: tam sattam hita paṭipattiyam sampayuttam vā yāthāva lakkhaṇa paṭivedhe pariṇeti iti pariṇāyikā

original: Aniccādivasena dhamme vipassatīti vipassanā. Sammā pakārehi aniccādīni jānātīti sampajaññaṃ.
analyzed: anicca ādi vasena dhamme vipassati iti vipassanā sammā pakārehi anicca ādīni jānāti iti sampajaññam

original: Uppathapaṭipanne sindhave vīthiāropanatthaṃ patodo viya uppathe dhāvanakūṭacittaṃ
analyzed: uppatha paṭipanne sindhave vīthi āropana attham patodaḥ viya uppathe dhāvana kūṭa cittam

original: vīthiāropanatthaṃ vijjhatīti patodo viyāti patodo. Dassanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti
analyzed: vīthi āropana attham vijjhati iti patodaḥ viyāti patodaḥ dassana lakkhaṇe indaṭṭham kāreti iti

original: indriyaṃ, paññāsaṅkhātaṃ indriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ. Avijjāya na kampatīti paññābalaṃ.
analyzed: indriyam paññā saṅkhātam indriyam paññindriyam avijjāya na kampati iti paññā balam

original: Kilesacchedanaṭṭhena paññāva satthaṃ paññāsatthaṃ. Accuggataṭṭhena paññāva pāsādo
analyzed: kilesa chedana ṭṭhena paññāva sattham paññāsattham accuggata ṭṭhena paññāva pāsādaḥ

original: paññāpāsādo. Ālokanaṭṭhena paññāva āloko paññāāloko.
analyzed: paññāpāsādaḥ ālokana ṭṭhena āloko paññāāloko

original: Obhāsanaṭṭhena paññāva obhāso paññāobhāso. Pajjotanaṭṭhena paññāva pajjoto paññāpajjoto.
analyzed: obhāsana ṭṭhena paññāva obhāso paññāobhāso pajjotana ṭṭhena paññāva pajjoto paññāpajjoto

original: Ratikaraṇaṭṭhena ratidāyakaṭṭhena ratijanakaṭṭhena cittīkataṭṭhena dullabhapātubhāvaṭṭhena
analyzed: rati karaṇa ṭṭhena rati dāyaka ṭṭhena rati janaka ṭṭhena cittīkata ṭṭhena dullabha pātubhāva ṭṭhena

original: atulaṭṭhena anomasattaparibhogaṭṭhena ca paññāva ratanaṃ paññāratanaṃ. Na tena sattā
analyzed: atula ṭṭhena anoma satta paribhoga ṭṭhena ca ratanam paññāratanam na tena sattā

original: muyhanti, sayaṃ vā ārammaṇe na muyhatīti amoho. Dhammavicayapadaṃ vuttatthameva.
analyzed: muyhanti sayam vā ārammaṇe na muyhati iti amohaḥ dhamma vicaya padam vutta ttham eva

original: Kasmā panetaṃ puna vuttanti? Amohassa mohapaṭipakkhabhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Tenetaṃ dīpeti
analyzed: kasmā pana etam puna vuttam ti amohassa moha paṭipakkha bhāva dīpana attham tena itam dīpeti

original: – yvāyaṃ amoho, so na kevalaṃ mohato añño dhammo, mohassa paṭipakkho dhammavicayasaṅkhāto
analyzed: yvā ayam amohaḥ so na kevalam mohataḥ aññaḥ dhammaḥ mohassa paṭipakkhaḥ dhamma vicaya saṅkhāto

original: amohova idhādhippetoti. Sammādiṭṭhīti yāthāvaniyyānikakusaladiṭṭhi. Dhammavicayasaṅkhāto
analyzed: amohaḥ uva idha adhippeto ti sammādiṭṭhī iti yāthāva niyyānika kusala diṭṭhi dhammavicaya saṅkhāto

original: pasattho sundaro vā bojjhaṅgoti dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo. Maggaṅganti ariyamaggassa
analyzed: pasatthaḥ sundaraḥ vā bojjhaṅgo ti dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ maggaṅganti ariya maggassa

original: aṅgaṃ kāraṇanti maggaṅgaṃ. Ariyamaggassa antogadhattā maggapariyāpannanti.
analyzed: aṅgam kāraṇanti maggaṅgam ariya maggassa magga pariyāpannanti

original: Asaññāsamāpattīti saññāvirāgabhāvanāvasena pavattitā asaññabhavūpapattinibbattanasamāpatti.
analyzed: asaññā samāpatti iti saññā virāga bhāvanā vasena pavatti tā asañña bhava upapatti nibbattana samāpatti

original: Anuppanne hi buddhe ekacce titthāyatane pabbajitvā vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catutthajjhānaṃ
analyzed: an uppanne hi buddhe ekacce titthāyatane pabbajitvā vāyokasiṇe parikammam katvā catuttha jhānam

original: nibbattetvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya saññāya dosaṃ passanti, saññāya sati hatthacchedādidukkhañceva
analyzed: nibbattetvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya saññāya dosam passanti saññāya sati hattha cheda ādi dukkham ca iva

original: sabbabhayāni ca honti, “alaṃ imāya saññāya, saññābhāvo santo”ti evaṃ saññāya dosaṃ
analyzed: sabba bhayāni ca honti alam imāya saññāya saññā bhāvaḥ evam saññāya dosam

original: passitvā saññāvirāgavasena catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhānā kālaṃ katvā
analyzed: passitvā saññā virāga vasena catuttha jjhānam nibbattetvā aparihīna jjhānā kālam katvā

original: asaññīsu nibbattanti. Cittaṃ nesaṃ cuticittanirodheneva idha nivattati, rūpakkhandhamattameva tattha nibbattati.
analyzed: asaññīsu nibbattanti cittam na isam cuti citta nirodhena iva idha nivattati rūpa kkhandha mattam eva tattha nibbattati

original: Te yathā nāma jiyāvegukkhitto saro yattako jiyāvego, tattakameva ākāse gacchati,
analyzed: te yathā nāma jiyāvegukkhittaḥ saraḥ yattakaḥ jiyāvego tattakam eva ākāse gacchati

original: evamevaṃ jhānavegukkhittā upapajjitvā yattako jhānavego, tattakameva kālaṃ tiṭṭhanti.
analyzed: evam evam jhāna vegu khittāḥ upapajjitvā yattakaḥ jhāna vego tattakam eva kālam tiṭṭhanti

original: Jhānavege pana parikkhīṇe tattha rūpakkhandho antaradhāyati, idha paṭisandhisaññā
analyzed: jhāna vege pana parikkhīṇe tattha rūpa kkhandho antaradhāyati idha paṭisandhi saññā

original: uppajjati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “asaññabhavūpapattinibbattanasamāpattī”ti. Vibhūtasaññāsamāpattīti
analyzed: uppajjati tam sandhāya vuttam asañña bhava upapatti nibbattana samāpatti iti vibhūta saññā samāpatti iti

original: viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpatti. Sā hi paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa paṭhamāruppasaññāyapi vibhāvanato
analyzed: viññāṇañca āyatana samāpatti sā hi paṭhama āruppa viññāṇassa vibhāvanato

original: “vibhūtasaññā”ti vuccati. Keci “vibhūtarūpasaññā”ti paṭhanti, tesaṃ matena vibhūtarūpasamāpatti
analyzed: vibhūta saññā iti vuccati keci vibhūta rūpa saññā iti paṭhanti tesam matena vibhūta rūpa samāpatti

original: nāma sesāruppasamāpattiyo. Sesā samāpattiyo suviññeyyāva.
analyzed: nāma sesā āruppa samāpattiyaḥ sesā samāpattiyaḥ su viññeyyāva

original: Nevasekkhanāsekkho jhāyīti jhānalābhī puthujjano. Ājāniyo jhāyīti arahā, sabbepi
analyzed: nevasekkha nāsekkhaḥ jhāyī iti jhāna lābhī puthujjanaḥ ājāniyaḥ jhāyī iti arahā sabbe pi

original: vā ariyapuggalā. Assakhaluṅko jhāyīti khaluṅkassasadiso jhāyī. Tathā hi khaluṅko
analyzed: vā ariya puggalāḥ assa khaluṅkaḥ jhāyī iti khaluṅka ssa sadisaḥ jhāyī tathā hi khaluṅko

original: asso damathaṃ na upeti ito cito ca yathāruci dhāvati, evamevaṃ yo puthujjano abhiññālābhī,
analyzed: assaḥ damatham naḥ upeti itas citas ca yathāruci dhāvati evam evam yaḥ puthujjanaḥ abhiññā lābhī

original: so abhiññā assādetvā “alamettāvatā, katamettāvatā”ti uttaridamathāya aparisakkanto
analyzed: saḥ abhiññāḥ assādetvā alam ettāvatā katamā ittāvatā ati uttari damathāya a parisakkantaḥ

original: abhiññācittavasena ito cito ca dhāvati pavattati, so “assakhaluṅko jhāyī”ti vutto.
analyzed: abhiññā citta vasena ito cito ca dhāvati pavattati saḥ assakhaluṅkaḥ jhāyī iti vutto

original: Diṭṭhuttaro jhāyīti jhānalābhī diṭṭhigatiko. Paññuttaro jhāyīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena
analyzed: diṭṭhuttaraḥ jhāyī iti jhāna lābhī diṭṭhi gatiko paññuttaraḥ jhāyī iti lakkhaṇa upanijjhānena

original: jhāyī, sabbo eva vā paññādhiko jhāyī.
analyzed: jhāyī sabbaḥ eva vā paññā adhikaḥ jhāyī

original: Saraṇo samādhīti akusalacittekaggatā, sabbopi vā sāsavo samādhi. Araṇo samādhīti
analyzed: saraṇaḥ samādhi iti akusala citta ekagga tā sabbaḥ api vā sa āsavaḥ samādhi araṇaḥ samādhi iti

original: sabbo kusalābyākato samādhi, lokuttaro eva vā. Savero samādhīti paṭighacittesu ekaggatā.
analyzed: sabbaḥ lokuttaraḥ eva vā saveraḥ samādhi iti paṭigha cittesu ekagga tā

original: Avero samādhīti mettācetovimutti. Anantaradukepi eseva nayo. Sāmiso samādhīti lokiyasamādhi.
analyzed: samādhi iti mettā cetaḥ vimutti esa iva nayo sāmisaḥ samādhi iti lokiya samādhi

original: So hi anatikkantavaṭṭāmisalokāmisatāya sāmiso. Nirāmiso samādhīti lokuttaro samādhi.
analyzed: saḥ hi an atikkanta vaṭṭa āmisa loka āmisa tāya sa āmisaḥ nirāmisaḥ samādhi iti lokuttaraḥ samādhi

original: Sasaṅkhāro samādhīti dukkhāpaṭipado dandhābhiñño sukhāpaṭipado ca dandhābhiñño. So
analyzed: sa saṅkhāro samādhi iti dukkha apaṭipadaḥ dandha abhiñño sukha apaṭipadaḥ ca dandha abhiñño so

original: hi sasaṅkhārena sappayogena cittena paccanīkadhamme kicchena kasirena niggahetvā
analyzed: hi sa saṅkhārena sa ppayogena cittena paccanīka dhamme kicchena kasirena niggahetvā

original: adhigantabbo. Itaro asaṅkhāro samādhi. Ekaṃsabhāvito samādhīti sukkhavipassakassa
analyzed: adhigantabbaḥ itaraḥ asaṅkhāraḥ samādhi ekaṃsa bhāvito samādhi iti sukkha vipassakassa

original: samādhi. Ubhayaṃsabhāvito samādhīti samathayānikassa samādhi. Ubhayato bhāvitabhāvano

original: niddhāretabbā. Tenevāha – “niyutto desanāhārasampāto”ti.
analyzed: niddhāretabbā tena iva āha niyuttaḥ desanā āhāra sampāto ti

original: Desanāhārasampātavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: desanā āhāra sampāta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 2. Vicayahārasampātavaṇṇanā
analyzed: vicaya hāra sampāta vaṇṇanā

original: 53. Evaṃ desanāhārasampātaṃ dassetvā idāni vicayahārasampātaṃ dassento yasmā desanāhārapadatthavicayo
analyzed: evam desanā hāra sampātam dassetvā idāni vicaya hāra sampātam dassentaḥ yasmā desanā hāra padattha vicayo

original: vicayahāro, tasmā desanāhāre vipallāsahetubhāvena niddhāritāya taṇhāya kusalādivibhāgapavicayamukhena
analyzed: tasmai desanā āhāre vipallāsa hetu bhāvena niddhāritāya taṇhāya kusala ādi vibhāga pavicaya mukhena

original: vicayahārasampātaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha taṇhā duvidhā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha kusalāti
analyzed: vicaya hāra sampātam dassetum tattha taṇhā duvidhā itiādi āraddham tattha kusalā ati

original: kusaladhammārammaṇā. Kusala-saddo cettha bāhitikasutte viya anavajjatthe daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: kusala dhamma ārammaṇā kusala saddo ca ittha bāhitika sutte viya anavajja atthe daṭṭhabbo

original: Kasmā panettha taṇhā kusalapariyāyena uddhaṭā? Heṭṭhā desanāhāre vipallāsahetubhāvena
analyzed: kasmā pana ittha taṇhā kusala pariyāyena uddhaṭā heṭṭhā desanā āhāre vipallāsa hetu bhāvena

original: taṇhaṃ uddharitvā tassā vasena saṃkilesapakkho dassito. Vicittapaṭibhānatāya pana
analyzed: taṇham uddharitvā tassāḥ vasena saṃkilesa pakkhaḥ dassitaḥ vicitta paṭibhāna tāya pana

original: idhāpi taṇhāmukheneva vodānapakkhaṃ dassetuṃ kusalapariyāyena taṇhā uddhaṭā. Tattha
analyzed: idha api taṇhā mukhena iva vodāna pakkham dassetum kusala pariyāyena taṇhā uddhaṭā tattha

original: saṃsāraṃ gametīti saṃsāragāminī, saṃsāranāyikāti attho. Apacayaṃ nibbānaṃ gametīti
analyzed: saṃsāram gameti iti saṃsāra gāminī saṃsāra nāyikā ati atthaḥ apacayam nibbānam gameti iti

original: apacayagāminī. Kathaṃ pana taṇhā apacayagāminīti? Āha “pahānataṇhā”ti. Tadaṅgādippahānassa
analyzed: apacaya gāminī katham pana taṇhā apacaya gāminī iti āha pahāna taṇhā iti tad aṅga ādi pahānassa

original: hetubhūtā taṇhā. Kathaṃ pana ekantasāvajjāya taṇhāya kusalabhāvoti? Sevitabbabhāvato.
analyzed: hetu bhūtā taṇhā katham pana ekanta sāvajjāya taṇhāya kusala bhāvaḥ ti sevitabba bhāvato

original: Yathā taṇhā, evaṃ mānopi duvidho kusalopi akusalopi, na taṇhā evāti taṇhāya nidassanabhāvena māno vutto.
analyzed: yathā taṇhā evam mānaḥ api duvidhaḥ kusalaḥ api akusalaḥ api na taṇhā eva ati taṇhāya nidassana bhāvena mānaḥ vutto

original: Tattha mānassa yathādhippetaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ mānaṃ nissāyā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: tattha mānassa yathā adhippetam kusala ādi bhāvam dassetum yam mānam nissāya ati ādim āha

original: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “mānamahaṃ, devānaminda, duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbampi asevitabbampī”tiādi.
analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā mānam aham devānaminda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbam pi a sevitabbam pi itiādi

original: Yaṃ nekkhammassitaṃ domanassantiādi “kusalā”ti vuttataṇhāya sarūpadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.

original: Tattha nekkhammassitaṃ domanassaṃ nāma –
analyzed: tattha nekkhammassitam domanassam nāma

original: vipariṇāmavirāganirodhaṃ ‘pubbe ceva rūpā etarahi ca, sabbete rūpā aniccā dukkhā

original: vipariṇāmadhammā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya disvā anuttaresu vimokkhesu

original: pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti ‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmi, yadariyā

original: uppajjati pihā, pihāpaccayā domanassaṃ. Yaṃ evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ, idaṃ vuccati nekkhammassitaṃ domanassa”nti –
analyzed: uppajjati pihā pihā paccayā domanassam yam evarūpam domanassam idam vuccati nekkhammassitam domanassanti

original: Evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate anuttaravimokkhasaṅkhātaariyaphaladhammesu

original: ariyabhūmiṃ sampāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi”nti anusocato uppannaṃ domanassaṃ nekkhammavasena
analyzed: ariya bhūmim sampāpuṇitum na asakkhinti anusocataḥ uppannam domanassam nekkhamma vasena

analyzed: nekkhammassitam domanassam nāma ayam taṇhā kusalā ati ayam pihā ti vuttā taṇhā kusalā

analyzed: katham rāga virāgā cetaḥ vimutti tad ārammaṇā kusalā ti idam vuttam hoti rāga virāgā

original: cetovimutti, na sabhāvena kusalā, anavajjaṭṭhena kusalā. Taṃ uddissa pavattiyā tadārammaṇā
analyzed: cetaḥ vimutti na sa bhāvena kusalā anavajja ṭṭhena kusalā tam uddissa pavattiyā tad ārammaṇā

original: Tassāti paññāvimuttiyā. Yāya vasena “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti gāthāyaṃ “sabbā duggatiyo jahe”ti vuttaṃ.

original: Iti cirataraṃ vipassanāparivāsaṃ parivasitvā dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññāya adhigatāya

original: Tattha yasmā paññāvimutti ariyamaggamūlikā, tasmā catutthajjhānapādake ariyamaggadhamme

original: Tattha upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvena parisuddhaṃ. Parisuddhattā eva pariyodātaṃ, pabhassaranti
analyzed: tattha upekkhā sati pārisuddhi bhāvena parisuddham parisuddha ttā eva pariyodātam pabhassaranti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Sukhādīnaṃ paccayaghātena vītarāgādiaṅgaṇattā anaṅgaṇaṃ. Anaṅgaṇattā
analyzed: vuttam hoti sukha ādīnam paccaya ghātena vīta rāga ādi aṅgaṇa ttā anaṅgaṇam anaṅgaṇa ttā

original: attho. Vase vattamānañhi cittaṃ “mudū”ti vuccati. Muduttā eva ca kammaniyaṃ, kammakkhamaṃ

original: kammayogganti attho. Muduñhi cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti, evaṃ bhāvitaṃ muduñca hoti kammaniyañca,
analyzed: kamma yogganti atthaḥ mudun hi cittam kammaniyam hoti evam bhāvitam mudun ca hoti kammaniyañca

original: yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, citta”nti. Etesu parisuddhabhāvādīsu ṭhitattā ṭhitaṃ. Ṭhitattāyeva

original: āneñjappattaṃ, acalaṃ niriñjananti attho. Mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano vase ṭhitattā
analyzed: āneñjappattam acalam niriñjananti atthaḥ mudu kammañña bhāvena vā attanaḥ vase ṭhita ttā

original: ṭhitaṃ. Saddhādīhi pariggahitattā āneñjappattaṃ. Saddhāpariggahitañhi cittaṃ assaddhiyena
analyzed: ṭhitam saddhā ādīhi pariggahita ttā āneñja ppattam saddhā pariggahitam hi cittam assaddhiyena

analyzed: na iñjati imehi chahi dhammehi pariggahitam āneñja ppattam hoti

original: Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ cittaṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ hoti. Abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ

analyzed: dhammānam abhiññā sacchikiriyāya

analyzed: na āruppa samāpattiyāḥ manasikāra vidhim dassento so

original: vuttaṃ. Taṃ suviññeyyameva. Nānādhimuttikatāñāṇanti hīnādivasena nānādhimuttikatāya ñāṇaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam tam su viññeyyam eva nānā adhimuttika tā ñāṇam ti hīna ādi vasena nānā adhimuttika tāya ñāṇam

original: Te yathādhimuttā ca bhavantīti te hīnādhimuttikā paṇītādhimuttikā sattā yathā yathā
analyzed: te yathā adhimuttā ca bhavanti iti te hīna adhimuttikā paṇīta adhimuttikā sattā yathā yathā

original: adhimuttā honti. Taṃ taṃ kammasamādānaṃ samādiyantīti adhimuttianurūpaṃ taṃ taṃ attanā
analyzed: adhimuttāḥ honti tam tam kamma samādānam samādiyanti iti adhimutti anurūpam tam tam attanā

original: samādiyitabbaṃ kattabbaṃ kammaṃ karonti, tāni kammasamādānāni samuṭṭhānavasena vibhajanto
analyzed: samādiyitabbam kattabbam kammam karonti tāni kamma samādānāni samuṭṭhāna vasena vibhajantaḥ

original: “te chabbidhaṃ kamma”ntiādimāha. Tattha keci lobhavasena kammaṃ samādiyantīti sambandhitabbaṃ.
analyzed: te chabbidham kamma nti ādim āha tattha keci lobha vasena kammam samādiyanti iti sambandhitabbam

original: Esa nayo sesesupi. Taṃ vibhajjamānanti taṃ samuṭṭhānavasena chabbidhaṃ puna pavattinivattivasena
analyzed: esa nayaḥ sesesu pi tam vibhajjamāna nti tam samuṭṭhāna vasena chabbidham puna pavatti nivatti vasena

original: vibhajjamānaṃ duvidhaṃ.
analyzed: vibhajjamānam duvidham

original: Yaṃ lobhavasena dosavasena mohavasena ca kammaṃ karotīti dasaakusalakammapathakammaṃ
analyzed: yam lobha vasena dosa vasena moha vasena ca kammam karoti iti dasa akusala kamma patha kammam

original: sandhāya vadati. Tañhi saṃkiliṭṭhatāya kāḷakanti kaṇhaṃ. Apāyesu nibbattāpanato kāḷakavipākanti
analyzed: sandhāya vadati tat hi saṃkiliṭṭha tāya kāḷakanti kaṇham apāyesu nibbattāpanato kāḷaka vipākanti

original: kaṇhavipākaṃ. Yaṃ saddhāvasena kammaṃ karotīti dasakusalakammapathakammaṃ. Tañhi
analyzed: kaṇha vipākam yam saddhā vasena kammam karoti iti dasa kusala kamma patha kammam tat hi

original: asaṃkiliṭṭhattā paṇḍaranti sukkaṃ. Sagge nibbattāpanato paṇḍaravipākattā sukkavipākaṃ.
analyzed: a saṃkiliṭṭha ttā paṇḍaranti sukkam sagge nibbattāpanato paṇḍara vipāka ttā sukka vipākam

original: Yaṃ lobhavasena dosavasena mohavasena saddhāvasena ca kammaṃ karoti, idaṃ kaṇhasukkanti
analyzed: yam lobha vasena dosa vasena moha vasena saddhā vasena ca kammam karoti idam kaṇhasukkanti

original: vomissakakammaṃ. Kaṇhasukkavipākanti sukhadukkhavipākaṃ. Missakakammañhi katvā akusalavalena
analyzed: vomissaka kammam kaṇha sukka vipākam ti sukha dukkha vipākam missaka kammam hi katvā akusala valena

original: tiracchānayoniyaṃ maṅgalahatthibhāvaṃ upapanno kusalena pavatte sukhaṃ anubhavati,
analyzed: tiracchānayoniyam maṅgalahatthi bhāvam upapanno kusalena pavatte sukham anubhavati

original: kusalena rājakule nibbattopi akusalena dukkhaṃ vedayati. Yaṃ vīriyavasena paññāvasena
analyzed: kusalena rāja kule nibbattaḥ api akusalena dukkham vedayati yam vīriya vasena paññā vasena

original: ca kammaṃ karoti, idaṃ kammaṃ akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākanti kammakkhayakarā
analyzed: ca kammam karoti idam kammam a kaṇham a sukkam a kaṇha a sukka vipākam ti kamma kkhaya karā

original: catumaggacetanā. Tañhi yadi kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya, kaṇhavipākaṃ dadeyya. Yadi sukkaṃ bhaveyya,
analyzed: catu magga cetanā tat hi yadi kaṇham bhaveyya kaṇha vipākam dadeyya yadi sukkam bhaveyya

original: sukkaupapattipariyāpannaṃ vipākaṃ dadeyya. Ubhayavipākassa pana appadānato akaṇhaasukkavipākanti ayamettha attho.
analyzed: sukka aupapatti pariyāpannam vipākam dadeyya ubhaya vipākassa pana appadānataḥ a kaṇha a sukka vipākam ti ayam ettha atthaḥ

original: Kammasamādāne paṭhamaṃ acelakapaṭipadā kāmesu pātabyatā, dutiyaṃ tibbakilesassa assumukhassāpi
analyzed: kamma samādāne paṭhamam acelaka paṭipadā kāmesu pātabya tā dutiyam tibba kilesassa assumukhassa api

original: rudato parisuddhabrahmacariyacaraṇaṃ, tatiyaṃ kāmesu apātabyatā acelakapaṭipadā,
analyzed: rudataḥ parisuddha brahmacariya caraṇam tatiyam kāmesu a pātabya tā a celaka paṭipadā

original: catutthaṃ paccaye alabhamānassāpi jhānavipassanāsukhasamaṅgino sāsanabrahmacariyacaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: catuttham paccaye a labhamānassa api jhāna vipassanā sukha samaṅgino sāsana brahmacariya caraṇam

original: Yaṃ evaṃ jātiyaṃ kammasamādānanti yaṃ aññampi evaṃpakāraṃ kammaṃ. Iminā puggalenātiādi
analyzed: yam evam jātiyam kamma samādānam ti yam aññam pi evaṃpakāram kammam iminā puggalena atiādi

original: tasmiṃ kammavipāke bhagavato ñāṇassa pavattanākāradassanaṃ. Tattha upacitanti yathā
analyzed: tasmin kamma vipāke bhagavato ñāṇassa pavattana ākāra dassanam tattha upacitan ti yathā

original: kataṃ kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti, tathā kataṃ upacitaṃ. Avipakkanti na vipakkavipākaṃ.
analyzed: katam kammam phala dāna samattham hoti tathā katam upacitam a vipakkam ti na vipakka vipākam

original: Vipākāya paccupaṭṭhitanti vipākadānāya katokāsaṃ. Na ca bhabbo abhinibbidhā gantunti
analyzed: vipākāya paccupaṭṭhitanti vipāka dānāya kata ukāsam na ca bhabbaḥ abhinibbidhā gantunti

original: kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ abhinibbijjhanato abhinibbidhāsaṅkhātaṃ ariyamaggaṃ adhigantuṃ
analyzed: abhinibbijjhanataḥ abhinibbidhā saṅkhātam ariya maggam adhigantum

original: na ca bhabbo. Taṃ bhagavā na ovadatīti taṃ vipākāvaraṇena nivutaṃ puggalaṃ bhagavā
analyzed: na ca bhabbaḥ tam bhagavā na ovadati iti tam vipāka āvaraṇena nivutam puggalam bhagavā

original: saccapaṭivedhaṃ purakkhatvā na ovadati, vāsanatthaṃ pana tādisānampi dhammaṃ deseti
analyzed: sacca paṭivedham purakkhatvā na ovadati vāsana attham pana tādisānam pi dhammam deseti

original: eva, ajātasattuādīnaṃ viya.
analyzed: eva ajāta sattu ādīnam

original: Upacitanti kātuṃ āraddhaṃ. Tenevāha – “na ca tāva pāripūriṃ gata”nti. Tena micchattaniyāmassa
analyzed: upacitanti kātum āraddham tena iva āha na ca tāva pāripūrim gatanti tena micchat ta niyāmassa

original: asamatthataṃ dasseti. Purā pāripūriṃ gacchatīti pāripūriṃ phalanipphādanasamatthataṃ
analyzed: asamattha tam dasseti purā pāripūrim gacchati iti pāripūrim phala nipphādana samattha tam

original: gacchati purā adhigaccheyya. Micchattaniyatatāya sajjukaṃ phaladhammassa abhājanabhāvaṃ
analyzed: gacchati purā adhigaccheyya micchat ta niyata tāya sajjukam phala dhammassa a bhājana bhāvam

original: nibbattayati purā. Tenevāha – “purā veneyyattaṃ samatikkamatī”ti. “Purā aniyataṃ
analyzed: nibbattayati purā tena iva āha purā veneyya ttam samatikkamati iti purā aniyatam

original: samatikkamatī”tipi pāṭho, so evattho. Asamatteti kamme asampuṇṇe, te asampuṇṇe vā.
analyzed: samatikkamati iti pi pāṭhaḥ saḥ evatthaḥ asamatta iti kamme asampuṇṇe te asampuṇṇe vā

original: 61. Evaṃ kilesantarāyamissakaṃ kammantarāyaṃ dassetvā idāni amissakaṃ kammantarāyaṃ dassetuṃ “imassa ca puggalassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Taṃ vuttanayameva.
analyzed: evam kilesa antarāya missakam kamma antarāyam dassetvā idāni amissakam kamma antarāyam dassetum imassa ca puggalassa atiādi vuttam tam vutta nayam eva

original: Sabbesanti imasmiṃ balaniddese vuttānaṃ sabbesaṃ kammānaṃ. Mudumajjhādhimattatāti
analyzed: sabbesanti imasmin bala niddese vuttānam sabbesam kammānam mudu majjha adhimatta tā ti

analyzed: phalam apara apariya vedanīyam eka javana vārasmin hi sattasu cetanāsu paṭhama cetanā diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyam

original: nāma. Pariyosānacetanā upapajjavedanīyaṃ nāma. Majjhe pañca cetanā aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ

original: gatisampatti gativipatti, upadhisampatti upadhivipatti, kālasampatti kālavipatti,
analyzed: gati sampatti gati vipatti upadhi sampatti upadhi vipatti kāla sampatti kāla vipatti

original: payogasampatti payogavipattiyo kāraṇaṃ. So ca nesaṃ kāraṇabhāvo “atthekaccāni pāpakāni
analyzed: payoga sampatti payoga vipattiyaḥ kāraṇam so ca na isam kāraṇa bhāvaḥ attha ekaccāni pāpakāni

original: kammasamādānāni gatisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantī”tiādipāḷivasena veditabbo.

original: 62. Anantarabalaniddese vuttakammasamādānapadeneva jhānādīni saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ
“tathā samādinnānaṃ kammāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sekkhaputhujjanasantānesu pavattāni jhānādīni
analyzed: tathā samādinnānam kammānam tiādi vuttam sekkha puthujjana santānesu pavattāni jhāna ādīni

analyzed: kammam honti tattha tathā sukkam sukka vipākam paccuppanna sukham

original: 63. Tasseva samādhissāti tassa anantarabalaniddese jhānādipariyāyehi vuttasamādhissa.

original: Parivārāti parikkhārā. Indriyānīti saddhāsatipaññindriyāni. Balānīti hirottappehi

original: saddhiṃ tāniyeva. Vīriyassa visuṃ gahaṇaṃ balānaṃ bahūpakāradassanatthaṃ. Vīriyupatthambhena
analyzed: saddhim vīriyassa visum gahaṇam balānam bahu upakāra dassana ttham vīriya upatthambhena

original: hi saddhādayo paṭipakkhena akampanīyā honti. Tenevāha – “vīriyavasena balāni bhavantī”ti.

original: Tesanti indriyānaṃ. Mudumajjhādhimattatāti avisadaṃ mudu. Nātivisadaṃ majjhaṃ. Ativisadaṃ

original: adhimattaṃ balavaṃ “tikkha”nti vuccati.

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha saṃkhittavitthārenāti saṃkhittassa vitthārena. Atha vā saṃkhittenāti

original: uddiṭṭhamattena. Saṃkhittavitthārenāti uddesena niddesena ca. Vitthārenāti uddesaniddesapaṭiniddesehi.
analyzed: uddiṭṭha mattena saṃkhitta vitthārena ati uddesena niddesena ca vitthārena ati uddesa niddesa paṭiniddesehi

original: Mudukanti lahukaṃ apāyabhayavaṭṭabhayādīhi santajjanavasena bhāriyaṃ akatvā. Mudutikkhanti

original: samathena saccappaṭivedho sambhavati. Samathavipassananti samadhuraṃ samathavipassanaṃ.

original: Vipassananti sātisayaṃ vipassanaṃ upadisati. Yasmā cettha tikkhindriyādayo ugghaṭitaññuādayova,

original: tasmā “tikkhindriyassa nissaraṇaṃ upadisatī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha adhipaññāsikkhāyāti adhipaññāsikkhaṃ.

original: Yaṃ ettha ñāṇanti ettha indriyānaṃ mudumajjhādhimattatāya yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, idaṃ vuccati
analyzed: yam ettha ettha indriyānam mudu majjha adhimatta tāya yam idam vuccati

original: parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ indriyaparopariyattavemattatāñāṇanti sambandhitabbaṃ.

original: Tassa ñāṇassa pavattanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ imaṃ bhūmi”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ayaṃ

original: kusalānaṃ kusalamūlāni, akusalānaṃ akusalamūlāni, sādhipatikānaṃ adhipati, sabbacittuppādānaṃ
analyzed: kusalānam kusala mūlāni akusalānam akusala mūlāni sa adhipatikānam adhipati sabba cittuppādānam

original: indriyāni. Api ca imasmiṃ sutte mano adhippeto. Yathā balaggassa rājā pubbaṅgamo,
analyzed: indriyāni api ca imasmin sutte manaḥ adhippetaḥ yathā balaggassa rājā pubbaṅgamaḥ

original: evamevaṃ dhammānaṃ mano pubbaṅgamo. Tattha tividhena mano pubbaṅgamo nekkhammachandena
analyzed: evam evam dhammānam manaḥ pubbaṅgamo tattha tividhena manaḥ pubbaṅgamaḥ nekkhamma chandena

original: abyāpādachandena avihiṃsāchandena. Tattha alobhassa nekkhammachandena manopubbaṅgamaṃ,
analyzed: abyāpāda chandena avihiṃsā chandena tattha alobhassa nekkhamma chandena manaḥ pubbaṅgamam

original: adosassa abyāpādachandena manopubbaṅgamaṃ, amohassa avihiṃsāchandena manopubbaṅgamaṃ.
analyzed: a dosassa a byāpāda chandena manaḥ pubbaṅgamam a mohassa a vihiṃsā chandena manaḥ pubbaṅgamam

original: Manoseṭṭhāti mano tesaṃ dhammānaṃ seṭṭhaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaraṃ mūlaṃ pamukhaṃ
analyzed: manoseṭṭhā ti mano tesam dhammānam seṭṭham visiṭṭham uttamam pavaram mūlam pamukham

original: pāmokkhaṃ, tena vuccati “manoseṭṭhā”ti. Manomayāti manena katā, manena nimmitā, manena
analyzed: pāmokkham tena vuccati manoseṭṭhā ati manaḥ mayā ati manena katā manena nimmitā manena

original: nibbattā, mano tesaṃ paccayo, tena vuccati “manomayā”ti. Te pana dhammā chandasamudānitā
analyzed: nibbattā manaḥ tesam paccayo tena vuccati manaḥ mayā ti te pana dhammā chanda samudānitā

original: anāvilasaṅkappasamuṭṭhānā phassasamodhānā vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho.
analyzed: anāvila saṅkappa samuṭṭhānā phassa samodhānā vedanā kkhandho saññā kkhandho saṅkhāra kkhandho

original: Manasā ce pasannenāti yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo. Iti iminā pasādena
analyzed: manasā ce pasannena ati yā saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādaḥ iti iminā pasādena

original: upeto samupeto upagato samupagato sampanno samannāgato, tena vuccati “pasannenā”ti
analyzed: upetaḥ samupetaḥ upagataḥ samupagataḥ sampanno samannāgato tena vuccati pasannena ati

original: idaṃ manokammaṃ. Bhāsati vāti vacīkammaṃ. Karoti vāti kāyakammaṃ. Iti dasakusalakammapathā dassitā.
analyzed: idam manaḥ kammam bhāsati vāti vacī kammam karoti vāti kāya kammam iti dasa kusala kamma pathā dassitā

original: Tatoti dasavidhassa kusalakammassa katattā upacitattā. Nanti yo so katapuñño katakusalo
analyzed: tato ti dasavidhassa kusala kammassa kata ttā upacita ttā yaḥ so kata puñño kata kusalo

original: katabhīruttāṇo, taṃ puggalaṃ. Sukhanti duvidhaṃ sukhaṃ kāyikaṃ cetasikañca. Anvetīti anugacchati.
analyzed: tam puggalam sukhanti duvidham sukham kāyikam cetasikam ca anveti iti anugacchati

original: Idhassu puriso appahīnānusayo saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādaṃ anupassati, so saṃyojaniyesu
analyzed: purisaḥ a pahīna anusayaḥ saṃyojaniyesu dhammesu assādam anupassati so saṃyojaniyesu

original: dhammesu assādaṃ anupassanto yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāsutaṃ sampattibhavaṃ pattheti. Iccassa
analyzed: dhammesu assādam anupassantaḥ yathādiṭṭham yathāsutam sampatti bhavam pattheti iccassa

original: avijjā ca bhavataṇhā ca anubaddhā honti, so yathādiṭṭhaṃ yathāsutaṃ sampattibhavaṃ
analyzed: avijjā ca bhava taṇhā ca anubaddhāḥ honti saḥ yathādiṭṭham yathāsutam sampatti bhavam

original: patthento pasādanīyavatthusmiṃ cittaṃ pasādeti saddahati okappeti. So pasannacitto
analyzed: patthentaḥ pasādanīya vatthusmim cittam pasādeti saddahati okappeti saḥ pasanna cittaḥ

original: tividhaṃ puññakiriyavatthuṃ anutiṭṭhati dānamayaṃ sīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ kāyena vācāya
analyzed: tividham puñña kiriya vatthum anutiṭṭhati dāna mayam sīla mayam bhāvanā mayam kāyena vācāya

original: manasā. So tassa vipākaṃ paccanubhoti diṭṭheva dhamme upapajje vā aparāpare vā pariyāye.
analyzed: manasā so tassa vipākam paccanubhoti diṭṭhe iva dhamme upapajje vā apara apare vā pariyāye

original: Iti kho panassa avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā
analyzed: iti kho panassa avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇam viññāṇa paccayā

original: nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā sukhavedanīyo phasso, phassapaccayā
analyzed: nāma rūpam nāma rūpa paccayā saḷāyatanam saḷāyatana paccayā sukha vedanīyaḥ phassaḥ phassa paccayā

original: vedanāti evaṃ santaṃ taṃ sukhamanveti. Tassevaṃ vedanāya aparāparaṃ parivattamānāya
analyzed: evam santam tam sukham anveti tassa ivam vedanāya apara aparam parivattamānāya

original: uppajjati taṇhā. Taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ…pe… samudayo hotīti.
analyzed: uppajjati taṇhā taṇhā paccayā upādānaṃ pe samudayaḥ hoti iti

original: Tattha yaṃ mano, ye ca manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, yañca sukhaṃ, ime vuccanti pañcakkhandhā,
analyzed: tattha yam manaḥ ye ca manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammāḥ yat ca sukham ime vuccanti pañca kkhandhāḥ

original: te dukkhasaccaṃ. Tesaṃ purimakāraṇabhūtā avijjā bhavataṇhā ca samudayasaccaṃ. Tesaṃ
analyzed: te dukkha saccam tesam purima kāraṇa bhūtā avijjā bhava taṇhā ca samudaya saccam tesam

original: pariññāya pahānāya bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti, dukkhassa pariññāya samudayassa pahānāya.
analyzed: pariññāya pahānāya bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti dukkhassa pariññāya samudayassa pahānāya

original: Yena parijānāti, yena pajahati, ayaṃ maggo. Yattha ca maggo pavattati, ayaṃ nirodho.
analyzed: yena parijānāti yena pajahati ayam maggaḥ yattha ca maggo pavattati ayam nirodho

original: Imāni cattāri saccāni evaṃ āyatanadhātuindriyamukhenāpi niddhāretabbāni. Tattha samudayena
analyzed: imāni cattāri saccāni evam āyatana dhātu indriya mukhena api niddhāretabbāni tattha samudayena

original: assādo, dukkhena ādīnavo, magganirodhehi nissaraṇaṃ, sukhassa anvayo phalaṃ, manasā
analyzed: assādaḥ dukkhena ādīnavaḥ magga nirodhehi nissaraṇam sukhassa anvayaḥ phalam manasā

original: pasannena kāyavacīsamīhā upāyo, manopubbaṅgamattā dhammānaṃ attano sukhakāmena pasannena
analyzed: pasannena kāya vacī samīhā upāyaḥ manaḥ pubbaṅgamattā dhammānam attano sukha kāmena pasannena

original: manasā vacīkammaṃ kāyakammañca pavattetabbanti ayaṃ bhagavato āṇatti. Ayaṃ desanāhārasampāto.
analyzed: manasā vacī kammam kāya kammañca pavattetabbanti ayam bhagavataḥ āṇatti ayam desanā āhāra sampāto

original: Tattha katamo vicayahārasampāto? Mananato ārammaṇavijānanato mano. Mananalakkhaṇe
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vicaya hāra sampātaḥ mananataḥ ārammaṇa vijānanataḥ manaḥ manana lakkhaṇe

original: sampayuttesu ādhipaccakaraṇato pubbaṅgamo īhābhāvato nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena dhammā.
analyzed: sampayuttesu ādhi pacca karaṇataḥ pubbaṅgamaḥ īhā bhāvataḥ nissatta nijjīva ṭṭhena dhammā

original: Gāmesu gāmaṇi viya padhānaṭṭhena mano seṭṭho etesanti manoseṭṭhā. Sahajātādipaccayabhūtena
analyzed: gāmesu viya padhāna aṭṭhena mano seṭṭho etesanti manoseṭṭhā sahajāta ādi paccaya bhūtena

original: manasā nibbattāti manomayā. Akālussiyato, ārammaṇassa okappanato ca pasannena vacīviññattivipphārato
analyzed: manasā nibbattā ti manaḥ mayā a kālussiyataḥ ārammaṇassa okappanataḥ ca pasannena vacī viññatti vipphārato

original: tathā sādiyanato ca bhāsati. Copanakāyavipphārato tathā sādiyanato ca karoti. Tathā
analyzed: tathā sādi yanataḥ ca bhāsati copana kāya vipphārataḥ tathā sādi yanataḥ ca karoti tathā

original: pasutattā anaññattā ca “tato”ti vuttaṃ. Sukhanato sātabhāvato iṭṭhabhāvato ca “sukha”nti
analyzed: pasuta ttā anañña ttā ca tatas ti vuttam sukhanataḥ sāta bhāvataḥ iṭṭha bhāvataḥ ca sukhanti

original: vuttaṃ. Katūpacitattā avipakkavipākattā ca “anvetī”ti vuttaṃ. Kāraṇāyattavuttito
analyzed: vuttam katu upacita ttā avipakka vipāka ttā ca anveti iti vuttam kāraṇa āyatta vuttitaḥ

original: asaṅkantito ca “chāyāva anapāyinī”ti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ anupadavicayato vicayahārasampāto.
analyzed: a saṅkantitaḥ ca chāyā ava anapāyinī iti vuttam ayam anupada vicayataḥ vicaya hāra sampāto

original: Tattha katamo yuttihārasampāto? Manassa dhammānaṃ ādhipaccayogato pubbaṅgamatā yujjati.
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ yutti hāra sampātaḥ manassa dhammānaṃ ādhi paccayogato pubbaṅgama tā yujjati

original: Tato eva tesaṃ manassa anuvattanato dhammānaṃ manoseṭṭhatā yujjati. Sahajātādipaccayavasena
analyzed: tatas eva tesam manassa anuvattanataḥ dhammānam manaḥ seṭṭha tā yujjati sahajāta ādi paccaya vasena

original: manasā nibbattattā dhammānaṃ manomayatā yujjati. Manasā pasannena samuṭṭhānānaṃ kāyavacīkammānaṃ
analyzed: manasā nibbatta ttā dhammānam manaḥ maya tā yujjati manasā pasannena samuṭṭhānānam kāya vacī kammānam

original: kusalabhāvo yujjati. Yena kusalakammaṃ upacitaṃ, taṃ chāyā viya sukhaṃ anvetīti yujjati.
analyzed: kusala bhāvaḥ yujjati yena kusala kammam upacitam tam chāyā viya sukham anveti iti yujjati

original: Ayaṃ yuttihārasampāto.
analyzed: ayam yutti hāra sampātaḥ

original: Tattha katamo padaṭṭhāno hārasampāto? Mano manopavicārānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ. Manopubbaṅgamā
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ padaṭṭhānaḥ hāra sampātaḥ manaḥ manas pavicārānam padaṭṭhānam manaḥ pubbaṅgamā

original: dhammā sabbassa kusalapakkhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. “Bhāsatī”ti sammāvācā, “karotī”ti sammākammanto,
analyzed: dhammā sabbassa kusala pakkhassa padaṭṭhānam bhāsati iti sammā vācā karoti iti sammā kammanto

original: te sammāājīvassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sammāvāyāmo
analyzed: te sammāājīvassa padaṭṭhānam sammāājīvaḥ sammāvāyāmassa padaṭṭhānam sammāvāyāmaḥ

original: sammāsatiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sammāsati sammāsamādhissa padaṭṭhānaṃ. “Manasā pasannenā”ti
analyzed: sammā satiyāḥ padaṭṭhānam sammā sati sammā samādhissa padaṭṭhānam manasā pasannena ati

original: ettha pasādo saddhindriyaṃ, taṃ sīlassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sīlaṃ samādhissa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: ettha pasādaḥ saddhindriyam tam sīlassa padaṭṭhānam sīlam samādhissa padaṭṭhānam

original: Samādhi paññāyāti yāva vimuttiñāṇadassanā yojetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ padaṭṭhānahārasampāto.
analyzed: samādhi paññāyāti yāva vimutti ñāṇa dassanā yojetabbam ayam padaṭṭhāna hāra sampāto

original: Tattha katamo lakkhaṇo hārasampāto? “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti manopubbaṅgamatāvacanena
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ lakkhaṇaḥ hāra sampātaḥ manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ti manaḥ pubbaṅgama tā vacanena

original: dhammānaṃ chandapubbaṅgamatāpi vīriyapubbaṅgamatāpi vīmaṃsāpubbaṅgamatāpi vuttā hoti
analyzed: dhammānam chanda pubbaṅgama tā api vīriya pubbaṅgama tā api vīmaṃsā pubbaṅgama tā api vuttā hoti

original: ādhipateyyalakkhaṇena chandādīnaṃ manasā ekalakkhaṇattā. Tathā nesaṃ saddhādipubbaṅgamatāpi
analyzed: ādhipateyya lakkhaṇena chanda ādīnam manasā eka lakkhaṇa ttā tathā na isam saddhā ādi pubbaṅgama tā api

original: vuttā hoti indriyalakkhaṇena saddhādīnaṃ manasā ekalakkhaṇattā. “Manasā ce pasannenā”ti
analyzed: vuttā hoti indriya lakkhaṇena saddhā ādīnam manasā eka lakkhaṇa ttā manasā ce pasannena ati

original: yathā manassa pasādasamannāgamo taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ kāyavacīkammānaṃ anavajjabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: yathā manassa pasāda samannāgamaḥ tad samuṭṭhānānam kāya vacī kammānam anavajja bhāva lakkhaṇam

original: Evaṃ cittassa satiādisamannāgamopi nesaṃ anavajjabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ yonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhānabhāvena
analyzed: evam cittassa sati ādi samannāgamaḥ api na īsam anavajja bhāva lakkhaṇam yoniso manasikāra samuṭṭhāna bhāvena

original: ekalakkhaṇattā. “Sukhamanvetī”ti sukhānugamanavacanena sukhassa paccayabhūtānaṃ manāpiyarūpādīnaṃ
analyzed: eka lakkhaṇa ttā sukham anveti iti sukha anugamana vacanena sukhassa paccaya bhūtānam manā piya rūpa ādīnam

original: anugamo vutto hoti tesampi kammapaccayatāya ekalakkhaṇattāti. Ayaṃ lakkhaṇahārasampāto.
analyzed: anugamaḥ vuttaḥ hoti tesam pi kamma paccaya tāya eka lakkhaṇa ttā ati ayam lakkhaṇa hāra sampāto

original: Tattha katamo catubyūho hārasampāto? “Manopubbaṅgamā”tiādīsu “mano”tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ catu byūhaḥ hāra sampātaḥ manaḥ pubbaṅgamā tiādīsu manaḥ ti ādīnam padānam

original: nibbacanaṃ niruttaṃ, taṃ padatthaniddesavasena veditabbaṃ. Padattho ca vuttanayena
analyzed: nibbacanam niruttam tam padattha niddesa vasena veditabbam padatthaḥ ca vutta nayena

original: suviññeyyova. Ye sukhena atthikā, tehi pasannena manasā kāyavacīmanokammāni pavattetabbānīti
analyzed: su viññeyyā uva ye sukhena atthikā tehi pasannena manasā kāya vacī manaḥ kammāni pavattetabbāni iti

original: ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo. Puññakiriyāya aññesampi pubbaṅgamā hutvā tattha tesaṃ
analyzed: ayam ettha bhagavataḥ adhippāyaḥ puñña kiriyāya aññesam pi pubbaṅgamāḥ hutvā tattha tesam

original: sammā upanetāro imissā desanāya nidānaṃ. “Chadvārādhipatī rājā, cittānuparivattino
analyzed: sammā upanetāraḥ imissā desanāya nidānam cha dvāra adhipatiḥ rājā citta anuparivattinaḥ

original: dhammā, cittassa ekadhammassa, sabbeva vasamanvagū”ti evamādisamānayanena imissā
analyzed: dhammā cittassa eka dhammassa evamādi samānayanena imissā

original: desanāya saṃsandanā desanānusandhi. Padānusandhiyo pana suviññeyyāvāti. Ayaṃ catubyūho hārasampāto.
analyzed: desanāya saṃsandanā desanā anusandhi pada anusandhiyaḥ pana su viññeyyau āti ayam catu byūhaḥ hāra sampāto

original: Tattha katamo āvaṭṭo hārasampāto? “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti tattha yāni tīṇi kusalamūlāni,
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ āvaṭṭaḥ hāra sampātaḥ manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ti tattha yāni tīṇi kusala mūlāni

original: tāni aṭṭhannaṃ sammattānaṃ hetu. Ye sammattā, ayaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Yaṃ manosahajanāmarūpaṃ,
analyzed: tāni aṭṭhannam sammattānam hetu ye sammattāḥ ayam aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo yam manaḥ sahaja nāma rūpam

original: idaṃ dukkhaṃ. Asamucchinnā purimanipphannā avijjā bhavataṇhā, ayaṃ samudayo. Yattha
analyzed: idam dukkham asamucchinnā purima nipphannā avijjā bhava taṇhā ayam samudayaḥ yattha

original: tesaṃ pahānaṃ, ayaṃ nirodhoti imāni cattāri saccāni. Ayaṃ āvaṭṭo hārasampāto.
analyzed: tesam pahānam ayam nirodhaḥ ti imāni cattāri saccāni ayam āvaṭṭaḥ hāra sampāto

original: Tattha katamo vibhattihārasampāto? “Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, manasā ce pasannena, tato
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vibhatti hāra sampātaḥ manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammāḥ manasā ce pasannena tatas

original: naṃ sukhamanvetī”ti nayidaṃ yathārutavasena gahetabbaṃ. Yo hi samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo
analyzed: nam sukham anveti iti na idam yathā ruta vasena gahetabbam yaḥ hi samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ

original: vā pāṇātipātimhi micchādiṭṭhike micchāpaṭipanne sakaṃ cittaṃ pasādeti, pasannena
analyzed: vā pāṇa atipātimhi micchādiṭṭhike micchā paṭipanne sakam cittam pasādeti pasannena

original: ca cittena abhūtaguṇābhitthavanavasena bhāsati vā nipaccakāraṃ vāssa yaṃ karoti,
analyzed: ca cittena abhūta guṇa abhitthavana vasena bhāsati vā nipacca kāram yam karoti

original: na tato naṃ sukhamanveti. Dukkhameva pana taṃ tato cakkaṃva vahato padamanveti. Iti
analyzed: na tatas nam sukham anveti dukkham eva pana tam tatas cakkam iva vahataḥ padam anveti iti

original: hi idaṃ vibhajjabyākaraṇīyaṃ. Yaṃ manasā ce pasannena bhāsati vā karoti vā, tañce
analyzed: hi idam vibhajja byākaraṇīyam yam manasā pasannena bhāsati vā karoti vā

original: vacīkammaṃ kāyakammañca sukhavedanīyanti. Taṃ kissa hetu? Sammattagatehi sukhavedanīyaṃ
analyzed: vacī kammam kāya kammañca sukha vedanīyanti tam kissa hetu sammatta gatehi sukha vedanīyam

original: micchāgatehi dukkhavedanīyanti. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ pasādo daṭṭhabbo? Nāyaṃ pasādo, pasādapatirūpako
analyzed: micchāgatehi dukkha vedanīyanti katham pana ayam pasādaḥ daṭṭhabbo na ayam pasādaḥ pasāda patirūpako

original: pana micchādhimokkhoti vadāmi. Ayaṃ vibhattihārasampāto.
analyzed: pana micchā adhimokkhaḥ ti vadāmi ayam vibhatti hāra sampātaḥ

original: Tattha katamo parivattano hārasampāto? Manopubbaṅgamātiādi. Yaṃ manasā paduṭṭhena
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parivattanaḥ hāra sampātaḥ manaḥ pubbaṅgam ātiādi yam manasā paduṭṭhena

original: bhāsati vā karoti vā dukkhassānugāmī. Idañhi suttaṃ etassa ujupaṭipakkho. Ayaṃ parivattano hārasampāto.
analyzed: bhāsati vā karoti vā dukkhassa anugāmī idam hi suttam etassa uju paṭipakkhaḥ ayam parivattanaḥ hāra sampāto

original: Tattha katamo vevacano hārasampāto? “Manopubbaṅgamā”ti mano cittaṃ manāyatanaṃ manindriyaṃ
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ vevacanaḥ hāra sampātaḥ manaḥ pubbaṅgam āti manaḥ cittam mana āyatanam man indriyam

original: manoviññāṇaṃ manoviññāṇadhātūti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Pubbaṅgamā purecārino puregāminoti
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇam manaḥ viññāṇa dhātū ti pariyāya vacanam pubbaṅgamā purecārino puregāmino ti

original: pariyāyavacanaṃ. Dhammā attā sabhāvāti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Seṭṭhaṃ padhānaṃ pavaranti
analyzed: pariyāya vacanam dhammāḥ attā sabhāvā ati pariyāya vacanam seṭṭham padhānam pavaranti

original: pariyāyavacanaṃ. Manomayā manonibbattā manosambhūtāti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Pasannena
analyzed: pariyāya vacanam manaḥ mayā manaḥ nibbattā manaḥ sambhūtā iti pariyāya vacanam pasannena

original: saddahantena okappentenāti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Sukhaṃ sātaṃ vedayitanti pariyāyavacanaṃ.
analyzed: saddahantena okappentena ati pariyāya vacanam sukham sātam vedayitanti pariyāya vacanam

original: Anveti anugacchati anubandhatīti pariyāyavacanaṃ. Ayaṃ vevacano hārasampāto.
analyzed: anveti anugacchati anubandhati iti pariyāya vacanam ayam vevacanaḥ hāra sampātaḥ

original: Tattha katamo paññattihārasampāto? Manopubbaṅgamāti ayaṃ manaso kiccapaññatti. Dhammāti
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ paññatti hāra sampātaḥ manaḥ pubbaṅgamā ati ayam manasaḥ kicca paññatti dhammā ati

original: sabhāvapaññatti, kusalakammapathapaññatti. Manoseṭṭhāti padhānapaññatti. Manomayāti
analyzed: sabhāva paññatti kusala kammapatha paññatti manoseṭṭhā ati padhāna paññatti manomayā ati

original: sahajātapaññatti. Pasannenāti saddhindriyena samannāgatapaññatti, assaddhiyassa paṭikkhepapaññatti.
analyzed: sahajāta paññatti pasannena ati saddhi indriyena samannāgata paññatti assaddhiyassa paṭikkhepa paññatti

original: Bhāsati vā karoti vāti sammāvācāsammākammantānaṃ nikkhepapaññatti. Tato naṃ sukhamanvetīti
analyzed: bhāsati vā karoti vāti sammāvācā sammākammantānam nikkhepa paññatti tatas nam sukham anveti iti

original: kammassa phalānubandhapaññatti, kammassa avināsapaññattīti. Ayaṃ paññattihārasampāto.
analyzed: kammassa phala anubandha paññatti kammassa avināsa paññatti iti ayam paññatti hāra sampātaḥ

original: Tattha katamo otaraṇo hārasampāto? Manoti viññāṇakkhandho. Dhammāti vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhā.
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ otaraṇaḥ hāra sampātaḥ manaḥ ti viññāṇa kkhandho dhammā ati vedanā saññā saṅkhāra kkhandhā

original: Bhāsati vā karoti vāti kāyavacīviññattiyo. Tāsaṃ nissayā cattāro mahābhūtāti rūpakkhandhoti
analyzed: bhāsati vā karoti vā ati kāya vacī viññattiyaḥ tāsam nissayā cattāro mahābhūtā ati rūpa kkhandho ti

original: ayaṃ khandhehi otaraṇo. Manoti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇanti manoggahaṇena avijjāpaccayā
analyzed: ayam khandhehi otaraṇaḥ manaḥ ti abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇan ti manaḥ ggahaṇena avijjā paccayā

original: saṅkhārā gahitāti. Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ…pe… samudayo hotīti ayaṃ paṭiccasamuppādena
analyzed: saṅkhārāḥ gahitā ati saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇam pe samudayaḥ hoti iti ayam paṭiccasamuppādena

original: otaraṇoti. Ayaṃ otaraṇo hārasampāto.
analyzed: ayam otaraṇaḥ hāra sampātaḥ

original: Tattha katamo sodhano hārasampāto? Manoti ārambho neva padasuddhi, na ārambhasuddhi.
analyzed: tattha katamo sodhano hāra sampātaḥ ārambhaḥ na iva pada suddhi na ārambha suddhi

original: Manopubbaṅgamāti padasuddhi, na ārambhasuddhi. Tathā dhammāti yāva sukhanti padasuddhi,
analyzed: manaḥ pubbaṅgamā ati pada suddhi na ārambha suddhi tathā dhammā ati yāva sukhanti pada suddhi

original: na ārambhasuddhi. Sukhamanvetīti pana padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi cāti. Ayaṃ sodhano hārasampāto.
analyzed: na ārambha suddhi sukham anveti iti pana pada suddhi ca iva ārambha suddhi ca ati ayam hāra sampātaḥ

original: Tattha katamo adhiṭṭhāno hārasampāto? Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayāti
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ adhiṭṭhānaḥ hāra sampātaḥ manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā manaḥ seṭṭhāḥ manaḥ mayā ti

original: ekattatā. Manasā ce pasannenāti vemattatā, tathā manasā ce pasannenāti ekattatā.
analyzed: ekatta tā manasā ce pasannena ati vematta tā tathā manasā ce pasannena ati ekatta tā

original: Bhāsati vā karoti vāti vemattatā, tathā manasā ce pasannenāti ekattatā. So pasādo
analyzed: bhāsati vā karoti vāti vematta tā tathā manasā ce pasannena ati ekatta tā saḥ pasādaḥ

original: duvidho ajjhattañca byāpādavikkhambhanato, bahiddhā ca okappanato. Tathā sampattibhavahetubhūtopi
analyzed: duvidhaḥ ajjhattam ca byāpāda vikkhambhanato bahiddhā ca okappanato tathā sampatti bhava hetu bhūtaḥ api

original: vaḍḍhihetubhūtovāti ayaṃ vemattatā. Tayidaṃ suttaṃ dvīhi ākārehi adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ hetunā
analyzed: vaḍḍhi hetu bhūtā uvāti ayam vematta tā tayā idam suttam dvīhi ākārehi adhiṭṭhātabbam hetunā

original: ca yo pasannamānaso, vipākena ca yo sukhavedanīyoti. Ayaṃ adhiṭṭhāno hārasampāto.
analyzed: ca yaḥ pasanna mānasaḥ vipākena ca yaḥ sukha vedanīyaḥ ti ayam adhiṭṭhānaḥ hāra sampāto

original: Tattha katamo parikkhāro hārasampāto? Manopubbaṅgamāti ettha manoti kusalaviññāṇaṃ.
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ parikkhāraḥ hāra sampātaḥ manaḥ pubbaṅgamā ti ettha manaḥ ti kusala viññāṇam

original: Tassa ca ñāṇasampayuttassa alobho adoso amohoti tayo sampayuttā hetū, ñāṇavippayuttassa
analyzed: tassa ca ñāṇa sampayuttassa alobhaḥ adosaḥ amohaḥ ti tayo sampayuttā hetū ñāṇa vippayuttassa

original: alobho adosoti dve sampayuttā hetū. Sabbesaṃ avisesena yonisomanasikāro hetu, cattāri
analyzed: alobho adoso ti dve sampayuttā hetū sabbesam avisesena yoniso manasikāraḥ hetu cattāri

original: sampatticakkāni paccayo. Tathā saddhammassavanaṃ, tassa ca dānādivasena pavattamānassa
analyzed: sampatti cakkāni paccayaḥ tathā saddhamma ssavanam tassa ca dāna ādi vasena pavattamānassa

original: deyyadhammādayo paccayo. Dhammāti cettha vedanādīnaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇādayo. Tathā tayo
analyzed: deyya dhamma ādayaḥ paccayaḥ dhammā ti ca ittha vedanā ādīnam iṭṭha ārammaṇa ādayo tathā tayo

original: viññāṇassa, vedanādayo pasādassa, saddheyyavatthukusalābhisaṅkhāro vipākasukhassa
analyzed: viññāṇassa vedanā ādayaḥ pasādassa saddheyya vatthu kusala abhisaṅkhāro vipāka sukhassa

original: paccayoti. Ayaṃ parikkhāro hārasampāto.
analyzed: paccayaḥ ti ayam parikkhāraḥ hāra sampāto

original: Tattha katamo samāropano hārasampāto? Manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti manoti puññacittaṃ,
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ samāropanaḥ hāra sampātaḥ manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ti mano ti puñña cittam

original: taṃ tividhaṃ – dānamayaṃ, sīlamayaṃ, bhāvanāmayanti. Tattha dānamayassa alobho padaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: tam tividham dāna mayam sīla mayam bhāvanā mayam ti tattha dāna mayassa alobho padaṭṭhānaṃ

original: sīlamayassa adoso padaṭṭhānaṃ, bhāvanāmayassa amoho padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbesaṃ abhippasādo
analyzed: sīla mayassa adoso padaṭṭhānam bhāvanā mayassa amoho padaṭṭhānam sabbesam abhippasādaḥ

original: padaṭṭhānaṃ, “saddhājāto upasaṅkamati, upasaṅkamanto payirupāsatī”ti suttaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.
analyzed: padaṭṭhānam saddhā jātaḥ upasaṅkamati upasaṅkamantaḥ payirupāsati iti suttam vitthāretabbam

original: Kusalacittaṃ sukhassa iṭṭhavipākassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yonisomanasikāro kusalacittassa
analyzed: kusala cittam sukhassa iṭṭha vipākassa padaṭṭhānam yoniso manasikāro kusala cittassa

original: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Yoniso hi manasi karonto kusalacittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti kusalacittaṃ bhāveti,
analyzed: pada ṭṭhānam yonisas hi manasi karontaḥ kusala cittam adhiṭṭhāti kusala cittam bhāveti

original: so anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti, uppannānaṃ
analyzed: saḥ an uppannānam pāpakānam akusalānam dhammānam an uppādāya chandam janeti uppannānam

original: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ…pe… padahati. Tassevaṃ catūsu sammappadhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro
analyzed: kusalānam dhammānam pe padahati tassa ivam catūsu sammappadhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro

original: satipaṭṭhānā yāva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatīti ayaṃ bhāvanāya
analyzed: sati paṭṭhānā yāva ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati iti ayam bhāvanāya

original: samāropanā. Sati ca bhāvanāya pahānañca siddhamevāti. Ayaṃ samāropano hārasampāto.
analyzed: samāropanā sati ca bhāvanāya pahānam ca siddham eva ati ayam samāropanaḥ hāra sampātaḥ

original: Tathā –
analyzed: tathā

original: “Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyati;
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati saṃyamataḥ veram na cīyati

original: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṃ, rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbuto”ti. ;
analyzed: kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakam rāga dosa moha khayā sa nibbutaḥ ti

original: Tattha dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu vuttaṃ. Saṃyamato veraṃ
analyzed: tattha dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti dāna mayam puñña kiriya vatthu vuttam saṃyamataḥ veram

original: na cīyatīti sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu vuttaṃ. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti lobhassa
analyzed: na cīyati iti sīla mayam puñña kiriya vatthu vuttam kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakanti lobhassa

original: ca dosassa ca mohassa ca pahānamāha. Tena bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ca dosassa ca mohassa ca pahānam āha tena bhāvanā mayam puñña kiriya vatthu vuttam

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti anupādāparinibbānamāha.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti anupādā parinibbānam āha

original: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti alobho kusalamūlaṃ. Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti adoso
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti alobho kusala mūlam saṃyamataḥ veram na cīyati iti adoso

original: kusalamūlaṃ. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti amoho kusalamūlaṃ. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa
analyzed: kusala mūlam kusalaḥ ca jahāti amohaḥ kusala mūlam rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa

original: nibbutoti tesaṃ nissaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: nibbutaḥ ti tesam nissaraṇam vuttam

original: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti sīlakkhandhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti sīlakkhandhassa padaṭṭhānam saṃyamataḥ veram na cīyati iti

original: samādhikkhandhassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti paññākkhandhassa vimuttikkhandhassa
analyzed: samādhi kkhandhassa padaṭṭhānam kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti paññā kkhandhassa vimutti kkhandhassa

original: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Dānena oḷārikānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ, sīlena majjhimānaṃ, paññāya sukhumānaṃ.
analyzed: padaṭṭhānam dānena oḷārikānam kilesānam pahānam sīlena majjhimānam paññāya sukhumānam

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti katāvībhūmiṃ dasseti.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti katāvībhūmim dasseti

original: Dadato puññaṃ…pe… jahāti pāpakanti sekkhabhūmi dassitā. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti aggaphalaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pe jahāti pāpakanti sekkha bhūmi dassitā rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti agga phalam vuttaṃ

original: Tathā dadato puññaṃ…pe… na cīyatīti lokiyakusalamūlaṃ vuttaṃ. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti
analyzed: tathā dadataḥ puññaṃpe na cīyati iti lokiya kusala mūlam vuttam kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakan ti

original: lokuttarakusalamūlaṃ vuttaṃ. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti lokuttarassa kusalamūlassa phalaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: lokuttara kusala mūlam vuttam rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti lokuttarassa kusala mūlassa phalam vuttaṃ

original: Dadato…pe… na cīyatīti puthujjanabhūmi dassitā. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti sekkhabhūmi dassitā. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti asekkhabhūmi dassitā.
analyzed: dadatā upe na cīyati iti puthujjana bhūmi dassitā kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakanti sekkha bhūmi dassitā rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti asekkha bhūmi dassitā

original: Dadato …pe… na cīyatīti saggagāminī paṭipadā vuttā. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti sekkhavimutti. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti asekkhavimutti vuttā.
analyzed: dadataḥ pe na cīyati iti sagga gāminī paṭipadā vuttā kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakanti sekkha vimutti rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti asekkha vimutti vuttā

original: Dadato…pe… na cīyatīti dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ lokiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ desanamāha.
analyzed: dadatā upe na cīyati iti dāna katham sīla katham sagga katham lokiyānam dhammānam desanam āha

original: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti loke ādīnavānupassanāya saddhiṃ sāmukkaṃsikaṃ dhammadesanamāha.
analyzed: kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakam ti loke ādīnava anupassanāya saddhim sāmukkaṃsikam dhamma desanam āha

original: Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti tassā desanāya phalamāha.
analyzed: rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti tassāḥ desanāya phalam āha

original: Dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dhammadānaṃ āmisadānañca vadati. Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti dhamma dānam āmisa dānañca vadati saṃyamataḥ veram na cīyati iti

original: pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā sattānaṃ abhayadānaṃ vadati. Evaṃ sabbānipi sikkhāpadāni vitthāretabbāni.
analyzed: pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā sattānam abhaya dānam vadati evam sabbāni api sikkhāpadāni vitthāretabbāni

original: Tena ca sīlasaṃyamena sīle patiṭṭhito cittaṃ saṃyameti, tassa samatho pāripūriṃ gacchati.
analyzed: tena ca sīla saṃyamena sīle patiṭṭhitaḥ cittam saṃyameti tassa samatho pāripūrim gacchati

original: Evaṃ so samathe ṭhito vipassanākosallayogato kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṃ rāgaṃ jahāti,
analyzed: evam saḥ samathe ṭhitaḥ vipassanā kosalla yogataḥ kusalo ca jahāti pāpakam rāgam jahāti

original: dosaṃ jahāti, mohaṃ jahāti, ariyamaggena sabbepi pāpake akusale dhamme jahāti. Evaṃ
analyzed: dosam jahāti moham jahāti ariya maggena sabbe api pāpake akusale dhamme jahāti evam

original: paṭipanno ca rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti rāgādīnaṃ parikkhayā dvepi vimuttiyo
analyzed: paṭipanno ca rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti rāga ādīnam parikkhayāḥ dve api vimuttiyaḥ

original: adhigacchatīti ayaṃ suttaniddeso.
analyzed: adhigacchati iti ayam sutta niddeso

original: Tattha katamo desanāhārasampāto? Imasmiṃ sutte kiṃ desitaṃ? Dve sugatiyo devā ca
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ desanā āhāra sampātaḥ imasmin sutte kim desitam dve sugatiyaḥ devā ca

original: manussā ca, dibbā ca pañca kāmaguṇā, mānusakā ca pañca kāmaguṇā, dibbā ca pañcupādānakkhandhā,
analyzed: manussā ca dibbā ca pañca kāmaguṇāḥ mānusakā ca pañca kāmaguṇāḥ dibbā ca pañca upādānakkhandhāḥ

original: mānusakā ca pañcupādānakkhandhā. Idaṃ vuccati dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ. Tassa kāraṇabhāvena
analyzed: mānusakā ca pañca upādāna kkhandhāḥ idam vuccati dukkham ariya saccam tassa kāraṇa bhāvena

original: purimapurimanipphannā taṇhā samudayo ariyasaccaṃ. Tayidaṃ vuccati assādo ca ādīnavo
analyzed: purima purima nipphannā taṇhā samudayaḥ ariya saccam tayidam vuccati assādaḥ ca ādīnavaḥ

original: ca. Sabbassa purimehi dvīhi padehi niddeso “dadato…pe… na cīyatī”ti. Kusalo ca jahāti
analyzed: ca sabbassa purimehi dvīhi padehi niddesaḥ dadatā upe na cīyati iti kusalaḥ ca jahāti

original: pāpakanti maggo vutto. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti dve nibbānadhātuyo saupādisesā
analyzed: pāpakanti maggaḥ vuttaḥ rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti dve nibbāna dhātuyo saupādisesā

original: ca anupādisesā ca. Idaṃ nissaraṇaṃ. Phalādīni pana yathārahaṃ veditabbānīti. Ayaṃ desanāhārasampāto.
analyzed: ca anupādisesā ca idam nissaraṇam phala ādīni pana yathāraham veditabbāni iti ayam desanā āhāra sampātaḥ

original: Vicayoti “dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”ti iminā paṭhamena padena tividhampi dānamayaṃ
analyzed: vicayo ti dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti iminā paṭhamena padena tividham pi dāna mayam

original: sīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu vuttaṃ. Dasavidhassapi deyyadhammassa pariccāgo
analyzed: sīla mayam bhāvanā mayam puñña kiriya vatthu vuttam dasavidhassa api deyya dhammassa pariccāgaḥ

original: vutto. Tathā chabbidhassapi rūpādiārammaṇassa. “Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatī”ti dutiyena
analyzed: vuttaḥ tathā chabbidhassa api rūpa ādi ārammaṇassa saṃyamataḥ veram na cīyati iti dutiyena

original: padena averā asapattā abyāpādā ca paṭipadā vuttā. “Kusalo ca jahāti pāpaka”nti tatiyena
analyzed: padena averā asapattā abyāpādā ca paṭipadā vuttā kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakanti tatiyena

original: padena ñāṇuppādo aññāṇanirodho sabbopi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo sabbepi bodhipakkhiyā
analyzed: padena ñāṇa uppādaḥ aññāṇa nirodho sabbaḥ api ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo sabbe api bodhi pakkhiyā

original: dhammā vuttā. “Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbuto”ti rāgakkhayena rāgavirāgā cetovimutti,
analyzed: dhammā vuttā rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti rāga kkhayena rāga virāgā cetaḥ vimutti

original: mohakkhayena avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti vuttāti. Ayaṃ vicayo hārasampāto.
analyzed: moha kkhayena avijjā virāgā paññā vimutti vuttā ati ayam vicayaḥ hāra sampāto

original: Yuttīti dāne ṭhito ubhayaṃ paripūreti macchariyappahānañca puññābhisandañcāti atthesā
analyzed: yutti iti dāne ṭhitaḥ ubhayam paripūreti macchariya pahānañca puñña abhisandañca ati attha isā

original: yutti. Sīlasaṃyame ṭhito ubhayaṃ paripūreti upacārasamādhiṃ appanāsamādhiñcāti atthesā
analyzed: sīla saṃyame ṭhitaḥ ubhayam paripūreti upacāra samādhim appanā samādhim ca ati

original: yutti. Pāpake dhamme pajahanto dukkhaṃ parijānāti, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ
analyzed: yutti pāpake dhamme pajahantaḥ dukkham parijānāti nirodham sacchikaroti maggaṃ

original: bhāvetīti atthesā yutti. Rāgadosamohesu sabbaso parikkhīṇesu anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
analyzed: bhāveti iti atthā isā yutti rāga dosa mohesu sabbaso parikkhīṇesu anupādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā

original: parinibbāyatīti atthesā yuttīti. Ayaṃ yuttihārasampāto.
analyzed: parinibbāyati iti attha isā yuttī iti ayam yutti hāra sampātaḥ

original: Padaṭṭhānanti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti cāgādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Saṃyamato
analyzed: padaṭṭhānam ti dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti cāga adhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānam saṃyamato

original: veraṃ na cīyatīti saccādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti paññādhiṭṭhānassa
analyzed: veram na cīyati iti sacca adhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānam kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti paññā adhiṭṭhānassa

original: padaṭṭhānaṃ. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti upasamādhiṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānanti. Ayaṃ
analyzed: padaṭṭhānam rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbutaḥ ti upasamādhi ṭṭhānassa padaṭṭhānanti ayaṃ

original: padaṭṭhāno hārasampāto.
analyzed: pada ṭṭhānaḥ hāra sampāto

original: Lakkhaṇoti “dadato”ti etena peyyavajjaṃ atthacariyaṃ samānattatā ca dassitāti veditabbā
analyzed: dadato ti etena peyya vajjam attha cariyam samānatta tā ca dassitā iti veditabbā

original: saṅgahavatthubhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā. “Saṃyamato”ti etena khantimettāavihiṃsāanuddayādayo
analyzed: saṅgaha vatthu bhāvena eka lakkhaṇa ttā saṃyamāt iti etena khanti mettā avihiṃsā anuddaya ādayaḥ

original: dassitāti veditabbā verānuppādanalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā. “Veraṃ na cīyatī”ti etena
analyzed: dassitā ati veditabbā vera anuppādana lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇa ttā veram na cīyati iti etena

original: hirīottappaappicchatāsantuṭṭhitādayo dassitā verāvaḍḍhanena ekalakkhaṇattā. Tathā
analyzed: hirī ottappa appiccha tā santuṭṭhi tā ādayaḥ dassitāḥ verā vaḍḍhanena eka lakkhaṇa ttā tathā

original: ahirīkānottappādayo acetabbabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā. “Kusalo”ti etena kosalladīpanena
analyzed: ahirīkāna uttappa ādayaḥ acetabba bhāvena eka lakkhaṇa ttā kusalaḥ ti etena kosalla dīpanena

original: sammāsaṅkappādayo dassitā maggaṅgādibhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā. “Jahāti pāpaka”nti etena
analyzed: sammāsaṅkappa ādayaḥ dassitāḥ maggaṅga ādi bhāvena eka lakkhaṇa ttā jahāti pāpakanti etena

original: pariññābhisamayādayopi dassitā abhisamayalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇattā. “Rāgadosamohakkhayā”ti
analyzed: pariññā abhisamaya ādayaḥ api dassitāḥ abhisamaya lakkhaṇena eka lakkhaṇa ttā rāga dosa moha kkhayā ti

original: etena avasiṭṭhakilesādīnampi khayā dassitā khepetabbabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattāti ayaṃ lakkhaṇo.
analyzed: etena avasiṭṭha kilesa ādīnam pi khayā dassitā khepetabba bhāvena eka lakkhaṇa ttā ti ayam lakkhaṇaḥ

original: Catubyūhoti dadatoti gāthāyaṃ bhagavato ko adhippāyo? Ye mahābhogataṃ patthayissanti,
analyzed: catu byūhaḥ ti dadataḥ ti gāthā ayam bhagavato kaḥ adhippāyaḥ ye mahā bhoga tam patthayissanti

original: te dānaṃ dassanti dāliddiyappahānāya. Ye averataṃ icchanti, te pañca verāni pajahissanti.
analyzed: te dānam dassanti dāliddiya pahānāya ye averatam icchanti te pañca verāni pajahissanti

original: Ye kusaladhammehi chandakāmā, te aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvessanti. Ye nibbāyitukāmā,
analyzed: ye kusala dhammehi chanda kāmā te aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvessanti ye nibbāyitu kāmā

original: te rāgadosamohaṃ pajahissantīti ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo. Evaṃ nibbacananidānasandhayo
analyzed: te rāga dosa moham pajahissanti iti ayam ettha bhagavataḥ adhippāyaḥ evam nibbacana nidāna sandhayaḥ

original: vattabbāti. Ayaṃ catubyūho.
analyzed: vattabbā ti ayam catu byūhaḥ

original: Āvaṭṭoti yañca adadato macchariyaṃ, yañca asaṃyamato veraṃ, yañca akusalassa pāpassa
analyzed: āvaṭṭoti yat ca a dadataḥ macchariyam yat ca a saṃyamataḥ veram yat ca akusalassa pāpassa

original: appahānaṃ, ayaṃ paṭipakkhaniddesena samudayo. Tassa alobhena ca adosena ca amohena
analyzed: appahānam ayam paṭipakkha niddesena samudayo tassa a lobhena ca a dosena ca a mohena

original: ca dānādīhi pahānaṃ, imāni tīṇi kusalamūlāni. Tesaṃ paccayo aṭṭha sammattāni, ayaṃ
analyzed: ca dāna ādīhi pahānam imāni tīṇi kusala mūlāni tesam paccayaḥ aṭṭha sammattāni ayaṃ

original: maggo. Yo rāgadosamohānaṃ khayo, ayaṃ nirodhoti. Ayaṃ āvaṭṭo.
analyzed: maggaḥ yaḥ rāga dosa mohānam khayaḥ ayam nirodhaḥ iti ayam āvaṭṭaḥ

original: Vibhattīti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti ekaṃsena yo bhayahetu deti, rāgahetu deti,
analyzed: vibhattīti dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti ekaṃsena yaḥ bhaya hetu deti rāga hetu deti

original: āmisakiñcikkhahetu deti, na tassa puññaṃ vaḍḍhati. Yañca daṇḍadānaṃ satthadānaṃ paraviheṭhanatthaṃ
analyzed: āmisa kiñcikkha hetu deti na tassa puññam vaḍḍhati yat ca daṇḍa dānam sattha dānam para viheṭhana attham

original: apuññaṃ assa pavaḍḍhati. Yaṃ pana kusalena cittena anukampanto vā apacāyamāno vā
analyzed: apuññam assa pavaḍḍhati yam pana kusalena cittena anukampantaḥ vā apacāyamānaḥ vā

original: annaṃ deti, pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathaṃ padīpeyyaṃ deti,
analyzed: annam deti pānam vattham yānam mālā gandha vilepanam seyyā āvasatham padīpeyyam deti

original: sabbasattānaṃ vā abhayadānaṃ deti, mettacitto hitajjhāsayo nissaraṇasaññī dhammaṃ
analyzed: sabba sattānam vā abhaya dānam deti metta cittaḥ hita ajjhāsayaḥ nissaraṇa saññī dhammaṃ

original: deseti. Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti ekaṃsena abhayūparatassa cīyati, kiṃkāraṇaṃ?
analyzed: deseti saṃyamataḥ veram na cīyati iti eka aṃsena abhayu uparatassa cīyati kiṃkāraṇam

original: Yaṃ asamattho, bhayūparato diṭṭhadhammikassa bhāyati “mā maṃ rājāno gahetvā hatthaṃ
analyzed: yam asamatthaḥ bhaya uparataḥ diṭṭhadhammikassa bhāyati mā mama rājānaḥ gahetvā hattham

original: vā chindeyyuṃ…pe… jīvantampi sūle uttāseyyu”nti, tena saṃyamena averaṃ cīyati. Yo
analyzed: vā jīvantam pi sūle tena saṃyamena averam cīyati yaḥ

original: pana evaṃ samāno veraṃ na cīyati. Yo pana evaṃ samādiyati, pāṇātipātassa pāpako vipāko
analyzed: pana evam samānaḥ veram na cīyati yaḥ pana evam samādiyati pāṇātipātassa pāpakaḥ vipāko

original: diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāye ca, evaṃ sabbassa akusalassa, so tato āramati, iminā
analyzed: diṭṭhe ca iva dhamme abhisamparāye ca evam sabbassa akusalassa so tatas āramati iminā

original: saṃyamena veraṃ na cīyati. Saṃyamo nāma sīlaṃ. Taṃ catubbidhaṃ cetanā sīlaṃ, cetasikaṃ
analyzed: saṃyamena vā iram na cīyati saṃyamaḥ nāma sīlam tam catubbidham cetanā sīlam cetasikam

original: sīlaṃ, saṃvaro sīlaṃ, avītikkamo sīlanti. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti pāpapahāyakā
analyzed: sīlam saṃvaraḥ sīlam a vītikkamaḥ sīlanti kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakanti pāpa pahāyakā

original: sattattiṃsa bodhipakkhiyā dhammā vattabbāti. Ayaṃ vibhatti.
analyzed: sattattiṃsa bodhi pakkhiyāḥ dhammāḥ vattabbā ti ayam vibhatti

original: Parivattanoti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, adadatopi puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati, na dānamayikaṃ.
analyzed: parivattanoti dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati a dadataḥ api puññam pavaḍḍhati na dānamayikam

original: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyati asaṃyamatopi veraṃ na cīyati, yaṃ dānena paṭisaṅkhānabalena
analyzed: saṃyamataḥ veram na cīyati asaṃyamataḥ api veram na cīyati yam dānena paṭisaṅkhāna balena

original: bhāvanābalena. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakaṃ, akusalo pana na jahāti. Rāgadosamohakkhayā
analyzed: bhāvanā balena kusalaḥ ca jahāti pāpakam akusalaḥ pana na jahāti rāga dosa moha kkhayā

original: sa nibbuto, tesaṃ aparikkhayā natthi nibbutīti. Ayaṃ parivattano.
analyzed: sa nibbutaḥ tesam a parikkhayā natthi nibbuti iti ayam parivattanaḥ

original: Vevacanoti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati. Pariccāgato kusalaṃ upacīyati. Anumodatopi puññaṃ
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati pariccāgataḥ kusalam upacīyati anumodataḥ api puññam

original: pavaḍḍhati cittappasādatopi veyyāvaccakiriyāyapi. Saṃyamatoti sīlasaṃvarato soraccato.
analyzed: pavaḍḍhati citta ppasādataḥ pi saṃyamato ti sīla saṃvarato soraccato

original: Veraṃ na cīyatīti pāpaṃ na vaḍḍhati, akusalaṃ na vaḍḍhati. Kusaloti paṇḍito nipuṇo
analyzed: veram na cīyati iti pāpam na vaḍḍhati akusalam na vaḍḍhati kusala uti paṇḍitaḥ nipuṇaḥ

original: medhāvī parikkhako. Jahātīti samucchindati samugghāṭeti. Ayaṃ vevacano.
analyzed: medhāvī parikkhakaḥ jahāti iti samucchindati samugghāṭa iti ayam vevacanaḥ

original: Paññattīti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti lobhassa paṭinissaggapaññatti, alobhassa nikkhepapaññatti.
analyzed: paññattī iti dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti lobhassa paṭinissagga paññatti alobhassa nikkhepa paññatti

original: Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti dosassa vikkhambhanapaññatti, adosassa nikkhepapaññatti.
analyzed: saṃyamataḥ veram na cīyati iti dosassa vikkhambhana paññatti adosassa nikkhepa paññatti

original: Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti mohassa samugghātapaññatti, amohassa bhāvanāpaññatti.
analyzed: kusalo ca jahāti pāpaka nti mohassa samugghāta paññatti amohassa bhāvanā paññatti

original: Rāgadosamohassa pahānapaññatti, alobhādosāmohassa bhāvanāpaññatti. Rāgadosamohakkhayā
analyzed: rāga dosa mohassa pahāna paññatti alobhā dosā mohassa bhāvanā paññatti rāga dosa moha kkhayā

original: sa nibbutoti kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhipaññatti, nibbānassa sacchikiriyapaññattīti. Ayaṃ paññatti.
analyzed: sa nibbutaḥ ti kilesānam paṭippassaddhi paññatti nibbānassa sacchikiriya paññatti iti ayaṃ paññatti

original: Otaraṇoti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dānaṃ nāma saddhādīhi indriyehi hotīti ayaṃ
analyzed: dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti dānam nāma saddhā ādīhi indriyehi hoti iti ayaṃ

original: indriyehi otaraṇo. Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti saṃyamo nāma sīlakkhandhoti ayaṃ khandhehi
analyzed: indriyehi saṃyamataḥ veram na cīyati iti saṃyamaḥ nāma sīla kkhandhaḥ ti ayam khandhehi

original: otaraṇo. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti pāpappahānaṃ nāma tīhi vimokkhehi hoti. Tesaṃ
analyzed: otaraṇaḥ kusalo ca jahāti pāpakam ti pāpa ppahānam nāma tīhi vimokkhehi hoti tesam

original: upāyabhūtāni tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti ayaṃ vimokkhamukhehi otaraṇo. Rāgadosamohakkhayā
analyzed: upāya bhūtāni tīṇi vimokkha mukhāni iti ayam vimokkha mukhehi otaraṇaḥ rāga dosa moha kkhayā

original: sa nibbutoti vimuttikkhandho. So ca dhammadhātu dhammāyatanañcāti ayaṃ dhātūhi ca
analyzed: sa nibbutaḥ ti vimutti kkhandho so ca dhammadhātu dhamma āyatanam ca ati ayam dhātūhi ca

original: āyatanehi ca otaraṇoti. Ayaṃ otaraṇo.
analyzed: āyatanehi ca ayam otaraṇo

original: Sodhanoti dadatotiādikā padasuddhi, no ārambhasuddhi. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti ayaṃ padasuddhi ca ārambhasuddhi cāti. Ayaṃ sodhano.
analyzed: dadataḥ iti ādikā pada suddhi no ārambha suddhi rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbuto ti ayam pada suddhi ca ārambha suddhi ca ati ayam sodhano

original: Adhiṭṭhānoti dadatoti ayaṃ ekattatā, cāgo pariccāgo dhammadānaṃ āmisadānaṃ abhayadānaṃ,
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāno ti dadatoti ayam ekatta tā cāgo pariccāgaḥ dhamma dānam āmisa dānam abhaya dānam

original: aṭṭha dānāni vitthāretabbāni. Ayaṃ vemattatā. Saṃyamoti ayaṃ ekattatā. Pātimokkhasaṃvaro
analyzed: aṭṭha dānāni vitthāretabbāni ayam vematta tā saṃyamaḥ ti ayam ekatta tā pātimokkha saṃvaro

original: satisaṃvaroti ayaṃ vemattatā. Kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti ayaṃ ekattatā. Sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ
analyzed: ayam vematta tā kusalo ca jahāti pāpakanti ayam ekatta tā sakkāyadiṭṭhim

original: pajahati vicikicchaṃ pajahatītiādikā ayaṃ vemattatā. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa nibbutoti
analyzed: pajahati vicikiccham pajahati iti ādikā ayam vematta tā rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa nibbuto ti

original: ayaṃ ekattatā. Saupādisesā nibbānadhātu anupādisesā nibbānadhātūti ayaṃ vemattatāti. Ayaṃ adhiṭṭhāno.
analyzed: ayam ekatta tā sa aupādisesā nibbāna dhātu anupādisesā nibbāna dhātu uti ayam vematta tā ati ayam adhiṭṭhānaḥ

original: Parikkhāroti dānassa pāmojjaṃ paccayo. Alobho hetu, saṃyamassa hirottappādayo paccayo.
analyzed: parikkhāro ti dānassa pāmojjam paccayaḥ alobho hetu saṃyamassa hirottappa ādayo paccayaḥ

original: Yonisomanasikāro adoso ca hetu, pāpappahānassa samādhi yathābhūtañāṇadassanañca paccayo.
analyzed: yoniso manasikāraḥ adoso ca hetu pāpa ppahānassa samādhi yathābhūta ñāṇa dassanañca paccayo

original: Tisso anupassanā hetu, nibbutiyā maggasammādiṭṭhi hetu, sammāsaṅkappādayo paccayoti. Ayaṃ parikkhāro.
analyzed: tissaḥ anupassanā hetu nibbutiyāḥ magga sammādiṭṭhi hetu sammāsaṅkappa ādayo paccayaḥ ti ayam parikkhāro

original: Samāropano hārasampātoti dadato puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu,
analyzed: samāropanaḥ hāra sampāto ti dadataḥ puññam pavaḍḍhati iti dāna mayam puñña kiriya vatthu

original: taṃ sīlassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Saṃyamato veraṃ na cīyatīti sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu,
analyzed: tam sīlassa padaṭṭhānam saṃyamataḥ veram na cīyati iti sīla mayam puñña kiriya vatthu

original: taṃ samādhissa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Sīlena hi jhānenapi rāgādikilesā na cīyanti. Yepissa
analyzed: tam samādhissa padaṭṭhānam sīlena hi jhānena api rāga ādi kilesāḥ na cīyanti ye pi issa

original: tappaccayā uppajjeyyuṃ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, tepissa na honti. Kusalo ca jahāti
analyzed: tad paccayāḥ uppajjeyyuṃ āsavāḥ vighāta pariḷāhāḥ te pi issa na honti kusalaḥ ca jahāti

original: pāpakanti pahānapariññā, taṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu. Rāgadosamohakkhayā sa
analyzed: pāpakanti pahāna pariññā tam bhāvanā mayam puñña kiriya vatthu rāga dosa moha kkhayā sa

original: nibbutoti rāgassapi khayā dosassapi khayā mohassapi khayā. Tattha rāgoti yo rāgo
analyzed: nibbutaḥ ti rāgassa api khayā dosassa api khayā mohassa api khayā tattha rāgo ti yaḥ rāgo

original: sārāgo cetaso sārajjanā lobho lubbhanā lubbhitattaṃ abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṃ.
analyzed: sārāgaḥ cetasaḥ sārajjanā lobhaḥ lubbhanā lubbhi tattam abhijjhā lobhaḥ akusala mūlam

original: Dosoti yo doso dussanā dussitattaṃ byāpādo cetaso byāpajjanā doso akusalamūlaṃ. Mohoti
analyzed: doso ti yaḥ dosaḥ dussanā dussita ttam byāpādaḥ cetasaḥ byāpajjanā dosaḥ akusala mūlam mohaḥ iti

original: yaṃ aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ anabhisamayo asambodho appaṭivedho dummejjhaṃ bālyaṃ asampajaññaṃ
analyzed: yam aññāṇam a dassanam an abhisamayaḥ a sambodhaḥ a paṭivedhaḥ dummejjham bālyam a sampajaññam

original: moho akusalamūlaṃ. Iti imesaṃ rāgādīnaṃ khayo nirodho paṭinissaggo nibbuti nibbāyanā
analyzed: mohaḥ akusala mūlam iti imesam rāga ādīnam khayaḥ nirodhaḥ paṭinissaggaḥ nibbuti nibbāyanā

original: parinibbānaṃ saupādisesā nibbānadhātu anupādisesā nibbānadhātūti. Ayaṃ samāropano hārasampāto.
analyzed: parinibbānam sa aupādisesā nibbāna dhātu anupādisesā nibbāna dhātu uti ayam samāropanaḥ hāra sampātaḥ

original: Missakahārasampātavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: missaka hāra sampāta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Nayasamuṭṭhānavāravaṇṇanā
analyzed: naya samuṭṭhāna vāra vaṇṇanā

original: 79. Evaṃ nānāsuttavasena ekasuttavasena ca hāravicāraṃ dassetvā idāni nayavicāraṃ

analyzed: diṭṭhi gatāni iti uccheda sassata dassanam vitthārena brahmajāle āgatāni dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhi gatāni

original: Tesanti evaṃ saṅkhepavitthāravantānaṃ ucchedasassatadassanānaṃ. Paṭipakkhoti pahāyakapaṭipakkho.

analyzed: bodhi pakkhiyāḥ dhammāḥ

original: Tattha ñāṇavajiranti vajirūpamañāṇaṃ. Aṭṭha samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā tejetvā tikkhasabhāvaṃ

original: dhammā”ti āha. Mohajālappadālananti pubbabhāge vikkhambhanavasena maggakkhaṇe samucchedavasena

analyzed: saṃsibbana vasena pavattanataḥ jālam bhava taṇhā tassā hi taṇhā jālinī sibbinī jālanti

original: 81. “Tattha diṭṭhicarito”tiādinā vodānapakkhaṃ dasseti. Tattha sallekhānusantatavuttīti
analyzed: tattha diṭṭhi caritā iti ādinā vodāna pakkham dasseti tattha sallekha anusantata vuttī iti

original: anupāyenapi yebhuyyena kilesānaṃ sallekhanādhippāyena carati, tasmā so sāsane pabbajito

original: Diṭṭhiyā savisaye paññāsadisī pavattīti so visujjhamāno paññādhiko hotīti āha – “diṭṭhicarito

original: sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamanto dhammānusārī bhavatī”ti. Taṇhāvasena micchāvimokkho hotīti

analyzed: apubba padesu pana viveciyamānaḥ iti vimociyamānaḥ paṭinissarati iti niyyāti vimuccati iti
