original: dasseti, taṃ suviññeyyaṃ.
analyzed: dasseti tam su viññeyyam

analyzed: ye hi keci iti ādinā tāsam paṭipadānam niyyāne tīsu pi kālesu ekantika bhāvam dasseti

analyzed: tattha imāhi eva catūhi paṭipadāhi iti imāhi eva catūhi paṭipadāhi tad vinimuttāya

original: Tattha abudhajanasevitāyāti apaṇḍitajanasevitāya. Bālakantāyāti bālajanakāmitāya.
analyzed: abudha jana sevitāya ati apaṇḍita jana sevitāya bāla kantāya ati bāla jana kāmitāya

analyzed: ugghaṭita ññu ādi puggala ttayam niddhāretum vuttam tattha yaḥ sādhāraṇāya ati dukkha apaṭipadāya

original: khippābhiññāya, sukhāpaṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya ca niyyātīti sambandho. Kathaṃ pana
analyzed: khippa abhiññāya sukha apaṭipadāya dandha abhiññāya ca niyyāti iti sambandho katham pana

original: paṭipadādvayaṃ ekassa sambhavatīti? Nayidamevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekassa puggalassa ekasmiṃ
analyzed: paṭipadā dvayam ekassa sambhavati iti na idam evam daṭṭhabbam ekassa puggalassa ekasmin

original: dve paṭipadā sambhavantīti. Yathāvuttāsu pana dvīsu paṭipadāsu yo yāya kāyaci niyyāti,
analyzed: dve paṭipadā sambhavanti iti yathā vuttāsu pana dvīsu paṭipadāsu yaḥ yāya kāyaci niyyāti

original: ayaṃ vipañcitaññūti ayamettha adhippāyo. Yasmā pana aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ paṭipadā calati
analyzed: ayam vipañcitaññu iti ayam ettha adhippāyaḥ yasmā pana aṭṭhasāliniyam paṭipadā calati

original: na calatīti vicāraṇāyaṃ “calatī”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā ekassapi puggalassa jhānantaramaggantaresu
analyzed: na calati iti vicāraṇā ayam calati iti vuttam tasmai ekassa api puggalassa jhāna antara magga antaresu

original: paṭipadābhedo icchitovāti.
analyzed: paṭipadā bhedaḥ icchitā uvāti

original: “Tattha bhagavā”tiādinā desanāvibhāgehipi tameva puggalavibhāgaṃ vibhāveti. Taṃ heṭṭhā
analyzed: tattha bhagavā ati ādinā desanā vibhāgehi pi tam eva puggala vibhāgam vibhāveti tam heṭṭhā

original: vuttanayameva. Tattha adhicittanti adhicittasikkhañcāti ca-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho.
analyzed: vutta nayam eva tattha adhicittam ti adhicitta sikkhan ca iti ca saddaḥ lutta niddiṭṭhaḥ

original: Tena adhicittasikkhañca adhipaññāsikkhañca vipañcitaññussa paññapetīti attho. Adhisīlanti
analyzed: tena adhicitta sikkhañca adhipaññā sikkhañca vipañcitaññussa paññapeti iti attho adhisīlam ti

original: etthāpi eseva nayo. Adhisīlasikkhaṃ adhicittasikkhaṃ adhipaññāsikkhañcāti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ettha api esā iva nayaḥ adhi sīla sikkham adhi citta sikkham adhi paññā sikkham ca ati yojetabbam

original: Cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavantīti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, cattāro puggalā hutvā tayo puggalā hontīti attho.
analyzed: cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavanti iti liṅga vipallāsena vuttam cattāro puggalāḥ hutvā tayo puggalāḥ honti iti attho

original: Ayaṃ saṃkilesoti ayaṃ akusalamūlādidvādasattikasaṅgaho saṃkilissati etenāti saṃkilesoti katvā. Idaṃ vodānanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
analyzed: ayam saṃkileso ti ayam akusala mūla ādi dvādasattika saṅgahaḥ saṃkilissati etena ati saṃkileso ti katvā idam ettha api esā iva nayo

original: Tīṇi hutvā dve bhavantīti nandiyāvaṭṭanayassa disābhūtadhammadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenevāha – “taṇhā ca avijjā cā”tiādi, taṃ sabbaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: tīṇi hutvā dve bhavanti iti nandiyāvaṭṭa nayassa disābhūta dhamma dassana attham vuttam tena iva āha taṇhā ca avijjā ca atiādi tat sabbam su viññeyyam eva

original: Kasmā panettha nayānaṃ uddesānukkamena niddeso na katoti? Nayānaṃ nayehi sambhavadassanatthaṃ.
analyzed: kasmā pana ittha nayānam uddesa anukkamena niddesaḥ na kataḥ iti nayānam nayehi sambhava dassana attham

original: Paṭhamanayato hi puggalādhiṭṭhānavasena tatiyanayassa, tatiyanayato ca dutiyanayassa
analyzed: paṭhama nayataḥ hi puggala adhiṭṭhāna vasena tatiya nayassa tatiya nayataḥ ca dutiya nayassa

original: sambhavoti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ paṭhamanayānantaraṃ tatiyanayo, tatiyanayānantarañca
analyzed: sambhavaḥ ti imassa visesassa dassana ttham paṭhama naya anantaram tatiya nayaḥ tatiya naya anantaram ca

original: dutiyanayo niddiṭṭho. Dhammādhiṭṭhānavasena pana tatiyanayato dutiyanayo, dutiyanayato
analyzed: dutiya nayaḥ niddiṭṭhaḥ dhamma adhiṭṭhāna vasena pana tatiya nayataḥ dutiya nayaḥ dutiya nayato

original: paṭhamanayopi sambhavatīti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ ante “taṇhā ca avijjā cā”tiādinā
analyzed: paṭhama nayaḥ api sambhavati iti imassa visesassa dassana ttham ante taṇhā ca avijjā ca ati ādinā

original: paṭhamanayassa bhūmi dassitā. Teneva hi “cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavanti, tīṇi hutvā
analyzed: paṭhama nayassa bhūmi dassitā tena iva hi cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavanti tīṇi hutvā

original: dve bhavantī”ti vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ “dve hutvā cattāri bhavanti, dve hutvā tīṇi bhavanti,
analyzed: dve bhavanti iti vuttam yadi evam dve hutvā cattāri bhavanti dve hutvā tīṇi bhavanti

original: tīṇi hutvā cattāri bhavantī”ti ayampi nayo vattabbo siyāti? Saccametaṃ, ayaṃ pana
analyzed: tīṇi hutvā cattāri bhavanti iti ayam pi nayaḥ vattabbaḥ siyāti saccam etam ayam pana

original: nayo atthato dassito evāti katvā na vutto. Yasmā tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anuppaveso
analyzed: nayaḥ atthataḥ dassitaḥ evā ti katvā na vuttaḥ yasmā tiṇṇam attha nayānam aññamaññam anuppaveso

original: icchito, sati ca anuppavese tato viniggamopi sambhavati evāti. Ayañca attho peṭakopadesena vibhāvetabbo.
analyzed: icchitaḥ sati ca anuppavese tatas viniggamaḥ api sambhavati evā ti ayaṃ ca atthaḥ peṭaka upadesena vibhāvetabbo

original: Tatthāyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya vibhāvanā – cattāro puggalā taṇhācarito duvidho mudindriyo
analyzed: tattha ayam āditas paṭṭhāya vibhāvanā cattāro puggalā taṇhā caritaḥ duvidhaḥ mud indriyo

original: tikkhindriyo ca. Tathā diṭṭhicaritoti. Tattha taṇhācarito mudindriyo dukkhāya paṭipadāya
analyzed: tikkhindriyaḥ ca tathā diṭṭhi carito ti tattha taṇhā caritaḥ mud indriyaḥ dukkhāya paṭipadāya

original: dandhābhiññāya niyyāti, tikkhindriyo dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti,
analyzed: dandha abhiññāya niyyāti tikkha indriyaḥ dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippa abhiññāya niyyāti

original: diṭṭhicarito pana mudindriyo sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyāti, tikkhindriyo
analyzed: diṭṭhi carito pana mud indriyo sukhāya paṭipadāya dandha abhiññāya niyyāti tikkha indriyo

original: sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti. Iti imāsu paṭipadāsu yathārahaṃ ṭhitehi
analyzed: sukhāya paṭipadāya khippa abhiññāya niyyāti iti imāsu paṭipadāsu yathāraham ṭhitehi

original: taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritehi cattāro āhārā tappaṭibandhachandarāgappahānena pahātabbā.
analyzed: taṇhā carita diṭṭhi caritehi cattāro āhārā tad paṭibandha chanda rāga ppahānena pahātabbā

original: Cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāvetvā cattāro vipallāsā daṭṭhabbāti sabbo yathāvuttanayo anugantabbo.
analyzed: cattāraḥ satipaṭṭhāne bhāvetvā cattāro vipallāsāḥ daṭṭhabbā ati sabbaḥ yathā vutta nayaḥ anugantabbo

original: Tatthāyaṃ pāḷi – tattha ye diṭṭhicaritā sattā, te kāmesu dosadiṭṭhī, na ca ye kāmesu
analyzed: tattha ayam tattha ye diṭṭhi caritā sattā te kāmesu dosa diṭṭhī na ca ye kāmesu

original: anusayā samūhatā, te attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti. Tesaṃ satthā vā dhammaṃ
analyzed: anusayā samūhatā te atta kilamatha anuyogam anuyuttāḥ viharanti tesam satthā vā dhammaṃ

original: deseti aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī “kāmehi natthi attho”ti, te ca pubbeyeva
analyzed: deseti aññataraḥ vā garuṭṭhāniyaḥ sabrahmacārī kāmehi na atthi attho ti te ca pubbe iya eva

original: kāmehi anatthikā, iti kāme appakasirena paṭinissajjanti, te cetasikena dukkhena anajjhositā.
analyzed: kāmehi anatthikāḥ iti kāme appakasirena paṭinissajjanti te cetasikena dukkhena an ajjhositā

original: Tena vuccati “sukhā paṭipadā”ti. Ye pana taṇhācaritā sattā, te kāmesu ajjhositā,
analyzed: tena vuccati sukhā paṭipadā ti ye pana taṇhā ācaritā sattā te kāmesu ajjhositā

original: tesaṃ satthā vā dhammaṃ deseti aññataro vā bhikkhu “kāmehi natthi attho”ti, te piyarūpaṃ
analyzed: tesam satthā vā dhammam deseti aññataraḥ vā bhikkhu kāmehi natthi attho ti te piya rūpam

original: dukkhena paṭinissajjanti. Tena vuccati “dukkhā paṭipadā”ti. Iti ime sabbe sattā dvīsu
analyzed: dukkhena paṭinissajjanti tena vuccati dukkhā paṭipadā ati iti ime sabbe sattā dvīsu

original: paṭipadāsu samosaraṇaṃ gacchanti dukkhāyañca sukhāyañca.
analyzed: paṭipadāsu samosaraṇam gacchanti dukkhāyan ca sukhāyan ca

original: Tattha ye diṭṭhicaritā sattā, te dvidhā tikkhindriyā ca mudindriyā ca. Tattha ye
analyzed: tattha ye diṭṭhi caritā sattā te dvidhā tikkha indriyā ca mud indriyā ca tattha ye

original: diṭṭhicaritā sattā tikkhindriyā, te sukhena paṭinissajjanti, khippañca abhisamenti.
analyzed: diṭṭhi caritā sattā tikkha indriyā te sukhena paṭinissajjanti khippañca abhisamenti

original: Tena vuccati – “sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā”ti. Tattha ye diṭṭhicaritā sattā mudindriyā
analyzed: tena vuccati sukhā paṭipadā khippā abhiññā ti tattha ye diṭṭhi caritā sattā mud indriyā

original: paṭhamaṃ tikkhindriyaṃ upādāya dandhataraṃ abhisamenti, te sukhena paṭinissajjanti,
analyzed: paṭhamam tikkha indriyam upādāya dandhataram abhisamenti te sukhena paṭinissajjanti

original: dandhañca abhisamenti. Tena vuccati – “sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā”ti. Tattha taṇhācaritā
analyzed: dandhañca abhisamenti tena vuccati sukhā paṭipadā dandhā abhiññā ati tattha taṇhā ācaritā

original: sattā duvidhā tikkhindriyā ca mudindriyā ca. Tattha ye taṇhācaritā sattā tikkhindriyā,
analyzed: sattā duvidhā tikkha indriyā ca mudindriyā ca tattha ye taṇhā ācaritā sattā tikkha indriyā

original: te dukkhena paṭinissajjanti, khippañca abhisamenti. Tena vuccati – “dukkhā paṭipadā
analyzed: te dukkhena paṭinissajjanti khippañca abhisamenti tena vuccati dukkhā paṭipadā

original: khippābhiññā”ti. Tattha ye taṇhācaritā sattā mudindriyā paṭhamaṃ tikkhindriyaṃ upādāya
analyzed: khippā abhiññā ti tattha ye taṇhā caritā sattā mud indriyā paṭhamam tikkha indriyam upādāya

original: dandhataraṃ abhisamenti, te dukkhena paṭinissajjanti, dandhañca abhisamenti. Tena
analyzed: dandhataram abhisamenti te dukkhena paṭinissajjanti dandham ca abhisamenti tena

original: vuccati – “dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā”ti. Imā catasso paṭipadāyo apañcamā achaṭṭhā.
analyzed: vuccati dukkhā paṭipadā dandhā abhiññā ti imāḥ catasso paṭipadāyaḥ apañcamāḥ achaṭṭhā

original: Ye hi keci nibbutā nibbāyanti nibbāyissanti vā imāhi catūhi paṭipadāhi anaññāhi,
analyzed: ye hi keci nibbutāḥ nibbāyanti nibbāyissanti vā imāhi catūhi paṭipadāhi anaññāhi

original: ayaṃ paṭipadā catukkamaggena kilese niddisati. Yā catukkamaggena ariyadhammesu niddisitabbā,
analyzed: ayam paṭipadā catukka maggena kilese niddisati yā catukka maggena ariya dhammesu niddisitabbā

original: ayaṃ vuccati sīhavikkīḷito nāma nayo.
analyzed: ayam vuccati sīhavikkīḷitaḥ nāma nayaḥ

original: Tatrime cattāro āhārā, cattāro vipallāsā upādānā yogā ganthā āsavā oghā sallā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo agatigamanānīti evaṃ imāni sabbāni dasa padāni. Ayaṃ suttassa saṃsandanā.
analyzed: tatra ime cattāro āhārā cattāro vipallāsāḥ upādānā yogā ganthāḥ āsavāḥ oghāḥ sallāḥ viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyaḥ agati gamanāni iti evam imāni sabbāni dasa padāni ayam suttassa saṃsandanā

original: Cattāro āhārā, tattha yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro, yo ca phasso āhāro, ime taṇhācaritena pahātabbā. Tattha yo ca manosañcetanāhāro, yo ca viññāṇāhāro, ime diṭṭhicaritena pahātabbā.
analyzed: cattāro āhārā tattha yo ca kabaḷīkāraḥ āhāro yaḥ ca phassaḥ āhāro ime taṇhā caritena pahātabbā tattha yaḥ ca manaḥ sañcetanā āhāro yaḥ ca viññāṇa āhāro ime diṭṭhi caritena pahātabbā

original: Tattha paṭhamo āhāro paṭhamo vipallāso, dutiyo āhāro dutiyo vipallāso, tatiyo āhāro
analyzed: tattha paṭhamo āhāro paṭhamaḥ vipallāso dutiyaḥ āhāro dutiyaḥ vipallāso tatiyaḥ āhāro

original: tatiyo vipallāso, catuttho āhāro catuttho vipallāso, ime cattāro vipallāsā apañcamā
analyzed: tatiyo vipallāso catuttho āhāro catuttho vipallāso ime cattāro vipallāsāḥ apañcamā

original: achaṭṭhā. Idañca pamāṇā cattāro āhārā.
analyzed: achaṭṭhāḥ idam ca pamāṇā cattāro āhārā

original: Tattha paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito kāme upādiyati, idaṃ kāmupādānaṃ. Dutiye vipallāse
analyzed: tattha paṭhame vipallāse ṭhitaḥ kāme upādiyati idam kāma upādānam dutiye vipallāse

original: ṭhito anāgataṃ bhavaṃ upādiyati, idaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Tatiye vipallāse ṭhito viparītadiṭṭhiṃ
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ anāgatam bhavam upādiyati idam sīla bbata upādānam tatiye vipallāse ṭhitaḥ viparīta diṭṭhim

original: upādiyati, idaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Catutthe vipallāse ṭhito khandhe attato upādiyati,
analyzed: upādiyati idam diṭṭhupādānam catutthe vipallāse ṭhito khandhe attataḥ upādiyati

original: idaṃ attavādupādānaṃ.
analyzed: idam attavāt upādānam

original: Tattha kāmupādāne ṭhito kāme abhijjhāya ganthati, ayaṃ abhijjhākāyagantho. Sīlabbatupādāne
analyzed: tattha kāma upādāne ṭhitaḥ kāme abhijjhāya ganthati ayam abhijjhā kāya ganthaḥ sīla bbata upādāne

original: ṭhito byāpādaṃ ganthati, ayaṃ byāpādakāyagantho. Diṭṭhupādāne ṭhito parāmāsaṃ ganthati,
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ byāpādam ganthati ayam byāpāda kāya ganthaḥ diṭṭhupādāne ṭhitaḥ parāmāsam ganthati

original: ayaṃ parāmāsakāyagantho. Attavādupādāne ṭhito papañcento ganthati, ayaṃ idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyagantho.
analyzed: ayam parāmāsa kāya ganthaḥ atta vāda upādāne ṭhitaḥ papañcentaḥ ganthati ayam idaṃsacca abhinivesa kāya ganthaḥ

original: Tassa ganthaganthitā kilesā āsavanti. Kiṃ pana vuccati āsavantīti? Vippaṭisārā. Ye
analyzed: tassa gantha ganthitā kilesāḥ āsavanti kim pana vuccati āsavanti iti vippaṭisārāḥ ye

original: vippaṭisārā, te anusayā. Tattha abhijjhākāyaganthena kāmāsavo, byāpādakāyaganthena
analyzed: vippaṭisārā te anusayā tattha abhijjhā kāya ganthena kāma āsavaḥ byāpāda kāya ganthena

original: bhavāsavo, parāmāsakāyaganthena diṭṭhāsavo, idaṃsaccābhinivesakāyaganthena avijjāsavo.
analyzed: bhava āsavo parāmāsa kāya ganthena diṭṭha āsavaḥ idaṃsacca abhinivesa kāya ganthena avijja āsavo

original: Te cattāro āsavā vepullaṃ gatā oghā honti, tena vuccanti “oghā”ti. Tattha kāmāsavo kāmogho, bhavāsavo bhavogho, avijjāsavo avijjogho, diṭṭhāsavo diṭṭhogho.
analyzed: te cattāro āsavāḥ vepullam gatāḥ oghāḥ honti tena vuccanti oghā ti tattha kāma āsavaḥ kāma oghaḥ bhava āsavaḥ bhava oghaḥ avijja āsavaḥ avijja oghaḥ diṭṭha āsavaḥ diṭṭha oghaḥ

original: Te cattāro oghā āsayamanupaviṭṭhā anusayasahagatā vuccanti sallāti hadayamāhacca
analyzed: te cattāro oghāḥ āsayam anupaviṭṭhāḥ anusaya sahagatāḥ vuccanti hadayam āhat ca

original: tiṭṭhanti. Tattha kāmogho rāgasallaṃ, bhavogho dosasallaṃ, avijjogho mohasallaṃ,
analyzed: tiṭṭhanti tattha kāma oghaḥ rāga sallam bhava oghaḥ dosa sallam avijja oghaḥ moha sallam

original: diṭṭhogho diṭṭhisallaṃ.
analyzed: diṭṭha oghaḥ diṭṭhi sallam

original: Imehi catūhi sallehi pariyādinnaṃ viññāṇaṃ catūsu dhammesu tiṭṭhati rūpe vedanāya
analyzed: imehi catūhi sallehi pariyādinnam viññāṇam catūsu dhammesu tiṭṭhati rūpe vedanāya

original: saññāya saṅkhāresu. Imā catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo. Tattha rāgasallena nandūpasecanaṃ
analyzed: saññāya saṅkhāresu imā catasso viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyo tattha rāga sallena nandu upasecanam

original: rūpūpagaṃ viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhati. Dosasallena vedanūpagaṃ. Mohasallena saññūpagaṃ. Diṭṭhisallena
analyzed: rūpa upagam viññāṇam tiṭṭhati dosa sallena vedanā upagam moha sallena saññu upagam diṭṭhi sallena

original: nandūpasecanaṃ saṅkhārūpagaṃ viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: nandu upasecanam saṅkhāra upagam viññāṇam tiṭṭhati

original: Catūhi viññāṇaṭṭhitīhi catubbidhaṃ agatiṃ gacchanti chandā dosā bhayā mohā. Rāgena
analyzed: catūhi viññāṇa ṭṭhitīhi catubbidham agatim gacchanti chandāḥ dosāḥ bhayāḥ mohāḥ rāgena

original: chandā agatiṃ gacchati, dosena dosā agatiṃ gacchati, mohena mohā agatiṃ gacchati,
analyzed: chandāḥ agatim gacchati dosena dosāḥ agatim gacchati mohena mohāḥ agatim gacchati

original: diṭṭhiyā bhayā agatiṃ gacchati, iti imāni ca kammāni ime ca kilesā ayaṃ saṃsārahetu.
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā bhayā agatim gacchati iti imāni ca kammāni ime ca kilesāḥ ayam saṃsāra hetu

original: Tatthimā catasso disā kabaḷīkāro āhāro “asubhe subha”nti vipallāso kāmupādānaṃ kāmayogo
analyzed: catasso disā kabaḷīkāraḥ āhāraḥ asubhe vipallāso kāma upādānam kāma yogo

original: abhijjhākāyagantho kāmāsavo kāmogho rāgasallaṃ rūpūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti chandā agatigamanaṃ, ayaṃ paṭhamā disā.
analyzed: abhijjhā kāya gantho kāma āsavaḥ kāmoghaḥ rāga sallam rūpūpagā viññāṇa ṭṭhiti chandā agati gamanam ayam paṭhamā disā

original: Phasso āhāro “dukkhe sukha”nti vipallāso sīlabbatupādānaṃ bhavayogo byāpādakāyagantho bhavāsavo bhavogho dosasallaṃ vedanūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti dosā agatigamanaṃ, ayaṃ dutiyā disā.
analyzed: phassaḥ āhāraḥ dukkhe sukhanti vipallāsaḥ sīla bbata upādānam bhava yogaḥ byāpāda kāya ganthaḥ bhava āsavaḥ bhava oghaḥ dosa sallam vedanā upagā viññāṇa ṭṭhiti dosāḥ agati gamanam ayam dutiyā disā

original: Manosañcetanāhāro “anattani attā”ti vipallāso diṭṭhupādānaṃ diṭṭhiyogo parāmāsakāyagantho
analyzed: manaḥ sañcetanā āhāraḥ an attani attā ati vipallāsaḥ diṭṭhupādānam diṭṭhi yogo parāmāsa kāyagantho

original: diṭṭhāsavo diṭṭhogho diṭṭhisallaṃ saññūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti bhayā agatigamanaṃ, ayaṃ tatiyā disā.
analyzed: diṭṭha āsavaḥ diṭṭha oghaḥ diṭṭhi sallam saññu upagā viññāṇa ṭṭhiti bhayā agati gamanam ayam tatiyā disā

original: Viññāṇāhāro “anicce nicca”nti vipallāso attavādupādānaṃ avijjāyogo idaṃsaccābhinivesokāyagantho
analyzed: viññāṇa āhāraḥ anicce vipallāsaḥ atta vāda upādānam avijjā yogaḥ idaṃsacca abhiniveso kāya gantho

original: avijjāsavo avijjogho mohasallaṃ saṅkhārūpagā viññāṇaṭṭhiti mohā agatigamanaṃ, ayaṃ
analyzed: avijja āsavaḥ avijjoghaḥ moha sallam saṅkhāra upagā viññāṇa ṭṭhiti mohāḥ agati gamanam ayam

original: catutthī disā. Iti imesaṃ dasannaṃ suttānaṃ paṭhamena padena paṭhamāya disāya ālokanaṃ,
analyzed: catutthī disā iti imesam dasannam suttānam paṭhamena padena paṭhamāya disāya ālokanam

original: dutiyena padena dutiyāya disāya, tatiyena padena tatiyāya disāya, catutthena padena
analyzed: dutiyena padena dutiyāya disāya tatiyena padena tatiyāya disāya catutthena padena

original: catutthiyā disāya ālokanaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati disā ālokanā. Iminā nayena sabbe kilesā
analyzed: catutthiyā disāya ālokanaṃ ayam vuccati disā ālokanā iminā nayena sabbe kilesā

original: catūsu padesu pakkhipitabbā. Ayaṃ akusalapakkho.
analyzed: catūsu padesu pakkhipitabbā ayam akusala pakkho

original: Catasso paṭipadā, cattāri jhānāni, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro vihārā dibbo brahmā
analyzed: catasso paṭipadā cattāri jhānāni cattāro sati paṭṭhānā cattāro vihārā dibbaḥ brahmā

original: ariyo āneñjo, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, cattāro adhiṭṭhānā,
analyzed: ariyaḥ āneñjaḥ cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro acchariyāḥ abbhutāḥ dhammāḥ cattāro adhiṭṭhānā

original: cattāro samādhayo chandasamādhi vīriyasamādhi cittasamādhi vīmaṃsāsamādhi, cattāro
analyzed: cattāro samādhayaḥ chanda samādhi vīriya samādhi citta samādhi vīmaṃsā samādhi cattāro

original: dhammā sukhabhāgiyā nāññatra bojjhaṅgā nāññatra tapasā nāññatra indriyasaṃvarā nāññatra
analyzed: dhammā sukha bhāgiyāḥ na aññatra bojjhaṅgāḥ na aññatra tapasā na aññatra indriya saṃvarāḥ na aññatra

original: sabbanissaggā, cattāri appamāṇāni.
analyzed: sabba nissaggā cattāri appamāṇāni

original: Tattha dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā bhāviyamānā bahulīkariyamānā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ
analyzed: tattha dukkhā paṭipadā dandha abhiññā bhāviyamānā bahulīkariyamānā paṭhamam jhānam

original: paripūreti, paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ paripūreti, paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: paripūreti paṭhamam jhānam paripuṇṇam paṭhamam satipaṭṭhānam paripūreti paṭhamam

original: satipaṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ vihāraṃ paripūreti, paṭhamo vihāro paripuṇṇo paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: satipaṭṭhānam paripuṇṇam paṭhamam vihāram paripūreti paṭhamaḥ vihāro paripuṇṇaḥ paṭhamam

analyzed: sammappadhānam paripūreti paṭhamam sammappadhānam paripuṇṇam paṭhamam acchariyam

original: abbhutaṃ dhammaṃ paripūreti, paṭhamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paripuṇṇo paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: abbhutam dhammam paripūreti paṭhamaḥ acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammo paripuṇṇo paṭhamam

original: adhiṭṭhānaṃ paripūreti, paṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ chandasamādhiṃ paripūreti,
analyzed: adhiṭṭhānam paripūreti paṭhamam adhiṭṭhānam paripuṇṇam chanda samādhim paripūreti

original: chandasamādhi paripuṇṇo indriyasaṃvaraṃ paripūreti, indriyasaṃvaro paripuṇṇo paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: paripuṇṇaḥ indriya saṃvaram paripūrayati indriya saṃvaraḥ paripuṇṇaḥ paṭhamam

original: appamāṇaṃ paripūreti. Evaṃ yāva sabbanissaggā catutthaṃ appamāṇaṃ paripūreti.
analyzed: appamāṇam paripūreti evam yāva sabba nissaggā catuttham appamāṇam paripūreti

original: Tattha paṭhamā ca paṭipadā paṭhamañca jhānaṃ paṭhamañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ dibbo ca vihāro
analyzed: tattha paṭhamā ca paṭipadā paṭhamam ca jhānam paṭhamam ca sati paṭṭhānam dibbaḥ ca vihāro

original: paṭhamañca sammappadhānaṃ paṭhamo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saccādhiṭṭhānañca chandasamādhi
analyzed: paṭhamañca sammappadhānam paṭhamaḥ ca acchariyaḥ abbhuto dhammo sacca adhiṭṭhānam ca chanda samādhi

original: ca indriyasaṃvaro ca mettā ca appamāṇaṃ. Ayaṃ paṭhamā disā.
analyzed: ca indriya saṃvaro ca mettā ca ayam paṭhamā disā

original: Dutiyā ca paṭipadā khippābhiññā dutiyañca jhānaṃ dutiyañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ brahmā ca
analyzed: dutiyā ca paṭipadā khippābhiññā dutiyam ca jhānam dutiyam ca satipaṭṭhānam brahmā ca

original: vihāro dutiyañca sammappadhānaṃ dutiyo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo cāgādhiṭṭhānañca
analyzed: vihāro dutiyañca sammappadhānam dutiyo ca acchariyaḥ abbhuto dhammo cāga adhiṭṭhānañca

original: cittasamādhi ca tapo ca karuṇā ca appamāṇaṃ. Ayaṃ dutiyā disā.
analyzed: citta samādhi ca tapo ca karuṇā ca appamāṇam ayam dutiyā disā

original: Tatiyā ca paṭipadā dandhābhiññā tatiyañca jhānaṃ tatiyañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ ariyo ca
analyzed: tatiyā ca paṭipadā dandhābhiññā tatiyañca jhānam tatiyañca satipaṭṭhānam ariyaḥ ca

original: vihāro tatiyañca sammappadhānaṃ tatiyo ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo saccādhiṭṭhānañca
analyzed: vihāro tatiyañca sammappadhānam tatiyo ca acchariyaḥ abbhuto dhammo sacca adhiṭṭhānañca

original: vīriyasamādhi ca bojjhaṅgā ca muditā ca appamāṇaṃ. Ayaṃ tatiyā disā.
analyzed: vīriya samādhi ca bojjhaṅgā ca muditā ca appamāṇam ayam tatiyā disā

original: Catutthī ca paṭipadā khippābhiññā catutthañca jhānaṃ catutthañca satipaṭṭhānaṃ āneñjo
analyzed: catutthī ca paṭipadā khippābhiññā catutthañca jhānam catutthañca satipaṭṭhānam āneñjaḥ

original: ca vihāro catutthañca sammappadhānaṃ catuttho ca acchariyo abbhuto dhammo upasamādhiṭṭhānañca
analyzed: ca vihāro catutthañca sammappadhānam catutthaḥ ca acchariyaḥ abbhutaḥ dhammo upasama adhiṭṭhānañca

original: vīmaṃsāsamādhi ca sabbanissaggo ca upekkhā ca appamāṇaṃ. Ayaṃ catutthī disā. Imāsaṃ
analyzed: vīmaṃsā samādhi ca sabba nissaggo ca upekkhā ca appamāṇam ayam catutthī disā imāsam

original: catunnaṃ disānaṃ yā ālokanā, ayaṃ vuccati disālocano nāma nayo.
analyzed: catunnam disānam yā ālokanā ayam vuccati disālocanaḥ nāma nayo

original: Tatthāyaṃ yojanā – cattāro ca āhārā, catasso ca paṭipadā, cattāro ca vipallāsā, cattāro
analyzed: tattha ayam yojanā cattāro ca āhārā catasso ca paṭipadā cattāro ca vipallāsā cattāro

original: ca satipaṭṭhānā, cattāri ca upādānāni, cattāri ca jhānāni, cattāro ca yogā, cattāro
analyzed: ca sati paṭṭhānā cattāri ca upādānāni cattāri ca jhānāni cattāraḥ ca yogā cattāro

original: ca vihārā, cattāro ca ganthā, cattāro ca sammappadhānā, cattāro ca āsavā, cattāro
analyzed: ca vihārā cattāraḥ ca ganthā cattāraḥ ca sammappadhānā cattāraḥ ca āsavā cattāro

original: ca acchariyā abbhutā dhammā, cattāro ca oghā, cattāri ca adhiṭṭhānāni, cattāri ca
analyzed: ca acchariyāḥ abbhutāḥ dhammā cattāro ca oghā cattāri ca adhiṭṭhānāni cattāri ca

original: sallāni, cattāro ca samādhayo, catasso ca viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, cattāro ca sukhabhāgiyā
analyzed: sallāni cattāro ca samādhayo catasso ca viññāṇa ṭṭhitiyo cattāro ca sukhabhāgiyā

original: dhammā, cattāri ca agatigamanāni cattāri ca appamāṇāni. Iti kusalākusalānaṃ pakkhapaṭipakkhavasena
analyzed: dhammā cattāri ca agati gamanāni cattāri ca appamāṇāni iti kusala akusalānam pakkha paṭipakkha vasena

original: yojanā. Ayaṃ sīhavikkīḷite disālocano nayo.
analyzed: yojanā ayam sīha vikkīḍite disa ālocanaḥ nayaḥ

original: Tassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni pariyosānaṃ, tattha paṭhamāya disāya sotāpattiphalaṃ
analyzed: tassa cattāri sāmañña phalāni pariyosānam tattha paṭhamāya disāya sotāpatti phalam

original: pariyosānaṃ, dutiyāya sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, tatiyāya anāgāmiphalaṃ, catutthiyā arahattaphalaṃ pariyosānanti.
analyzed: pariyosānam dutiyāya sakadāgāmi phalam tatiyāya anāgāmi phalam catutthiyā arahatta phalam pariyosānam ti

original: Tattha katamo tipukkhalanayo? Paṭipadāvibhāgena catūsu puggalesu yo sukhāya paṭipadāya
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ tipukkhala nayaḥ paṭipadā vibhāgena catūsu puggalesu yaḥ sukhāya paṭipadāya

original: khippābhiññāya niyyāti, ayaṃ ugghaṭitaññū. Yo sukhāya vā paṭipadāya, dandhābhiññāya,
analyzed: khippa abhiññāya niyyāti ayam ugghaṭita ññū yaḥ sukhāya vā paṭipadāya dandha abhiññāya

original: dukkhāya vā paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti, ayaṃ vipañcitaññū. Yo dukkhāya paṭipadāya
analyzed: dukkhāya vā paṭipadāya khippa abhiññāya niyyāti ayam vipañcita ññū yaḥ dukkhāya paṭipadāya

original: dandhābhiññāya niyyāti, ayaṃ neyyo. Iti cattāro hutvā tayo honti. Tattha ugghaṭitaññussa
analyzed: dandhā abhiññāya niyyāti ayam neyyaḥ iti cattāraḥ hutvā tayaḥ honti tattha ugghaṭita ññussa

original: samathapubbaṅgamā vipassanā sappāyā. Neyyassa vipassanāpubbaṅgamo samatho, vipañcitaññussa
analyzed: samatha pubbaṅgamā vipassanā sappāyā neyyassa vipassanā pubbaṅgamaḥ samathaḥ

original: samathavipassanā yuganaddhā. Ugghaṭitaññussa mudukā desanā, neyyassa tikkhā desanā,
analyzed: samatha vipassanā yuga naddhā ugghaṭita ññussa mudukā desanā neyyassa tikkhā desanā

original: vipañcitaññussa tikkhamudukā desanā.
analyzed: tikkha mudukā desanā

original: Ugghaṭitaññussa adhipaññāsikkhā, vipañcitaññussa adhicittasikkhā ca adhipaññāsikkhā
analyzed: ugghaṭitaññussa adhi paññā sikkhā vipañcitaññussa adhicittasikkhā ca adhi paññā sikkhā

original: ca, neyyassa adhisīlasikkhā ca adhicittasikkhā ca adhipaññāsikkhā ca. Iti imesaṃ
analyzed: ca neyyassa adhi sīla sikkhā ca adhi citta sikkhā ca adhi paññā sikkhā ca iti imesam

original: puggalānaṃ catūhi paṭipadāhi niyyānaṃ.
analyzed: puggalānam catūhi paṭipadāhi niyyānam

original: Tatthāyaṃ saṃkilesapakkho, tīṇi akusalamūlāni, tayo phassā, tisso vedanā, tayo upavicārā, tayo kilesā, tayo vitakkā, tayo pariḷāhā, tīṇi saṅkhatalakkhaṇāni, tisso dukkhatā.
analyzed: tattha ayam saṃkilesa pakkho tīṇi akusala mūlāni tayo phassā tissaḥ vedanā tayo upavicārā tayo kilesā tayo vitakkā tayo pariḷāhā tīṇi saṅkhata lakkhaṇāni tissaḥ dukkha tā

original: Tīṇi akusalamūlānīti lobho akusalamūlaṃ, doso akusalamūlaṃ, moho akusalamūlaṃ. Tayo
analyzed: tīṇi akusala mūlāni iti lobhaḥ akusala mūlam dosaḥ akusala mūlam mohaḥ akusala mūlam

original: phassāti sukhavedanīyo phasso, dukkhavedanīyo phasso, adukkhamasukhavedanīyo phasso.
analyzed: phassā ti sukha vedanīyaḥ phassaḥ dukkha vedanīyaḥ phassaḥ adukkhamasukha vedanīyaḥ phasso

original: Tisso vedanāti sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā. Tayo upavicārāti
analyzed: tissaḥ vedanā ati sukhāḥ vedanā dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ adukkhamasukhāḥ vedanā tayo upavicārā ati

original: somanassūpavicāro, domanassūpavicāro, upekkhūpavicāro. Tayo kilesāti lobho, doso,
analyzed: somanassūpavicāro domanassūpavicāro upekkhūpavicāro tayo kilesā ati lobho doso

original: moho. Tayo vitakkāti kāmavitakko, byāpādavitakko, vihiṃsāvitakko. Tayo pariḷāhāti
analyzed: mohaḥ tayo vitakkā ati kāma vitakkaḥ byāpāda vitakkaḥ vihiṃsā vitakko tayo

original: rāgajo, dosajo, mohajo. Tīṇi saṅkhatalakkhaṇānīti uppādo, ṭhiti, vayo. Tisso dukkhatāti
analyzed: rāga jaḥ dosa jaḥ moha jo tīṇi saṅkhata lakkhaṇāni iti uppādaḥ ṭhiti vayaḥ tisso dukkha tā ti

original: dukkhadukkhatā, vipariṇāmadukkhatā, saṅkhāradukkhatā.
analyzed: dukkha dukkha tā vipariṇāma dukkha tā saṅkhāra dukkha tā

original: Tattha lobho akusalamūlaṃ manāpikena ārammaṇena samuṭṭhahati. Tadeva manāpikārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: tattha lobhaḥ akusala mūlam manāpikena ārammaṇena samuṭṭhahati tat eva manāpika ārammaṇam

original: paṭicca uppajjati sukhavedanīyo phasso, sukhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati
analyzed: paṭicca uppajjati sukha vedanīyaḥ phassaḥ sukha vedanīyam phassam paṭicca uppajjati

original: sukhā vedanā, sukhaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca uppajjati somanassūpavicāro, somanassūpavicāraṃ
analyzed: sukhā vedanā sukham vedanam paṭicca uppajjati somanassa upavicāraḥ somanassa upavicāram

original: paṭicca uppajjati rāgo, rāgaṃ paṭicca uppajjati kāmavitakko, kāmavitakkaṃ paṭicca
analyzed: paṭicca uppajjati rāgaḥ rāgam paṭicca uppajjati kāma vitakko kāma vitakkam paṭicca

original: uppajjati rāgajo pariḷāho, rāgajaṃ pariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati uppādo saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: uppajjati rāga jaḥ pariḷāhaḥ rāga jam pariḷāham paṭicca uppajjati uppādaḥ saṅkhata lakkhaṇam

original: uppādaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati vipariṇāmadukkhatā.
analyzed: uppādam saṅkhata lakkhaṇam paṭicca uppajjati vipariṇāma dukkha tā

original: Doso akusalamūlaṃ amanāpikena ārammaṇena samuṭṭhahati. Tadeva amanāpikārammaṇaṃ paṭicca
analyzed: dosaḥ akusala mūlam amanāpikena ārammaṇena samuṭṭhahati tat eva amanāpika ārammaṇam paṭicca

original: uppajjati dukkhavedanīyo phasso, dukkhavedanīyaṃ phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhā
analyzed: uppajjati dukkha vedanīyaḥ phassaḥ dukkha vedanīyam phassam paṭicca uppajjati dukkhā

original: vedanā, dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca uppajjati domanassūpavicāro, domanassūpavicāraṃ paṭicca
analyzed: vedanā dukkham vedanam paṭicca uppajjati domanassūpavicāraḥ domanassūpavicāram paṭicca

original: uppajjati doso, dosaṃ paṭicca uppajjati byāpādavitakko, byāpādavitakkaṃ paṭicca uppajjati
analyzed: uppajjati dosaḥ dosam paṭicca uppajjati byāpāda vitakkaḥ byāpāda vitakkam paṭicca uppajjati

original: dosajo pariḷāho, dosajaṃ pariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: dosa jaḥ pariḷāhaḥ dosa jam pariḷāham paṭicca uppajjati ṭhitassa aññathattam saṅkhata lakkhaṇam

original: ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati dukkhadukkhatā.
analyzed: ṭhitassa aññathattam saṅkhata lakkhaṇam paṭicca uppajjati dukkha dukkha tā

original: Moho akusalamūlaṃ upekkhāṭhāniyaṃ ārammaṇena samuṭṭhahati. Tadeva upekkhāṭhāniyaṃ
analyzed: mohaḥ akusala mūlam upekkhā ṭhāniyam ārammaṇena samuṭṭhahati tat eva upekkhā ṭhāniyam

original: ārammaṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati adukkhamasukhavedanīyo phasso, adukkhamasukhavedanīyaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇam paṭicca uppajjati adukkham asukha vedanīyaḥ phassaḥ adukkham asukha vedanīyam

original: phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca
analyzed: phassam paṭicca uppajjati adukkham asukhā vedanā adukkham asukham vedanam paṭicca

original: uppajjati upekkhūpavicāro, upekkhūpavicāraṃ paṭicca uppajjati moho, mohaṃ paṭicca
analyzed: uppajjati upekkhū upavicāraḥ upekkhū upavicāram paṭicca uppajjati mohaḥ moham paṭicca

original: uppajjati vihiṃsāvitakko, vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ paṭicca uppajjati mohajo pariḷāho, mohajaṃ
analyzed: uppajjati vihiṃsā vitakkaḥ vihiṃsā vitakkam paṭicca uppajjati moha jaḥ pariḷāhaḥ moha jam

original: pariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati vayo saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ, vayaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ paṭicca
analyzed: pariḷāham paṭicca uppajjati vayaḥ saṅkhata lakkhaṇam vayam saṅkhata lakkhaṇam paṭicca

original: uppajjati saṅkhāradukkhatā. Iti ayaṃ tīhi ākārehi kilesānaṃ niddeso. Yo koci akusalapakkho,
analyzed: uppajjati saṅkhāra dukkha tā iti ayam tīhi ākārehi kilesānam niddesaḥ yaḥ koci akusala pakkho

original: sabbo so tīsu akusalamūlesu samosaratīti.
analyzed: sabbo so tīsu akusala mūlesu samosarati iti

original: Tattha katamo kusalapakkho? Tīṇi kusalamūlāni alobho, adoso, amoho. Tisso paññā sutamayī,
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ kusala pakkhaḥ tīṇi kusala mūlāni alobhaḥ adosaḥ amohaḥ tissā paññā suta mayī

original: cintāmayī, bhāvanāmayī. Tayo samādhī savitakkasavicāro, avitakkavicāramatto, avitakkaavicāro.
analyzed: cintā mayī bhāvanā mayī tayo samādhī sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ a vitakka vicāra mattaḥ a vitakka a vicāraḥ

original: Tisso sikkhā adhisīlasikkhā, adhicittasikkhā, adhipaññāsikkhā. Tīṇi nimittāni samathanimittaṃ,
analyzed: tissaḥ sikkhāḥ adhi sīla sikkhā adhi citta sikkhā adhi paññā sikkhā tīṇi nimittāni samatha nimittam

original: paggahanimittaṃ, upekkhānimittaṃ. Tayo vitakkā nekkhammavitakko, abyāpādavitakko,
analyzed: paggaha nimittam upekkhā nimittam tayaḥ vitakkāḥ nekkhamma vitakko a byāpāda vitakkaḥ

original: avihiṃsāvitakko. Tīṇi indriyāni anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ, aññindriyaṃ, aññātāvindriyaṃ.
analyzed: avihiṃsā vitakko tīṇi indriyāni anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam aññindriyam aññātāvindriyam

original: Tayo upavicārā nekkhammūpavicāro, abyāpādūpavicāro, avihiṃsūpavicāro tisso esanā
analyzed: tayo upavicārā nekkhammūpavicāro a byāpādūpavicāro a vihiṃsu upavicāro tisso esanā

original: kāmesanā, bhavesanā, brahmacariyesanā. Tayo khandhā sīlakkhandho, samādhikkhandho, paññākkhandho.
analyzed: kāma īsanā bhava īsanā brahmacariya īsanā tayo khandhā sīla kkhandho samādhi kkhandho paññā kkhandho

original: Tattha alobho kusalamūlaṃ sutamayipaññaṃ paripūreti. Sutamayi paññā paripuṇṇā savitakkasavicāraṃ
analyzed: tattha alobho kusala mūlam suta mayi paññam paripūreti suta mayi paññā paripuṇṇā sa vitakka sa vicāram

original: samādhiṃ paripūreti, savitakkasavicāro samādhi paripuṇṇo adhisīlasikkhaṃ paripūreti,
analyzed: samādhim paripūreti sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ samādhi paripuṇṇaḥ adhi sīla sikkham paripūreti

original: adhisīlasikkhā paripuṇṇā samathanimittaṃ paripūreti, samathanimittaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ nekkhammavitakkaṃ
analyzed: adhi sīla sikkhā paripuṇṇā samatha nimittam paripūreti samatha nimittam paripuṇṇam nekkhamma vitakkam

original: paripūreti, nekkhammavitakko paripuṇṇo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ paripūreti, anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ
analyzed: paripūreti nekkhamma vitakko paripuṇṇaḥ anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam paripūreti anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam

original: paripuṇṇaṃ nekkhammasitūpavicāraṃ paripūreti, nekkhammūpavicāraṃ paripuṇṇo kāmesanaṃ
analyzed: paripuṇṇam nekkhamma situ upavicāram paripūreti nekkhamma upavicāram paripuṇṇaḥ kāma esanam

original: pajahati. Kāmesanappahānaṃ sīlakkhandhaṃ paripūreti.
analyzed: pajahati kāma īsana pahānam sīla kkhandham paripūreti

original: Adoso kusalamūlaṃ cintāmayipaññaṃ paripūreti, cintāmayipaññā paripuṇṇā avitakkavicāramattaṃ
analyzed: adoso kusala mūlam cintāmayi paññam paripūreti cintāmayi paññā paripuṇṇā a vitakka vicāra mattam

analyzed: adhicitta sikkhā paripuṇṇā upekkhā nimittam paripūreti upekkhā nimittam paripuṇṇam

analyzed: a byāpāda vitakkam paripūreti a byāpāda vitakkaḥ paripuṇṇaḥ aññindriyam paripūreti aññindriyam

original: paripuṇṇaṃ abyāpādūpavicāraṃ paripūreti, abyāpādūpavicāro paripuṇṇo bhavesanaṃ pajahati,
analyzed: paripuṇṇam a byāpād ūpa vicāram a byāpād ūpa vicāraḥ paripuṇṇaḥ bhavesanam pajahati

original: bhavesanappahānaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ paripūreti.
analyzed: bhavesana pahānam samādhi khandham paripūreti

original: Amoho kusalamūlaṃ bhāvanāmayipaññaṃ paripūreti, bhāvanāmayipaññā paripuṇṇā avitakkaavicāraṃ
analyzed: amohaḥ kusala mūlam bhāvanā mayi paññam paripūreti bhāvanā mayi paññā paripuṇṇā a vitakka avicāram

original: samādhiṃ paripūreti, avitakkaavicāro samādhi paripuṇṇo adhipaññāsikkhaṃ paripūreti,
analyzed: samādhim paripūreti a vitakka a vicāraḥ samādhi paripuṇṇaḥ adhi paññā sikkham paripūreti

original: adhipaññāsikkhā paripuṇṇā paggahanimittaṃ paripūreti, paggahanimittaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ

original: avihiṃsāvitakkaṃ paripūreti, avihiṃsāvitakko paripuṇṇo aññātāvindriyaṃ paripūreti,
analyzed: a vihiṃsā vitakkam paripūreti a vihiṃsā vitakko paripuṇṇaḥ aññātā vindriyam paripūreti

original: aññātāvindriyaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ avihiṃsūpavicāraṃ paripūreti, avihiṃsūpavicāro paripuṇṇo

analyzed: brahmacariya isanam paripūreti brahmacariya isanā paripuṇṇā paññā kkhandham paripūreti

original: Iti ime tayo dhammā akusalapakkhikā kusalapakkhikā ca tikaniddesehi niddiṭṭhā tipukkhalanayassa
analyzed: iti ime tayaḥ dhammā akusala pakkhikā kusala pakkhikā ca tika niddesehi niddiṭṭhā tipukkhala nayassa

original: disā nāma. Tassa pariyosānaṃ tayo vimokkhā appaṇihito suññato animitto, ayaṃ tipukkhalo nāma dutiyo nayo.
analyzed: disā nāma tassa pariyosānam tayaḥ vimokkhāḥ appaṇihitaḥ suññataḥ animittaḥ ayam tipukkhalaḥ nāma dutiyaḥ nayo

original: Tattha ye ime tayo puggalā ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyoti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ
analyzed: tattha ye ime tayo puggalāḥ ugghaṭita ññū vipañcita ññū imesam tiṇṇam puggalānam

original: dve puggalā sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya, sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya
analyzed: dve puggalā sukhāya paṭipadāya khippa abhiññāya sukhāya paṭipadāya dandha abhiññāya

original: ca niyyanti, dveyeva puggalā dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya, dukkhāya paṭipadāya
analyzed: ca niyyanti dveyeva puggalāḥ dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya dukkhāya paṭipadāya

original: dandhābhiññāya ca niyyanti, ime cattāro. Te visesena dve honti diṭṭhicarito ca taṇhācarito
analyzed: dandha abhiññāya ca niyyanti ime cattāro te visesena dve honti diṭṭhi carito ca taṇhā carito

original: ca. Ime cattāro hutvā tayo honti, tayo hutvā dve honti. Imesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ
analyzed: ca ime cattāraḥ hutvā tayaḥ honti tayaḥ hutvā dve honti imesam dvinnam puggalānam

original: ayaṃ saṃkileso – avijjā ca taṇhā ca ahirīkañca anottappañca asati ca asampajaññañca
analyzed: ayam saṃkilesaḥ avijjā ca taṇhā ca ahirīkañca anottappañca asati ca asampajaññañca

original: nīvaraṇāni ca saṃyojanāni ca ajjhosānañca abhiniveso ca ahaṃkāro ca mamaṃkāro ca
analyzed: nīvaraṇāni ca saṃyojanāni ca ajjhosānam ca abhiniveso ca ahaṃkāro ca mamaṃkāro ca

original: assaddhiyañca dovacassatā ca kosajjañca ayonisomanasikāro ca vicikicchā ca avijjā
analyzed: assaddhiyañca dovacassatā ca kosajjañca a yoni soma nasikāraḥ ca vicikicchā ca avijjā

original: ca asaddhammassavanañca asamāpatti ca.
analyzed: ca asat dhamma ssavanam ca asamāpatti ca

original: Tattha avijjā ca ahirīkañca asati ca nīvaraṇāni ca ajjhosānañca ahaṃkāro ca assaddhiyañca kosajjañca vicikicchā ca asaddhammassavanañca, ayaṃ ekā disā.
analyzed: tattha avijjā ca ahirīkañca asati ca nīvaraṇāni ca ajjhosānañca ahaṃkāro ca assaddhiyañca kosajjañca vicikicchā ca asat dhamma ssavanañca ayam ekā disā

original: Taṇhā ca anottappañca asampajaññañca saṃyojanāni ca abhiniveso ca mamaṃkāro ca dovacassatā
analyzed: taṇhā ca anottappañca asampajaññañca saṃyojanāni ca abhiniveso ca mamaṃkāraḥ ca dovacassatā

original: ca ayonisomanasikāro ca avijjā ca asamāpatti ca, ayaṃ dutiyā disā. Dasannaṃ dukānaṃ
analyzed: ca a yoniso manasikāro ca avijjā ca asamāpatti ca ayam dutiyā disā dasannam dukānam

original: dasa padāni paṭhamā disāti kātabbāni. Saṃkhittena atthaṃ ñāpenti paṭipakkhe kaṇhapakkhassa
analyzed: dasa padāni paṭhamā disā ati kātabbāni saṃkhittena attham ñāpenti paṭipakkhe kaṇha pakkhassa

original: dasannaṃ dukānaṃ dasa padāni dutiyakāni, ayaṃ dutiyā disā.
analyzed: dasa padāni dutiyakāni ayam dutiyā disā

original: Tattha katamo kusalapakkho? Samatho ca vipassanā ca vijjā ca caraṇañca sati ca sampajaññañca
analyzed: tattha katamo kusala pakkho samathaḥ ca vipassanā ca vijjā ca caraṇañca sati ca sampajaññañca

original: hirī ca ottappañca ahaṃkārappahānañca mamaṃkārappahānañca sammāvāyāmo ca yonisomanasikāro
analyzed: hirī ca ottappañca ahaṃkāra pahānañca mamaṃkāra ppahānañca sammā vāyāmo ca yoniso manasikāro

original: ca sammāsati ca sammāsamādhi ca paññā ca nibbidā ca samāpatti ca saddhammassavanañca
analyzed: ca sammā sati ca sammā samādhi ca paññā ca nibbidā ca samāpatti ca saddhamma ssavanañca

original: somanassañca dhammānudhammapaṭipatti ca.
analyzed: somanassam ca dhamma anudhamma paṭipatti ca

original: Dasannaṃ dukānaṃ samathādīni somanassapariyosānāni paṭhamāni dasa padāni paṭhamā
analyzed: dasannam dukānam samatha ādīni somanassa pariyosānāni paṭhamāni dasa padāni paṭhamā

original: disā, vipassanādīni dhammānudhammapaṭipattipariyosānāni dutiyāni dasa padāni dutiyā
analyzed: disā vipassanā ādīni dhamma anudhamma paṭipatti pariyosānāni dutiyāni dasa padāni dutiyā

original: disā. Iti akusalapakkhe kusalapakkhe ca nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa catasso disā.
analyzed: disāḥ iti akusala pakkhe kusala pakkhe ca nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa catasso disāḥ

original: Tāsu kusalapakkhe samathādīhi akusalapakkhe taṇhādayo pahānaṃ gacchanti, tesaṃ pahānā
analyzed: tāsu kusala pakkhe samatha ādīhi akusala pakkhe taṇhā ādayaḥ pahānam gacchanti tesam pahānā

original: rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, kusalapakkhe vipassanādīhi akusalapakkhe avijjādayo pahānaṃ
analyzed: rāga virāgā cetaḥ vimutti kusala pakkhe vipassanā ādīhi akusala pakkhe avijjā ādayaḥ pahānam

original: gacchanti, tesaṃ pahānā avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti. Iti imā dve vimuttiyo nandiyāvaṭṭanaye pariyosānaṃ.
analyzed: gacchanti tesam pahānāḥ avijjā virāgā paññā vimutti iti imāḥ dve vimuttiyaḥ nandiyāvaṭṭanaye pariyosānam

original: Tattha taṇhā avijjā samatho vipassanāti cattāri padāni, tesu aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni
analyzed: tattha taṇhā avijjā samathaḥ vipassanā ati cattāri padāni tesu aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni

original: samosaranti. Kathaṃ? Samatho ca alobho ca adoso ca asubhasaññā ca dukkhasaññā cāti
analyzed: samosaranti katham samatho ca a lobho ca a doso ca asubha saññā ca dukkha saññā ca ati

original: imāni pañca padāni samathaṃ bhajanti, vipassanā ca amoho ca aniccasaññā ca anattasaññā
analyzed: imāni pañca padāni samatham bhajanti vipassanā ca amoho ca anicca saññā ca anatta saññā

original: cāti imāni cattāri padāni vipassanaṃ bhajanti. Evaṃ nava padāni kusalāni dvīsu padesu
analyzed: ca ati imāni cattāri padāni vipassanam bhajanti evam nava padāni kusalāni dvīsu padesu

original: samosaranti. Taṇhā ca lobho ca doso ca subhasaññā ca sukhasaññā cāti imāni pañca
analyzed: samosaranti taṇhā ca lobho ca doso ca subha saññā ca sukha saññā ca ati imāni pañca

original: padāni taṇhaṃ bhajanti, avijjā ca moho ca niccasaññā ca attasaññā cāti imāni cattāri
analyzed: padāni taṇham bhajanti avijjā ca moho ca nicca saññā ca atta saññā ca ati imāni cattāri

original: padāni avijjaṃ bhajanti. Evaṃ nava padāni akusalāni dvīsu padesu samosaranti. Iti
analyzed: padāni avijjam bhajanti evam nava padāni akusalāni dvīsu padesu samosaranti iti

original: tipukkhalo ca sīhavikkīḷito ca nandiyāvaṭṭanayaṃ anuppavisanti.
analyzed: tipukkhalaḥ ca sīhavikkīḷitaḥ ca nandiyāvaṭṭanayam anuppavisanti

original: Kathaṃ tipukkhale naye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti? Vipassanā ca amoho ca aniccasaññā
analyzed: katham tipukkhale naye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti vipassanā ca amohaḥ ca anicca saññā

original: ca anattasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni amoho, samatho ca alobho ca asubhasaññā
analyzed: ca anatta saññā ca ati imāni cattāri padāni amoho samatho ca alobho ca asubha saññā

original: ca dukkhasaññā cāti imāni cattāri padāni alobho, adoso adoso eva. Evaṃ nava padāni
analyzed: ca dukkha saññā ca ati imāni cattāri padāni alobhaḥ adosaḥ adosaḥ eva evam nava padāni

analyzed: kusalāni tīsu padesu samosaranti taṇhā ca lobho ca subha saññā ca sukha saññā ca ati

original: imāni cattāri padāni lobho, avijjā ca moho ca niccasaññā ca attasaññā cāti imāni
analyzed: imāni cattāri padāni lobho avijjā ca moho ca nicca saññā ca atta saññā ca ati imāni

original: cattāri padāni moho, doso doso eva. Evaṃ nava padāni akusalāni tīsu padesu samosaranti.
analyzed: cattāri padāni mohaḥ dosaḥ dosaḥ eva evam nava padāni akusalāni tīsu padesu samosaranti

original: Iti tipukkhale naye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti.
analyzed: iti tipukkhale naye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti

original: Kathaṃ catūsu padesu aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni samosaranti? Taṇhā ca subhasaññā ca, ayaṃ
analyzed: katham catūsu padesu aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni samosaranti taṇhā ca subha saññā ca ayaṃ

original: paṭhamo vipallāso. Lobho ca sukhasaññā ca, ayaṃ dutiyo vipallāso. Avijjā ca niccasaññā
analyzed: paṭhamaḥ vipallāsaḥ lobho ca sukha saññā ca ayam dutiyaḥ vipallāsaḥ avijjā ca nicca saññā

original: ca, ayaṃ tatiyo vipallāso. Moho ca attasaññā ca, ayaṃ catuttho vipallāso. Iti nava
analyzed: ca ayam tatiyaḥ vipallāso moho ca atta saññā ca ayam catutthaḥ vipallāso iti nava

original: padāni akusalāni catūsu padesu samosaranti. Samatho ca asubhasaññā ca paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: padāni akusalāni catūsu padesu samosaranti ca asubha saññā ca paṭhamam sati paṭṭhānam

original: alobho ca dukkhasaññā ca dutiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ, vipassanā ca aniccasaññā ca tatiyaṃ
analyzed: alobho ca dukkha saññā ca dutiyam sati paṭṭhānam vipassanā ca anicca saññā ca tatiyam

original: satipaṭṭhānaṃ, amoho ca anattasaññā ca catutthaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Iti nava padāni kusalāni
analyzed: sati paṭṭhānam amoho ca anatta saññā ca catuttham sati paṭṭhānam iti nava padāni kusalāni

original: catūsu padesu samosaranti. Evaṃ sīhavikkīḷitanaye itare dve nayā anuppavisanti. Tiṇṇañhi
analyzed: catūsu padesu samosaranti evam sīhavikkīḷita naye itare dve nayāḥ anuppavisanti tiṇṇan hi

original: nayānaṃ yā bhūmiyo gocaro, so ekekaṃ nayaṃ anuppavisati. Tasmā ekekassa nayassa akusale
analyzed: nayānam yāḥ bhūmiyaḥ gocaro saḥ ekekam nayam anuppavisati tasmai ekekassa nayassa akusale

original: vā dhamme viññāte kusale vā paṭipakkho anvesitabbo. Paṭipakkhaṃ anvesitvā so nayo
analyzed: vā dhamme viññāte kusale vā paṭipakkhaḥ anvesitabbaḥ paṭipakkham anvesitvā saḥ nayaḥ

original: niddisitabbo. Tamhi naye niddiṭṭhe yathā ekamhi naye itaresaṃ nayānaṃ mūlapadāni
analyzed: niddisitabbaḥ tamhi naye niddiṭṭhe yathā ekamhi naye itaresam nayānam mūlapadāni

original: anuppaviṭṭhāni, tato tato nīharitvā niddisitabbāni. Ekekasmiñhi naye aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni anuppaviṭṭhāni.
analyzed: an uppaviṭṭhāni tatas tatas nīharitvā niddisitabbāni ekekasmin hi naye aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni an uppaviṭṭhāni

original: Tattha ekekasmiṃ dhamme viññāte sabbe dhammā viññātā honti. Imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ nayānaṃ
analyzed: tattha eka ekasmin dhamme viññāte sabbe dhammāḥ viññātāḥ honti imesam tiṇṇam nayānam

original: sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa cattāri phalāni pariyosānaṃ paṭhamāya disāya paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ,

analyzed: manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ dhammā ti gāthā ayam manaḥ ti yadi pi kāmāvacara kusala ādi bhedam sabbam pi

original: catubhūmakacittaṃ mano, imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne cakkhupālattherassa purimajātiyaṃ vejjabhūtassa
analyzed: catu bhūmaka cittam manaḥ imasmin pana ṭhāne cakkhupāla ttherassa purima jātiyam vejja bhūtassa

original: uppannavasena niyamiyamānaṃ paṭighasampayuttacittameva labbhati. So mano pubbaṅgamo
analyzed: uppanna vasena niyamiyamānam paṭigha sampayutta cittam eva labbhati so manaḥ pubbaṅgamaḥ

original: etesanti manopubbaṅgamā, manasā paṭhamagāminā samannāgatāti attho. Dhammāti nissattanijjīvaṭṭhena
analyzed: etesan ti manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ manasā paṭhama gāminā samannāgatā ati attho dhammā ti nissatta nijjīva ṭṭhena

original: dhammā, te pana vedanādayo tayo arūpino khandhā. Ete hi manopubbaṅgamā. Kathaṃ panetehi
analyzed: dhammā te pana vedanā ādayaḥ tayo arūpino khandhāḥ ete hi manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ katham pana itehi

original: saddhiṃ ekasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ekasmiñca ārammaṇe ekakkhaṇe uppajjamāno mano pubbaṅgamo
analyzed: saddhim ekasmin vatthusmim ekasmin ca ārammaṇe eka khaṇe uppajjamānaḥ manaḥ pubbaṅgamaḥ

original: nāma hotīti? Uppādapaccayaṭṭhena. Yathā hi bahūsu ekato gāmaghātādikammāni karontesu
analyzed: nāma hoti iti uppāda paccaya ṭṭhena yathā hi bahūsu ekatas gāmaghāta ādi kammāni karontesu

original: “ko etesaṃ pubbaṅgamo”ti vutte yo tesaṃ paccayo hoti, yaṃ yaṃ nissāya te taṃ kammaṃ
analyzed: kaḥ etesam pubbaṅgamaḥ ti vutte yaḥ tesam paccayaḥ hoti yam yam nissāya te tam kammaṃ

original: karonti, so datto vā mitto vā tesaṃ pubbaṅgamoti vuccati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: karonti saḥ dattaḥ vā mittaḥ vā tesam pubbaṅgamaḥ ti vuccati evaṃsampadam idam daṭṭhabbam

original: Iti uppādapaccayaṭṭhena mano pubbaṅgamo etesanti manopubbaṅgamā. Na hi te mane anuppajjante
analyzed: iti uppāda paccaya ṭṭhena manaḥ pubbaṅgamaḥ etesanti manaḥ pubbaṅgamāḥ na hi te mane anuppajjante

original: uppajjituṃ sakkuṇanti, mano pana ekaccesu cetasikesu anuppajjantesupi uppajjati eva.
analyzed: uppajjitum sakkuṇanti manaḥ pana ekaccesu cetasikesu an uppajjantesu pi uppajjati eva

original: Adhipativasena mano seṭṭho etesanti manoseṭṭhā. Yathā hi corādīnaṃ corajeṭṭhakādayo
analyzed: adhipati vasena mano seṭṭhaḥ yathā hi cora ādīnam cora jeṭṭhaka ādayaḥ

original: adhipatino seṭṭhā, tathā tesampi mano seṭṭho. Yathā pana dāruādīhi nipphannāni bhaṇḍāni
analyzed: adhipatino seṭṭhā tathā tesam pi mano seṭṭhaḥ yathā pana dāru ādīhi nipphannāni bhaṇḍāni

original: dārumayādīni nāma honti, tathā etepi manato nipphannattā manomayā nāma. Paduṭṭhenāti
analyzed: dāru maya ādīni nāma honti tathā ete pi manataḥ nipphanna ttā manaḥ mayāḥ nāma paduṭṭhena ati

original: abhijjhādīhi dosehi paduṭṭhena dūsitena bhāsati vā karoti vā. So hi bhāsanto catubbidhaṃ
analyzed: abhijjhā ādīhi dosehi paduṭṭhena dūsitena bhāsati vā karoti vā saḥ hi bhāsantaḥ catubbidham

original: vacīduccaritameva bhāsati, karontopi tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritameva karoti, abhāsanto
analyzed: vacīduccaritam eva bhāsati tividham kāya duccaritam eva karoti a bhāsantaḥ

original: akaronto tehi abhijjhādīhi paduṭṭhamanatāya tividhaṃ manoduccaritaṃ pūreti. Evamassa
analyzed: a karontaḥ tehi abhijjhā ādīhi paduṭṭha manatāya tividham manoduccaritam pūreti evam assa

original: dasa akusalakammapathā pāripūriṃ gacchanti. Tato naṃ dukkhamanvetīti tato tividhaduccaritato
analyzed: dasa akusala kamma pathā pāripūrim gacchanti tatas nam dukkham anveti iti tatas tividha duccaritato

original: taṃ puggalaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti duccaritānubhāvena catūsu apāyesu dukkhaṃ anugacchati.
analyzed: tam puggalam dukkham anveti duccarita anubhāvena catūsu apāyesu dukkham anugacchati

original: Yathā kiṃ? Cakkaṃva vahato padanti, yathā nāma sakaṭaṃ vahato balībaddassa padaṃ
analyzed: yathā kim vahataḥ padanti yathā nāma sakaṭam vahataḥ balībaddassa padanti

original: paharantaṃ cakkaṃ anugacchati, evaṃ naṃ puggalaṃ dukkhamanugacchatīti.
analyzed: paharantam cakkam anugacchati evam nam puggalam dukkham anugacchati iti

original: “Middhī yadā hotī”ti gāthāyaṃ middhīti thinamiddhābhibhūto. Mahagghasoti mahābhojano
analyzed: yadā hoti iti gāthā ayam middhī iti thina middha abhibhūtaḥ mahat hasaḥ iti mahā bhojanaḥ

original: āharahatthakaalaṃsāṭakatatravaṭṭakakākamāsakabhuttavamitakānaṃ aññataro viya. Niddāyitāti
analyzed: āharahatthaka alaṃsāṭaka tatravaṭṭaka kākamāsaka bhutta vamitakānam aññataraḥ viya niddāyitā ati

original: supanasīlo. Samparivattasāyīti seyyasukhapassasukhānaṃ anuyuñjanavasena samparivattakasayanasīlo.
analyzed: supana sīlaḥ samparivatta sāyī iti seyya sukha passa sukhānam anuyuñjana vasena samparivattaka sayana sīlaḥ

original: Nivāpapuṭṭhoti kuṇḍakādinā sūkarabhattena puṭṭho. Gharasūkaro hi bālakālato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: nivāpa puṭṭhaḥ ti kuṇḍaka ādinā sūkara bhattena puṭṭhaḥ ghara sūkaraḥ hi bāla kālataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: posiyamāno thūlasarīrakāle gehato bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhanto heṭṭhāmañcādīsu samparivattitvā
analyzed: thūla sarīra kāle gehataḥ bahi nikkhamitum a labhantaḥ heṭṭhā mañca ādīsu samparivattitvā

original: samparivattitvā assasanto passasanto sayateva. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yadā puriso middhī
analyzed: samparivattitvā assasanto passasanto idam vuttam hoti yadā purisaḥ middhī

original: ca hoti mahagghaso ca, nivāpapuṭṭho mahāvarāho viya aññena iriyāpathena yāpetuṃ asakkonto
analyzed: ca hoti mahagghasaḥ ca nivāpa puṭṭhaḥ mahāvarāhaḥ viya aññena iriyāpathena yāpetum a sakkonto

original: niddāsīlo saṃparivattasāyī, tadā so “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni manasi
analyzed: niddā sīlaḥ saṃparivatta sāyī tadā saḥ aniccam dukkham anattā ti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni manasi

original: kātuṃ na sakkoti. Tesaṃ amanasikārā mandapañño punappunaṃ gabbhaṃ upeti, gabbhavāsato na parimuccatīti.
analyzed: kātum na sakkoti tesam a manasikārā manda pañño punappunam gabbham upeti gabbha vāsataḥ na parimuccati iti

original: “Ayasāva mala”nti gāthāyaṃ ayasāti ayato. Samuṭṭhitanti jātaṃ. Tatuṭṭhāyāti tato
analyzed: ayasā ava malanti gāthā idam ayasā ati ayataḥ samuṭṭhitanti jātam

original: uṭṭhahitvā. Atidhonacārinanti dhonā vuccati cattāro paccaye idamatthitāya alametenāti
analyzed: uṭṭhahitvā atidhona cārinanti dhonā vuccati cattāro paccaye idam atthitāya alam etena ati

original: paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanapaññā, taṃ atikkamitvā caranto atidhonacārī nāma. Idaṃ
analyzed: paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjana paññā tam atikkamitvā carantaḥ atidhonacārī nāma idam

original: vuttaṃ hoti – yathā ayato malaṃ samuṭṭhāya yato taṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ, tameva khādati vināseti,
analyzed: vuttam hoti yathā ayataḥ malam samuṭṭhāya yatas tam samuṭṭhitam tam eva khādati vināseti

original: evamevaṃ cattāro paccaye appaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ sāni kammāni

original: attano santāne uṭṭhitattā attano santakāneva tāni kammāni duggatiṃ nayantīti.
analyzed: attano santāne uṭṭhita ttā attano santakāna eva tāni kammāni duggatim nayanti iti

original: “Coro yathā”ti gāthāyaṃ coro yathā sandhimukhe gahītoti yathā coro gharasandhiṃ chinditvā
analyzed: coraḥ yathā ati coraḥ yathā sandhi mukhe yathā coraḥ ghara sandhim chinditvā

original: gehaṃ pavisanto gharasandhimukhe eva rājapurisehi gahito. Sakammunā haññati bajjhate
analyzed: geham pavisantaḥ ghara sandhi mukhe eva rāja purisehi gahitaḥ sa kammunā haññati bajjhate

analyzed: tena attanā kata kammena kasā abhitāḷana ādinā haññati ca iva addu bandhana ādinā bajjhati

original: ca. Evaṃ ayaṃ pecca pajā paratthāti evampi ayaṃ pāpakārinī pajā ito cavitvā paraloke.
analyzed: ca evam ayam evam pi ayam pāpa kārinī pajā itas cavitvā para loke

original: Sakammunā haññati bajjhate cāti attanāva katena pāpakammena nirayādīsu nānappakārehi
analyzed: sa kammunā haññati bajjhate ca ati attanā va katena pāpa kammena niraya ādīsu nānappakārehi

original: kammakāraṇādīhi haññati ceva paribajjhati cāti.
analyzed: kamma kāraṇa ādīhi haññati ca iva paribajjhati ca ati

original: “Sukhakāmānī”ti gāthāyaṃ yo daṇḍena vihiṃsatīti yo puggalo daṇḍena vā leḍḍuādīhi
analyzed: sukha kāmāni iti gāthā ayam yaḥ daṇḍena vihiṃsati iti yaḥ puggalaḥ daṇḍena vā leḍḍu ādīhi

analyzed: vā vibādhati pecca saḥ na labhe sukhanti so puggalo para loke manussa sukham vā dibba sukham

analyzed: vā na labhati nibbāna sukhe pana vattabbam eva natthi

original: Gunnaṃ ce taramānānanti gāvīsu mahoghaṃ tarantīsu. Jimhaṃ gacchati puṅgavoti yadi
analyzed: gunnam ce gāvīsu mahā ogham tarantīsu jimham gacchati puṅgavaḥ iti yadi

analyzed: yūtha pati usabhaḥ kuṭilam gacchati sabbā tā jimham gacchanti iti sabbā api tāḥ gāviyaḥ

original: kuṭilameva gacchanti. Kasmā? Nette jimhaṃ gate satīti nettari kuṭilaṃ gate sati,
analyzed: kuṭilam eva gacchanti kasmāt nette jimham gate sati iti nettari kuṭilam gate sati

original: nettassa kuṭilaṃ gatattāti attho. So hi tāsaṃ paccayiko upaddavaharo ca.
analyzed: na ittassa kuṭilam gata ttā ti attho so hi tāsam paccayikaḥ upaddava haraḥ ca

original: “Evameva”nti gāthāyaṃ yathā cetaṃ, evamevaṃ yo manussesu padhānasammato, yadi so
analyzed: evam evanti gāthā ayam yathā evam evam yaḥ manussesu padhāna sammataḥ yadi so

analyzed: adhamma cārī siyā ye tassa anujīvino sabbe pi adhammikāḥ ava honti sāmi sampadā hi pakati sampadam

original: Sukiccharūpā vatāti suṭṭhu kicchāpannarūpā vata. Upadhīsūti kāmaguṇūpadhīsu. Rattāti

analyzed: rāga abhibhūtā kaṭukanti dukkhaṃ

original: Kukkuccajanakeneva pattavaṭṭippabhavassa upacchinnattā phaluppatti kadaliyā parābhavāya
analyzed: kukkucca janakena iva patta vaṭṭi ppa bhavassa upacchinna ttā phala uppatti kadaliyā parābhavāya

original: hotīti āha – “phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hantī”ti. Tathā phalapariyosānattā osadhīnaṃ “phalaṃ
analyzed: hoti iti āha phalam kadalim hanti iti tathā phala pariyosāna ttā osadhīnam phalam

analyzed: veḷum phalam naḷanti vuttam vaḷavāya kucchismiṃ gadrabhassa jātā assatarī nāma

analyzed: athassa cattāraḥ pāde catūsu khāṇukesu bandhitvā kucchim phāletvā potakam nīharanti

original: sā tattheva marati. Tena vuttaṃ – “gabbho assatariṃ yathā”ti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti –

original: yathā attano phalaṃ kadaliveḷunaḷepi vināseti, gabbho ca assatariṃ, evaṃ attano kammaphalabhūto
analyzed: yathā attano phalam vināseti gabbhaḥ ca assatarim evam attano kamma phala bhūto

original: sakkāro asappurisaṃ vināsetīti.
analyzed: sakkāraḥ a sappurisam vināseti iti

analyzed: kujjhana lakkhaṇam kodham para guṇa makkhana lakkhaṇam makkham ca garum

original: 91. Cetasāti attano cittena. Cetoti tassa puggalassa cittaṃ. Pariccāti paricchinditvā. Iriyatīti pavattati. Yathābhatanti yathā kiñci āharitvā ṭhapitaṃ.
analyzed: cetasā ati attano cittena tassa puggalassa cittam pariccāti paricchinditvā iriyati iti pavattati yathā abhatanti yathā kiñci āharitvā ṭhapitam

original: Mākatthāti mā akattha. Na pamutyatthīti pamokkho natthi. Upeccāpīti sañciccāpi, buddhipubbenāpīti attho.
analyzed: mā akattha ati mā akattha na pamuti atthi iti pamokkhaḥ na atthi upecca api iti sañcicca api buddhi pubbena api iti attho

original: “Adhammenā”ti vatvāpi “musāvādenā”ti vacanaṃ musāvādassa mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ.

original: Tenevāha – “ekaṃ dhammaṃ atītassā”tiādi, tathā “evaṃ parittaṃ kho, rāhula, tesaṃ
analyzed: tena iva āha ekam dhammam atītassa atiādi tathā evam parittam kho rāhula tesam

original: sāmaññaṃ, yesaṃ natthi sampajānamusāvāde lajjā”tiādi. Taṃ kathaṃ nu bhavissatīti
analyzed: sāmaññam yesam na atthi sampajāna musāvāde tam katham nu bhavissati iti

original: taṃ dhanaṃ kena nu pakārena tesaṃ bhavissati. Adhammena tesaṃ sambhatattā tesu naciraṭṭhitikaṃ
analyzed: tat dhanam kena nu pakārena tesam bhavissati adhammena tesam sambhata ttā tesu naciraṭṭhitikam

original: hotīti attho. Antarāyā su bhavissantīti adhammiyavohārādito rājantarāyādayo bhavissanti.
analyzed: hoti iti attho antarāyā su bhavissanti iti adhammiya vohāra āditaḥ rāja antarāya ādayaḥ bhavissanti

original: Sūti nipātamattaṃ. Sambhatassa vinassatīti imassa sambhataṃ sajjitaṃ vinassati. Sagganti
analyzed: su iti nipāta mattam sambhatassa vinassati iti imassa sambhatam sajjitam vinassati sagganti

original: sugatiṃ. Sā hi rūpādīhi sobhanehi aggoti saggoti adhippetā. Ettāvatāti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ
analyzed: sugatim sā hi rūpa ādīhi sobhanehi aggā ti saggā ti adhippetā ettāvatā iti diṭṭhadhammika samparāyikānam

original: atthānaṃ hāniyā. Hatāti vinaṭṭhā.
analyzed: atthānam hāniyā hatā ati vinaṭṭhā

original: Vivaṭṭateti nivaṭṭati. Lobhā khaṇati attānanti lobhahetu apuññāni karonto kāyavisamādiyogena attānaṃ khaṇati nāma. Mittehi jīratīti mittabhāvehi hāyati.
analyzed: vivaṭṭata iti nivaṭṭati lobhā khaṇati attānam ti lobha hetu apuññāni karonto kāya visama ādi yogena attānam khaṇati nāma mittehi jīrati iti mitta bhāvehi hāyati

original: Carantīti catūhi iriyāpathehi akusalameva karontā vicaranti. Bālāti idhalokatthaṃ
analyzed: caranti iti catūhi iriyāpathehi akusalam eva karontā vicaranti bālā ati idha lokattham

original: paralokatthañca ajānantā idha bālā nāma. Dummedhāti nippaññā. Na hi paññāya duṭṭhattaṃ
analyzed: para loka atthañca a jānantāḥ idha bālāḥ nāma dummedhā ati nippaññāḥ na hi paññāya duṭṭha ttam

original: nāma atthi. Amittenevāti amittabhūtena viya verinā viya hutvā. Kaṭukapphalanti tikhiṇaphalaṃ,
analyzed: nāma atthi amittena iva ati amitta bhūtena viya verinā viya hutvā kaṭu kapphalanti tikhiṇa phalam

original: dukkhaphalanti attho. Na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, yaṃ katvā anutappatīti yaṃ kammaṃ
analyzed: dukkha phalanti atthaḥ na tam kammam katam sādhu yam katvā anutappati iti yam kammam

original: nirayādīsu nibbattanasamatthaṃ dukkhudayaṃ katvā anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe anutappati
analyzed: niraya ādīsu nibbattana samattham dukkha udayam katvā anussarita anussarita khaṇe anutappati

original: anusocati, taṃ kataṃ na sādhu na sundaraṃ na bhaddakaṃ. Yassa assumukhoti yassa assūhi
analyzed: anusocati tam katam na sādhu na sundaram na bhaddakam yassa assu mukhā uti yassa assūhi

original: tintamukho rodanto vipākaṃ paṭisevati anubhoti.
analyzed: tintamukhaḥ rodantaḥ vipākam paṭisevati anubhoti

original: Dukkaranti vattapaṭivattapūraṇādivasena ābhisamācārikasīlassa kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya
analyzed: dukkaram ti vatta paṭivatta pūraṇa ādi vasena ābhisamācārika sīlassa kātum a sakkuṇeyya tāya

original: dukkaraṃ. Samādānato paṭṭhāya khaṇḍaṃ akatvā visesato ādibrahmacariyakassa carimakacittaṃ
analyzed: dukkaram samādānataḥ paṭṭhāya khaṇḍam a katvā visesataḥ ādi brahmacariyakassa carimaka cittam

original: pāpetabbatāya duttitikkhaṃ, sīlasaṃvarādayo vā aparikkhate katvā sampādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya
analyzed: pāpetabba tāya duttitikkham sīla saṃvara ādayaḥ vā a parikkhate katvā sampādetum a sakkuṇeyya tāya

original: dukkaraṃ. Adhivāsetabbānaṃ pana dussahanato khantisaṃvaraṃvasena duttitikkhaṃ. Abyattenāti
analyzed: dukkaram adhivāsetabbānam pana dussahanataḥ khanti saṃvaraṃ vasena duttitikkham abyattena ati

original: mandapaññena. Sāmaññanti samaṇabhāvo. Tatthāti tassa sāmaññassa. Sambādhāti dunnivatthaduppārutamātugāmādisammaddā.
analyzed: manda paññena sāmaññanti samaṇa bhāvo tattha ati tassa sāmaññassa dunnivattha duppāruta mātugāma ādi sammaddā

original: Yatthāti sīlasaṃvarādīnaṃ paribandhabhūtesu sambādhasaṅkhātesu visabhāgārammaṇādīsu.
analyzed: yattha ati sīla saṃvara ādīnam paribandha bhūtesu sambādha saṅkhātesu visa bhāga ārammaṇa ādīsu

original: Atha vā dukkarantipadassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ duttitikkhanti vuttaṃ. Duttitikkhanti dukkhamaṃ
analyzed: atha vā duttitikkhanti padassa attham dassetum duttitikkhanti vuttam duttitikkhanti

original: duradhivāsiyaṃ. Abyattenāti bālena. Sāmaññanti samaṇadhammo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ
analyzed: duradhivāsiyam abyattena ati bālena sāmaññam ti samaṇa dhammaḥ idam vuttam hoti yam

original: paṇḍitā kulaputtā dasapi vassāni vīsatipi…pe… saṭṭhipi vassāni dantebhi dantamādhāya
analyzed: paṇḍitā kula puttā vassāni saṭṭhipi vassāni dantebhi dantam ādhāya

original: jivhāya tāluṃ āhacca cetasā cittaṃ abhiniggaṇhitvā ekāsanaṃ ekabhattaṃ paṭisevamānā

original: āpāṇakoṭikaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carantā sāmaññaṃ karonti, taṃ bālā abyattā kātuṃ na sakkontīti.
analyzed: āpāṇakoṭikam brahmacariyam carantā sāmaññam karonti tam bālāḥ abyattāḥ kātum na sakkonti iti

original: Bahūhi tattha sambādhāti tasmiṃ sāmaññasaṅkhāte ariyamagge bahū sambādhā, maggādhigamāya
analyzed: bahūhi tattha tasmin sāmañña saṅkhāte ariya magge bahū sambādhāḥ magga adhigamāya

original: paṭipannassa bahū parissayāti attho.
analyzed: paṭipannassa bahū parissayā ti atthaḥ

original: Appameyyaṃ paminantoti appameyyaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ “ettakasīlo ayaṃ ettakasamādhi
analyzed: appameyyam paminanto ti appameyyam khīṇāsava puggalam ettaka sīlaḥ ayam ettaka samādhi

original: ettakapañño”ti evaṃ minanto. Kodha vidvā vikappayeti ko idha vidvā medhāvī vikappeyya,
analyzed: ettaka pañño ti evam minantaḥ kodha vidvā vikappaya iti kaḥ idha vidvā medhāvī vikappeyya

original: khīṇāsavova khīṇāsavaṃ minanto vikappeyyāti dīpeti. Nivutaṃ maññeti yo pana puthujjano
analyzed: khīṇāsavaḥ uva khīṇāsavam minantaḥ vikappeyya ati dīpeti nivutam maññeti yaḥ pana puthujjano

original: minetuṃ ārabhati, taṃ nivutaṃ avakujjapaññaṃ maññāmi. Akissavanti kissavā vuccati
analyzed: minetum ārabhati tam nivutam avakujja paññam maññāmi a kissavanti kissavā vuccati

original: paññā, nippaññanti attho.
analyzed: paññā nippaññanti attho

original: Kuṭhārīti attacchedakaṭṭhena kuṭhārisadisī pharusavācā. Chindatīti kusalamūlasaṅkhāte

original: mūleyeva nikantati. Visaṃ halāhalaṃ ivāti halāhalasaṅkhātaṃ visaṃ iva. Evaṃ viraddhaṃ
analyzed: nikantati visam halāhalam iva ati halāhala saṅkhātam visam iva evam viraddham

original: pātetīti viraddhaṃ aparaddhaṃ khalitapuggalaṃ evaṃ apāyesu vinipāteti. Vācā dubbhāsitā
analyzed: pāta iti iti viraddham aparaddham khalita puggalam evam apāyesu vinipāta iti vācā dubbhāsitā

original: yathāti yathā vācā ariyūpavādanavasena dubbhāsitā.
analyzed: yathā iti yathā vācā ari yūpa vādana vasena dubbhāsitā

original: 92. Nindiyanti nindanīyaṃ. Taṃ vā nindati yo pasaṃsiyoti yo guṇavisiṭṭhatāya pasaṃsāraho
analyzed: nindanīyam tam vā nindati yaḥ yaḥ guṇa visiṭṭha tāya pasaṃsā raho

original: puggalo, taṃ vā so pāpicchatādīni āropetvā garahati. Vicinātīti upacināti. Kalinti
analyzed: puggalaḥ tam vā saḥ pāpa icchatā ādīni āropetvā garahati vicināti iti upacināti

original: aparādhaṃ. Ayaṃ kalīti ayaṃ aparādho. Akkhesūti jūtakīḷanakkhesu. Sabbassāpi sahāpi

original: attanāti sabbena attano dhanenāpi attanāpi saddhiṃ. Sugatesūti sobhanagamanattā,

original: sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā, sammā gatattā, sammā ca gadattā sugatasaṅkhātesu buddhādīsu.

original: Manaṃ padosayeti yo manaṃ padoseyya, tassa ayaṃ manopadoso eva mahattaro kalīti vuttaṃ
analyzed: manam padosaya iti yaḥ manam padoseyya tassa ayam manas upadosaḥ eva mahattaraḥ kalī iti vuttam

original: hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā sataṃ sahassānaṃ…pe… pāpakanti. Tattha sataṃ sahassānanti nirabbudagaṇanāya

original: satasahassaṃ. Chattiṃsatīti aparāni chattiṃsati nirabbudāni. Pañca cāti abbudagaṇanāya

original: Lobhaguṇeti “guṇo”ti bālehi diṭṭhattā, anekakkhattuṃ pavattitattā ca lobhoyeva lobhaguṇo,

original: vigatabhūta alikavādi. Anariyāti asappurisa. Bhūnahūti bhūtihanaka attano buddhivināsaka.

original: Purisantāti purisādhama. Kalīti alakkhipurisa. Avajātakaputtāti buddhassa bhagavato

analyzed: jātaḥ rajam ākirasi iti kilesa rajam attani pakkhipasi santa iti samita kilese khīṇa āsave

original: Kibbisakārīti pāpakāri. Papatanti narakaṃ.
analyzed: kibbisa kāri iti pāpa kāri papatanti narakam

analyzed: idam saṃkilesabhāgiyan ti idam taṇhā ādīnam sabhāva bhedataḥ avatthā bhedato ca aneka bhedakam dassetum anekehi sutta padehi udāharaṇa vasena dassitam saṃkilesabhāgiyam suttan ti veditabbam

original: Pasannenāti kammakammaphalādīni saddahantena.
analyzed: pasannena ati kamma kamma phala ādīni saddahantena

analyzed: pecca saḥ labhata iti yaḥ bhūte daṇḍena na hiṃsati saḥ puggalaḥ para loke manussa bhūtaḥ manussa sukham deva bhūtaḥ dibba sukham ubhayam atikkantaḥ nibbāna sukham labhati iti attho

original: veditabbā. Mahāghare vasantassāpi hi sakiñcanasapalibodhaṭṭhena gharāvāso sambādhova.

original: sugandhabhojanaṃ pariyesantassa uñchanaṃ ñātuñchanaṃ nāma, gharapaṭipāṭiyā pana dvāre
analyzed: sugandha bhojanam pariyesantassa uñchanam ñātuñchanam nāma ghara paṭipāṭiyā pana dvāre

original: ṭhitena laddhamissakabhojanaṃ aññātuñchanaṃ nāma. Idaṃ idha adhippetaṃ. Tena yāpentaṃ.
analyzed: ṭhitena laddha missaka bhojanam aññātuñchanam nāma idam idha adhippetam tena yāpentam

original: Kāmesu anapekkhinanti vatthukāmakilesakāmesu nirapekkhaṃ.
analyzed: kāmesu an apekkhinanti vatthu kāma kilesa kāmesu nirapekkham

original: Chetvāti vadhitvā. Sukhaṃ setīti kodhapariḷāhena aparidayhamānattā sukhaṃ sayati.
analyzed: chetvā ati vadhitvā sukham seti iti kodha pariḷāhena a paridayham ānattā sukham sayati

original: Na socatīti kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanassattā na socati. Visamūlassāti dukkhavipākassa.
analyzed: na socati iti kodha vināsena vinaṭṭha domanassa ttā na socati visa mūlassa ati dukkha vipākassa

original: Madhuraggassāti yaṃ akkuṭṭhassa paccakkositvā pahaṭassa paṭippaharitvā sukhaṃ uppajjati,
analyzed: madhuraggassa ati yam akkuṭṭhassa paccakkositvā pahaṭassa paṭippaharitvā sukham uppajjati

original: taṃ sandhāya so “madhuraggo”ti vutto. Imasmiñhi ṭhāne pariyosānaṃ “agga”nti vuttaṃ. Ariyāti buddhādayo.
analyzed: tam sandhāya saḥ madhuraggaḥ iti vuttaḥ imasmin hi ṭhāne pariyosānam aggam ti vuttam ariyāḥ ti buddha ādayaḥ

original: Haneti haneyya. Uppatitanti asamugghāṭitaṃ avikkhambhituppannavasena samudācāruppannavasena samudācarantaṃ. Vinodayeti attano santānato nīhareyya.
analyzed: haneti haneyya uppatitam ti a samugghāṭitam a vikkhambhita uppanna vasena samudācāra uppanna vasena samudācarantam vinodaya iti attanaḥ santānataḥ nīhareyya

original: 101. Sattiyāti desanāsīsametaṃ, ekatodhārādinā satthenāti attho. Omaṭṭhoti pahaṭo.
analyzed: sattiyā iti desanā sīsam etam ekatodhāra ādinā satthena ati attho omaṭṭhaḥ ti pahaṭaḥ

original: Cattāro hi pahārā omaṭṭho ummaṭṭho maṭṭho vimaṭṭhoti. Tattha upari ṭhatvā adhomukhaṃ
analyzed: cattāro hi pahārā omaṭṭhaḥ ummaṭṭhaḥ maṭṭhaḥ vimaṭṭhaḥ ti tattha upari ṭhatvā adhomukham

original: dinnappahāro omaṭṭho nāma, adho ṭhatvā uddhaṃ mukhaṃ dinnappahāro ummaṭṭho nāma,
analyzed: dinnappahāraḥ omaṭṭhaḥ nāma adhas ṭhatvā uddham mukham dinnappahāraḥ ummaṭṭhaḥ nāma

original: aggaḷasūci viya vinivijjhitvā kato maṭṭho nāma, seso sabbopi vimaṭṭho nāma. Imasmiṃ
analyzed: aggaḷa sūci viya vinivijjhitvā kataḥ maṭṭhaḥ nāma sesaḥ sabbaḥ api vimaṭṭhaḥ nāma imasmin

original: pana ṭhāne omaṭṭho gahito. So hi sabbadāruṇo duruddharaṇasallo duttikiccho antodoso
analyzed: pana ṭhāne omaṭṭhaḥ gahitaḥ saḥ hi sabba dāruṇaḥ duruddharaṇa sallaḥ duttikicchaḥ antodoso

original: antopubbalohito ca hoti. Pubbalohitaṃ anikkhamitvā vaṇamukhaṃ pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: antopubba lohito ca hoti pubba lohitam a nikkhamitvā vaṇa mukham pariyonandhitvā tiṭṭhati

original: Pubbalohitaṃ nīharitukāmehi mañcena saddhiṃ bandhitvā adhosiro kātabbo hoti, maraṇaṃ
analyzed: pubba lohitam nīharitu kāmehi mañcena saddhim bandhitvā adhosiraḥ kātabbaḥ hoti maraṇam

original: vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ pāpuṇāti. Paribbajeti vihareyya.
analyzed: vā maraṇa mattam vā dukkham pāpuṇāti paribbajeti vihareyya

original: Imāya gāthāya kiṃ kathitaṃ? Yathā sattiyā omaṭṭhapuriso sallubbāhanavaṇatikicchanānaṃ
analyzed: imāya gāthāya kim kathitam yathā sattiyā omaṭṭha purisaḥ

original: atthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati payogaṃ karoti parakkamati. Yathā ca dayhamāne matthake
analyzed: atthāya vīriyam ārabhati payogam karoti parakkamati yathā ca dayhamāne matthake

original: ādittasiro tassa nibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati payogaṃ karoti parakkamati, evamevaṃ
analyzed: ādittasiro tassa nibbāpana tthāya vīriyam ārabhati payogam karoti parakkamati evam evam

original: bhikkhu kāmarāgappahānāya sato appamatto hutvā vihareyya bhagavāti kathesi.
analyzed: bhikkhu kāma rāga ppahānāya sataḥ appamattaḥ hutvā vihareyya bhagavā iti kathesi

original: Evaṃ devatāya kathite atha bhagavā cintesi – “imāya devatāya upamā daḷhaṃ katvā ānītā,
analyzed: evam devatāya kathite atha bhagavā cintesi imāya devatāya upamā daḷham katvā ānītā

original: atthaṃ pana parittakaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā. Punappunaṃ kathentīpi hi esā kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanappahānameva
analyzed: attham pana parittakam gahetvā ṭhitā punappunam kathenti ipi hi esā kāma rāgassa vikkhambhana ppahānam eva

original: katheyya, yāva ca kāmarāgo maggena na samugghāṭiyyati, tāva anubandhova hotī”ti tameva
analyzed: katheyya yāva ca kāma rāgaḥ maggena na samugghāṭiyyati tāva anubandhaḥ uva hoti iti tam eva

original: upamaṃ gahetvā paṭhamamaggavasena devatāya vinivaṭṭetvā dassento “sattiyā viya omaṭṭho”ti
analyzed: upamam gahetvā paṭhama magga vasena devatāya vinivaṭṭetvā dassento sattiyā viya omaṭṭhaḥ ti

original: dutiyagāthamāha. Tassattho purimanayānusārena veditabbo.
analyzed: dutiya gātham āha tassa atthaḥ purima naya anusārena veditabbo

original: Lokāmisanti kāmaguṇo. Santipekkhoti sabbasaṅkhārūpasamaṃ nibbānaṃ apekkhamāno. Paññavāti
analyzed: kāma guṇo santi pekkho ti sabba saṅkhāra upasamam nibbānam apekkhamāno paññavāti

original: paññavanto. Pahitattoti nibbānaṃ patipesitacitto. Virato kāmasaññāyāti yāya kāyaci
analyzed: paññavanto pahita tto ti nibbānam patipesita cittaḥ virataḥ kāma saññāya ati yāya kāyaci

original: sabbato kāmasaññāya catutthamaggasampayuttāya samucchedaviratiyā virato. “Viratto”tipi
analyzed: sabbatas kāma saññāya catuttha magga sampayuttāya samuccheda viratiyā virataḥ virattaḥ tipi

original: pāṭho. Kāmasaññāyāti pana bhummavacanaṃ hoti. Sagāthāvagge “kāmasaññāsū”ti pāṭho.
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ kāma saññāya iti pana bhumma vacanam hoti sagāthā vagge kāma saññāsu iti pāṭhaḥ

original: Catūhi maggehi dasannampi saṃyojanānaṃ atītattā sabbasaṃyojanātīto. Catutthamaggeneva
analyzed: catūhi maggehi dasannam pi saṃyojanānam atīta ttā sabba saṃyojana atītaḥ catuttha maggena iva

original: vā uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanātīto tatra tatrābhinandanato nandisaṅkhātāya taṇhāya tiṇṇañca
analyzed: vā tatra tatra abhinandanataḥ nandi saṅkhātāya taṇhāya tiṇṇam ca

original: bhavānaṃ parikkhīṇattā nandibhavaparikkhīṇo. So tādiso khīṇāsavo bhikkhu gambhīre
analyzed: bhavānam parikkhīṇa ttā nandi bhava parikkhīṇo so tādisaḥ khīṇa āsavaḥ bhikkhu gambhīre

original: saṃsāraṇṇave na sīdati.
analyzed: saṃsāraṇṇave na sīdati

original: Saddahānoti yena pubbabhāge kāyasucaritādibhedena, aparabhāge ca sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedena
analyzed: saddahānaḥ iti yena pubba bhāge kāya su carita ādi bhedena apara bhāge ca sattattiṃsa bodhi pakkhiya bhedena

original: dhammena arahanto buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakā nibbānaṃ pattā. Taṃ saddahāno arahataṃ
analyzed: dhammena arahantaḥ buddha paccekabuddha buddha sāvakāḥ nibbānam pattā tam saddahānaḥ arahatam

original: dhammaṃ nibbānappattiyā lokiyalokuttarapaññaṃ labhati, tañca kho na saddhāmattakeneva.
analyzed: dhammam nibbāna ppattiyā lokiya lokuttara paññam labhati tat ca kho na saddhā mattakena iva

original: Yasmā pana saddhājāto upasaṅkamati, upasaṅkamanto payirupāsati, payirupāsanto sotaṃ
analyzed: yasmai pana saddhā jātaḥ upasaṅkamati upasaṅkamantaḥ payiḥ upāsati payiḥ upāsantaḥ sotam

original: odahati, odahitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, tasmā upasaṅkamanato paṭṭhāya yāva dhammassavanena
analyzed: odahati odahita sotaḥ dhammam suṇāti tasmai upasaṅkamanataḥ paṭṭhāya yāva dhammassavanena

original: sussūsaṃ labhate paññaṃ.
analyzed: sussūsam labhate paññam

original: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Taṃ dhammaṃ saddahitvāpi ācariyupajjhāye kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvāpi
analyzed: kim vuttam hoti tam dhammam saddahitvā api ācariya upajjhāye kālena kālam upasaṅkamitvā api

original: vattakaraṇena payirupāsitvā yadā payirupāsanāya ārādhitacittā kiñci vattukāmā honti.
analyzed: vatta karaṇena payirupāsitvā yadā payirupāsanāya ārādhita cittā kiñci vattu kāmāḥ honti

original: Atha adhigatāya sotukāmatāya sotaṃ odahitvā suṇanto labhatīti evaṃ sussūsampi ca
analyzed: atha adhigatāya sotu kāma tāya sotam odahitvā suṇantaḥ labhati iti evam ca

original: satiavippavāsena appamatto subhāsitadubbhāsitaññutāya vicakkhaṇo eva labhati, na
analyzed: sati a vippavāsena appamattaḥ subhāsita dubbhāsita ñutāya vicakkhaṇaḥ eva labhati na

original: itaro. Tenāha – “appamatto vicakkhaṇo”ti.
analyzed: itaraḥ tena āha appamattaḥ vicakkhaṇo ti

original: Patirūpakārīti desakālādīni ahāpetvā lokiyassa lokuttarassa dhammassa patirūpaṃ adhigamūpāyaṃ
analyzed: patirūpa kārī iti desa kāla ādīni ahāpetvā lokiyassa lokuttarassa dhammassa patirūpam adhigama upāyam

original: karotīti patirūpakārī. Dhuravāti cetasikavīriyavasena anikkhittadhuro. Uṭṭhātāti
analyzed: karoti iti pati rūpa kārī dhura vāti cetasika vīriya vasena a nikkhitta dhuraḥ uṭṭhātā ati

original: kāyikavīriyavasena uṭṭhānasampanno asithilaparakkamo. Vindate dhananti lokiyalokuttaradhanaṃ
analyzed: kāyika vīriya vasena uṭṭhāna sampannaḥ asithila parakkamaḥ vindate lokiya lokuttara dhanam

original: adhigacchati. Saccenāti vacīsaccena paramatthasaccena ca. Buddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakā
analyzed: adhigacchati saccena ati vacī saccena paramattha saccena ca buddha paccekabuddha ariya sāvakā

original: nibbutiṃ pāpuṇantā kittimpi pāpuṇantiyeva. Dadanti paresaṃ yaṃ kiñci icchitaṃ patthitaṃ
analyzed: nibbutim pāpuṇantā kittim pi pāpuṇantiyā iva dadanti paresam yam kiñci icchitam patthitam

original: dento mittāni ganthati sampādeti karotīti attho. Duddadaṃ vā dadanto ganthati, dānamukhena
analyzed: dentaḥ mittāni ganthati sampādeti karoti iti atthaḥ duddadam vā dadantaḥ ganthati dāna mukhena

original: cattāripi saṅgahavatthūni gahitānīti veditabbāni. Tehi mittāni karonti. Asmā lokā
analyzed: cattāri pi saṅgaha vatthūni gahitāni iti veditabbāni tehi mittāni karonti asmai lokā

original: paraṃ lokaṃ, sa ve pecca na socatīti yassa puggalassa ime saddhādayo dhammā vijjanti,
analyzed: param lokam sa ve pecca na socati iti yassa puggalassa ime saddhā ādayaḥ dhammā vijjanti

original: so imasmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ gantvā na socati, sokakāraṇaṃ tassa natthīti attho.
analyzed: saḥ imasmai param lokam gantvā na socati soka kāraṇam tassa natthi iti attho

original: “Yassete caturo dhammā, saddhassa gharamesino;
analyzed: yassa ete caturaḥ dhammā saddhassa gharamesinaḥ

original: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve pecca na socatī”ti. –
analyzed: saccam dhammaḥ cāgo sa ve pecca na socati iti

original: Gāthaṃ avasesaṃ katvā udāhaṭaṃ. Āḷavakasutte hi imā gāthā āḷavakena “kathaṃ su labhate pañña”ntiādinā puṭṭhena bhagavatā bhāsitāti.
analyzed: gātham avasesam katvā udāhaṭam āḷavaka sutte hi imāḥ gāthāḥ āḷavakena katham su labhate paññanti ādinā puṭṭhena bhagavatā bhāsitā ati

original: Yena kenaci vaṇṇenāti yena kenaci kāraṇena, pakārena vā. Saṃvāsoti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne
analyzed: yena kenacid vaṇṇena ati yena kenacid kāraṇena pakārena vā ekasmin ṭhāne

analyzed: sahavāso samāgamaḥ tanti tathā samāgatam anukampitabbam purisam manasā ce pasannena ati
