analyzed: karuṇā samussāhitena pasādena pasannena manasā na tena hoti saṃyuttaḥ ti tena yathā vuttena

original: anusāsanena kāmacchandādīnaṃ saṃyojanavasena saṃyutto nāma na hoti. Yānukampā anuddayāti
analyzed: anusāsanena kāmacchanda ādīnam saṃyojana vasena saṃyuttaḥ nāma na hoti yā anukampā

original: yā ariyamaggasampāpanavasena karuṇāyanā, mettāyanā cāti attho.
analyzed: yā ariya magga sampāpana vasena karuṇāyanā mettāyanā ca ati attho

original: 102. Rāgo ca doso cāti rāgadosā heṭṭhā vuttanayāva. Kutonidānāti kiṃnidānā kiṃhetukā.
analyzed: rāgo ca doso ca ati rāga dosāḥ heṭṭhā vutta nayā va kutonidānā ati kiṃnidānā kiṃhetukā

original: Paccattavacanassa hi ayaṃ to-ādeso, samāse cassa lopābhāvo veditabbo. Aratī ratī
analyzed: paccatta vacanassa hi ayam to ādesaḥ samāse cassa lopa abhāvaḥ veditabbaḥ aratī ratī

original: lomahaṃso kutojāti yāyaṃ pantesu senāsanesu, adhikusalesu ca dhammesu arati ukkaṇṭhitā,
analyzed: lomahaṃso kutojāti yā ayam pantesu senāsanesu adhi kusalesu ca dhammesu arati ukkaṇṭhitā

original: yā ca pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rati abhirati āsatti kīḷanādi, yo ca lomahaṃsasamuṭṭhānato
analyzed: yā ca pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rati abhirati āsatti kīḷana ādi ca loma haṃsa samuṭṭhānato

original: lomahaṃsasaṅkhāto cittutrāso, ime tayo dhammā kuto jātā kuto nibbattāti pucchā. Kuto
analyzed: lomahaṃsa saṅkhāto cittutrāso ime tayo dhammā kutas jātā kutas nibbattā ati pucchā kutas

original: samuṭṭhāyāti kuto uppajjitvā. Manoti kusalacittaṃ. Vitakkāti kāmavitakkādayo. Kumārakā
analyzed: samuṭṭhāya ati kutas uppajjitvā manaḥ ti kusala cittam vitakkā ati kāma vitakka ādayaḥ kumārakā

original: dhaṅkamivosajantīti yathā kumārakā kīḷantā kākaṃ suttena pāde bandhitvā osajanti
analyzed: dhaṅkam iva usajanti iti yathā kumārakā kīḍantā kākam suttena pāde bandhitvā osajanti

original: khipanti, evaṃ kusalamanaṃ akusalavitakkā kuto samuṭṭhāya osajantīti pucchā.
analyzed: khipanti evam kusala manam akusala vitakkā kutas samuṭṭhāya osajanti iti pucchā

original: Rāgo cāti dutiyagāthā tassā vissajjanaṃ. Tattha itoti attabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha. Attabhāvanidānā
analyzed: rāgaḥ ca iti dutiya gāthā tassāḥ vissajjanam tattha itas ti atta bhāvam sandhāya āha atta bhāva nidānā

original: hi rāgadosā, arati rati lomahaṃsā ca attabhāvato jātā. Kāmavitakkādayo attabhāvato
analyzed: hi rāga dosāḥ ca atta bhāvataḥ jātā kāma vitakka ādayaḥ atta bhāvataḥ

original: eva samuṭṭhāya kusalamanaṃ osajanti. Tena tadaññaṃ pakatiādikāraṇaṃ paṭikkhipanto
analyzed: eva samuṭṭhāya kusala manaṃ osajanti tena tad aññam pakati ādi kāraṇam paṭikkhipanto

original: āha – “itonidānā ito samuṭṭhāyā”ti. Purimagāthāya vuttanayenettha saddasiddhi veditabbā.
analyzed: āha itonidānā itas samuṭṭhāya ati purima gāthāya vutta nayena ittha sadda siddhi veditabbā

original: Idāni yvāyaṃ “itonidānā”tiādīsu attabhāvanidānā attabhāvato jātā attabhāvato samuṭṭhāyāti
analyzed: idāni yvā ayam itonidāna ati ādīsu atta bhāva nidānāḥ atta bhāvataḥ jātāḥ atta bhāvataḥ samuṭṭhāya ati

original: attho vutto, taṃ sādhento āha – “snehajā attasambhūtā”ti. Ete hi rāgādayo vitakkapariyosānā
analyzed: atthaḥ vuttaḥ tam sādhentaḥ āha sneha jāḥ atta sambhūtā iti ete hi rāga ādayaḥ vitakka pariyosānā

original: taṇhāsnehena jātā. Tathā jāyantā ca pañcupādānakkhandhabhede attabhāvasaṅkhāte attani
analyzed: taṇhā snehena jātā tathā jāyantā ca pañca upādāna khandha bhede atta bhāva saṅkhāte

original: sambhūtā. Tenāha – “snehajā attasambhūtā”ti. Idāni tadatthajotikaṃ upamaṃ dasseti
analyzed: sambhūtā tena āha sneha jā atta sambhūtā iti idāni tad attha jotikam upamam dasseti

original: “nigrodhasseva khandhajā”ti. Tattha khandhajāti khandhesu jātā pārohā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: nigrodhassa iva khandha jāti tattha khandha jāti khandhesu jātā pārohā idam vuttaṃ

analyzed: hoti yathā nigrodhassa khandha ja saṅkhātā pārohā āporasa saṅkhāte snehe sati jāyanti

original: jāyantā ca tasmiṃyeva nigrodhe tesu tesu sākhappadesesu sambhavanti, evaṃ ete rāgādayo

original: ajjhattaṃ taṇhāsnehe sati jāyanti, jāyantā ca tasmiṃyeva attabhāve tesu tesu cakkhādippadesesu
analyzed: ajjhattam taṇhā snehe sati jāyanti ca tasmin yeva attabhāve tesu tesu cakkha ādi ppadesesu

original: iṭṭhārammaṇesu sambhavanti. Tena vuttaṃ – “snehajā attasambhūtā”ti. Puthu visattā
analyzed: iṭṭha ārammaṇesu sambhavanti tena vuttam sneha jā atta sambhūtā ati puthu visattā

original: kāmesūti yasmā rāgopi pañcakāmaguṇikādivasena, dosopi āghātavatthuādivasena aratiādayopi
analyzed: kāmesu iti yasmā rāgaḥ api pañca kāma guṇika ādi vasena dosaḥ api āghāta vatthu ādi vasena arati ādayaḥ api

original: tassa tassa bhedassa vasenāti sabbathā sabbepime kilesā puthu anekappakārā hutvā

original: Baḷisāti sattānaṃ anatthahetutāya baḷisā viya baḷisā. Anayāyāti anatthāya. Byābādhāyāti
analyzed: baḷisā ati sattānam anattha hetutāya baḷisāḥ viya baḷisāḥ anayāya ati anatthāya byābādhāya ati

original: dukkhāya. Iṭṭhāti pariyiṭṭhā vā apariyiṭṭhā vā sukhārammaṇatāya iṭṭhā. Kāmanīyaṭṭhena
analyzed: dukkhāya iṭṭhā ati pariyiṭṭhā vā apariyiṭṭhā vā sukha ārammaṇa tāya iṭṭhā kāmanīya ṭṭhena

original: kantā. Manassa vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena manāpā. Piyasabhāvatāya piyarūpā. Kilesakāmasahitattā
analyzed: kantā manassa vaḍḍhanaṭṭhena manāpā piya sabhāva tāya piya rūpā kilesa kāma sahita ttā

original: kāmūpasaṃhitā. Rāgajananaṭṭhena cittassa rañjanato rajanīyā. Tañceti taṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ,
analyzed: rāga janana ṭṭhena cittassa rañjanataḥ rajanīyā tat ca iti tam rūpa ārammaṇam

original: nīlādivasena anekabhedabhinnampi hi rūpāyatanaṃ rūpārammaṇabhāvena cakkhuviññeyyabhāvena
analyzed: nīla ādi vasena aneka bheda bhinnam pi hi rūpa āyatanam rūpa ārammaṇa bhāvena cakkhu viññeyya bhāvena

original: ca ekavidhataṃ nātivattatīti taṃsabhāvasāmaññaṃ gahetvā “tañce”ti vuttaṃ. Abhinandatīti
analyzed: ca ekavidha tam na ativattati iti taṃsa bhāva sāmaññam gahetvā tat ca iti vuttam abhinandati iti

original: abhinandanabhūtāya sappītikataṇhāya abhimukho nandati. Abhivadatīti “aho sukhaṃ,
analyzed: abhinandana bhūtāya sappītika taṇhāya abhimukhaḥ nandati abhivadati iti aho sukham

original: aho sukha”nti vadāpentiyā taṇhāyanavasena abhivadati. Ajjhosāya tiṭṭhatīti gilitvā
analyzed: aho sukhanti taṇhāyana vasena abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati iti gilitvā

original: pariniṭṭhapetvā tiṭṭhati. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilitabaḷiso mārassāti
analyzed: pariniṭṭhapetvā tiṭṭhati ayam vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu gilita baḷisaḥ mārassa ati

original: ayaṃ, bhikkhu, kilesamārassa baḷisabhūtaṃ rūpataṇhaṃ gilitvā ṭhitoti vuccati. Sesavāresupi
analyzed: ayam bhikkhu kilesa mārassa baḷisa bhūtam rūpa taṇham gilitvā ṭhitaḥ ti vuccati sesa vāresu pi

original: iminā nayena attho veditabbo. Abhedīti bhindi. Paribhedīti sabbabhāgena bhindi. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
analyzed: iminā nayena atthaḥ veditabbaḥ abhedi iti bhindi paribhedi iti sabba bhāgena bhindi sesam uttānam eva

original: 109. Ayaṃ loko santāpajātoti ayaṃ sattaloko jātasantāpo ñātibyasanādivasena uppannasokasantāpo
analyzed: ayam loko santāpa jāto ti ayam satta lokaḥ jāta santāpaḥ ñāti byasana ādi vasena uppanna soka santāpaḥ

original: ca rāgādivasena uppannapariḷāhasantāpo cāti attho. Phassaparetoti anekehi dukkhaphassehi
analyzed: ca rāga ādi vasena uppanna pariḷāha santāpaḥ ca ati attho phassa paretaḥ ti anekehi dukkha phassehi

original: abhibhūto. Rodaṃ vadati attatoti taṃ taṃ attanā phuṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ abhāvitakāyatāya
analyzed: abhibhūtaḥ rodam vadati tam tam attanā phuṭṭham dukkham a bhāvita kāya tāya

original: adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto “aho dukkhaṃ, īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ mayhaṃ sattunopi mā hotū”tiādinā
analyzed: adhivāsetum a sakkontaḥ aho dukkham īdisam dukkham mayham sattuno pi mā hotu uti ādinā

original: vilapanto vadati. Kasmā? Yena yena hi maññanti, tato taṃ hoti aññathā, yasmā ete
analyzed: vilapantaḥ vadati kasmai yena yena hi maññanti tato tam hoti aññathā yasmai ete

original: sattā yena yena pakārena attano dukkhassa paṭikāraṃ maññanti āsīsanti, taṃ dukkhaṃ
analyzed: sattāḥ yena yena pakārena attanaḥ dukkhassa paṭikāram maññanti āsīsanti tam dukkham

original: tato aññena pakārena tikicchitabbaṃ hoti. Yena vā pakārena attano vaḍḍhiṃ maññanti,
analyzed: tatas aññena pakārena tikicchitabbam hoti yena vā pakārena attanaḥ vaḍḍhim maññanti

original: tato aññathā avaḍḍhi eva pana hoti. Evaṃ aññathābhāvitaṃ icchāvighātaṃ eva pāpuṇāti.
analyzed: tatas aññathā eva pana hoti evam aññathā bhāvitam icchā vighātam eva pāpuṇāti

original: Ayaṃ bhavasatto kāmādibhavesu satto sattaloko, tathāpi bhavamevābhinandati, na tattha
analyzed: ayam kāma ādi bhavesu satto satta loko tathā api bhavam eva abhinandati na

original: nibbindati. Yadabhinandati taṃ bhayanti yaṃ kāmādibhavaṃ abhinandati, taṃ jarāmaraṇādianekabyasanānubandhattā
analyzed: nibbindati yat abhinandati tam bhayanti yam kāma ādi bhavam abhinandati tam jarā maraṇa ādi aneka byasana anubandhattā

original: ativiya bhayānakaṭṭhena bhayaṃ. Yassa bhāyatīti yato jarāmaraṇādito bhāyati, taṃ
analyzed: bhayāna kaṭṭhena bhayam yassa bhāyati iti yatas jarā maraṇa āditas bhāyati tam

original: dukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhadukkhatāya ca dukkhanti.
analyzed: dukkhassa adhiṭṭhāna bhāvataḥ dukkha dukkha tāya ca dukkhanti

original: Bhavavippahānāyāti bhavassa pajahanatthāya. Khoti avadhāraṇatthe nipāto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: bhava vippahānāya ati bhavassa pajahana tthāya kho ti avadhāraṇa atthe nipātaḥ idam vuttam

original: hoti – ekanteneva kāmādibhavassa samudayappahānena pahānatthaṃ idaṃ mayā adhigataṃ
analyzed: hoti ekantena iva kāma ādi bhavassa samudaya ppahānena pahāna attham idam mayā adhigatam

original: maggabrahmacariyaṃ vussatīti.
analyzed: magga brahmacariyam vussati iti

original: Evaṃ ariyassa maggassa ekaṃseneva niyyānikabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni aññamaggassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ
analyzed: evam ariyassa maggassa ekaṃsena iva niyyānika bhāvam dassetvā idāni añña maggassa niyyānika bhāvam

original: paṭikkhipanto “ye hi kecī”tiādimāha. Tattha bhavenāti rūpabhavena vā arūpabhavena
analyzed: paṭikkhipantaḥ ye hi keci iti ādim āha tattha bhavena ati rūpa bhavena vā arūpa bhavena

original: vā. Bhavassāti saṃsārassa. Vippamokkhanti bhavato vimuttiṃ, saṃsārasuddhinti attho.
analyzed: vā bhavassa ati saṃsārassa vippamokkham ti bhavataḥ vimuttim saṃsāra suddhim ti attho

original: Kiñcāpi te samaṇabrāhmaṇā tattha nibbānasaññino, bhavagāmikammena pana rūpārūpajjhānena,
analyzed: kiñca api te samaṇa brāhmaṇā tattha nibbāna saññinaḥ bhava gāmi kammena pana rūpa arūpa jjhānena

original: taṃnibbattena ca upapattibhavena bhavavisuddhiṃ vadantā bhavena bhavavippamokkhaṃ
analyzed: tad nibbattena ca upapatti bhavena bhava visuddhim vadantāḥ bhavena bhava vippamokkham

original: vadanti nāma. Tenāha – “sabbe te avippamuttā bhavasmāti vadāmī”ti. Atha vā bhavenāti
analyzed: vadanti nāma tena āha sabbe te a vippamuttāḥ bhavasma ati vadāmi iti atha vā bhavena ati

original: bhavadiṭṭhiyā, bhavati tiṭṭhati sassatanti hi pavattanato sassatadiṭṭhi “bhavadiṭṭhī”ti
analyzed: bhava diṭṭhiyā bhavati tiṭṭhati sassatanti hi pavattanato sassata diṭṭhi bhava diṭṭhi iti

original: vuccati. Bhavadiṭṭhi eva uttarapadalopena “bhavo”ti vuttā bhavataṇhātiādīsu viya.
analyzed: vuccati bhava diṭṭhi eva uttara pada lopena bhavaḥ ti vuttā bhava taṇhā tiādīsu viya

original: Bhavadiṭṭhivasena hi idhekacce bhavavisesaṃyeva bhavavippamokkhaṃ maññanti. Yathā
analyzed: bhava diṭṭhi vasena hi idha ekacce bhava visesaṃya iva bhava vippamokkham maññanti yathā

original: taṃ bako brahmā āha – “idaṃ niccaṃ, idaṃ dhuvaṃ, idaṃ sassataṃ, idaṃ avipariṇāmadhamma”nti.
analyzed: tam bakaḥ brahmā āha idam niccam idam dhuvam idam sassatam idam a vipariṇāma dhammanti

original: Vibhavenāti ucchedadiṭṭhiyā. Vibhavati vinassati ucchijjatīti hi pavattanato ucchedadiṭṭhi
analyzed: vibhavena ati uccheda diṭṭhiyā vibhavati vinassati ucchijjati iti hi pavattanato uccheda diṭṭhi

original: vuttanayena “vibhavo”ti vuccati. Bhavassa nissaraṇamāhaṃsūti saṃsārasuddhiṃ vadiṃsu.
analyzed: vutta nayena vibhavaḥ ti vuccati bhavassa nissaraṇam āhaṃsu iti saṃsāra suddhim vadiṃsu

original: Ucchedadiṭṭhivasena hi idhekacce saṃsārasuddhiṃ vadanti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
analyzed: uccheda diṭṭhi vasena hi idha ekacce saṃsāra suddhim vadanti tathā hi vuttam

original: “Yato kho, bho, ayaṃ attā rūpī cātumahābhūtiko…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati. Ettāvatā kho, bho, ayaṃ attā sammā samucchinno hotī”ti.
analyzed: yatas kho bho ayam attā rūpī cātumahābhūti kope na ivasaññānāsaññāyatanam upasampajja viharati ettāvatā kho bho ayam attā sammā samucchinnaḥ hoti iti

original: Anissaṭāti anikkhantā. Tattha kāraṇamāha – “upadhiñhi paṭicca dukkhamidaṃ sambhotī”ti.
analyzed: anissaṭā ti anikkhantā tattha kāraṇam āha upadhim hi paṭicca dukkham idam sambhoti iti

original: Tattha upadhinti khandhādiupadhiṃ. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yattha ime diṭṭhigatikā nibbānasaññino,
analyzed: tattha upadhim ti khandha ādi upadhim kim vuttam hoti yattha ime diṭṭhi gatikāḥ nibbāna saññino

original: tattha khandhūpadhikilesūpadhiabhisaṅkhārūpadhayo adhigatā ñātā. Kuto tassa dukkhanissaraṇatāti.
analyzed: tattha khandhu upadhi kilesu upadhi abhisaṅkhāra upadhayaḥ adhigatā ñātā kutas tassa dukkha nissaraṇa tā ti

original: Yaṃ pana paramatthato dukkhanissaraṇaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “sabbupādānakkhayā natthi dukkhassa sambhavo”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: yam pana paramatthataḥ dukkha nissaraṇam tam dassetum sabba upādāna kkhayā na atthi dukkhassa sambhavaḥ ti vuttam

original: Lokamimaṃ passāti bhagavā attano cittaṃ ālapati. Puthūti visuṃ visuṃ. Avijjāya paretanti
analyzed: lokam imam passāti bhagavā attano cittam ālapati puthu uti visum visum avijjāya paretanti

original: mohena abhibhūtaṃ. Bhūtanti khandhapañcakaṃ. Bhūtaratanti itthī purise, puriso itthiyāti
analyzed: mohena abhibhūtam bhūtanti khandha pañcakam bhūtaratanti itthī purise puriso itthiyā ati

original: evaṃ aññamaññaṃ sattesu rataṃ, tato eva bhavā aparimuttā. Ye hi keci bhavāti ittarakhaṇā
analyzed: evam aññamaññam sattesu ratam tatas eva bhavāḥ a parimuttāḥ ye hi keci

original: vā dīghāyukā vā sātavanto vā asātavanto vā bhavā. Sabbadhīti uddhaṃ adho tiriyanti
analyzed: vā dīgha āyukāḥ vā sātavantaḥ vā a sātavantaḥ vā bhava sabbadhi iti uddham adhas tiriyanti

original: sabbattha. Sabbatthatāyāti sabbabhāvena. Sabbe te bhavātiādīsu “sabbepi bhavā aniccā”tiādinā
analyzed: sabbattha sabbatthatāya ati sabba bhāvena sabbe te bhava atiādīsu sabbe api bhavāḥ anicca atiādinā

original: vipassanāsahitāya maggapaññāya aviparītaṃ passato bhavataṇhāpi pahīyati nirujjhati,
analyzed: vipassanā sahitāya magga paññāya aviparītam passataḥ bhava taṇhā api pahīyati nirujjhati

original: vibhavaṃ ucchedampi nābhinandati na pattheti, tassa sabba taṇhānaṃ anavasesato maggena
analyzed: vibhavam ucchedam pi na abhinandati na pattheti tassa sabba taṇhānam anavasesataḥ maggena

original: nirujjhanato nibbānaṃ nibbuti hoti. Tassa evaṃ nibbutassa bhikkhuno anupādā kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ
analyzed: nirujjhanataḥ nibbānam nibbuti hoti tassa evam nibbutassa bhikkhuno anupādā kilesa abhisaṅkhārānaṃ

original: anupādānato aggahaṇato punabbhavo na hoti. Evaṃbhūtena ca abhibhūto pañcavidhopi
analyzed: anupādānataḥ aggahaṇato punabbhavaḥ na hoti evaṃbhūtena ca abhibhūtaḥ pañcavidhaḥ api

original: māro vijito assa anena mārena saṅgāmo, sabbepi bhave samatikkanto iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu
analyzed: māraḥ vijitaḥ assa anena mārena saṅgāmaḥ sabbe pi bhave samatikkanto iṭṭha aniṭṭha ādīsu

original: tādilakkhaṇappattoti.
analyzed: tad ādi lakkhaṇa ppatto ti

original: Anusotagāmī andhaputhujjano paṭisotagāmī kalyāṇaputhujjano. Ṭhitatto sekkho. Itaro asekkho.
analyzed: anusota gāmī andha puthujjano paṭisota gāmī kalyāṇa puthujjano ṭhitattaḥ sekkhaḥ itaraḥ asekkho

original: 110. Abhijātikoti jātiyo. Kaṇhābhijātikoti kaṇhe nīce kule jāto. Kaṇhaṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyatīti
analyzed: abhijātikaḥ iti jātiyaḥ kaṇha abhijātikaḥ iti kaṇhe nīce kule jāto kaṇham dhammam abhijāyati iti

original: kāḷakaṃ dasavidhaṃ dussīladhammaṃ pasavati karoti, so taṃ abhijāyitvā niraye nibbattati.
analyzed: kāḷakam dasavidham dussīla dhammam pasavati karoti saḥ tam abhijāyitvā niraye nibbattati

original: Sukkaṃ dhammanti “ahaṃ pubbepi puññānaṃ akatattā nīce kule nibbatto, idāni puññaṃ
analyzed: sukkam dhammanti aham pubbe pi puññānaṃ a kata ttā nīce kule nibbattaḥ idāni puññam

original: karissāmī”ti puññasaṅkhātaṃ sukkaṃ paṇḍaraṃ dhammaṃ abhijāyati, so tena sagge nibbattati.
analyzed: karissāmi iti puñña saṅkhātam sukkam paṇḍaram dhammam abhijāyati saḥ tena sagge nibbattati

original: Akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ nibbānanti nibbānañhi sace kaṇhaṃ bhaveyya, kaṇhavipākaṃ dadeyya.
analyzed: a kaṇham a sukkam nibbānanti nibbānam hi sace kaṇham bhaveyya kaṇha vipākam dadeyya

original: Sukkaṃ, sukkavipākaṃ dadeyya. Dvinnampi appadānato pana “akaṇhaṃ asukka”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: sukkam sukka vipākam dadeyya dvinnam pi appadānato pana a kaṇham a sukkam ti vuttam

original: Nibbānanti cettha arahattaṃ adhippetaṃ. Tañhi kilesanibbānante jātattā nibbānaṃ nāma.
analyzed: nibbānan ti ca ittha arahattam adhippetam tat hi kilesa nibbāna ante jāta ttā nibbānam nāma

original: Taṃ esa abhijāyati pasavati karoti. Sukkābhijātikoti sukke ucce kule jāto. Sesaṃ
analyzed: tam esa abhijāyati pasavati karoti sukka abhijātikaḥ iti sukke ucce kule jātaḥ sesam

original: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. “Kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipāka”ntiādikassa kammacatukkassa attho heṭṭhā
analyzed: vutta nayena iva veditabbam kaṇham kaṇha vipākam ti ādikassa kamma catukkassa atthaḥ heṭṭhā

original: hārasampātavāre vibhatto eva.
analyzed: hāra sampāta vāre eva

original: 111. Mānusattanti manussabhāvaṃ, manussayoninti attho. Dveti kiccaṃ akiccameva cāti
analyzed: mānusattanti manussa bhāvam manussa yoninti atthaḥ dve iti kiccam akiccam eva ca ati

original: dve. Kiccāni tveva kattabbāni, na cākiccaṃ kiñci kattabbanti dasseti. Sukiccantiādi
analyzed: dve kiccāni tu eva kattabbāni na ca akiccam kiñci kattabbanti dasseti su kicca ntiādi

original: “kicca”nti vuttānaṃ tesaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ.
analyzed: kiccan ti vuttānam tesam sarūpa dassanam

original: Padhānānīti uttamāni visiṭṭhāni. Purimasmiṃ pabbajitesūti visaye bhummaṃ. Dutiye
analyzed: padhānāni iti uttamāni visiṭṭhāni purimasmin pabbajitesu iti visaye bhummam dutiye

original: adhikaraṇe. Tattha nibbānanti arahattaṃ adhippetaṃ. Kasmā panettha āmisapariccāgo
analyzed: adhikaraṇe tattha nibbānan ti arahattam adhippetam kasmā pana ittha āmisa pariccāgaḥ

original: arahattena samadhuro niddiṭṭhoti? Dakkhiṇeyyesu dakkhiṇāya mahapphalabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
analyzed: arahattena sa madhuraḥ niddiṭṭhaḥ ti dakkhiṇeyyesu dakkhiṇāya mahat phala bhāva dassana attham

original: Yena yena vā pana vatthunāti ucchedādivatthunā. Ajjhositāti bhavataṇhādivasena ajjhositā.
analyzed: yena yena vā pana vatthunā ati uccheda ādi vatthunā ajjhositā ati bhava taṇhā ādi vasena ajjhositā

original: Dutiye yena yena vā pana vatthunāti amarāvikkhepavatthuādinā.
analyzed: dutiye yena yena vā pana vatthunā ati amarā vikkhepa vatthu ādinā

original: Iminā asubhena kammavipākenāti asubhassa kāyaduccaritādikammassa vipākattā asubhena
analyzed: iminā asubhena kamma vipākena ati asubhassa kāya duccarita ādi kammassa vipāka ttā asubhena

original: asivena kammavipākena. Idaṃ bālalakkhaṇaṃ nibbattatīti purimasmiṃ bhave duccaritasamaṅgitāya
analyzed: asivena kamma vipākena idam bāla lakkhaṇam nibbattati iti purimasmim bhave duccarita samaṅgi tāya

original: bālo ayaṃ bhavatīti upalakkhaṇaṃ jāyati. Idaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttanti idaṃ evaṃ
analyzed: bālaḥ ayam bhavati iti upalakkhaṇam jāyati idam saṃkilesa bhāgiyam idam evam

original: pavattaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ nāma suttaṃ.
analyzed: pavattam saṃkilesabhāgiyam nāma suttam

original: Iminā subhenāti ettha vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Tattha mahāpurisalakkhaṇanti
analyzed: iminā subhena ati ettha vutta naya anusārena atthaḥ veditabbo tattha mahāpurisa lakkhaṇam ti

original: paṇḍitalakkhaṇaṃ. Kilesabhūmīhīti kilesaṭṭhānehi kilesāvatthāhi vā. Sānusayassa pariyuṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: paṇḍita lakkhaṇam kilesa bhūmīhi iti kilesa ṭṭhānehi kilesa avatthāhi vā sa anusayassa pariyuṭṭhānam

original: jāyatīti appahīnānusayassa paccayasamāyoge rāgādayo pariyuṭṭhānavasena pavattanti.
analyzed: jāyati iti appahīna anusayassa paccaya samāyoge rāga ādayo pariyuṭṭhāna vasena pavattanti

original: Pariyuṭṭhito saṃyujjatīti yo rāgādīhi pariyuṭṭhitacitto, so kāmarāgādīhi saṃyujjati
analyzed: pariyuṭṭhitaḥ saṃyujjati iti yaḥ rāga ādīhi pariyuṭṭhita cittaḥ saḥ kāma rāga ādīhi saṃyujjati

original: nāma. Saṃyujjanto upādiyatīti yo kāmarāgasaṃyojanādīhi saṃyutto, so kāmupādānādīni
analyzed: nāma saṃyujjantaḥ upādiyati iti yaḥ kāma rāga saṃyojana ādīhi saṃyuttaḥ saḥ kāma upādāna ādīni

original: akusalakammāni ca upādiyati. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
analyzed: akusala kammāni ca upādiyati sesam sabbattha uttānam eva

original: nibbindanto dukkhaparijānanādivasena saccāni paṭivijjhati. Esa maggo visuddhiyāti
analyzed: nibbindantaḥ dukkha parijānana ādi vasena saccāni paṭivijjhati esa maggo visuddhiyā ti

original: yvāyaṃ vuttanayena saccappaṭivedho, esa visuddhatthāya maggo. Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhāti
analyzed: yvā ayam vutta nayena sacca ppaṭivedhaḥ esa visuddha atthāya maggo sabbe saṅkhārāḥ dukkhā ti

original: sabbe saṅkhārā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena khayaṭṭhena ca dukkhāti. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.
analyzed: sabbe saṅkhārā abhiṇha sampaṭipīḷana ṭhena khaya ṭṭhena ca dukkhā ti sesam vutta nayam eva

original: Sabbe dhammā anattāti sabbepi tebhūmakadhammā parato tucchato suññato asārato avasavattanato
analyzed: sabbe dhammā anattā ati sabbe pi tebhūmaka dhammā paratas tucchataḥ suññataḥ asārataḥ a vasavattanato

original: ca anattāti. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
analyzed: ca anattā ati sesam purima sadisam eva

original: Seyyoti visiṭṭho uttamo. Sadisoti samāno. Hīnoti lāmako. Omānopi hi attano avaṅkaraṇamukhenapi
analyzed: seyyo ti visiṭṭhaḥ uttamaḥ sadiso ti samānaḥ hīnaḥ ti lāmakaḥ hi hi attanaḥ avaṅkaraṇa mukhena api

original: saṃpaggaṇhanavaseneva pavattati. Tena vuttaṃ “hīnohamasmī”ti. Kimaññatra yathābhūtassa
analyzed: saṃpaggaṇhana vasena iva pavattati tena vuttam hīnaḥ ham asmi iti kim aññatra yathābhūtassa

original: adassanāti sarasapabhaṅgutāya ekanteneva anavaṭṭhitasabhāvehi rūpadhammehi seyyādivasena
analyzed: a dassanā ati sarasa pabhaṅgu tāya ekantena iva anavaṭṭhita sabhāvehi rūpa dhammehi seyyā ādi vasena

original: attano ukkhipanassa tesaṃ yathābhūtaṃ adassanaṃ aññāṇaṃ vinā kiṃ aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ siyā,
analyzed: attanaḥ ukkhipanassa tesam yathābhūtam adassanam aññāṇam vinā kim aññam kāraṇam siyā

original: aññaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ tassa natthīti attho. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Vuttavipariyāyena
analyzed: aññam kiñci kāraṇam tassa natthi iti atthaḥ vedanā ādīsu pi esa eva nayaḥ vutta vipariyāyena

original: sukkapakkho veditabbo.
analyzed: sukkapakkhaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: 115. Ye ariyasaccāni vibhāvayantīti dukkhādīni ariyasaccāni paññāobhāsena saccappaṭicchādakakilesandhakāraṃ
analyzed: ye ariya saccāni vibhāvayanti iti dukkha ādīni ariya saccāni paññā obhāsena sacca ppaṭicchādaka kilesa andhakāram

original: vidhametvā attano pakāsāni pākaṭāni karonti. Gambhīrapaññenāti appameyyapaññatāya
analyzed: vidhametvā attanaḥ pakāsāni pākaṭāni karonti gambhīra paññena ati appameyya pañña tāya

original: sadevakassapi lokassa ñāṇena alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhapaññena sabbaññunāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: sa devakassa api lokassa ñāṇena alabbhaneyya patiṭṭha paññena sabbaññunā iti vuttam hoti

original: Sudesitānīti saṅkhepavitthārādīhi tehi tehi nayehi suṭṭhu desitāni. Kiñcāpi te honti
analyzed: su desitāni iti saṅkhepa vitthāra ādīhi tehi tehi nayehi suṭṭhu desitāni kiñcā api te honti

original: bhusaṃ pamattāti te vibhāvitaariyasaccā puggalā kāmaṃ devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: te vibhāvita ariya saccā puggalā kāmam deva rajja cakkavatti rajja ādi pamāda ṭṭhānam

original: āgamma bhusaṃ pamattā honti, tathāpi sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa
analyzed: āgamma bhusam pamattāḥ honti tathā api sotāpatti magga ñāṇena abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇassa

original: nirodhena ṭhapetvā satta bhave anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca,
analyzed: nirodhena ṭhapetvā satta bhave anamatagge saṃsāre ye uppajjeyyum nāmañca rūpañca

original: tesaṃ niruddhattā na aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ ādiyanti, sattamabhaveyeva pana vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā
analyzed: tesam niruddhattā na aṭṭhamam bhavam ādiyanti pana vipassanam ārabhitvā

original: arahattaṃ pāpuṇantīti attho.
analyzed: arahattam pāpuṇanti iti attho

original: Yathindakhīloti ettha yathāti upamāvacanaṃ. Indakhīloti nagaradvārathirakaraṇatthaṃ
analyzed: yathā inda khīlā iti ettha yathā ati upamā vacanam inda khīlā iti nagara dvāra thirakaraṇa ttham

original: ummārabbhantare aṭṭha vā dasa vā hatthe pathaviṃ khaṇitvā ākoṭitassa sāradārumayassa
analyzed: ummāra bbhantare aṭṭha vā dasa vā hatthe pathavim khaṇitvā ākoṭitassa sāra dāru mayassa

original: thambhassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Pathavissito siyāti gambhīranemitāya anto pavisitvā bhūminissito
analyzed: thambhassa itam adhivacanam patha vissitaḥ siyāti gambhīra nemitāya antar pavisitvā bhūmi nissitaḥ

original: siyā bhaveyya. Catubbhi vātehīti catūhi disāhi āgatavātehi. Asampakampiyoti kampetuṃ
analyzed: siyā bhaveyya catubbhi vātehi iti catūhi disāhi āgata vātehi kampetum

original: vā cāletuṃ vā asakkuṇeyyo. Tathūpamaṃ…pe… passatīti yo cattāri ariyasaccāni paññāya
analyzed: vā cāletum vā a sakkuṇeyyaḥ passati iti yaḥ cattāri ariya saccāni paññāya

original: ajjhogāhetvā passati, taṃ sappurisaṃ uttamapurisaṃ tathā dassanato sabbatitthiyavādavātehi
analyzed: ajjhogāhetvā passati tam sappurisam uttama purisam tathā dassanato sabba titthiya vāda vātehi

original: asampakampiyatāya tathūpamaṃ yathāvuttaindakhīlūpamaṃ vadāmīti attho.
analyzed: tathūpamam yathāvutta aindakhīlu upamam vadāmi iti

original: Sotāpattiyaṅgehīti ariyasotāpajjanassa aṅgabhūtehi. Ariyasāvakoti ariyassa buddhassa
analyzed: sotāpattiyaṅgehi iti ariya sotāpajjanassa aṅga bhūtehi ariya sāvakaḥ iti ariyassa buddhassa

original: bhagavato saddhammassavanante jātattā ariyasāvako. Khīṇanirayomhīti khīṇanirayo amhi.
analyzed: bhagavato saddhamma ssava nante jāta ttā ariya sāvako khīṇa nirayaḥ asmi iti khīṇa nirayaḥ amhi

original: Khīṇāpāyaduggativinipātoti idaṃ nirayādīnaṃyeva vevacanavasena vuttaṃ. Nirayādayo
analyzed: idam vevacana vasena vuttam niraya ādayaḥ

original: hi vaḍḍhisaṅkhātato ayato apetattā apāyā. Dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggatiyo.
analyzed: hi vaḍḍhi saṅkhātataḥ ayataḥ apeta ttā apāyāḥ dukkhassa gati paṭisaraṇanti duggatiyo

original: Dukkaṭakārino vivasā ettha nipatantīti vinipātā. Sotaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ādito patto adhigatoti
analyzed: dukkaṭa kārinaḥ vivasāḥ ettha nipatanti iti vinipātā sotam ariya maggaṃ āditas patto adhigato ti

original: sotāpanno. Akuppadhammatāya maggaphalānaṃ puthujjanabhāvasaṅkhāte virūpe na nipatanasabhāvoti
analyzed: sotāpannaḥ akuppa dhamma tāya magga phalānam puthujjana bhāva saṅkhāte virūpe na nipatana sabhāvaḥ ti

original: avinipātadhammo. Tato eva dhammaniyāmena niyatatāya niyato. Uparimaggattayasaṅkhātā
analyzed: avinipāta dhammo tatas eva dhamma niyāmena niyata tāya niyataḥ upari magga ttaya saṅkhātā

original: sambodhi avassaṃ pattabbatāya assa paraṃ ayanaṃ gati paṭisaraṇanti sambodhiparāyaṇo.
analyzed: sambodhi avassam pattabba tāya assa param ayanam gati paṭisaraṇanti sambodhi parāyaṇaḥ

original: Niviṭṭhātiādīni padāni aññamaññavevacanāneva. Sahadhammiyāti sabrahmacārino. Ariyakantehīti
analyzed: niviṭṭha ati ādīni padāni saha dhammiyā ati sabrahmacārinaḥ

original: ariyānaṃ kantehi piyehi manāpehi. Pañca sīlāni hi ariyasāvakānaṃ kantāni honti, bhavantarepi
analyzed: ariyānam kantehi piyehi manāpehi pañca sīlāni hi ariya sāvakānam kantāni honti bhavantare pi

original: avijahanato. Tāni sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbopi panettha saṃvaro labbhatiyeva. Sotāpannohamasmīti
analyzed: a vijahanataḥ tāni sandhāya itam vuttam sabbaḥ api pana ittha saṃvaraḥ labbhatiyā iva sotāpannaḥ ham asmi iti

original: idaṃ desanāsīsameva. Sakadāgāmiādayopi “sakadāgāmīhamasmī”tiādinā nayena byākarontiyeva.
analyzed: idam sakadāgāmi ādayaḥ api sakadāgāmī iham asmi iti ādinā nayena

original: Yato sabbesampi sikkhāpadāvirodhena yuttaṭṭhāne byākaraṇaṃ anuññātamevāti.
analyzed: yatas sabbesam pi sikkhāpada avirodhena yutta ṭṭhāne byākaraṇam anuññātam eva ati

original: Yassindriyānīti yassa ariyapuggalassa saddhādīni indriyāni. Subhāvitānīti ariyamaggabhāvanāvasena
analyzed: yassa indriyāni iti yassa ariya puggalassa saddhā ādīni indriyāni su bhāvitāni iti ariya magga bhāvanā vasena

original: suṭṭhu bhāvitāni. Ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā cāti orambhāgiyānaṃ uddhambhāgiyānañca saṃyojanānaṃ
analyzed: suṭṭhu bhāvitāni ajjhattam bahiddhā ca ati orambhāgiyānam uddhambhāgiyānam ca saṃyojanānam

original: pajahanavasena. Tenāha “sabbaloke”ti. Nibbijjhāti nibbijjhitvā paṭivijjhitvā.
analyzed: pajahana vasena tena āha sabba loke iti nibbijjha ati nibbijjhitvā paṭivijjhitvā

original: Dhammapadānīti dhammakoṭṭhāsāni. Anabhijjhā dhammapadaṃ nāma alobho vā alobhasīsena
analyzed: dhamma padāni iti dhamma koṭṭhāsāni anabhijjhā dhamma padam nāma alobhaḥ vā alobha sīsena

original: adhigatajhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānāni vā dasaasubhavasena vā adhigatajhānādīni
analyzed: adhigata jhāna vipassanā magga phala nibbānāni vā dasa asubha vasena vā adhigata jhāna ādīni

original: anabhijjhā dhammapadaṃ. Catubrahmavihāravasena adhigatāni abyāpādo dhammapadaṃ. Dasānussatiāhārepaṭikkūlasaññāvasena
analyzed: anabhijjhā dhamma padam catu brahmavihāra vasena adhigatāni a byāpādaḥ dhamma padam dasa anussati āhāre paṭikkūla saññā vasena

original: adhigatāni sammāsati dhammapadaṃ. Dasakasiṇaānāpānavasena adhigatāni sammāsamādhi dhammapadaṃ.
analyzed: adhigatāni sammā sati dhamma padam dasa kasiṇa ānāpāna vasena adhigatāni sammā samādhi dhamma padam

original: Pañca chindeti heṭṭhā apāyupapattisaṃvattanikāni pañca orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni pāde
analyzed: pañca chinda iti heṭṭhā apāyu papatti saṃvattanikāni pañca orambhāgiya saṃyojanāni pāde

original: baddharajjuṃ viya puriso satthena heṭṭhā maggattayena chindeyya. Pañca jaheti uparidevalokasampāpakāni
analyzed: baddha rajjum viya puriso satthena heṭṭhā magga ttayena chindeyya pañca jaheti upari deva loka sampāpakāni

original: pañca uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni puriso gīvāya baddharajjuṃ viya arahattamaggena jaheyya
analyzed: pañca uddhambhāgiya saṃyojanāni purisaḥ gīvāya baddha rajjum viya arahatta maggena jaheyya

original: chindeyyevāti attho. Pañca cuttari bhāvayeti uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānatthāya
analyzed: chindeyya eva ati pañca cuttari bhāvaya iti uddhambhāgiya saṃyojanānam pahāna tthāya

original: saddhādīni pañcindriyāni uttari bhāveyya. Pañca saṅgātigoti evaṃ sante pañcannaṃ
analyzed: saddhā ādīni pañca indriyāni uttari evam sante

original: rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhisaṅgānaṃ atikkamanena pañcasaṅgātigo hutvā bhikkhu “oghatiṇṇo”ti
analyzed: rāga dosa moha māna diṭṭhi saṅgānaṃ atikkamanena pañca saṅga atigaḥ hutvā bhikkhu ogha tiṇṇaḥ ti

original: vuccati, nittiṇṇacaturoghoti vuccatīti attho.
analyzed: vuccati nittiṇṇa catur oghaḥ ti vuccati iti attho

original: Anaññātaṃ appaṭividdhaṃ catusaccadhammaṃ, amatapadaṃyeva vā ñassāmi jānissāmīti paṭipannassa
analyzed: an aññātam appaṭividdham catu sacca dhammam amata padaṃ yā iva vā ñassāmi jānissāmi iti paṭipannassa

original: paṭhamamaggaṭṭhassa indriyanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ. Paṭhamamaggañāṇañhi taṃpubbabhāgavasena
analyzed: paṭhama magga ṭṭhassa indriyan ti anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam paṭhama magga ñāṇam hi tad pubbabhāga vasena

original: evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ājānāti paṭhamamaggena ñātamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānātīti añño, tassa
analyzed: evam vuttam ājānāti paṭhama maggena ñāta mariyādam an atikkamitvā jānāti iti aññaḥ tassa

original: indriyanti aññindriyaṃ, heṭṭhā tīsu phalesu, upari tīsu maggesu ca ñāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: indriyan ti aññindriyam heṭṭhā tīsu phalesu upari tīsu maggesu ca ñāṇassa etam adhivacanam

original: Aññātāvino catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitakiccassa arahato indriyanti aññātāvindriyaṃ, aggaphalañāṇassetaṃ
analyzed: aññātāvino catūsu saccesu niṭṭhita kiccassa arahataḥ indriyanti aññātāvindriyam agga phala ñāṇassa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Anabhisametassāti appaṭividdhassa. Abhisamayāyāti paṭivedhāya.
analyzed: adhivacanam an abhisametassa ati appaṭividdhassa abhisamayāya ati paṭivedhāya

original: 116. Bālalakkhaṇānīti bālassa upalakkhaṇakāraṇāni. Bālanimittānīti “bālo aya”nti
analyzed: bāla lakkhaṇāni iti bālassa upalakkhaṇa kāraṇāni bāla nimittāni iti bālaḥ

original: gahetuṃ nimittāni kāraṇāni. Bālāpadānānīti bālassa porāṇāni viruḷhāni kammāni. “Duccintitacintī”tiādīsu
analyzed: gahetum nimittāni kāraṇāni bāla apadānāni iti bālassa porāṇāni viruḷhāni kammāni duccintita cintī iti ādīsu

original: duccintitaṃ abhijjhaṃ byāpādaṃ micchādassanañca cintetīti duccintitacintī. Dubbhāsitaṃ
analyzed: duccintitam abhijjham byāpādam micchādassanam ca cinteti iti duccintita cintī dubbhāsitam

original: musāvādādiṃ bhāsatīti dubbhāsitabhāsī. Dukkaṭaṃ pāṇātipātādikammaṃ karotīti dukkaṭakammakārī.
analyzed: musāvāda ādim bhāsati iti dubbhāsita bhāsī dukkaṭam pāṇātipāta ādi kammam karoti iti dukkaṭa kamma kārī

original: Vuttavipariyāyena sukkapakkho veditabbo.
analyzed: vutta vipariyāyena sukkapakkhaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Bhiyyoti uparūpari. Pakujjheyyunti virujjheyyuṃ. “Pakuppeyyu”ntipi pāṭho. Bhusenāti
analyzed: bhiyyas iti upari upari pakujjheyyum ti virujjheyyum pakuppeyyum tipi pāṭhaḥ bhusena ati

original: daḷhena. Daṇḍenāti daṇḍadānena. Dhīroti paṇḍito sappaññajātiko. Nisedhayeti paṭibāheyya.
analyzed: daḷhena daṇḍena ati daṇḍa dānena dhīro iti paṇḍito sappañña jātikaḥ nisedhaya iti paṭibāheyya

original: Puna kiñci kātuṃ vattuṃ vā asamatthaṃ kareyyāti attho.
analyzed: puna kiñci kātum vattum vā asamattham kareyya attho

original: Paranti paccatthikaṃ. Yo sato upasammatīti yo satimā hutvā upasammati, tassa upasamaṃyevāhaṃ bālassa paṭisedhanaṃ maññāmīti attho.
analyzed: paranti paccatthikam yaḥ sataḥ upasammati iti yaḥ satimā hutvā upasammati tassa upasamaṃya iva aham bālassa paṭisedhanam maññāmi iti attho

original: Vajjanti dosaṃ. Yadā naṃ maññatīti yasmā naṃ maññati. Ajjhāruhatīti ajjhottharati.
analyzed: vajjanti dosam yadā nam maññati iti yasmai nam maññati ajjhāruhati iti ajjhottharati

original: Gova bhiyyo palāyinanti yathā goyūthe tāvadeva dve gāvo yujjhante gogaṇo olokento
analyzed: yathā go yūthe tāvat eva dve gāvaḥ yujjhante go gaṇaḥ olokentaḥ

original: tiṭṭhati yāva na eko palāyati, yadā pana palāyati, atha taṃ palāyīnaṃ sabbo gogaṇo
analyzed: tiṭṭhati yāva na ekaḥ palāyati yadā pana palāyati atha tam palāyīnam sabbaḥ go gaṇaḥ

original: bhiyyo ajjhottharati, evaṃ dummedho khamantaṃ bhiyyo ajjhottharatīti attho.
analyzed: bhiyyas ajjhottharati evam dummedhaḥ khamantam bhiyyas ajjhottharati iti attho

original: Sadatthaparamāti sakatthaparamā. Khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatīti tesu sakatthaparamesu
analyzed: sadattha paramā ati sa kattha paramā khantyāḥ bhiyyas na vijjati iti tesu sakattha paramesu

original: atthesu khantito uttaritaro añño attho na vijjati. Tamāhu paramaṃ khantinti yo balavā
analyzed: atthesu khantitaḥ uttaritaraḥ aññaḥ attho na vijjati tam āhu paramam khantin ti yaḥ balavā

original: titikkhati, tassa taṃ khantiṃ paramaṃ āhu. Bālabalaṃ nāma aññāṇabalaṃ. Taṃ yassa
analyzed: titikkhati tassa tam khantim paramam āhu bāla balam nāma aññāṇa balam tam yassa

original: balaṃ, abalameva taṃ, na taṃ balanti āhu kathenti dīpenti. Dhammaguttassāti dhammena
analyzed: balam abalam eva tam na tam balanti āhu kathenti dīpenti dhamma guttassa ati dhammena

original: rakkhitassa dhammaṃ vā rakkhantassa. Paṭivattāti paṭippharitvā vattā, paṭipparitvā
analyzed: rakkhitassa dhammam vā rakkhantassa paṭivattā ati paṭippharitvā vattā paṭipparitvā

original: vā yaṃ vā taṃ vā vadeyyāsi. Dhammaṭṭhaṃ pana cāletuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Tasseva
analyzed: vā yam vā tam vā vadeyyāsi dhammaṭṭham pana cāletum samatthaḥ nāma na atthi tassa iva

original: tena pāpiyoti tena kodhena tasseva puggalassa pāpaṃ hoti. Katarassāti? Yo kuddhaṃ
analyzed: tena pāpiyaḥ ti tena kodhena tassa iva puggalassa pāpam hoti katarassa ati yaḥ kuddham

original: paṭikujjhati, tassa. Tattha kuddhanti sampadāne upayogavacanaṃ, kuddhassāti attho.
analyzed: paṭikujjhati tassa tattha kuddhanti sampadāne upayoga vacanam kuddhassa ati atthaḥ

original: Tikicchantānanti ekavacane bahuvacanaṃ, tikicchantanti attho. Janā maññantīti evarūpaṃ
analyzed: tikicchantānam ti ekavacane bahuvacanam tikicchantanti atthaḥ janāḥ maññanti iti evarūpam

original: attano ca parassa cāti ubhinnaṃ atthaṃ tikicchantaṃ nipphādentaṃ puggalaṃ “bālo aya”nti
analyzed: attanaḥ ca parassa ca ati ubhinnam attham tikicchantam nipphādentam puggalam bālaḥ ayanti

original: andhabālaputhujjanā evaṃ maññanti. Ye dhammassa akovidāti ye catusaccadhamme akovidā
analyzed: andha bāla puthujjanāḥ evam maññanti ye dhammassa akovidā ati ye catu sacca dhamme akovidā

original: acchekā, te evaṃ maññantīti attho.
analyzed: acchekā te evam maññanti iti attho

original: 117. Pattanti adhigataṃ etarahi anubhuyyamānaṃ kāmūpakaraṇaṃ pattabbanti tadeva anāgate
analyzed: pattanti adhigatam etarahi anubhuyyamānam kāma upakaraṇam pattabbanti tat eva anāgate

analyzed: adhigantabbam anubhavitabbam ubhayam etam tat ubhayam pi rāga raja ādīhi

original: avakiṇṇaṃ. Āturassāti rāgādikilesāturassa. Anusikkhatoti kilesabahulapuggale anusikkhato.
analyzed: avakiṇṇam āturassa ati rāga ādi kilesa āturassa anusikkhato ti kilesa bahula puggale anusikkhato

original: Ye ca sikkhāsārāti ye yathāsamādinnaṃ sīlavatādisaṅkhātaṃ sikkhaṃ sārato gahetvā
analyzed: ye ca sikkhā sārā ti ye yathā samādinnam sīlavata ādi saṅkhātam sikkham sārataḥ gahetvā

original: ṭhitā. Tenāha – “sīlaṃ vataṃ jīvitaṃ brahmacariya”nti. Tattha yaṃ “na karomī”ti oramati,
analyzed: ṭhitā tena āha sīlam jīvitam tattha yam na karomi iti oramati

original: taṃ sīlaṃ. Yaṃ vesabhojanakiccacaraṇādi, taṃ vataṃ. Jīvitanti ājīvo. Brahmacariyanti
analyzed: tam sīlam yam vesa bhojana kicca caraṇa ādi tam ājīvaḥ

original: methunavirati. Upaṭṭhānasārāti etesaṃ sīlādīnaṃ anuṭṭhānasārā. Etehi eva saṃsārasuddhīti
analyzed: methuna virati upaṭṭhāna sārā ati etesam sīla ādīnam anuṭṭhāna sārā etehi eva saṃsāra suddhi iti

original: tāni sārato gahetvā ṭhitāti attho.
analyzed: tāni sārataḥ gahetvā ṭhitā ati attho

original: Iccete ubho antāti iti sīlabbataparāmāsamukhena attakilamathānuyogo, kāmesu anavajjasaññitāmukhena
analyzed: iti sīlabbata parāmāsa mukhena atta kilamatha anuyogaḥ kāmesu anavajja saññi tā mukhena

analyzed: kāma sukhallikā anuyogaḥ ca ati ete ubho antā te ca kho yathākkamam āyatim pattabbe etarahi

original: patte ca rāgarajādiokiṇṇe kāmaguṇe allīnehi kilesāturānaṃ anusikkhantehi, sayañca
analyzed: patte ca kāma guṇe anusikkhantehi sayam ca

original: kilesātureheva paṭipajjitabbā, tato eva ca te kaṭasivaḍḍhanā aparāparaṃ jarāmaraṇehi
analyzed: kilesa āturehi iva paṭipajjitabbā tatas eva ca te apara aparam jarā maraṇehi

original: sivathikāya vaḍḍhanasīlā ekanteneva kaṭasiṃ vaḍḍhenti, sayaṃ vaḍḍhantā pare ca antadvaye
analyzed: sivathikāya vaḍḍhana sīlāḥ ekantena iva kaṭasim vaḍḍhenti sayam pare ca anta dvaye

original: samādapentā vaḍḍhāpenti cāti attho.
analyzed: samādapentā vaḍḍhāpenti ca ati attho

original: Ubho ante anabhiññāyāti yathāvutte ubho ante ajānitvā. Olīyanti eketi “sassato attā
analyzed: ubho ante an abhiññāya ati yathā vutte ubho ante a jānitvā olīyanti eke iti sassataḥ attā

original: ca loko cā”ti olīyanataṇhābhinivesavasena avalīyanti ekacce. Atidhāvanti eketi ekacce
analyzed: ca ca ati olīyana taṇhā abhinivesa vasena avalīyanti ekacce atidhāvanti eke iti ekacce

original: – “ucchijjati vinassati attā ca loko cā”ti atidhāvanābhinivesavasena atikkamanti.
analyzed: ucchijjati vinassati attā ca loko ca ati atidhāvana abhinivesa vasena atikkamanti

original: Na amaññiṃsu tesañca taṇhādimaññanānaṃ pahīnattā. Tato eva anupādāparinibbānato tividhampi vaṭṭaṃ tesaṃ paññāpanāya natthīti.
analyzed: na amaññiṃsu tesam ca taṇhā ādi maññanānam pahīna ttā tatas eva anupādā parinibbānataḥ tividham pi vaṭṭam tesam paññāpanāya natthi iti

original: Jaññāti jāneyya. Saṃyujeti saṃyojeyya. Mānusanti manussānaṃ idanti mānusaṃ, manussabhavapariyāpannaṃ.
analyzed: jaññā ati jāneyya saṃyujā iti saṃyojeyya mānusanti manussānam idam iti mānusam manussa bhava pariyāpannam

original: Kiñhi tassa sakaṃ hotīti tassa maccumukhaṃ pavisantassa sattassa kiṃ aññaṃ sakaṃ
analyzed: kim hi tassa sakam hoti iti tassa maccu mukham pavisantassa sattassa kim aññam sakam

original: nāma aññatra kalyāṇakammato. Kammassakā hi sattā. Tenāha – “tasmā kareyya kalyāṇa”ntiādi.
analyzed: nāma aññatra kalyāṇa kammataḥ kammassakā hi sattā tena āha tasmā kareyya kalyāṇa ntiādi

original: Tattha samparāyikanti samparāyaphalanibbattakaṃ.
analyzed: tattha samparāyikam ti samparāya phala nibbattakam

original: 118. Ime dhammāti ime kusalā vā akusalā vā dhammā. Evaṃgahitāti evaṃ samādinnā uppāditā.
analyzed: ime dhammā ti ime kusalāḥ vā akusalāḥ vā dhammāḥ evaṃgahitā ati evam samādinnā uppāditā

original: Idaṃ phalanti idaṃ iṭṭhavipākaṃ aniṭṭhavipākañca phalaṃ. Ayamatthoti ayaṃ vuḍḍhi,
analyzed: idam phalanti idam iṭṭha vipākam aniṭṭha vipākam ca phalam ayam attho ti ayam vuḍḍhi

original: ayaṃ hānīti attho. Aññampi evaṃjātiyanti ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyaṃ vadati.
analyzed: ayam hāni iti atthaḥ aññam pi evaṃjātiyam ti ekaṃsa byākaraṇīyam vadati

original: Ākaṅkhato na jāneyyunti tattha yena hetunā bhagavato yā ākaṅkhā, sā aññesaṃ avisayoti āha – “kintaṃ bhagavā ākaṅkhatīti. Idaṃ avisajjanīya”nti.
analyzed: ākaṅkhataḥ na jāneyyunti tattha yena hetunā bhagavataḥ yā ākaṅkhā sā aññesam a visayo ti āha kintam bhagavā ākaṅkhati iti idam a visajjanīya nti

original: Ettakoti etaparimāṇo. Sīlakkhandheti sīlakkhandhahetu. “Sīlakkhandhenā”tipi pāṭho.
analyzed: ettakaḥ iti eta parimāṇaḥ sīla kkhandha iti sīla kkhandha hetu sīla kkhandhena ati pi pāṭhaḥ

original: Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Iriyāyanti kāyavacīsamācāre. Pabhāveti ānubhāve. Hitesitāyanti
analyzed: sesa pade supi esa iva nayoḥ iriyāyanti kāya vacī samācāre ānubhāve

original: mettāya. Iddhiyanti iddhividhāya. Ettakā buddhaguṇā, te ca paccekaṃ evaṃpabhāvā.
analyzed: mettāya iddhiyanti iddhi vidhāya ettakāḥ buddha guṇā te ca paccekam evaṃpabhāvā

original: Tathā maggaphalanibbānāni evamānubhāvāni. Ariyasaṅgho evaṃvidhaguṇehi yuttoti.
analyzed: tathā magga phala nibbānāni evam ānubhāvāni ariya saṅghaḥ evaṃvidha guṇehi yuttaḥ ti

original: Tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ mahānubhāvatā na sabbathā aññesaṃ visayo, bhagavato eva visayoti
analyzed: tiṇṇam ratanānam mahā anubhāva tā na sabbathā aññesam visayaḥ bhagavataḥ eva visayo ti

original: āha – “buddhavisayo avisajjanīyo”ti. Tena yo aññopi attho buddhavisayo, so avisajjanīyoti
analyzed: āha buddha visayaḥ avisajjanīyaḥ ti tena yaḥ aññaḥ api atthaḥ buddha visayaḥ saḥ avisajjanīyaḥ ti

original: dasseti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “buddhavisayo acinteyyo na cintetabbo, yaṃ cintento
analyzed: dasseti vuttam ha etam bhagavatā buddha visayaḥ acinteyyaḥ na cintetabbaḥ yam cintentaḥ

original: ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti. Katamā pubbā koṭīti avisajjanīyanti “katamā pubbā
analyzed: ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assa ati katamā pubbā koṭī iti a visajjanīyanti katamā pubbā

original: koṭī”ti kenaci kataṃ pucchanaṃ avisajjanīyaṃ. Kasmā? Saṃsārassa purimāya koṭiyā abhāvato.
analyzed: koṭi iti kenaci katam pucchanam a visajjanīyam kasmā saṃsārassa purimāya koṭiyāḥ abhāvato

original: Tenevāha – “purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyatī”ti. Tattha na paññāyatīti na dissati,
analyzed: tena iva āha purimā bhikkhave koṭi na paññāyati iti tattha na paññāyati iti na dissati

original: na upalabbhatīti attho. Na paññāyatīti aññassa ñāṇavisayo na hotīti pana atthaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: na upalabbhati iti atthaḥ na paññāyati iti aññassa ñāṇa visayaḥ na hoti iti pana attham sandhāya

original: “na paññāyatīti sāvakānaṃ ñāṇavekallenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha attūpanāyikāti attā
analyzed: na paññāyati iti sāvakānam ñāṇa vekallena atiādi vuttam tattha attūpanāyikā ati attā

original: upanetabbo etissāti attūpanāyikā. Natthi buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanāti etena
analyzed: upanetabbaḥ etissa ati attūpanāyikā natthi buddhānam bhagavantānam a vijānanā ati etena

original: purimāya koṭiyā abhāvato eva na paññāyati, na tattha ñāṇassa paṭighātoti dasseti.
analyzed: purimāya koṭiyāḥ abhāvato eva na paññāyati na tattha ñāṇassa paṭighāto ti dasseti

original: Yaṃ pana atthi, taṃ aññesaṃ appameyyampi bhagavato na appameyyanti bhagavato sabbattha
analyzed: yam pana atthi tam aññesam appameyyam pi bhagavataḥ na appameyyanti bhagavataḥ sabbattha

original: appaṭihataññāṇataṃ dassetuṃ “yathā bhagavā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbhā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: appaṭihata ññāṇa tam dassetum yathā bhagavā kokālikam bhikkhum ārabbha iti ādim āha

original: Tattha aññataraṃ bhikkhunti nāmagottena apākaṭaṃ. “Kīva dīghaṃ nu kho, bhante, padume
analyzed: tattha aññataram bhikkhunti nāma gottena apākaṭam kīva dīgham nu kho bhante padume

analyzed: niraye āyu pamāṇam ti pañham pucchitvā nisinnam ekam bhikkhum evam āha ati ettha ayam

analyzed: ettakāni vassāni iti vā ettakāni vassa satāni iti vā ettakāni vassa sahassāni iti vā

analyzed: bhagavā avoca seyyathā api bhikkhu vīsatikhārikaḥ kosalakaḥ tilavāho tatas puriso

analyzed: bhikkhu vīsatikhārikaḥ kosalakaḥ tilavāhaḥ iminā upakkamena parikkhayam pariyādānam

original: gaccheyya, na tveva eko abbudo nirayo. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati abbudā nirayā,
analyzed: gaccheyya na tu eva ekaḥ abbudaḥ nirayaḥ seyyathā api bhikkhu vīsati abbudāḥ nirayā

original: evameko nirabbudo nirayotiādi.
analyzed: evam ekaḥ nirabbudaḥ

original: Tattha vīsatikhārikoti māgadhakena patthena cattāro patthā kosalaraṭṭhe eko pattho
analyzed: tattha vīsatikhāriko ti māgadhakena patthena cattāro patthā kosala raṭṭhe ekaḥ pattho

original: hoti. Tena patthena cattāro patthā āḷhakaṃ, cattāri āḷhakāni doṇaṃ, catudoṇā mānikā,
analyzed: hoti tena patthena cattāro patthāḥ āḷhakam cattāri āḷhakāni doṇam catu doṇā mānikā

original: catumānikā khārī. Tāya khāriyā vīsatikhāriko tilavāho. Tilavāhoti tilasakaṭaṃ. Abbudo
analyzed: catu mānikā khārī tāya khāriyā vīsati khārikaḥ tila vāhaḥ tila vāhaḥ iti tila sakaṭam abbudaḥ

analyzed: abbudaḥ nirayaḥ iti vuttaḥ esa nayaḥ nirabbuda ādīsu pi

original: Tattha vassagaṇanāpi evaṃ veditabbā – yathā hi sataṃsatasahassāni koṭi hoti. Evaṃ
analyzed: tattha vassa gaṇanā api evam veditabbā yathā hi sataṃsatasahassāni hoti evam

original: sataṃsatasahassakoṭiyo pakoṭi nāma. Sataṃsatasahassapakoṭiyo koṭipakoṭi nāma. Sataṃsatasahassakoṭipakoṭiyo
analyzed: pakoṭi nāma sataṃsata sahassa pakoṭiyo koṭi pakoṭi nāma sataṃsata sahassa koṭi pakoṭiyo

analyzed: nahutam sataṃsata sahassa nahutāni ninnahutam sataṃsata sahassāni ninnahutāni ekaḥ

analyzed: abbudaḥ tatas vīsati guṇaḥ nirabbudaḥ esa nayaḥ sabbattha ayam ca gaṇanā

original: dukkarāti vuttaṃ – “taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātu”nti. Keci pana “tattha tattha paridevanānattena
analyzed: dukkarā iti vuttam tam na sukaram saṅkhātunti keci pana tattha tattha paridevanā nattena

original: kammakāraṇanānattenapi imāni nāmāni laddhānī”ti vadanti. Apare “sītanarakā ete”ti.
analyzed: imāni nāmāni laddhāni iti vadanti apare sīta narakāḥ ete iti

original: Cittaṃ āghātetvāti cittaṃ padūsetvā.
analyzed: cittam āghātetvā ati cittam padūsetvā

original: 119. Kathaṃ jinoti pakārapucchā. Kena jinoti kāraṇapucchā. Kena kāraṇena kena hetunā
analyzed: katham jinoti pakāra pucchā kena jinoti kāraṇa pucchā kena kāraṇena kena hetunā

original: kāya paṭipattiyā jinoti pucchati. Kathanti pana kena pakārena kiṃ atītānaṃ, udāhu
analyzed: kāya paṭipattiyā jinoti pucchati kathanti pana kena pakārena kim udāhu

original: anāgatānaṃ paccuppannānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānena jinoti pucchati, tasmā taṃ “visajjanīya”nti
analyzed: anāgatānam paccuppannānam kilesānam pahānena jinoti pucchati tasmai tam visajjanīyanti

original: vuttaṃ. Katamo jinoti kiṃ rūpaṃ jino, udāhu vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ jino.
analyzed: vuttam katamaḥ jinaḥ ti kim rūpam jinaḥ udāhu vedanā saññā saṅkhārāḥ viññāṇam jinaḥ

original: Rūpādivinimutto vā añño jino, yo “attā”ti vuccatīti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha “avisajjanīya”nti.
analyzed: rūpa ādi vinimuttaḥ vā aññaḥ jinaḥ yaḥ attā iti vuccati iti imam attham sandhāya āha avisajjanīyam ti

original: Kittakoti pamāṇato kiṃparimāṇo.
analyzed: kittakaḥ ti pamāṇataḥ kiṃparimāṇaḥ

original: Atthi tathāgatoti atthi satto. Yvāyamāyasmā “evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto”ti pañcakkhandhe
analyzed: atthi tathāgato ti atthi sattaḥ yvā ayam āyasmai evaṃnāmaḥ evaṃgotto ti pañca kkhandhe

original: upādāya paññapīyati, tassa puggalassa adhippetattā vuttaṃ “visajjanīya”nti. Rūpaṃ
analyzed: upādāya paññapīyati tassa puggalassa adhippeta ttā vuttam visajjanīyanti rūpam

original: tathāgatoti rūpaṃ attāti sakkāyadiṭṭhivasena pucchatīti katvā vuttaṃ “avisajjanīya”nti.
analyzed: tathāgataḥ ti rūpam attā iti sakkāya diṭṭhi vasena pucchati iti katvā vuttam a visajjanīya nti

original: Iminā nayena sabbapadesu attho veditabbo.
analyzed: iminā nayena sabba padesu atthaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: 120. Bālaṃ pīṭhasamāruḷhantiādīni sāmiatthe upayogavacanāni. Kāyena duccaritānīti
analyzed: bālam pīṭha samāruḷhanti ādīni sāmi atthe upayoga vacanāni kāyena duccaritāni iti

original: kāyena duṭṭhu katāni. Olabbhantīti avalambanti avatthariyanti. Sesapadadvayaṃ tasseva
analyzed: kāyena duṭṭhu katāni olabbhanti iti avalambanti avatthariyanti sesa pada dvayam tassa iva

original: vevacanaṃ. Olambanādiākārena hi tāni upaṭṭhahanti, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Mahatanti mahantānaṃ.
analyzed: vevacanam olambana ādi ākārena hi tāni upaṭṭhahanti tasmai evam vuttam mahatanti mahantānam

original: Pathaviyaṃ olambantīti pathavitale pattharanti. Sesapadadvayaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ.
analyzed: pathaviyam olambanti iti pathavi tale pattharanti sesa pada dvayam tassa iva vevacanam

original: Pattharaṇākāroyeva hesa. Tatra, bhikkhave, bālassāti tasmiṃ upaṭṭhahanākāre bālassa evaṃ hoti.
analyzed: pattharaṇa ākāraḥ yā iva ha isa tatra bhikkhave bālassa ati tasmin upaṭṭhahana ākāre bālassa evam hoti

original: Lābhā vo, bhikkhaveti bhikkhave, ye ime tumhehi paṭiladdhā manussattasaddhāpaṭilābhādayo,
analyzed: lābhāḥ vaḥ bhikkhave ti bhikkhave ye ime tumhehi paṭiladdhāḥ manussatta saddhā paṭilābha ādayaḥ

original: lābhā vo tumhākaṃ lābhā eva. Suladdhanti yampidaṃ pabbajitvā catupārisuddhisīlādisampādanaṃ
analyzed: lābhāḥ vaḥ tumhākam lābhāḥ eva su laddhanti yat pi idam pabbajitvā catu pārisuddhi sīla ādi sampādanam

original: laddhaṃ, tampi suladdhaṃ. Khaṇo vo paṭiladdhoti aṭṭhaakkhaṇavajjito navamoyaṃ khaṇo
analyzed: laddham tam pi su laddham khaṇaḥ vaḥ paṭiladdhaḥ ti aṭṭha akkhaṇa vajjito navamaḥ yam khaṇaḥ

original: paṭiladdho maggabrahmacariyavāsāya. “Diṭṭhā mayā”tiādinā ekadesanidassanena aṭṭha akkhaṇe vibhāveti.
analyzed: paṭiladdhaḥ magga brahmacariya vāsāya diṭṭhā mayā ati ādinā eka desa nidassanena aṭṭha akkhaṇe vibhāveti

original: 121. Yahiṃ yahinti yaṃ yaṃ duggatiṃ yo gacchati. So naṃ adhammoti yo adhammo tena carito, so naṃ adhammacāriṃ puggalaṃ. Hanātīti bādhati.
analyzed: yahim yahinti yam yam duggatim yaḥ gacchati saḥ nam adhammaḥ iti yaḥ adhammaḥ tena caritaḥ saḥ nam adhamma cārim puggalam hanāti iti bādhati

original: Appesakkhatāti appānubhāvatā. Dubbaṇṇatāti virūpatā bībhacchatā. Duppaññatāti nippaññatā ahetukapaṭisandhivasena eḷamūgatā.
analyzed: appesakkha tā ati appa anubhāva tā dubbaṇṇa tā ati virūpa tā bībhaccha tā duppañña tā ati nippañña tā ahetuka paṭisandhi vasena eḷamūga tā

original: 122. Vācānurakkhīti catunnaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ parivajjanena vācānurakkhī. Abhijjhādīnaṃ
analyzed: vācā anurakkhī iti catunnam vacīduccaritānam parivajjanena vācā anurakkhī abhijjhā ādīnam

original: anuppādanena manasā suṭṭhu saṃvuto. Pāṇātipātādayo pajahanto kāyena ca akusalaṃ na
analyzed: an uppādanena manasā suṭṭhu saṃvutaḥ pāṇa atipāta ādayo pajahanto kāyena ca akusalam na

original: kayirā, ete tayo kammapathe visodhaye. Evaṃ visodhento hi sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esakehi
analyzed: kayirāḥ ete tayo kamma pathe visodhaye evam visodhentaḥ hi sīla kkhandha ādīnam esakehi

original: buddhādīhi isīhi paveditaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ ārādheyyāti. Dukkaṭanti kāyena

original: vācāya manasā ca dukkaṭaṃ sāvajjaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ duggatisaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ yassa
analyzed: vācāya manasā ca dukkaṭam sāvajjam dukkhudrayam duggati saṃvattaniyam kammam yassa

original: natthi. Saṃvutaṃ tīhi ṭhānehīti etehi tīhi kāraṇehi kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ pavesanivāraṇato

original: pihitaṃ, taṃ ahaṃ “brāhmaṇa”nti vadāmīti.
analyzed: pihitam tam aham vadāmi iti

original: Accantadussīlyanti ekantadussīlabhāvo. Gihī vāpi jātito paṭṭhāya dasa akusalakammapathe
analyzed: ekanta dussīla bhāvaḥ gihī vā api jātitaḥ paṭṭhāya dasa akusala kamma pathe

analyzed: karontaḥ pabbajitaḥ vā api upasampanna divasataḥ paṭṭhāya garuka āpattim āpajjamānaḥ accanta dussīlo

analyzed: nāma idha pana yaḥ dvīsu tīsu atta bhāvesu dussīlo tassa gatiyā āgatam dussīla bhāvam

original: sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Dussīlabhāvoti cettha dussīlassa cha dvārāni nissāya uppannā

original: taṇhā veditabbā. Māluvā sālamivotthatanti yassa puggalassa taṃ taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ.

original: Yathā nāma māluvā sālaṃ otthataṃ deve vassante pattehi udakaṃ paṭicchitvā saṃbhañjanavasena

analyzed: karoti nāma ati attho

original: kantati viddhaṃsetīti.
analyzed: kantati vid haṃseti iti

original: Niseviyāti katvā. Garahāti gārayhā. Bālamatīti mandabuddhino. Khayā ca kammassāti

original: kammakkhayakarañāṇena kammassa khepanato. Vimuttacetasoti samucchedavimuttiyā paṭippassaddhivimuttiyā

original: ca vimuttacitto. Nibbanti te jotirivindhanakkhayāti yathā nāma anupādāno jātavedo
analyzed: ca vimutta cittaḥ nibbanti te jotirivindhana kkhayā ti yathā nāma anupādānaḥ jātavedaḥ

original: nibbāyati, evamevaṃ abhisaṅkhārassa viññāṇassa anavasesakkhayā nibbāyati.
analyzed: nibbāyati evam evam abhisaṅkhārassa viññāṇassa anavasesa kkhayā nibbāyati

original: 123. “Yathāpi bhamaro”ti gāthāyaṃ bhamaroti yā kāci madhukarajāti. Pupphanti pupphārāme
analyzed: yathā api bhamaroti gāthā ayam bhamaroti yā kāci madhukara jāti pupphanti puppha ārāme

original: caranto pupphañca tassa vaṇṇañca gandhañca aheṭhayaṃ aheṭhayanto avināsento caratīti
analyzed: carantaḥ pupphañca tassa vaṇṇañca gandhañca aheṭhayam a heṭhayantaḥ a vināsento carati iti

original: attho. Evaṃ caritvā ca paleti rasamādāyāti yāvadatthaṃ rasaṃ pivitvā aparampi madhukaraṇatthāya
analyzed: evam caritvā ca palā iti rasam ādāya ati yāvadattham rasam pivitvā aparam pi madhukaraṇa tthāya

original: rasaṃ gahetvā ḍeti. So ekaṃ vanagahanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā rukkhasusirādīsu taṃ rajamissakaṃ
analyzed: rasam gahetvā ḍeti saḥ ekam vana gahanam ajjhogāhetvā rukkha susira ādīsu tam rajamissakam

analyzed: puppham vā tassa vaṇṇaḥ vā gandho vā vinassati atha kho puppham pākatikam eva hoti

original: Evaṃ gāme munī careti evaṃ sekkho asekkho vā anagāriyamuni kulapaṭipāṭiyā gāme bhikkhaṃ

original: Ayamassa bhamarena madhukarena sarikkhatā. Khīṇāsavo panettha adhippetoti.

original: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatīti yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi

original: Ācāragocarasampannoti ācārena ca gocarena ca sampanno. Aṇumattesūti appamattakesu.

original: Vajjesūti akusaladhammesu. Bhayadassāvīti bhayaṃ dassī. Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti

original: Kāyakammavacīkammena samannāgato, kusalena parisuddhājīvoti ettha ācāragocaraggahaṇeneva

analyzed: kāya vacī kammena samannāgataḥ kusalena ati vuttam yasmā pana tena samannāgataḥ tasmā

analyzed: catūsu iriyāpathesu aṭṭha ārambha vatthu vasena ekakaḥ hoti tassa kāyikam vīriyam āraddham

analyzed: uppanna kilesam uppanna ṭṭhāne yeva niggaṇhitvā jhānam nibbatteti tassa cetasikam vīriyam

analyzed: āraddham nāma hoti evam āraddha vīriyaḥ thāma vāti ṭhitimā daḷha parakkamo ti thira parakkamo

original: Anikkhittadhuro…pe… sacchikiriyāyāti saṃkilesadhammānaṃ pahānatthaṃ vodānadhammānaṃ

analyzed: udayattha gāmi niyāti

original: Natthi puttasamaṃ pemanti mātāpitaro virūpepi attano puttake suvaṇṇabimbakaṃ viya

original: samaṃ pemaṃ nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Gosamitanti gohi samaṃ godhanasadisaṃ aññaṃ

original: aññaṃ udakaṃ nidānaṃ nāma natthi bhagavāti vadati.
analyzed: aññam udakam nidānam nāma na atthi bhagavā iti vadati

original: Yasmā pana attapemena samaṃ pemaṃ natthi. Mātāpitaro hi chaḍḍetvāpi puttadhītaro
analyzed: yasmai pana atta pemena samam pemam natthi mātā pitaraḥ hi chaḍḍetvā api putta dhītaro

analyzed: a posetvā attānam eva posenti dhaññena ca samam dhanam nāma na atthi tathārūpe hi kāle

analyzed: hirañña suvaṇṇa ādīni pi go mahiṃsa ādīni pi dhañña ggahaṇa attham dhañña sāmikānam eva santikam

original: gahetvā gacchanti. Paññāya ca samā ābhā nāma natthi. Sūriyādayo hi ekadesaṃyeva obhāsenti,
analyzed: gahetvā gacchanti paññāya ca samā ābhā nāma natthi sūriya ādayaḥ hi eka desam yā iva obhāsenti

original: paccuppannameva ca tamaṃ vinodenti, paññā pana dasasahassimpi lokadhātuṃ ekapajjotaṃ
analyzed: paccuppannam eva ca tamam vinodenti paññā pana dasa sahassim pi lokadhātum eka pajjotam

original: kātuṃ sakkoti, atītaṃsādipaṭicchādakañca tamaṃ vidhamati. Meghavuṭṭhiyā ca samo saro
analyzed: kātum sakkoti atīta aṃsa ādi paṭicchādakam ca tamam vidhamati megha vuṭṭhiyā ca samaḥ saro

original: nāma natthi. Nadī vā hi hotu taḷākādīni vā, vuṭṭhisamo saro nāma natthi. Meghavuṭṭhiyā
analyzed: nāma natthi nadī vā hi hotu taḷāka ādīni vā vuṭṭhi samaḥ saraḥ nāma natthi megha vuṭṭhiyā

analyzed: hi pacchinnāya mahā samudde aṅguli pabbata emana mattam pi udakam na hoti vuṭṭhiyā pana

analyzed: pavattamānāya eka udakam hoti tasmai bhagavā devatā vacanam

original: paṭikkhipanavasena paṭigāthaṃ vadanto “natthi attasamaṃ pema”ntiādimāha.

original: 124. Kiṃsūdha bhītāti kiṃ nu bhītā. Maggo canekāyatano pavuttoti aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇavasena
analyzed: bhītā ati kim nu bhītā maggo caneka āyatano pavutto ti aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇa vasena

original: anekehi kāraṇehi maggo kathito, evaṃ sante kissa bhītā hutvā ayaṃ janatā dvāsaṭṭhi
analyzed: anekehi kāraṇehi maggo kathitaḥ evam sante kissa bhītā hutvā ayam janatā

original: diṭṭhiyo aggahesīti vadati. Bhūripaññāti bahupañña ussannapañña. Paralokaṃ na bhāyeti

analyzed: ca bhāvanā bhāgiyena ca ati nibbedha bhāgiyena nibbedha bhāgiyam eva hi dassana bhāgiyam

original: bhāvanābhāgiyanti dvidhā bhinditvā dassitaṃ. Lokiyañca lokuttarañcāti lokiyaṃ lokuttarañca
analyzed: dvidhā bhinditvā dassitam lokiyam ca lokuttaram ca ati lokiyam lokuttaram ca

original: suttaṃ, saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi dassanabhāgiyādīhi cāti ubhayehi niddisitabbanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: suttam saṃkilesa bhāgiya ādīhi dassana bhāgiya ādīhi ca ati ubhayehi niddisitabbanti adhippāyaḥ

original: Yasmiṃ suttetiādi niddisanākāradassanaṃ. Tattha saṃkilesabhāgiyanti saṃkilesakoṭṭhāsasahitaṃ,
analyzed: yasmin sutta itiādi niddisana ākāra dassanam tattha saṃkilesa bhāgiyam ti saṃkilesa koṭṭhāsa sahitam

original: saṃkilesatthadīpananti attho. Esa nayo sesesupi.
analyzed: saṃkilesa attha dīpananti atthaḥ esa nayaḥ sesesu pi

original: Evaṃ lokiyattikassa saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi catūhi padehi saṃsandanaṃ dassetvā iminā
analyzed: evam lokiya ttikassa saṃkilesa bhāgiya ādīhi catūhi padehi saṃsandanam dassetvā iminā

original: nayena sesatikānaṃ sesapadānañca saṃsandanaṃ suviññeyyanti taṃ anuddharitvā saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ
analyzed: nayena sesatikānam sesa padānam ca saṃsandanam su viññeyyanti tam an uddharitvā saṃkilesabhāgiya ādīnam

original: samatikkamanaṃ dassetuṃ “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yadipi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ
analyzed: samatikkamanam dassetum vāsanā bhāgiyam sutta nti ādi vuttam tattha yadi pi saṃkilesa bhāgiyam

original: suttaṃ, vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ lokiyameva. Tathāpi lokuttarasuttāni viya lokiyasuttānaṃ
analyzed: suttam vāsanābhāgiyam ca suttam lokiyam eva tathā api lokuttara suttāni viya lokiya suttānam

original: vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyassa samatikkamāya hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: vāsanā bhāgiyam suttam saṃkilesa bhāgiyassa samatikkamāya hoti iti imam attham dassetuṃ

original: “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyassa suttassa nigghātāyā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: vāsanā bhāgiyam suttam saṃkilesa bhāgiyassa suttassa nigghātāya ati vuttam tattha

original: nigghātāyāti pahānāya. Suttasīsena cettha suttattho gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yasmā ca
analyzed: nigghātāya ati pahānāya sutta sīsena ca ittha sutta atthaḥ gahito ti daṭṭhabbam yasmā ca

original: vodānadhammā viya saṃkilesadhammānaṃ dassanabhūmisamatikkamaneneva bhāvanābhūmi adhigantabbā,
analyzed: vodāna dhammā viya saṃkilesa dhammānam dassana bhūmi samatikkamanena iva bhāvanā bhūmi adhigantabbā

original: tasmā “bhāvanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ dassanabhāgiyassa suttassa paṭinissaggāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tasmā bhāvanā bhāgiyam suttam dassana bhāgiyassa suttassa paṭinissaggāya ati vuttam

original: Yasmā pana asekkhadhammesu uppannesu maggabhāvanākiccaṃ nāma natthi. Jhānabhāvanāpi
analyzed: yasmā pana asekkha dhammesu uppannesu magga bhāvanā kiccam nāma natthi jhāna bhāvanā api

original: diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthā eva hoti, tasmā “asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ bhāvanābhāgiyassa
analyzed: diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāra atthā eva hoti tasmai asekkha bhāgiyam suttam bhāvanā bhāgiyassa

original: suttassa paṭinissaggāya, asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārattha”nti ca vuttaṃ.
analyzed: suttassa paṭinissaggāya asekkha bhāgiyam suttam diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāra atthanti ca vuttam

original: Idāni tikapadeheva saṃsanditvā dassetuṃ “lokuttara”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Ekabījinātiādīsu yo sotāpanno hutvā ekameva attabhāvaṃ janetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ ekabījī nāma. Yathāha –
analyzed: idāni tika padehi iva saṃsanditvā dassetum lokuttara ntiādi vuttam ekabījinā iti ādīsu yaḥ sotāpannaḥ hutvā ekam eva atta bhāvam janetvā arahattam pāpuṇāti ayam ekabījī nāma yathā āha

original: “Katamo ca puggalo ekabījī? Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno
analyzed: katamo ca puggalo eka bījī idha ekacco puggalo tiṇṇam saṃyojanānam parikkhayā sotāpanno

original: hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo. So ekaṃyeva mānusakaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā
analyzed: hoti a vinipāta dhammaḥ niyataḥ sambodhi parāyaṇaḥ saḥ ekam yā iva mānusakam bhavam nibbattetvā

original: dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo ekabījī”ti.
analyzed: dukkhassantam karoti ayam vuccati puggalaḥ eka bījī ti

original: Yo pana dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ kolaṃkolo nāma. Yathāha –
analyzed: yaḥ pana dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantam karoti ayam kolaṃkolaḥ nāma yathā āha

original: “Katamo ca puggalo kolaṃkolo? Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ…pe… parāyaṇo. So dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo kolaṃkolo”ti.
analyzed: katamaḥ ca puggalo kolaṃkolaḥ idha ekacco puggalo parāyaṇo so dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantam karoti ayam vuccati puggalo kolaṃkolaḥ ti

original: Tattha kulānīti bhave. Dve vā tīṇi vāti idamettha desanāmattameva. Yāva chaṭṭhabhavā saṃsarantopi kolaṃkolo hoti eva.
analyzed: tattha kulāni iti bhave dve vā tīṇi vā ti idam ettha desanā mattam eva yāva chaṭṭha bhavā saṃsarantaḥ api kolaṃkolaḥ hoti eva

original: Yo pana satta bhave saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti, ayaṃ sattakkhattuparamo nāma. Yathāha –
analyzed: yaḥ pana satta bhave saṃsaritvā dukkhassantam karoti ayam sattakkhattuparamaḥ nāma yathā āha

original: “Katamo ca puggalo sattakkhattuparamo? Idhekacco…pe… parāyaṇo. So sattakkhattuṃ deve
analyzed: katamaḥ ca puggalaḥ satta kkhattu paramaḥ idha ekacca upe parāyaṇaḥ saḥ satta kkhattum deve

original: ceva mānuse ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo
analyzed: ca iva mānuse ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantam karoti ayam vuccati puggalo

original: sattakkhattuparamo”ti.
analyzed: satta kkhattu paramaḥ ti

original: Ko pana tesaṃ etaṃ pabhedaṃ niyametīti? Keci tāva “pubbahetu niyametī”ti vadanti.
analyzed: kaḥ pana tesam etam pabhedam niyameti iti keci tāva pubba hetu niyameti iti vadanti

original: Keci “paṭhamamaggo”, keci “upari tayo maggā”. Keci “tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā”ti.
analyzed: paṭhama maggo keci upari tayo maggā keci tiṇṇam maggānam vipassanā ati

original: Tattha pubbahetu niyametīti vāde paṭhamamaggassa upanissayo kato nāma hoti. Upari
analyzed: tattha pubba hetu niyameti iti vāde paṭhama maggassa upanissayaḥ kataḥ nāma hoti upari

original: tayo maggā nirupanissayā uppannāti āpajjati. Paṭhamamaggo niyametīti vāde upari tiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: tayo maggā nirupanissayāḥ uppannā ti āpajjati paṭhama maggaḥ niyameti iti vāde upari tiṇṇam

original: maggānaṃ niratthakatā āpajjati. Upari tayo maggā niyamentīti vāde “paṭhamamagge anuppanne
analyzed: maggānam niratthaka tā āpajjati upari tayo maggāḥ niyamenti iti vāde paṭhama magge anuppanne

original: eva upari tayo maggā uppannā”ti āpajjati. Vipassanā niyametīti vādo pana yujjati.
analyzed: eva upari tayo maggā uppannāti āpajjati vipassanā niyameti iti vādaḥ pana yujjati

original: Sace hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā balavatī hoti, ekabījī nāma hoti. Tato mandatarā
analyzed: sace hi upari tiṇṇam maggānam vipassanā balavatī hoti ekabījī nāma hoti tatas mandatarā

original: kolaṃkolo. Tato mandatarā sattakkhattuparamoti. Ettha ca yo manussesu eva sattakkhattuṃ
analyzed: kolaṃkolo tatas mandatarā satta kkhattu paramaḥ ti ettha ca yaḥ manussesu eva satta kkhattum

original: saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, yo ca devesuyeva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ
analyzed: saṃsaritvā arahattam pāpuṇāti yaḥ ca devesuyā iva satta kkhattum saṃsaritvā arahattam

original: pāpuṇāti, ime na idhādhippetā. Yo pana kālena devesu, kālena manussesūti vomissakanayena
analyzed: pāpuṇāti ime na idha adhippetāḥ yaḥ pana kālena devesu kālena manussesu iti vomissaka nayena

original: saṃsaritvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, so idhādhippeto. Tasmā “sattakkhattuparamo”ti idaṃ
analyzed: saṃsaritvā arahattam pāpuṇāti saḥ idha adhippeto tasmā satta kkhattu paramaḥ ti idam

original: idhaṭṭhakavokiṇṇavaṭṭajjhāsayassa vasena veditabbaṃ. Vaṭṭajjhāsayo hi ādito paṭṭhāya
analyzed: idhaṭṭhaka vokiṇṇa vaṭṭa jhāsayassa vasena veditabbam vaṭṭa jhāsayaḥ hi āditaḥ paṭṭhāya

original: cha devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbāyissati.
analyzed: cha deva loke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhe ṭhatvā parinibbāyissati

original: Tattha yo saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti, so maggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī
analyzed: tattha yaḥ saddham dhuram katvā sotāpatti maggam nibbatteti so magga kkhaṇe saddhā anusārī

original: nāma hoti. Phalakkhaṇe pana saddhāvimutto nāma hutvā vuttanayena ekabījiādibhedo
analyzed: nāma hoti phala kkhaṇe pana saddhāvimuttaḥ nāma hutvā vutta nayena eka bīji ādi bhedaḥ

original: hoti. Yo pana paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti, so maggakkhaṇe dhammānusārī
analyzed: hoti yaḥ pana paññam dhuram katvā sotāpatti maggam nibbatteti so magga kkhaṇe dhamma anusārī

original: nāma. Phalakkhaṇe pana diṭṭhippatto nāma hutvā ekabījiādibhedo hoti. Idañca aṭṭhannaṃ
analyzed: nāma phala kkhaṇe pana diṭṭhippatto nāma hutvā ekabīji ādi bhedaḥ hoti idam ca aṭṭhannam

original: vimokkhānaṃ alābhino vasena vuttaṃ. Lābhī pana phalakkhaṇe kāyasakkhī nāma hoti.
analyzed: vimokkhānam alābhino vasena vuttam lābhī pana pha lakkhaṇe kāyasakkhī nāma hoti

original: Tattha ye saddhāvimuttadiṭṭhippattakāyasakkhināmakā tayo sotāpannā, te ekabījiādīhi
analyzed: tattha ye tayo sotāpannā te ekabīji ādīhi

original: tīheva saṅgahetvā vuttaṃ – “pañcahi puggalehi niddisitabbaṃ ekabījinā…pe… dhammānusārinā”ti, evaṃ pañcahi.
analyzed: tīhi iva saṅgahetvā vuttam pañcahi puggalehi niddisitabbam dhamma anusārinā ati evam pañcahi

original: Dvādasahi puggalehīti sakadāgāmimaggaṭṭho, sakadāgāmī, anāgāmimaggaṭṭho, abhedena
analyzed: dvādasahi puggalehi iti sakadāgāmi magga ṭṭho sakadāgāmī anāgāmi magga ṭṭho abhedena

analyzed: anāgāmī antarā aparinibbāyi ādayo pañca saddhā vimutta diṭṭhi ppatta kāya sakkhinaḥ tayo ti

original: bhedena aṭṭhāti, evaṃ dvādasahi. Tattha hi yo avihādīsu tattha tattha āyuvemajjhaṃ
analyzed: bhedena evam dvādasa hi tattha hi tattha tattha āyu vemajjham

original: appatvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ antarāparinibbāyī. Yo pana āyuvemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā arahattaṃ
analyzed: a patvā parinibbāyati ayam antarāparinibbāyī yaḥ pana āyu vemajjham atikkamitvā arahattam

original: pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ upahaccaparinibbāyī. Tathā yo avihādīsu upapanno asaṅkhārena appayogena
analyzed: pāpuṇāti ayam upahacca parinibbāyī tathā yaḥ a vihā ādīsu upapannaḥ asaṅkhārena appayogena

analyzed: arahattam adhigacchati ayam asaṅkhāra parinibbāyī yaḥ pana sa saṅkhārena sa payogena

original: arahattaṃ adhigacchati, ayaṃ sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī. Uddhaṃ uparūpari brahmaloke upapattisoto
analyzed: arahattam adhigacchati ayam sa saṅkhāra parinibbāyī uddham upari upari brahmaloke upapatti soto

original: etassāti uddhaṃsoto. Paṭisandhivasena akaniṭṭhe gacchatīti akaniṭṭhagāmī.
analyzed: etassa ati paṭisandhi vasena akaniṭṭhe gacchati iti akaniṭṭha gāmī

original: Tattha atthi uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī atthi uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī, atthi na
analyzed: tattha atthi uddhaṃsotaḥ akaniṭṭha gāmī atthi uddhaṃsotaḥ na akaniṭṭha gāmī atthi na

original: uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī atthi na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmīti. Tattha yo idha anāgāmiphalaṃ
analyzed: uddhaṃsotaḥ akaniṭṭhagāmī atthi na uddhaṃsotaḥ na akaniṭṭhagāmī iti tattha yaḥ idha anāgāmi phalam

original: patvā avihādīsu nibbatto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā uparūpari nibbattitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: patvā a viha ādīsu nibbatto tattha yāvatāyukam ṭhatvā upari upari nibbattitvā akaniṭṭham

original: pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo pana avihādīsu nibbatto tattheva
analyzed: pāpuṇāti ayam uddhaṃsotaḥ akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma yaḥ pana a vihādīsu nibbatto tattha eva

original: aparinibbāyitvā akaniṭṭhampi appatvā uparūpari brahmaloke parinibbāyati, ayaṃ uddhaṃsoto
analyzed: a parinibbāyitvā akaniṭṭham pi ap patvā upari upari brahmaloke parinibbāyati ayam

original: na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo ito cavitvā akaniṭṭheyeva nibbattati, ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto
analyzed: na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma yaḥ itas cavitvā akaniṭṭhā iya iva nibbattati ayam na

original: akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Yo pana avihādīsu catūsu aññatarasmiṃ nibbattitvā tattheva parinibbāyati,
analyzed: akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma yaḥ pana a vihā ādīsu catūsu aññatarasmin nibbattitvā tattha iva parinibbāyati

original: ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma. Saddhāvimuttādayo vuttavibhāgāyeva.
analyzed: ayam na uddhaṃsotaḥ na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma saddhāvimutta ādayaḥ vutta vibhāgāya iva

original: Navahi puggalehīti ettha aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ alābhī arahā paññāvimutto nāma. Tesaṃ
analyzed: navahi puggalehi iti ettha aṭṭhannam vimokkhānam alābhī arahā paññā vimutto nāma tesam

original: pana lābhī vikkhambhanasamucchedavimokkhavasena ubhohi bhāgehi rūpakāyanāmakāyasaṅkhātato

original: ubhato bhāgato vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma. Samasīsināti ettha tividho samasīsī
analyzed: ubhatas bhāgataḥ ubhatobhāgavimuttaḥ nāma samasīsinā ati ettha tividhaḥ samasīsī

original: – iriyāpathasamasīsī, rogasamasīsī, jīvitasamasīsīti.
analyzed: iriyāpatha samasīsī roga samasīsī jīvita samasīsī iti

original: Tatra yo ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu yeneva iriyāpathena samannāgato hutvā vipassanaṃ
analyzed: tatra yaḥ ṭhāna ādīsu iriyāpathesu yena iva iriyāpathena samannāgataḥ hutvā vipassanaṃ

original: ārabhati, teneva iriyāpathena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyati, ayaṃ iriyāpathasamasīsī
analyzed: ārabhati tena iva iriyāpathena arahattam patvā parinibbāyati ayam iriyāpatha samasīsī

original: nāma. Yo pana ekaṃ rogaṃ patvā antoroge eva vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṃ patvā
analyzed: nāma yaḥ pana ekam rogam patvā antoroge eva vipassanam paṭṭhapetvā arahattam patvā

original: teneva rogena parinibbāyati, ayaṃ rogasamasīsī nāma. Palibodhasīsaṃ taṇhā, bandhanasīsaṃ
analyzed: tena iva rogena parinibbāyati ayam rogasamasīsī nāma palibodha sīsam taṇhā bandhana sīsam
