analyzed: māno parāmāsa sīsam diṭṭhi vikkhepa sīsam uddhaccam kilesa sīsam avijjā adhimokkha sīsam

original: saddhā, paggahasīsaṃ vīriyaṃ, upaṭṭhānasīsaṃ sati, avikkhepasīsaṃ samādhi, dassanasīsaṃ
analyzed: saddhā paggaha sīsam vīriyam upaṭṭhāna sīsam sati avikkhepa sīsam samādhi dassana sīsam

original: paññā, pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ, gocarasīsaṃ vimokkho, saṅkhārasīsaṃ nirodhoti
analyzed: paññā pavatta sīsam jīvita indriyam gocara sīsam vimokkho saṅkhāra sīsam nirodho ti

original: terasasu sīsesu kilesasīsaṃ avijjaṃ arahattamaggo pariyādiyati, pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ
analyzed: terasasu sīsesu kilesa sīsam avijjam arahatta maggo pariyādiyati pavatta sīsam jīvita indriyam

original: cuticittaṃ pariyādiyati. Tattha avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ cittaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ pariyādātuṃ
analyzed: cuti cittam pariyādiyati tattha avijjā pariyādāyakam cittam jīvitindriyam pariyādātum

original: na sakkoti. Jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ avijjaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti. Aññaṃ avijjāpariyādāyakaṃ
analyzed: na sakkoti jīvitindriya pariyādāyakam avijjam pariyādātum na sakkoti aññam avijjā pariyādāyakam

original: cittaṃ, aññaṃ jīvitindriyapariyādāyakaṃ. Yassa cetaṃ sīsadvayaṃ samaṃ pariyādānaṃ
analyzed: cittam aññam jīvitindriya pariyādāyakam yassa sīsa dvayam samam pariyādānam

original: gacchati, so jīvitasamasīsī nāma.
analyzed: gacchati saḥ jīvitasamasīsī nāma

original: Kathaṃ panidaṃ samaṃ hotīti? Vārasamatāya. Yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, sotāpattimagge
analyzed: katham panidam samam hoti iti vāra samatāya yasmin hi vāre magga vuṭṭhānam hoti sa utāpatti magge

original: pañca paccavekkhaṇāni, sakadāgāmimagge pañca, anāgāmimagge pañca, arahattamagge cattārīti
analyzed: pañca paccavekkhaṇāni sakadāgāmi magge pañca anāgāmi magge pañca arahatta magge cattāri iti

original: ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā parinibbāyato imāya
analyzed: ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇa ñāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgam otaritvā parinibbāyato imāya

original: vārasamatāya idaṃ ubhayasīsapariyādānampi samaṃ hoti nāma. Tenāyaṃ puggalo “jīvitasamasīsī”ti
analyzed: vāra samatāya idam ubhaya sīsa pariyādānam pi samam hoti nāma tena ayam puggalaḥ jīvita sama sīsī iti

original: vuccati, ayameva idhādhippeto. Evaṃ suññatavimuttādayo tayo saddhāvimutto paññāvimutto
analyzed: vuccati ayam eva idha adhippetaḥ evam suññata vimutta ādayo tayo saddhā vimutto paññā vimutto

original: ubhatobhāgavimutto samasīsīti satta sāvakā arahanto, paccekabuddho, sammāsambuddhoti
analyzed: ubhatobhāga vimutto samasīsī iti satta sāvakāḥ arahanto paccekabuddho sammāsambuddho ti

original: imehi navahi puggalehi asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
analyzed: imehi navahi puggalehi asekkhabhāgiyam suttam niddisitabbam

original: Rāgacaritoti rāgasahitaṃ caritaṃ etassāti rāgacarito. Rāgena vā carito pavattito
analyzed: rāga carito ti rāga sahitam caritam etassa ati rāga caritaḥ rāgena vā caritaḥ pavattitaḥ

original: rāgacarito, rāgajjhāsayo rāgādhikoti attho. Esa nayo sesesupi. Rāgamukhe ṭhitoti
analyzed: rāga caritaḥ rāga ajjhāsayaḥ rāga adhiko ti attho esa nayo sesesu pi rāga mukhe ṭhito ti

original: rāgapariyuṭṭhāne ṭhito, pariyuṭṭhitarāgoti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: rāga pariyuṭṭhāne ṭhitaḥ pariyuṭṭhita rāgaḥ ti attho sesa padesu pi esa eva nayo

original: Vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttanti lokiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ. Lokiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: vāsanābhāgiyam suttanti lokiyam satta adhiṭṭhānam vāsanābhāgiyam suttam lokiyam satta adhiṭṭhānam

original: saṃkilesabhāgiyañhi suttaṃ rāgacaritehi puggalehi niddiṭṭhaṃ. Tattha “lokiyaṃ, sattādhiṭṭhāna”nti
analyzed: saṃkilesa bhāgiyam hi suttam rāga caritehi puggalehi niddiṭṭham tattha lokiyam satta adhiṭṭhānam ti

original: padadvayaṃ anuvattamānaṃ katvā vuttaṃ “vāsanābhāgiya”nti. Sīlavantehīti sīlavantādīhi
analyzed: pada dvayam anuvattamānam katvā vuttam sīlavantehi iti sīlavanta ādīhi

original: puggalehi. Pakatisīlantiādi yehi samannāgatā, te puggalā. Tesaṃ dassanena puggalānaṃ
analyzed: puggalehi yehi samannāgatā te puggalā tesam dassanena puggalānaṃ

original: upalakkhaṇaṃ. Atha vā dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ pakatisīlādivasena, sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ pakatisīlavantādivasena
analyzed: upalakkhaṇam atha vā dhamma adhiṭṭhānam pakati sīla ādi vasena satta adhiṭṭhānam pakati sīlavanta ādi vasena

original: veditabbanti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ “sīlavantehi niddisitabba”nti vatvā “pakatisīla”ntiādi
analyzed: veditabbanti imassa nayassa dassana attham sīlavantehi niddisitabbanti vatvā pakati sīla ntiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Taṃ pakatisīlādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ eva gahaṇaṃ nidassanamattaṃ, pattidānaabbhanumodanadhammassavanadesanādiṭṭhijukammādīnampi
analyzed: vuttam tam pakati sīla ādīnam pañcannam eva gahaṇam nidassana mattam patti dāna abbhanumodana dhamma ssavana desanā diṭṭhi ju kamma ādīnam pi

original: cettha sambhavato. Tesampi vā ettheva saṅgahetvā dassanatthaṃ “pañcā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ca ittha sambhavato tesam pi vā ettha iva saṅgahetvā dassana ttham pañca iti vuttam

original: Tattha pakatisīlanti sampattaviratisīlaṃ. Cittappasādoti kammaphalasaddhā ratanattayasaddhā
analyzed: tattha pakati sīlam ti sampatta virati sīlam citta ppasādaḥ ti kamma phala saddhā

original: ca. Ñāṇaṃ paññāya niddisitabbanti yasmiṃ sutte paññā āgatā, taṃ suttaṃ ñāṇanti niddisitabbaṃ.
analyzed: ca ñāṇam paññāya niddisitabbanti yasmin sutte paññā āgatā tam suttam ñāṇam ti niddisitabbam

original: Na kevalaṃ paññāpariyāyeneva, atha kho paññindriyādipariyāyenapi yattha paññā āgatā,
analyzed: na kevalam paññā pariyāyena iva atha kho paññindriya ādi pariyāyena api yattha paññā āgatā

original: taṃ suttaṃ ñāṇanti niddisitabbanti dassetuṃ “paññindriyenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tassattho
analyzed: tat suttam ñāṇanti niddisitabbanti dassetum paññindriyena ātiādi vuttam tassa atthaḥ

original: – heṭṭhā vutto eva. Yaṃ vā panātiādīsu yaṃ vā aññaṃ kiñci paññāya adhivacanaṃ. Sabbaṃ
analyzed: heṭṭhā vuttaḥ eva yam vā pana ati ādīsu yam vā aññam kiñci paññāya adhivacanam sabbam

original: taṃ yattha katthaci sutte āgataṃ, taṃ suttaṃ ñāṇanti niddisitabbanti attho.
analyzed: tam yattha katthaci sutte āgatam tam suttam ñāṇam ti niddisitabbanti attho

original: Ajjhattikabāhirehīti yasmiṃ sutte ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, bāhirāni ca āyatanāni āgatāni,
analyzed: ajjhattika bāhirehi iti yasmin sutte ajjhattikāni āyatanāni bāhirāni ca āyatanāni āgatāni

original: taṃ suttaṃ tehi āyatanehi ñāṇaṃ ñeyyanti niddisitabbaṃ. Paññāpi ārammaṇabhūtā ñeyyanti
analyzed: tam suttam tehi āyatanehi ñāṇam ñeyyanti niddisitabbam paññā api ārammaṇa bhūtā ñeyyanti

original: ñeyyato visuṃ katvā paññā vuttā. Tathā hi paññā ñāṇantarassa ārammaṇanti katthaci
analyzed: ñeyyataḥ visum katvā paññā vuttā tathā hi paññā ñāṇa antarassa ārammaṇanti katthaci

original: sutte ñeyyabhāvenapi vuccati. Yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇabhūtanti yaṃ kiñci ñāṇassa visayabhūtaṃ
analyzed: sutte ñeyya bhāvena api vuccati yam kiñci ārammaṇa bhūtan ti yam kiñci ñāṇassa visaya bhūtan

original: rūpādi. Ajjhattikaṃ vā bāhiraṃ vāti vā-saddena oḷārikādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Sabbaṃ taṃ
analyzed: rūpa ādi ajjhattikam vā bāhiram vā ati vā saddena oḷārika ādim saṅgaṇhāti sabbam tam

original: saṅkhatena asaṅkhatena cāti sabbaṃ taṃ yathāsambhavaṃ saṅkhatabhāvena asaṅkhatabhāvena
analyzed: saṅkhatena asaṅkhatena ca ati sabbam tam yathāsambhavam saṅkhata bhāvena asaṅkhata bhāvena

original: ca ñeyyanti niddisitabbaṃ. Ñeyyadhammavasena hi ñeyyasuttaṃ ñeyyanti vuccatīti.
analyzed: ca ñeyyanti niddisitabbam ñeyya dhamma vasena hi ñeyya suttam ñeyyanti vuccati iti

original: Yaṃ vā pana kiñci bhagavā aññataravacanaṃ bhāsatīti lokiyalokuttarādisuttesu ekasmiṃ
analyzed: yam vā pana kiñci bhagavā aññatara vacanam bhāsati iti lokiya lokuttara ādi suttesu ekasmin

original: sutte dve. Tesu yaṃ vā pana kiñci aññataravacanaṃ ekasseva kathanaṃ bhāsati niddisati.
analyzed: sutte dve tesu yam vā pana kiñci aññataravacanam ekassa iva kathanam bhāsati niddisati

original: Sabbaṃ taṃ yathāniddiṭṭhaṃ dhārayitabbanti taṃ yathā sabbaṃ suttaṃ lokiyādīsu yadi
analyzed: sabbam tam yathāniddiṭṭham dhārayitabbanti tam yathā sabbam suttam lokiya ādīsu yadi

original: aññataravasena, atha ubhayavasena yathā yathā niddiṭṭhaṃ, tathā tathā gahetabbaṃ,
analyzed: aññatara vasena atha ubhaya vasena yathā yathā niddiṭṭham tathā tathā gahetabbam

original: taṃ taṃ padhānabhāvena niddisitabbanti attho.
analyzed: tam tam padhāna bhāvena niddisitabbanti atthaḥ

original: Kilesasahitaññeva kammaṃ vipākassa hetu, na itaranti vuttaṃ “duvidho hetu yañca kammaṃ
analyzed: kilesa sahitam nā eva kammam vipākassa hetu na itaran ti vuttam duvidhaḥ hetu yat ca kammam

original: ye ca kilesā”ti. Samudayo kilesāti ettha “samudayo”ti etena samudayapakkhiyā vuttā.
analyzed: ye ca kilesā ati samudayo kilesā ati ettha samudayo ti etena samudaya pakkhiyā vuttā

original: “Kilesā”ti ca kilesavanto, saṃkiliṭṭhāti attho. Yaṃ dissatīti yaṃ yaṃ dissati. Tāsu
analyzed: kilesā ati ca kilesavantaḥ saṃkiliṭṭhā ti atthaḥ yam dissati iti yam yam dissati tāsu

original: tāsu bhūmīsūti puthujjanabhūmiādīsu. Kappiyānulomenāti kappiyena ca kappiyānulomena
analyzed: tāsu bhūmīsu uti puthujjana bhūmi ādīsu kappiya anulomena ati kappiyena ca kappiya anulomena

original: ca. Tattha kappiyaṃ pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato vuttaṃ, kappiyānulomaṃ mahāpadesavasena nayato
analyzed: ca tattha kappiyam pāḷiyam sarūpataḥ vuttam kappiya anulomam mahā padesa vasena nayato

original: dassitaṃ. Paṭikkhittakāraṇenāti yena kāraṇena bhagavatā yaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ, tena kāraṇena
analyzed: dassitam paṭikkhitta kāraṇena ati yena kāraṇena bhagavatā yam paṭikkhittam tena kāraṇena

original: taṃ niddisitabbaṃ. Ekantena sarāgādisaṃvattanameva hi bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ, taṃ
analyzed: tat niddisitabbam ekantena sa rāga ādi saṃvattanam eva hi bhagavatā paṭikkhittam tam

original: sarāgāya saṃvattanādikāraṇena niddisitabbaṃ. Dhammassāti asaṅkhatadhammassa. Ariyadhammānanti
analyzed: sa rāgāya saṃvattana ādi kāraṇena niddisitabbam dhammassa ati asaṅkhata dhammassa ariya dhammānam ti

original: maggaphaladhammānaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: magga phala dhammānam sesam su viññeyyam eva

original: Ettha ca yathā saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṃsaggato anekavidho paṭṭhānabhedo
analyzed: ettha ca yathā saṃkilesabhāgiya ādīnam aññam aññam saṃsaggataḥ anekavidhaḥ paṭṭhāna bhedaḥ

original: icchito, evaṃ lokiyasattādhiṭṭhānādisaṃsaggatopi anekavidho paṭṭhānabhedo sambhavati.
analyzed: icchitaḥ evam lokiya sattā adhiṭṭhāna ādi saṃsaggataḥ api anekavidhaḥ paṭṭhāna bhedaḥ sambhavati

original: Pāḷiyaṃ pana ubhayatthāpi ekadesadassanavasena āgatattā nayadassananti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: pāḷiyam pana ubhayattha api eka desa dassana vasena āgata ttā naya dassanan ti veditabbam

original: Sakkā hi iminā nayena viññunā te niddhāretunti. Yathā ca saṃkilesabhāgiyādīnaṃ lokiyādīnañca
analyzed: sakkā hi iminā nayena viññunā te niddhāretunti yathā ca saṃkilesa bhāgiya ādīnam lokiya ādīnam ca

original: visuṃ visuṃ saṃsaggabhedavasena ayaṃ paṭṭhānabhedo anekavidho labbhati, evaṃ ubhayesampi
analyzed: visum visum saṃsagga bheda vasena ayam paṭṭhāna bhedaḥ anekavidhaḥ labbhati evam ubhayesam pi

original: saṃsaggavasena ayaṃ nayo yathārahaṃ labbhateva. Labbhati hi lokiyaṃ suttaṃ kiñci
analyzed: saṃsagga vasena ayam nayaḥ yathāraham labbhatā iva labbhati hi lokiyam suttam kiñci

original: saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ, kiñci vāsanābhāgiyaṃ. Tathā lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ kiñci nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ,
analyzed: saṃkilesa bhāgiyam kiñci vāsanā bhāgiyam tathā lokuttaram suttam kiñci nibbedha bhāgiyam

original: kiñci asekkhabhāgiyanti. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: kiñci sesesu pi esa iva nayo

original: Evaṃ soḷasavidhe paṭṭhāne aṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ pakkhipitvā, aṭṭhavīsatividhe
analyzed: evam soḷasavidhe paṭṭhāne aṭṭhavīsatividham paṭṭhānam pakkhipitvā aṭṭhavīsatividhe

original: ca paṭṭhāne soḷasavidhaṃ pakkhipitvā yathārahaṃ dukatikādibhedena sambhavato paṭṭhānavibhāgo
analyzed: ca paṭṭhāne soḷasavidham pakkhipitvā yathāraham dukatika ādi bhedena sambhavataḥ paṭṭhāna vibhāgaḥ

original: veditabbo, so ca kho tīsu piṭakesu labbhamānassa suttapadassa vasena. Yasmā pana
analyzed: veditabbo saḥ ca kho tīsu piṭakesu labbhamānassa sutta padassa vasena yasmā pana

original: tāni tāni suttapadāni udāharaṇavasena niddhāretvā imasmiṃ atthe vitthāriyamāne atipapañco
analyzed: tāni tāni sutta padāni udāharaṇa vasena niddhāretvā imasmin atthe vitthāriyamāne atipapañcaḥ

original: hoti, atibhāriyā ca nettisaṃvaṇṇanā, sakkā ca iminā nayena viññunā ayamattho viññātuṃ,
analyzed: hoti ati bhāriyā ca netti saṃvaṇṇanā sakkā ca iminā nayena viññunā ayam atthaḥ viññātum

original: tasmā na taṃ vitthārayimha. Teneva hi pāḷiyaṃ aññamaññasaṃsaggavasena paṭṭhānavibhāgo
analyzed: tasmā na tam vitthārayimha tena iva hi pāḷiyam aññamañña saṃsagga vasena paṭṭhāna vibhāgaḥ

original: ekadeseneva dassito, na nippadesatoti.
analyzed: ekadesena iva dassitaḥ na nippadesato ti

original: Sāsanapaṭṭhānavāravaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sāsana paṭṭhāna vāra vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Nigamanakathā
analyzed: nigamana kathā

original: Ettāvatā ca –
analyzed: ettāvatā ca

original: Hāre naye ca paṭṭhāne, suvisuddhavinicchayaṃ;
analyzed: hāre naye ca paṭṭhāne su visuddha vinicchayam

original: Vibhajanto navaṅgassa, sāsanassatthavaṇṇanaṃ.
analyzed: vibhajantaḥ navaṅgassa sāsanassa attha vaṇṇanam

original: Nettippakaraṇaṃ dhīro, gambhīraṃ nipuṇañca yaṃ;
analyzed: dhīraḥ gambhīram nipuṇam ca yam

original: Adesayi mahāthero, mahākaccāyano vasī.
analyzed: adesayi mahā theraḥ mahākaccāyanaḥ vasī

original: Saddhammāvataraṭṭhāne, paṭṭane nāgasavhaye;
analyzed: saddhamma avatara ṭṭhāne paṭṭane nāga sa vhaye

original: Dhammāsokamahārāja-vihāre vasatā mayā.
analyzed: dhammāsoka mahā rājavihāre vasatā mayā

original: Ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ yā tassa, āraddhā atthavaṇṇanā;
analyzed: cira ṭṭhita ttham yā tassa āraddhā attha vaṇṇanā

original: Udāharaṇasuttānaṃ, lakkhaṇānañca sabbaso.
analyzed: udāharaṇa suttānam lakkhaṇānam ca sabbaso

original: Atthaṃ pakāsayantī sā, anākulavinicchayā;
analyzed: attham pakāsayantī sā an ākula vinicchayā

original: Samattā sattavīsāya, pāḷiyā bhāṇavārato.
analyzed: samattā sattavīsāya pāḷiyā bhāṇa vārataḥ

original: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
analyzed: iti tam yam tam adhigatam mayā

original: Puññaṃ tassānubhāvena, lokanāthassa sāsanaṃ.
analyzed: puññam tassa anubhāvena lokanāthassa sāsanam

original: Ogāhetvā visuddhāya, sīlādipaṭipattiyā;
analyzed: ogāhetvā visuddhāya sīla ādi paṭipattiyā

original: Sabbepi dehino hontu, vimuttirasabhāgino.
analyzed: sabbe pi dehinaḥ hontu vimutti rasa bhāginaḥ

original: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu lokasmiṃ, sammāsambuddhasāsanaṃ;
analyzed: ciram tiṭṭhatu lokasmim sammāsambuddha sāsanam

original: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
analyzed: tasmim sa gāravāḥ niccam hontu sabbe pi pāṇinaḥ

original: Sammā vassatu kālena, devopi jagatīpati;
analyzed: sammā vassatu kālena devaḥ api jagatīpati

original: Saddhammanirato lokaṃ, dhammeneva pasāsatūti.
analyzed: saddhamma nirataḥ lokam dhammena iva pasāsatu iti

original: Iti badaratitthavihāravāsinā ācariyadhammapālena katā
analyzed: iti badaratittha vihāra vāsinā ācariya dhammapālena katā

original: Nettippakaraṇassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanā samattāti.
analyzed: netti pakaraṇassa attha saṃvaṇṇanā samattā ati

original: Nettippakaraṇa-aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: netti pakaraṇa aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā
